GE07mbh_01_u:001.109c: avāpa tat pāśupataṃ mahāstraṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.110a: yadāśrauṣaṃ tridivasthaṃ dhanaṃjayaṃ; śakrāt sākṣād divyam astraṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_01_u:001.110c: adhīyānaṃ śaṃsitaṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.111a: yadāśrauṣaṃ vaiśravaṇena sārdhaṃ; samāgataṃ bhīmam anyāṃś ca pārthān
GE07mbh_01_u:001.111c: tasmin deśe mānuṣāṇām agamye; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.112a: yadāśrauṣaṃ ghoṣayātrāgatānāṃ; bandhaṃ gandharvair mokṣaṇaṃ cārjunena
GE07mbh_01_u:001.112c: sveṣāṃ sutānāṃ karṇabuddhau ratānāṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.113a: yadāśrauṣaṃ yakṣarūpeṇa dharmaṃ; samāgataṃ dharmarājena sūta
GE07mbh_01_u:001.113c: praśnān uktān vibruvantaṃ ca samyak; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.114c: virāṭarāṣṭre vasatā mahātmanā; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.115a: yadāśrauṣaṃ satkṛtāṃ matsyarājñā; sutāṃ dattām uttarām arjunāya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.115c: tāṃ cārjunaḥ pratyagṛhṇāt sutārthe; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.116c: akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta yudhiṣṭhirasya; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.117a: yadāśrauṣaṃ naranārāyaṇau tau; kṛṣṇārjunau vadato nāradasya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.117c: ahaṃ draṣṭā brahmaloke sadeti; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.118a: yadāśrauṣaṃ mādhavaṃ vāsudevaṃ; sarvātmanā pāṇḍavārthe niviṣṭam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.118c: yasyemāṃ gāṃ vikramam ekam āhus; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.119a: yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇaduryodhanābhyāṃ; buddhiṃ kṛtāṃ nigrahe keśavasya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.119c: taṃ cātmānaṃ bahudhā darśayānaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.120a: yadāśrauṣaṃ vāsudeve prayāte; rathasyaikām agratas tiṣṭhamānām
GE07mbh_01_u:001.120c: ārtāṃ pṛthāṃ sāntvitāṃ keśavena; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.121a: yadāśrauṣaṃ mantriṇaṃ vāsudevaṃ; tathā bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ ca teṣām
GE07mbh_01_u:001.121c: bhāradvājaṃ cāśiṣo 'nubruvāṇaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.122a: yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇa uvāca bhīṣmaṃ; nāhaṃ yotsye yudhyamāne tvayīti
GE07mbh_01_u:001.122c: hitvā senām apacakrāma caiva; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.123a: yadāśrauṣaṃ vāsudevārjunau tau; tathā dhanur gāṇḍivam aprameyam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.123c: trīṇy ugravīryāṇi samāgatāni; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.124c: kṛṣṇaṃ lokān darśayānaṃ śarīre; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.125a: yadāśrauṣaṃ bhīṣmam amitrakarśanaṃ; nighnantam ājāv ayutaṃ rathānām
GE07mbh_01_u:001.125c: naiṣāṃ kaś cid vadhyate dṛśyarūpas; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.126a: yadāśrauṣaṃ bhīṣmam atyantaśūraṃ; hataṃ pārthenāhaveṣv apradhṛṣyam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.126c: śikhaṇḍinaṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.127a: yadāśrauṣaṃ śaratalpe śayānaṃ; vṛddhaṃ vīraṃ sāditaṃ citrapuṅkhaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.127c: bhīṣmaṃ kṛtvā somakān alpaśeṣāṃs; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.128c: bhūmiṃ bhittvā tarpitaṃ tatra bhīṣmaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.129a: yadāśrauṣaṃ śukrasūryau ca yuktau; kaunteyānām anulomau jayāya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.129c: nityaṃ cāsmāñ śvāpadā vyābhaṣantas; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.130a: yadā droṇo vividhān astramārgān; vidarśayan samare citrayodhī
GE07mbh_01_u:001.130c: na pāṇḍavāñ śreṣṭhatamān nihanti; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.131c: saṃśaptakān nihatān arjunena; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.132a: yadāśrauṣaṃ vyūham abhedyam anyair; bhāradvājenāttaśastreṇa guptam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.132c: bhittvā saubhadraṃ vīram ekaṃ praviṣṭaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.133a: yadābhimanyuṃ parivārya bālaṃ; sarve hatvā hṛṣṭarūpā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.133c: mahārathāḥ pārtham aśaknuvantas; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.134a: yadāśrauṣam abhimanyuṃ nihatya; harṣān mūḍhān krośato dhārtarāṣṭrān
GE07mbh_01_u:001.134c: krodhaṃ muktaṃ saindhave cārjunena; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.135c: satyāṃ nistīrṇāṃ śatrumadhye ca tena; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.136a: yadāśrauṣaṃ śrāntahaye dhanaṃjaye; muktvā hayān pāyayitvopavṛttān
GE07mbh_01_u:001.136c: punar yuktvā vāsudevaṃ prayātaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.137a: yadāśrauṣaṃ vāhaneṣv āśvasatsu; rathopasthe tiṣṭhatā gāṇḍivena
GE07mbh_01_u:001.137c: sarvān yodhān vāritān arjunena; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.138a: yadāśrauṣaṃ nāgabalair durutsahaṃ; droṇānīkaṃ yuyudhānaṃ pramathya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.138c: yātaṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ yatra tau kṛṣṇapārthau; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.139a: yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇam āsādya muktaṃ; vadhād bhīmaṃ kutsayitvā vacobhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.139c: dhanuṣkoṭyā tudya karṇena vīraṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.140a: yadā droṇaḥ kṛtavarmā kṛpaś ca; karṇo drauṇir madrarājaś ca śūraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.140c: amarṣayan saindhavaṃ vadhyamānaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.141a: yadāśrauṣaṃ devarājena dattāṃ; divyāṃ śaktiṃ vyaṃsitāṃ mādhavena
GE07mbh_01_u:001.141c: ghaṭotkace rākṣase ghorarūpe; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.142a: yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇaghaṭotkacābhyāṃ; yuddhe muktāṃ sūtaputreṇa śaktim
GE07mbh_01_u:001.142c: yayā vadhyaḥ samare savyasācī; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.143a: yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇam ācāryam ekaṃ; dhṛṣṭadyumnenābhyatikramya dharmam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.143c: rathopasthe prāyagataṃ viśastaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.144a: yadāśrauṣaṃ drauṇinā dvairathasthaṃ; mādrīputraṃ nakulaṃ lokamadhye
GE07mbh_01_u:001.144c: samaṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavaṃ yudhyamānaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.145a: yadā droṇe nihate droṇaputro; nārāyaṇaṃ divyam astraṃ vikurvan
GE07mbh_01_u:001.145c: naiṣām antaṃ gatavān pāṇḍavānāṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.146a: yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇam atyantaśūraṃ; hataṃ pārthenāhaveṣv apradhṛṣyam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.146c: tasmin bhrātṝṇāṃ vigrahe devaguhye; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.147a: yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇaputraṃ kṛpaṃ ca; duḥśāsanaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam ugram
GE07mbh_01_u:001.147c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ śūnyam adharṣayantaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.148a: yadāśrauṣaṃ nihataṃ madrarājaṃ; raṇe śūraṃ dharmarājena sūta
GE07mbh_01_u:001.148c: sadā saṃgrāme spardhate yaḥ sa kṛṣṇaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.149c: hataṃ saṃgrāme sahadevena pāpaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.150a: yadāśrauṣaṃ śrāntam ekaṃ śayānaṃ; hradaṃ gatvā stambhayitvā tad ambhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.150c: duryodhanaṃ virathaṃ bhagnadarpaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.151a: yadāśrauṣaṃ pāṇḍavāṃs tiṣṭhamānān; gaṅgāhrade vāsudevena sārdham
GE07mbh_01_u:001.151c: amarṣaṇaṃ dharṣayataḥ sutaṃ me; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.152a: yadāśrauṣaṃ vividhāṃs tāta mārgān; gadāyuddhe maṇḍalaṃ saṃcarantam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.152c: mithyā hataṃ vāsudevasya buddhyā; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.153a: yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇaputrādibhis tair; hatān pāñcālān draupadeyāṃś ca suptān
GE07mbh_01_u:001.153c: kṛtaṃ bībhatsam ayaśasyaṃ ca karma; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.154c: kruddhenaiṣīkam avadhīd yena garbhaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.155a: yadāśrauṣaṃ brahmaśiro 'rjunena; muktaṃ svastīty astram astreṇa śāntam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.155c: aśvatthāmnā maṇiratnaṃ ca dattaṃ; tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:001.156a: yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇaputreṇa garbhe; vairāṭyā vai pātyamāne mahāstre
GE07mbh_01_u:001.157a: śocyā gāndhārī putrapautrair vihīnā; tathā vadhvaḥ pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:001.157c: kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ duṣkaraṃ pāṇḍaveyaiḥ; prāptaṃ rājyam asapatnaṃ punas taiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.158a: kaṣṭaṃ yuddhe daśa śeṣāḥ śrutā me; trayo 'smākaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca sapta
GE07mbh_01_u:001.158c: dvyūnā viṃśatir āhatākṣauhiṇīnāṃ; tasmin saṃgrāme vigrahe kṣatriyāṇām
GE07mbh_01_u:001.159a: tamasā tv abhyavastīrṇo moha āviśatīva mām
GE07mbh_01_u:001.159c: saṃjñāṃ nopalabhe sūta mano vihvalatīva me
GE07mbh_01_u:001.160c: mūrcchitaḥ punar āśvastaḥ saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:001.161c: stokaṃ hy api na paśyāmi phalaṃ jīvitadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:001.162b-0059_01: niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ muhyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.162c: gāvalgaṇir idaṃ dhīmān mahārthaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:001.163a: śrutavān asi vai rājño mahotsāhān mahābalān
GE07mbh_01_u:001.165c: asmiṃl loke yaśaḥ prāpya tataḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.166a: vainyaṃ mahārathaṃ vīraṃ sṛñjayaṃ jayatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.167a: bāhlīkaṃ damanaṃ śaibyaṃ śaryātim ajitaṃ jitam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.168a: maruttaṃ manum ikṣvākuṃ gayaṃ bharatam eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:001.169a: yayātiṃ śubhakarmāṇaṃ devair yo yājitaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.171a: tebhyaś cānye gatāḥ pūrvaṃ rājāno balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.172a: pūruḥ kurur yaduḥ śūro viṣvagaśvo mahādhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.172c: anenā yuvanāśvaś ca kakutstho vikramī raghuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.173a: vijitī vītihotraś ca bhavaḥ śveto bṛhadguruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.174a: dambhodbhavaḥ paro venaḥ sagaraḥ saṃkṛtir nimiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.179a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.180c: rājāno nidhanaṃ prāptās tava putrair mahattamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.181a: yeṣāṃ divyāni karmāṇi vikramas tyāga eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:001.181c: māhātmyam api cāstikyaṃ satyatā śaucam ārjavam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.183a: tava putrā durātmānaḥ prataptāś caiva manyunā
GE07mbh_01_u:001.183c: lubdhā durvṛttabhūyiṣṭhā na tāñ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:001.184c: yeṣāṃ śāstrānugā buddhir na te muhyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:001.186a: bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca nātaḥ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:001.187a: vidhātṛvihitaṃ mārgaṃ na kaś cid ativartate
GE07mbh_01_u:001.188a: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.188c: nirdahantaṃ prajāḥ kālaṃ kālaḥ śamayate punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.189a: kālo vikurute bhāvān sarvāṃl loke śubhāśubhān
GE07mbh_01_u:001.189c: kālaḥ saṃkṣipate sarvāḥ prajā visṛjate punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.189d-0061_01: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:001.189e: kālaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu caraty avidhṛtaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.190a: atītānāgatā bhāvā ye ca vartanti sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.190c: tān kālanirmitān buddhvā na saṃjñāṃ hātum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:001.190d-0063_02: āśvāsya svastham akarot sūto gāvalgaṇis tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:001.190d-0064_01: evam uktvā ca rājānaṃ saṃjayo virarāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:001.190d-0064_02: dhṛtarāṣṭro 'pi tac chrutvā dhṛtim eva samāśrayat
GE07mbh_01_u:001.190d-0064_03: diṣṭyedam āgatam iti matvā sa prājñasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.191f-0066_01: bhārataṃ bhānumān indur yadi na syur amī trayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.192a: devarṣayo hy atra puṇyā brahmarājarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:001.193c: sa hi satyam ṛtaṃ caiva pavitraṃ puṇyam eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:001.194a: śāśvataṃ brahma paramaṃ dhruvaṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.195a: asat sat sad asac caiva yasmād devāt pravartate
GE07mbh_01_u:001.195c: saṃtatiś ca pravṛttiś ca janma mṛtyuḥ punarbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.196c: avyaktādi paraṃ yac ca sa eva parigīyate
GE07mbh_01_u:001.198c: āsevann imam adhyāyaṃ naraḥ pāpāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:001.199c: āstikaḥ satataṃ śṛṇvan na kṛcchreṣv avasīdati
GE07mbh_01_u:001.200a: ubhe saṃdhye japan kiṃ cit sadyo mucyeta kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_01_u:001.200c: anukramaṇyā yāvat syād ahnā rātryā ca saṃcitam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.201a: bhāratasya vapur hy etat satyaṃ cāmṛtam eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:001.201b-0067_01: divyā yajñāś ca nikhilā viṣṇuś copaniṣan mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:001.201c: navanītaṃ yathā dadhno dvipadāṃ brāhmaṇo yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:001.202a: hradānām udadhiḥ śreṣṭho gaur variṣṭhā catuṣpadām
GE07mbh_01_u:001.203a: yaś cainaṃ śrāvayec chrāddhe brāhmaṇān pādam antataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.204c: bibhety alpaśrutād vedo mām ayaṃ pratariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:001.205a: kārṣṇaṃ vedam imaṃ vidvāñ śrāvayitvārtham aśnute
GE07mbh_01_u:001.205c: bhrūṇahatyākṛtaṃ cāpi pāpaṃ jahyān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.206a: ya imaṃ śucir adhyāyaṃ paṭhet parvaṇi parvaṇi
GE07mbh_01_u:001.206c: adhītaṃ bhārataṃ tena kṛtsnaṃ syād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.207a: yaś cemaṃ śṛṇuyān nityam ārṣaṃ śraddhāsamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.207c: sa dīrgham āyuḥ kīrtiṃ ca svargatiṃ cāpnuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.208a: catvāra ekato vedā bhārataṃ caikam ekataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:001.208d-0069_01: caturbhyaḥ sarahasyebhyo vedebhyo hy adhikaṃ yadā
GE07mbh_01_u:001.208e: mahattve ca gurutve ca dhriyamāṇaṃ tato 'dhikam
GE07mbh_01_u:001.209c: niruktam asya yo veda sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:001.210a: tapo na kalko 'dhyayanaṃ na kalkaḥ; svābhāviko vedavidhir na kalkaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:002.236d-005_0017: bhaviṣyaty upajīvyaṃ ca kavīnām idam annavat
GE07mbh_01_u:002.236d-005_0018: na cāsya kavayaḥ ke cid bhaviṣyanti viśeṣaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:002.236d-005_0019: viśeṣaṇe gṛhasthasya traya evāśramā yathā dhanyam ārogyam āyuṣyaṃ puṇyaṃ satkarmasādhakam
GE07mbh_01_u:002.236d-005_0022: yad adhītaṃ tadā samyag dvijaśreṣṭhair dvijottamāt
GE07mbh_01_u:002.240a: anāśrityaitad ākhyānaṃ kathā bhuvi na vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:002.241d-0187_01: asya kāvyasya kavayo na samarthā viśeṣaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:002.241d-0187_02: sādhor iva gṛhasthasya śeṣās traya ivāśramāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:002.241d-0188_02: sa hy eka eva paralokagatasya bandhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:002.241d-0188_03: arthāḥ striyaś ca nipuṇair api sevyamānā
GE07mbh_01_u:002.242a: dvaipāyanauṣṭhapuṭaniḥsṛtam aprameyaṃ; puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca
GE07mbh_01_u:002.242c: yo bhārataṃ samadhigacchati vācyamānaṃ; kiṃ tasya puṣkarajalair abhiṣecanena
GE07mbh_01_u:002.242d-0189_01: yad ahnā kurute pāpaṃ brāhmaṇas tv indriyaiś caran
GE07mbh_01_u:002.242d-0190_01: yad rātrau kurute pāpaṃ karmaṇā manasā girā
GE07mbh_01_u:002.242d-0191_03: puṇyāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ śṛṇuyāc ca nityaṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:002.242d-0191_04: tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya caiva
GE07mbh_01_u:002.243a: ākhyānaṃ tad idam anuttamaṃ mahārthaṃ; vinyastaṃ mahad iha parvasaṃgraheṇa
GE07mbh_01_u:002.243c: śrutvādau bhavati nṛṇāṃ sukhāvagāhaṃ; vistīrṇaṃ lavaṇajalaṃ yathā plavena
GE07mbh_01_u:003.001A: janamejayaḥ pārikṣitaḥ saha bhrātṛbhiḥ kurukṣetre dīrghasatram upāste
GE07mbh_01_u:003.001B: tasya bhrātaras trayaḥ śrutasena ugraseno bhīmasena iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.002A: teṣu tat satram upāsīneṣu tatra śvābhyāgacchat sārameyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.002B: sa janamejayasya bhrātṛbhir abhihato rorūyamāṇo mātuḥ samīpam upāgacchat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.005B: vyaktaṃ tvayā tatrāparāddhaṃ yenāsy abhihata iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.007A: tac chrutvā tasya mātā saramā putraśokārtā tat satram upāgacchad yatra sa janamejayaḥ saha bhrātṛbhir dīrghasatram upāste
GE07mbh_01_u:003.008-0192_01: na kiṃ cid uktavantas te | sā tān uvāca |
GE07mbh_01_u:003.008B: ayaṃ me putro na kiṃ cid aparādhyati
GE07mbh_01_u:003.008D: yasmāc cāyam abhihato 'napakārī tasmād adṛṣṭaṃ tvāṃ bhayam āgamiṣyatīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.009A: sa janamejaya evam ukto devaśunyā saramayā dṛḍhaṃ saṃbhrānto viṣaṇṇaś cāsīt
GE07mbh_01_u:003.010A: sa tasmin satre samāpte hāstinapuraṃ pratyetya purohitam anurūpam anvicchamānaḥ paraṃ yatnam akarod yo me pāpakṛtyāṃ śamayed iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.011A: sa kadā cin mṛgayāṃ yātaḥ pārikṣito janamejayaḥ kasmiṃś cit svaviṣayoddeśe āśramam apaśyat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.012A: tatra kaś cid ṛṣir āsāṃ cakre śrutaśravā nāma
GE07mbh_01_u:003.013A: tasya taṃ putram abhigamya janamejayaḥ pārikṣitaḥ paurohityāya vavre
GE07mbh_01_u:003.014B: bhagavann ayaṃ tava putro mama purohito 'stv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.015B: bho janamejaya putro 'yaṃ mama sarpyāṃ jātaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.015C: mahātapasvī svādhyāyasaṃpanno mattapovīryasaṃbhṛto macchukraṃ pītavatyās tasyāḥ kukṣau saṃvṛddhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.015D: samartho 'yaṃ bhavataḥ sarvāḥ pāpakṛtyāḥ śamayitum antareṇa mahādevakṛtyām
GE07mbh_01_u:003.015F: yad enaṃ kaś cid brāhmaṇaḥ kaṃ cid artham abhiyācet taṃ tasmai dadyād ayam
GE07mbh_01_u:003.015G: yady etad utsahase tato nayasvainam iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.017C: yad ayaṃ brūyāt tat kāryam avicārayadbhir iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.018A: tenaivam uktā bhrātaras tasya tathā cakruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.018B: sa tathā bhrātṝn saṃdiśya takṣaśilāṃ pratyabhipratasthe
GE07mbh_01_u:003.018C: taṃ ca deśaṃ vaśe sthāpayām āsa
GE07mbh_01_u:003.019A: etasminn antare kaś cid ṛṣir dhaumyo nāmāyodaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.019B: tasya śiṣyās trayo babhūvur upamanyur āruṇir vedaś ceti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.020A: sa ekaṃ śiṣyam āruṇiṃ pāñcālyaṃ preṣayām āsa
GE07mbh_01_u:003.021A: sa upādhyāyena saṃdiṣṭa āruṇiḥ pāñcālyas tatra gatvā tat kedārakhaṇḍaṃ baddhuṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.024A: tataḥ kadā cid upādhyāya āyodo dhaumyaḥ śiṣyān apṛcchat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.026A: sa evam uktas tāñ śiṣyān pratyuvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:003.026B: tasmāt sarve tatra gacchāmo yatra sa iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.027A: sa tatra gatvā tasyāhvānāya śabdaṃ cakāra
GE07mbh_01_u:003.028A: sa tac chrutvā āruṇir upādhyāyavākyaṃ tasmāt kedārakhaṇḍāt sahasotthāya tam upādhyāyam upatasthe
GE07mbh_01_u:003.028C: ayam asmy atra kedārakhaṇḍe niḥsaramāṇam udakam avāraṇīyaṃ saṃroddhuṃ saṃviṣṭo bhagavacchabdaṃ śrutvaiva sahasā vidārya kedārakhaṇḍaṃ bhavantam upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.029B: yasmād bhavān kedārakhaṇḍam avadāryotthitas tasmād bhavān uddālaka eva nāmnā bhaviṣyatīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.030C: sarve ca te vedāḥ pratibhāsyanti sarvāṇi ca dharmaśāstrāṇīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.031A: sa evam ukta upādhyāyeneṣṭaṃ deśaṃ jagāma
GE07mbh_01_u:003.034B: sa cāhani gā rakṣitvā divasakṣaye 'bhyāgamyopādhyāyasyāgrataḥ sthitvā namaścakre
GE07mbh_01_u:003.037-0193_01: sa tathety uktvā bhaikṣaṃ caritvopādhyāyāya nyavedayat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.037-0193_02: sa tasmād upādhyāyaḥ sarvam eva bhaikṣam agṛhṇāt |
GE07mbh_01_u:003.038A: sa tathety uktvā punar arakṣad gāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.039A: tam upādhyāyas tathāpi pīvānam eva dṛṣṭvovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:003.039B: vatsopamanyo sarvam aśeṣatas te bhaikṣaṃ gṛhṇāmi
GE07mbh_01_u:003.041C: anyeṣām api vṛttyuparodhaṃ karoṣy evaṃ vartamānaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.042B: rakṣitvā ca punar upādhyāyagṛham āgamyopādhyāyasyāgrataḥ sthitvā namaścakre
GE07mbh_01_u:003.043A: tam upādhyāyas tathāpi pīvānam eva dṛṣṭvā
GE07mbh_01_u:003.043B: ahaṃ te sarvaṃ bhaikṣaṃ gṛhṇāmi na cānyac carasi
GE07mbh_01_u:003.044B: bho etāsāṃ gavāṃ payasā vṛttiṃ kalpayāmīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.045B: naitan nyāyyaṃ paya upayoktuṃ bhavato mayānanujñātam iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.046A: sa tatheti pratijñāya gā rakṣitvā punar upādhyāyagṛhān etya guror agrataḥ sthitvā
GE07mbh_01_u:003.048B: bhoḥ phenaṃ pibāmi yam ime vatsā mātṝṇāṃ stanaṃ pibanta udgirantīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.049B: ete tvadanukampayā guṇavanto vatsāḥ prabhūtataraṃ phenam udgiranti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.049C: tad evam api vatsānāṃ vṛttyuparodhaṃ karoṣy evaṃ vartamānaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.049D: phenam api bhavān na pātum arhatīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.050A: sa tatheti pratijñāya nirāhāras tā gā arakṣat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.050B: tathā pratiṣiddho bhaikṣaṃ nāśnāti na cānyac carati
GE07mbh_01_u:003.051A: sa kadā cid araṇye kṣudhārto 'rkapatrāṇy abhakṣayat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.052A: sa tair arkapatrair bhakṣitaiḥ kṣārakaṭūṣṇavipākibhiś cakṣuṣy upahato 'ndho 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.053-0194_01: nāyāty upamanyuḥ | ta ūcuḥ | vanaṃ gato gā rakṣitum iti |
GE07mbh_01_u:003.053A: atha tasminn anāgacchaty upādhyāyaḥ śiṣyān avocat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.054A: sa evam uktvā gatvāraṇyam upamanyor āhvānaṃ cakre
GE07mbh_01_u:003.055B: ayam asmi bho upādhyāya kūpe patita iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.058C: tau tvāṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ kariṣyato devabhiṣajāv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.059A: sa evam ukta upādhyāyena stotuṃ pracakrame devāv aśvinau vāgbhir ṛgbhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.060a: pra pūrvagau pūrvajau citrabhānū; girā vā śaṃsāmi tapanāv anantau
GE07mbh_01_u:003.060c: divyau suparṇau virajau vimānāv; adhikṣiyantau bhuvanāni viśvā
GE07mbh_01_u:003.061a: hiraṇmayau śakunī sāṃparāyau; nāsatyadasrau sunasau vaijayantau
GE07mbh_01_u:003.061c: śukraṃ vayantau tarasā suvemāv; abhi vyayantāv asitaṃ vivasvat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.062a: grastāṃ suparṇasya balena vartikām; amuñcatām aśvinau saubhagāya
GE07mbh_01_u:003.062c: tāvat suvṛttāv anamanta māyayā; sattamā gā aruṇā udāvahan
GE07mbh_01_u:003.063a: ṣaṣṭiś ca gāvas triśatāś ca dhenava; ekaṃ vatsaṃ suvate taṃ duhanti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.063c: nānāgoṣṭhā vihitā ekadohanās; tāv aśvinau duhato gharmam ukthyam
GE07mbh_01_u:003.064a: ekāṃ nābhiṃ saptaśatā arāḥ śritāḥ; pradhiṣv anyā viṃśatir arpitā arāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.064c: anemi cakraṃ parivartate 'jaraṃ; māyāśvinau samanakti carṣaṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:003.065a: ekaṃ cakraṃ vartate dvādaśāraṃ pradhi;ṣaṇṇābhim ekākṣam amṛtasya dhāraṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:003.065c: yasmin devā adhi viśve viṣaktās; tāv aśvinau muñcato mā viṣīdatam
GE07mbh_01_u:003.066a: aśvināv indram amṛtaṃ vṛttabhūyau; tirodhattām aśvinau dāsapatnī
GE07mbh_01_u:003.066c: bhittvā girim aśvinau gām udācarantau; tadvṛṣṭamahnā prathitā valasya
GE07mbh_01_u:003.067a: yuvāṃ diśo janayatho daśāgre; samānaṃ mūrdhni rathayā viyanti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.067c: tāsāṃ yātam ṛṣayo 'nuprayānti; devā manuṣyāḥ kṣitim ācaranti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.068a: yuvāṃ varṇān vikurutho viśvarūpāṃs; te 'dhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā
GE07mbh_01_u:003.068c: te bhānavo 'py anusṛtāś caranti; devā manuṣyāḥ kṣitim ācaranti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.069a: tau nāsatyāv aśvināv āmahe vāṃ; srajaṃ ca yāṃ bibhṛthaḥ puṣkarasya
GE07mbh_01_u:003.069c: tau nāsatyāv amṛtāvṛtāvṛdhāv; ṛte devās tat prapadena sūte
GE07mbh_01_u:003.070a: mukhena garbhaṃ labhatāṃ yuvānau; gatāsur etat prapadena sūte
GE07mbh_01_u:003.070c: sadyo jāto mātaram atti garbhas; tāv aśvinau muñcatho jīvase gāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.072C: na tv aham etam apūpam upayoktum utsahe anivedya gurava iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.073B: āvābhyāṃ purastād bhavata upādhyāyenaivam evābhiṣṭutābhyām apūpaḥ prītābhyāṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.073D: tvam api tathaiva kuruṣva yathā kṛtam upādhyāyeneti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.074A: sa evam uktaḥ punar eva pratyuvācaitau
GE07mbh_01_u:003.076A: sa evam ukto 'śvibhyāṃ labdhacakṣur upādhyāyasakāśam āgamyopādhyāyam abhivādyācacakṣe
GE07mbh_01_u:003.079A: athāparaḥ śiṣyas tasyaivāyodasya dhaumyasya vedo nāma
GE07mbh_01_u:003.080C: bhavatā madgṛhe kaṃ cit kālaṃ śuśrūṣamāṇena bhavitavyam
GE07mbh_01_u:003.081A: sa tathety uktvā gurukule dīrghakālaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇaparo 'vasat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.081B: gaur iva nityaṃ guruṣu dhūrṣu niyujyamānaḥ śītoṣṇakṣuttṛṣṇāduḥkhasahaḥ sarvatrāpratikūlaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.083A: sa upādhyāyenānujñātaḥ samāvṛttas tasmād gurukulavāsād gṛhāśramaṃ pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:003.083B: tasyāpi svagṛhe vasatas trayaḥ śiṣyā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.084C: duḥkhābhijño hi gurukulavāsasya śiṣyān parikleśena yojayituṃ neyeṣa
GE07mbh_01_u:003.085A: atha kasya cit kālasya vedaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ janamejayaḥ pauṣyaś ca kṣatriyāv upetyopādhyāyaṃ varayāṃ cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.086A: sa kadā cid yājyakāryeṇābhiprasthita uttaṅkaṃ nāma śiṣyaṃ niyojayām āsa
GE07mbh_01_u:003.086B: bho uttaṅka yat kiṃ cid asmadgṛhe parihīyate tad icchāmy aham aparihīṇaṃ bhavatā kriyamāṇam iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.087A: sa evaṃ pratisamādiśyottaṅkaṃ vedaḥ pravāsaṃ jagāma
GE07mbh_01_u:003.088A: athottaṅko guruśuśrūṣur guruniyogam anutiṣṭhamānas tatra gurukule vasati sma
GE07mbh_01_u:003.089D: asyā yathāyam ṛtur vandhyo na bhavati tathā kriyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:003.090-0197_01: tasya strīvākyaṃ na kāryam iti dharmalopabhayād evam avadat |
GE07mbh_01_u:003.090A: sa evam uktas tāḥ striyaḥ pratyuvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:003.090B: na mayā strīṇāṃ vacanād idam akāryaṃ kāryam
GE07mbh_01_u:003.091A: tasya punar upādhyāyaḥ kālāntareṇa gṛhān upajagāma tasmāt pravāsāt
GE07mbh_01_u:003.091B: sa tadvṛttaṃ tasyāśeṣam upalabhya prītimān abhūt
GE07mbh_01_u:003.092-0198_01: sa uvāca | sarvaṃ kṛtam iti | upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca |
GE07mbh_01_u:003.094A: yaś cādharmeṇa vibrūyād yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati
GE07mbh_01_u:003.095B: so 'ham anujñāto bhavatā icchāmīṣṭaṃ te gurvartham upahartum iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.097A: sa kadā cit tam upādhyāyam āhottaṅkaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.097C: kiṃ te priyam upaharāmi gurvartham iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.098-0199_01: tenaivam ukta upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca | kimartham upahareyam iti |
GE07mbh_01_u:003.098B: vatsottaṅka bahuśo māṃ codayasi gurvartham upahareyam iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.099C: tad icchāmīṣṭaṃ te gurvartham upahṛtyānṛṇo gantum
GE07mbh_01_u:003.100G: śobhamānā yathā tābhyāṃ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ tasminn ahani saṃpādayasva
GE07mbh_01_u:003.100H: śreyo hi te syāt kṣaṇaṃ kurvata iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.101B: sa pathi gacchann apaśyad ṛṣabham atipramāṇaṃ tam adhirūḍhaṃ ca puruṣam atipramāṇam eva
GE07mbh_01_u:003.105A: sa evam ukto bāḍham ity uktvā tadā tad ṛṣabhasya purīṣaṃ mūtraṃ ca bhakṣayitvottaṅkaḥ pratasthe yatra sa kṣatriyaḥ pauṣyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.108B: gurvarthe kuṇḍalābhyām arthy āgato 'smīti ye te kṣatriyayā pinaddhe kuṇḍale te bhavān dātum arhatīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.109-0200_01: tasyās tat strīdhanaṃ iṃdreṇa yajñe tuṣṭena dattam āsīt |
GE07mbh_01_u:003.110A: sa tenaivam uktaḥ praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ kṣatriyāṃ nāpaśyat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.112A: sa evam uktaḥ pauṣyas taṃ pratyuvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:003.112D: na hi sā kṣatriyā ucchiṣṭenāśucinā vā śakyā draṣṭum
GE07mbh_01_u:003.113B: asti khalu mayocchiṣṭenopaspṛṣṭaṃ śīghraṃ gacchatā ceti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.115A_0: athottaṅkas tathety uktvā prāṅmukha upaviśya suprakṣālitapāṇipādavadano 'śabdābhir
GE07mbh_01_u:003.115A_1: hṛdayaṃgamābhir adbhir upaspṛśya triḥ pītvā dviḥ parimṛjya khāny adbhir upaspṛśyāntaḥpuraṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.117B: ete kuṇḍale gurvarthaṃ me bhikṣite dātum arhasīti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.118A: sā prītā tena tasya sadbhāvena pātram ayam anatikramaṇīyaś ceti matvā te kuṇḍale avamucyāsmai prāyacchat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.120A: sa evam uktas tāṃ kṣatriyāṃ pratyuvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:003.120C: na māṃ śaktas takṣako nāgarājo dharṣayitum iti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.121A: sa evam uktvā tāṃ kṣatriyām āmantrya pauṣyasakāśam āgacchat
GE07mbh_01_u:003.124C: śīghram icchāmi yathopapannam annam upahṛtaṃ bhavateti
GE07mbh_01_u:003.125A: sa tathety uktvā yathopapannenānnenainaṃ bhojayām āsa
GE07mbh_01_u:003.126A: athottaṅkaḥ śītam annaṃ sakeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā aśucy etad iti matvā

GE07mbh_01_u:003.127-0201_02: pratiśāpaṃ dātum | tasmād annam eva pratyakṣīkuru |

GE07mbh_01_u:003.162B: upādhyāyinī ca snātā keśān āvapayanty upaviṣṭottaṅko nāgacchatīti śāpāyāsya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_01_u:003.166B: bhos takṣakeṇa nāgarājena vighnaḥ kṛto 'smin karmaṇi
GE07mbh_01_u:003.167A: tatra ca mayā dṛṣṭe striyau tantre 'dhiropya paṭaṃ vayantyau
GE07mbh_01_u:003.167B: tasmiṃś ca tantre kṛṣṇāḥ sitāś ca tantavaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:003.172B: ye te striyau dhātā vidhātā ca

GE07mbh_01_u:003.173A: yad api tac cakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ ṣaṭ kumārāḥ parivartayanti te ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ saṃvatsaraś cakram
GE07mbh_01_u:003.174A: ya ṛṣabhas tvayā pathi gacchatā dṛṣṭaḥ sa airāvato nāgarājaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:003.179c: samyag vijayinaṃ dṛṣṭvā samantān mantribhir vṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:003.180a: tasmai jayāśiṣaḥ pūrvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ prayujya saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:003.181c: bālyād ivānyad eva tvaṃ kuruṣe nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:003.182a: evam uktas tu vipreṇa sa rājā pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:003.182c: janamejayaḥ prasannātmā samyak saṃpūjya taṃ munim
GE07mbh_01_u:003.183a: āsāṃ prajānāṃ paripālanena; svaṃ kṣatradharmaṃ paripālayāmi
GE07mbh_01_u:003.183c: prabrūhi vā kiṃ kriyatāṃ dvijendra; śuśrūṣur asmy adya vacas tvadīyam

GE07mbh_01_u:003.184c: uvāca rājānam adīnasattvaṃ; svam eva kāryaṃ nṛpateś ca yat tat

GE07mbh_01_u:004.002-0213_01: mayodaṅkasya caritam aśeṣam uktam | janamejayasya sarpasatrasya
GE07mbh_01_u:004.003B: paramaṃ lomaharṣaṇe prakṣyāmas tvāṃ vakṣyasi ca naḥ śuśrūṣatāṃ kathāyogam

GE07mbh_01_u:004.007c: tato vakṣyasi yat tvāṃ sa prakṣyati dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:004.008a: evam astu gurau tasminn upaviṣṭe mahātmani
GE07mbh_01_u:004.008c: tena pṛṣṭaḥ kathāḥ puṇyā vakṣyāmi vividhāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:004.009a: so 'tha viprarṣabhaḥ kāryaṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_01_u:004.009c: devān vāgbhiḥ pitṝn adbhis tarpayitvājagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:004.010a: yatra brahmarṣayaḥ siddhās ta āsīnā yatavratāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:004.011a: ṛtvikṣv atha sadasyeṣu sa vai gṛhapatis tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.001a: purāṇam akhilaṃ tāta pitā te 'dhītavān purā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.001c: kaccit tvam api tat sarvam adhīṣe lomaharṣaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:005.002a: purāṇe hi kathā divyā ādivaṃśāś ca dhīmatām
GE07mbh_01_u:005.002c: kathyante tāḥ purāsmābhiḥ śrutāḥ pūrvaṃ pitus tava
GE07mbh_01_u:005.003a: tatra vaṃśam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārgavam
GE07mbh_01_u:005.003c: kathayasva kathām etāṃ kalyāḥ sma śravaṇe tava

GE07mbh_01_u:005.005c: tat tāvac chṛṇu yo devaiḥ sendraiḥ sāgnimarudgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006a: imaṃ vaṃśam ahaṃ brahman bhārgavaṃ te mahāmune
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-0215_01: śṛṇuṣvāvahito brahman purāṇe yac chrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-0216_01: bhṛgur maharṣir bhagavān brahmaṇā vai svayaṃbhuvā
