GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0001: bhṛgor babhūvuḥ ṣaṭ putrās tapasā bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0002: kaviś ca cyavanaś caiva śaṅkhalaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0003: suraśmiḥ saptaraśmiś ca vitathaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0004: vītahavyasya tanayaḥ smṛto gṛtsamadaḥ prabhuḥ gṛtsasyāpi sutas tv asya brahman sāvedaso 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0006: sāvedasya tu putro 'bhūd ūrvaḥ śrutavatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0007: ūrvasya tu vihavyo 'bhūd brahmasūnur mahātmanaḥ vihavyasya tu dāyādo viharaḥ kīrtimān smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0009: viharasyātmavān putro vatsaś cādhirathaḥ smṛtaḥ vatsasyāpi vinindas tu sūnur āsīn mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0011: bhṛgor vinindasya sutaḥ sadyo nāma babhūva ha
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0012: sadyasyāpy ātmajo brahman vitto nāma suvīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0013: vittasya tu mahātejā babhūva ca śrutaśravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0014: śrutaśravasas tu sūnur babhūva tapavān prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0016: ūrdhvaḥ prakāśasya suto brahmarṣir brahmavittamaḥ brahmasṛṣṭo mato yena yena pūrvaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0018: ūrdhvasya caiva vāgindro vāgindro brahmavādinaḥ ṛcīkas tasya tanayo brahmasūnur mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0021: jamadagnes tu vai pañca āsan putrā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0022: rumaṇvāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vasur viśvāvasus tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.006d-006_0023: rāmas tasya jaghanyo 'bhūn mahāstro reṇukāsutaḥ triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī yena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.007a: bhṛgoḥ sudayitaḥ putraś cyavano nāma bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.007e: pramater apy abhūt putro ghṛtācyāṃ rurur ity uta
GE07mbh_01_u:005.008a: ruror api suto jajñe śunako vedapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.009a: tapasvī ca yaśasvī ca śrutavān brahmavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.014a: taṃ praviśyāśramaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛgor bhāryām aninditām
GE07mbh_01_u:005.015a: abhyāgataṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ pulomā cārudarśanā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.016a: tāṃ tu rakṣas tato brahman hṛcchayenābhipīḍitam
GE07mbh_01_u:005.016c: dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭam abhūt tatra jihīrṣus tām aninditām
GE07mbh_01_u:005.016d-0217_01: jātam ity abravīt kāryaṃ jihīrṣur muditaḥ śubhām
GE07mbh_01_u:005.016d-0217_02: sā hi pūrvaṃ vṛtā tena pulomnā tu śucismitā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.016d-0217_03: tāṃ tu prādāt pitā paścād bhṛgave śāstravat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.016d-0217_04: tasya tat kilbiṣaṃ nityaṃ hṛdi vartati bhārgava
GE07mbh_01_u:005.016d-0217_05: idam antaram ity evaṃ hartuṃ cakre manas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.017c: tam apṛcchat tato rakṣaḥ pāvakaṃ jvalitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.018a: śaṃsa me kasya bhāryeyam agne pṛṣṭa ṛtena vai
GE07mbh_01_u:005.018c: satyas tvam asi satyaṃ me vada pāvaka pṛcchate
GE07mbh_01_u:005.019c: paścāt tv imāṃ pitā prādād bhṛgave 'nṛtakāriṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:005.020a: seyaṃ yadi varārohā bhṛgor bhāryā rahogatā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.020c: tathā satyaṃ samākhyāhi jihīrṣāmy āśramād imām
GE07mbh_01_u:005.021a: manyur hi hṛdayaṃ me 'dya pradahann iva tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_01_u:005.021c: matpurvabhāryāṃ yad imāṃ bhṛguḥ prāpa sumadhyamām
GE07mbh_01_u:005.021d-0218_01: asaṃmataṃ kṛtaṃ me 'dya hariṣyāmy āśramād imām
GE07mbh_01_u:005.022a: tad rakṣa evam āmantrya jvalitaṃ jātavedasam
GE07mbh_01_u:005.022c: śaṅkamāno bhṛgor bhāryāṃ punaḥ punar apṛcchata
GE07mbh_01_u:005.023a: tvam agne sarvabhūtānām antaś carasi nityadā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.023c: sākṣivat puṇyapāpeṣu satyaṃ brūhi kave vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.024c: seyaṃ yadi tathā me tvaṃ satyam ākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:005.025a: śrutvā tvatto bhṛgor bhāryāṃ hariṣyāmy aham āśramāt
GE07mbh_01_u:005.025c: jātavedaḥ paśyatas te vada satyāṃ giraṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā saptārcir duḥkhito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026b-0219_01: satyaṃ vadāmi yadi me śāpaḥ syād brahmavittamāt
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026b-0219_02: asatyaṃ ced ahaṃ brūve patiṣye narakān kramāt
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026c: bhīto 'nṛtāc ca śāpāc ca bhṛgor ity abravīc chanaiḥ agnir uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026d-0220_02: kiṃ tv iyaṃ vidhinā pūrvaṃ mantravan na vṛtā tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026d-0220_03: pitrā tu bhṛgave dattā pulomeyaṃ yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026d-0220_04: dadāti na pitā tubhyaṃ varalobhān mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026d-0220_06: bhāryām ṛṣir bhṛguḥ prāpa māṃ puraskṛtya dānava
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026d-0220_07: seyam ity avagacchāmi nānṛtaṃ vaktum utsahe
GE07mbh_01_u:005.026d-0220_08: nānṛtaṃ hi sadā loke pūjyate dānavottama
GE07mbh_01_u:006.001a: agner atha vacaḥ śrutvā tad rakṣaḥ prajahāra tām
GE07mbh_01_u:006.002a: tataḥ sa garbho nivasan kukṣau bhṛgukulodvaha
GE07mbh_01_u:006.002c: roṣān mātuś cyutaḥ kukṣeś cyavanas tena so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:006.003a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mātur udarāc cyutam ādityavarcasam
GE07mbh_01_u:006.003c: tad rakṣo bhasmasād bhūtaṃ papāta parimucya tām
GE07mbh_01_u:006.004a: sā tam ādāya suśroṇī sasāra bhṛgunandanam
GE07mbh_01_u:006.005e: sāntvayām āsa bhagavān vadhūṃ brahmā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:006.006c: anuvartatī sṛtiṃ tasyā bhṛgoḥ patnyā yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:006.007a: tasyā mārgaṃ sṛtavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tu saritaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:006.007c: nāma tasyās tadā nadyāś cakre lokapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:006.008a: sa evaṃ cyavano jajñe bhṛgoḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_01_u:006.008c: taṃ dadarśa pitā tatra cyavanaṃ tāṃ ca bhāminīm
GE07mbh_01_u:006.009a: sa pulomāṃ tato bhāryāṃ papraccha kupito bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:006.009e: na hi tvāṃ veda tad rakṣo madbhāryāṃ cāruhāsinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:006.010a: tat tvam ākhyāhi taṃ hy adya śaptum icchāmy ahaṃ ruṣā
GE07mbh_01_u:006.010c: bibheti ko na śāpān me kasya cāyaṃ vyatikramaḥ pulomovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:006.011c: tato mām anayad rakṣaḥ krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
GE07mbh_01_u:006.012c: bhasmībhūtaṃ ca tad rakṣo mām utsṛjya papāta vai
GE07mbh_01_u:007.001a: śaptas tu bhṛguṇā vahniḥ kruddho vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:007.001c: kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ brahman kṛtavān asi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_01_u:007.002a: dharme prayatamānasya satyaṃ ca vadataḥ samam
GE07mbh_01_u:007.002c: pṛṣṭo yad abruvaṃ satyaṃ vyabhicāro 'tra ko mama
GE07mbh_01_u:007.003a: pṛṣṭo hi sākṣī yaḥ sākṣyaṃ jānamāno 'nyathā vadet
GE07mbh_01_u:007.003c: sa pūrvān ātmanaḥ sapta kule hanyāt tathā parān
GE07mbh_01_u:007.004a: yaś ca kāryārthatattvajño jānamāno na bhāṣate
GE07mbh_01_u:007.004c: so 'pi tenaiva pāpena lipyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.005a: śakto 'ham api śaptuṃ tvāṃ mānyās tu brāhmaṇā mama
GE07mbh_01_u:007.005c: jānato 'pi ca te vyaktaṃ kathayiṣye nibodha tat
GE07mbh_01_u:007.006c: agnihotreṣu satreṣu kriyāsv atha makheṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:007.007a: vedoktena vidhānena mayi yad dhūyate haviḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.007c: devatāḥ pitaraś caiva tena tṛptā bhavanti vai
GE07mbh_01_u:007.008a: āpo devagaṇāḥ sarve āpaḥ pitṛgaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:007.008c: darśaś ca paurṇamāsaś ca devānāṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:007.009a: devatāḥ pitaras tasmāt pitaraś cāpi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.009c: ekībhūtāś ca pūjyante pṛthaktvena ca parvasu
GE07mbh_01_u:007.010a: devatāḥ pitaraś caiva juhvate mayi yat sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:007.010c: tridaśānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mukham evam ahaṃ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.011a: amāvāsyāṃ ca pitaraḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.011c: manmukhenaiva hūyante bhuñjate ca hutaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.011e: sarvabhakṣaḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhaviṣyāmi mukhaṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_01_u:007.012a: cintayitvā tato vahniś cakre saṃhāram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.013c: vināgninā prajāḥ sarvās tata āsan suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.014e: vidhadhvam atra yat kāryaṃ na syāt kālātyayo yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:007.015a: atharṣayaś ca devāś ca brahmāṇam upagamya tu
GE07mbh_01_u:007.015c: agner āvedayañ śāpaṃ kriyāsaṃhāram eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:007.017a: śrutvā tu tad vacas teṣām agnim āhūya lokakṛt
GE07mbh_01_u:007.018a: lokānām iha sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ kartā cānta eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:007.018c: tvaṃ dhārayasi lokāṃs trīn kriyāṇāṃ ca pravartakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.018e: sa tathā kuru lokeśa nocchidyeran kriyā yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:007.019a: kasmād evaṃ vimūḍhas tvam īśvaraḥ san hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.019c: tvaṃ pavitraṃ yadā loke sarvabhūtagataś ca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:007.020c: upādāne 'rciṣo yās te sarvaṃ dhakṣyanti tāḥ śikhin
GE07mbh_01_u:007.020d-0221_01: kravyādā ca tanur yā te sā sarvaṃ bhakṣayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:007.021a: yathā sūryāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ śuci vibhāvyate
GE07mbh_01_u:007.022a: tad agne tvaṃ mahat tejaḥ svaprabhāvād vinirgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:007.022c: svatejasaiva taṃ śāpaṃ kuru satyam ṛṣer vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:007.022e: devānāṃ cātmano bhāgaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mukhe hutam
GE07mbh_01_u:007.023a: evam astv iti taṃ vahniḥ pratyuvāca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_01_u:007.024a: devarṣayaś ca muditās tato jagmur yathāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:007.024c: ṛṣayaś ca yathāpūrvaṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pracakrire
GE07mbh_01_u:007.025a: divi devā mumudire bhūtasaṃghāś ca laukikāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.025c: agniś ca paramāṃ prītim avāpa hatakalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:007.025d-0222_01: evaṃ sa bhagavāñ śāpaṃ lebhe 'gnir bhṛgutaḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:007.026c: pulomasya vināśaś ca cyavanasya ca saṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.001a: sa cāpi cyavano brahman bhārgavo 'janayat sutam
GE07mbh_01_u:008.002a: pramatis tu ruruṃ nāma ghṛtācyāṃ samajījanat
GE07mbh_01_u:008.002d-0224_02: jātas tapasi tīvre ca sthitaḥ sthirayaśās tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.003a: tasya brahman ruroḥ sarvaṃ caritaṃ bhūritejasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.003c: vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu tvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.005a: etasminn eva kāle tu menakāyāṃ prajajñivān
GE07mbh_01_u:008.006a: athāpsarā menakā sā taṃ garbhaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_01_u:008.007a: utsṛjya caiva taṃ garbhaṃ nadyās tīre jagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:008.007c: kanyām amaragarbhābhāṃ jvalantīm iva ca śriyā
GE07mbh_01_u:008.008a: tāṃ dadarśa samutsṛṣṭāṃ nadītīre mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.009a: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā kanyāṃ sthūlakeśo dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.010c: tataḥ pramadvarety asyā nāma cakre mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.011a: tām āśramapade tasya rurur dṛṣṭvā pramadvarām
GE07mbh_01_u:008.012a: pitaraṃ sakhibhiḥ so 'tha vācayām āsa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.012d-0227_01: yācayām āsa tāṃ kanyāṃ putrārthe varavarṇinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:008.013a: tataḥ prādāt pitā kanyāṃ rurave tāṃ pramadvarām
GE07mbh_01_u:008.014c: sakhībhiḥ krīḍatī sārdhaṃ sā kanyā varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_01_u:008.015a: nāpaśyata prasuptaṃ vai bhujagaṃ tiryag āyatam
GE07mbh_01_u:008.017a: sā daṣṭā sahasā bhūmau patitā gatacetanā
GE07mbh_01_u:008.019a: dadarśa tāṃ pitā caiva te caivānye tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:008.020d-0229_01: uddālakaḥ kaṭhaś caiva śvetaketus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:008.022a: tāṃ te kanyāṃ vyasuṃ dṛṣṭvā bhujagasya viṣārditām
GE07mbh_01_u:008.022c: ruruduḥ kṛpayāviṣṭā rurus tv ārto bahir yayau
GE07mbh_01_u:008.022d-0230_01: te ca sarve dvijaśreṣṭhās tatraivopāviśaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.001c: ruruś cukrośa gahanaṃ vanaṃ gatvā suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.002c: abravīd vacanaṃ śocan priyāṃ cintya pramadvarām
GE07mbh_01_u:009.003a: śete sā bhuvi tanvaṅgī mama śokavivardhinī
GE07mbh_01_u:009.003b-0231_03: mumūrṣur api me prāṇān ādāyāśu gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:009.003c: bāndhavānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kiṃ nu duḥkham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_01_u:009.004a: yadi dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ guravo vā mayā yadi
GE07mbh_01_u:009.004c: samyag ārādhitās tena saṃjīvatu mama priyā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0232_01: evaṃ lālapyatas tasya bhāryārthe duḥkhitasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0232_02: devadūtas tadābhyetya vākyam āha ruruṃ vane
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0233_02: yadi me niścalā bhaktir mama jīvatu sā priyā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0233_03: vilapyamāne tu rurau sarve devāḥ kṛpānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0233_04: dūtaṃ prasthāpayām āsuḥ saṃdiśyāsya hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0233_05: sa dūtas tvarito 'bhyetya devānāṃ priyakṛc chuciḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0233_07: devaiḥ sarvair ahaṃ brahman preṣito 'smi tavāntikam
GE07mbh_01_u:009.005d-0233_08: tvaddhitaṃ tvaddhitair uktaṃ śṛṇu vākyaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_01_u:009.006a: abhidhatse ha yad vācā ruro duḥkhena tan mṛṣā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.006c: na tu martyasya dharmātmann āyur asti gatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.007c: tasmāc choke manas tāta mā kṛthās tvaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:009.008a: upāyaś cātra vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ devair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.008c: taṃ yadīcchasi kartuṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasīmāṃ pramadvarām
GE07mbh_01_u:009.009a: ka upāyaḥ kṛto devair brūhi tattvena khecara
GE07mbh_01_u:009.009c: kariṣye taṃ tathā śrutvā trātum arhati māṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_01_u:009.010c: evam utthāsyati ruro tava bhāryā pramadvarā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.012a: tato gandharvarājaś ca devadūtaś ca sattamau
GE07mbh_01_u:009.015a: evam ukte tataḥ kanyā sodatiṣṭhat pramadvarā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.016a: etad dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣye hi ruror uttamatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.017a: tata iṣṭe 'hani tayoḥ pitarau cakratur mudā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.020a: sa kadā cid vanaṃ vipro rurur abhyāgaman mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:009.021a: tata udyamya daṇḍaṃ sa kāladaṇḍopamaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:009.021c: abhyaghnad ruṣito vipras tam uvācātha ḍuṇḍubhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:009.022a: nāparādhyāmi te kiṃ cid aham adya tapodhana
GE07mbh_01_u:009.022c: saṃrambhāt tat kimarthaṃ mām abhihaṃsi ruṣānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:010.001a: mama prāṇasamā bhāryā daṣṭāsīd bhujagena ha
GE07mbh_01_u:010.001c: tatra me samayo ghora ātmanoraga vai kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:010.002a: hanyāṃ sadaiva bhujagaṃ yaṃ yaṃ paśyeyam ity uta
GE07mbh_01_u:010.003a: anye te bhujagā vipra ye daśantīha mānavān
GE07mbh_01_u:010.003c: ḍuṇḍubhān ahigandhena na tvaṃ hiṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:010.004c: ḍuṇḍubhān dharmavid bhūtvā na tvaṃ hiṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:010.005a: iti śrutvā vacas tasya bhujagasya rurus tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:010.006a: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān ruruḥ saṃśamayann iva
GE07mbh_01_u:010.006c: kāmayā bhujaga brūhi ko 'sīmāṃ vikriyāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:010.007a: ahaṃ purā ruro nāmnā ṛṣir āsaṃ sahasrapāt
GE07mbh_01_u:010.007d-0237_01: brāhmaṇasya tu śāpena prāpto 'haṃ vikriyām imām
GE07mbh_01_u:010.008a: kimarthaṃ śaptavān kruddho dvijas tvāṃ bhujagottama
GE07mbh_01_u:010.008c: kiyantaṃ caiva kālaṃ te vapur etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:011.001a: sakhā babhūva me pūrvaṃ khagamo nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:011.002a: sa mayā krīḍatā bālye kṛtvā tārṇam athoragam
GE07mbh_01_u:011.002c: agnihotre prasaktaḥ san bhīṣitaḥ pramumoha vai
GE07mbh_01_u:011.003a: labdhvā ca sa punaḥ saṃjñāṃ mām uvāca tapodhanaḥ maivaṃ sarpeṇa bādhethāḥ sakhe bhīr āviśan mama
GE07mbh_01_u:011.003b-007_0002: śaptaś ca tvaṃ mayā vipra na nandāmi kadācana tenaiva bahuśokto 'haṃ sarpake tv ātmaṇai (sic) dvija
GE07mbh_01_u:011.004c: tathāvīryo bhujaṃgas tvaṃ mama kopād bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:011.005b-0238_01: muhur uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya susaṃbhrāntas tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:011.006a: prayataḥ saṃbhramāc caiva prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:011.006c: sakheti hasatedaṃ te narmārthaṃ vai kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:011.007a: kṣantum arhasi me brahmañ śāpo 'yaṃ vinivartyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:011.007c: so 'tha mām abravīd dṛṣṭvā bhṛśam udvignacetasam
GE07mbh_01_u:011.008c: nānṛtaṃ vai mayā proktaṃ bhavitedaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:011.009a: yat tu vakṣyāmi te vākyaṃ śṛṇu tan me dhṛtavrata
GE07mbh_01_u:011.009c: śrutvā ca hṛdi te vākyam idam astu tapodhana
GE07mbh_01_u:011.009d-0239_01: yaṃ samābhāṣya dṛṣṭvā ca śāpād asmād vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_01_u:011.010a: utpatsyati rurur nāma pramater ātmajaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:011.010c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śāpamokṣas te bhavitā nacirād iva
GE07mbh_01_u:011.010d-0240_01: evam uktas tu tenāham uragatvam avāptavān
GE07mbh_01_u:011.011a: sa tvaṃ rurur iti khyātaḥ pramater ātmajaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:011.011b-0240a_01: śāpamokṣaś ca bhavitā na cirād dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:011.011c: svarūpaṃ pratilabhyāham adya vakṣyāmi te hitam
GE07mbh_01_u:011.011d-0241_01: sa ḍauṇḍubhaṃ parityajya rūpaṃ viprarṣabhas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:011.011d-0241_03: idaṃ covāca vacanaṃ rurum apratimaujasam sūtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:011.011d-0242_01: iti svarūpaṃ gṛhyāśu tam ṛṣiṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:011.012c: tasmāt prāṇabhṛtaḥ sarvān na hiṃsyād brāhmaṇaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:011.013a: brāhmaṇaḥ saumya eveha jāyateti parā śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:011.014c: brāhmaṇasya paro dharmo vedānāṃ dharaṇād api
GE07mbh_01_u:011.015a: kṣatriyasya tu yo dharmaḥ sa neheṣyati vai tava
GE07mbh_01_u:011.015b-0243_01: kṣatriyasya tu yo dharmaḥ sa te nārhati vai dvija
GE07mbh_01_u:011.016a: tad idaṃ kṣatriyasyāsīt karma vai śṛṇu me ruro
GE07mbh_01_u:011.017a: paritrāṇaṃ ca bhītānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ brāhmaṇād api
GE07mbh_01_u:012.001c: sarpā vā hiṃsitās tāta kimarthaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:012.002a: kimarthaṃ mokṣitāś caiva pannagās tena śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_01_u:012.002c: āstīkena tad ācakṣva śrotum icchāmy aśeṣataḥ ṛṣir uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:012.003-0244_01: ity uktvāntarhite yogāt tasminn ṛṣivare prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:012.003a: śroṣyasi tvaṃ ruro sarvam āstīkacaritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:012.004a: ruruś cāpi vanaṃ sarvaṃ paryadhāvat samantataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:012.004c: tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭum anvicchan saṃśrānto nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:012.004d-0245_01: sa mohaṃ paramaṃ gatvā naṣṭasaṃjña ivābhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:012.004d-0245_02: tad ṛṣer vacanaṃ tathyaṃ cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005a: labdhasaṃjño ruruś cāyāt tac cācakhyau pitus tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005b-0246_01: nyavedayata tat sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ pitur dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005b-0247_01: pitre tu sarvam ākhyāya ḍuṇḍubhasya vaco 'rthavat
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005b-0247_02: apṛcchat pitaraṃ bhūyaḥ so 'stikasya vacas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005b-0247_03: yat tad ākhyānam akhilaṃ ḍuṇḍubhenātha kīrtitam
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005b-0247_04: tat kīrtyamānaṃ bhagavañ chrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005c: pitā cāsya tad ākhyānaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005d-008_0001: kimarthaṃ rājaśārdūla rājā sa janamejayaḥ sarpasatreṇa sarpāṇāṃ gato 'ntaṃ tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005d-008_0003: iti śrīrāmāya namaḥ | śrīgurubhyo namaḥ | śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ |
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005d-008_0004: akṣaraṃ yat paribhraṣṭaṃ mātrāhīnaṃ tu yad bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005d-008_0005: kṣantum arhanti vidvāṃsaḥ kasya na syād vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005d-008_0006: śiva śiva | kapardi samartha bhūteśa bhaganetranipātana
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005d-008_0007: vyatikramaṃ me bhagavan kṣantum arhasi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_01_u:012.005d-008_0008: nārāyaṇāya namaḥ | śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ | gaṇapataye namaḥ |
GE07mbh_01_u:013.001c: sarpasatreṇa sarpāṇāṃ gato 'ntaṃ tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_01_u:013.002a: āstīkaś ca dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ kimarthaṃ japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.002c: mokṣayām āsa bhujagān dīptāt tasmād dhutāśanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:013.003a: kasya putraḥ sa rājāsīt sarpasatraṃ ya āharat
GE07mbh_01_u:013.003c: sa ca dvijātipravaraḥ kasya putro vadasva me
GE07mbh_01_u:013.004a: mahad ākhyānam āstīkaṃ yatraitat procyate dvija
GE07mbh_01_u:013.004c: sarvam etad aśeṣeṇa śṛṇu me vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:013.005a: śrotum icchāmy aśeṣeṇa kathām etāṃ manoramām
GE07mbh_01_u:013.007a: pūrvaṃ pracoditaḥ sūtaḥ pitā me lomaharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.007c: śiṣyo vyāsasya medhāvī brāhmaṇair idam uktavān
GE07mbh_01_u:013.008c: idam āstīkam ākhyānaṃ tubhyaṃ śaunaka pṛcchate
GE07mbh_01_u:013.009a: āstīkasya pitā hy āsīt prajāpatisamaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.009c: brahmacārī yatāhāras tapasy ugre rataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.010a: jaratkārur iti khyāta ūrdhvaretā mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.010d-0250_02: cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ yatra sāyaṃgṛho muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.010d-0250_03: tīrtheṣu ca samāplāvaṃ kurvann aṭati sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.011a: aṭamānaḥ kadā cit sa svān dadarśa pitāmahān
GE07mbh_01_u:013.012a: tān abravīt sa dṛṣṭvaiva jaratkāruḥ pitāmahān
GE07mbh_01_u:013.014d-0251_01: yeṣāṃ tu saṃtatir nāsti martyaloke sukhāvahā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.014d-0251_02: na te labhante vasatiṃ svarge puṇyavratā api
GE07mbh_01_u:013.015a: asmākaṃ saṃtatis tv eko jaratkārur iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.016a: na sa putrāñ janayituṃ dārān mūḍhaś cikīrṣati
GE07mbh_01_u:013.017a: anāthās tena nāthena yathā duṣkṛtinas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.017c: kas tvaṃ bandhur ivāsmākam anuśocasi sattama
GE07mbh_01_u:013.018a: jñātum icchāmahe brahman ko bhavān iha dhiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.018c: kimarthaṃ caiva naḥ śocyān anukampitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:013.019a: mama pūrve bhavanto vai pitaraḥ sapitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.019c: brūta kiṃ karavāṇy adya jaratkārur ahaṃ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:013.020-0252_01: pitaras te vayaṃ tāta saṃtāraya kulaṃ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:013.020a: yatasva yatnavāṃs tāta saṃtānāya kulasya naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.020c: ātmano 'rthe 'smadarthe ca dharma ity eva cābhibho
GE07mbh_01_u:013.021a: na hi dharmaphalais tāta na tapobhiḥ susaṃcitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.021c: tāṃ gatiṃ prāpnuvantīha putriṇo yāṃ vrajanti ha
GE07mbh_01_u:013.022a: tad dāragrahaṇe yatnaṃ saṃtatyāṃ ca manaḥ kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:013.022c: putrakāsmanniyogāt tvam etan naḥ paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_01_u:013.023a: na dārān vai kariṣyāmi sadā me bhāvitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.024c: tathā yady upalapsyāmi kariṣye nānyathā tv aham
GE07mbh_01_u:013.025a: sanāmnī yā bhavitrī me ditsitā caiva bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.025c: bhaikṣavat tām ahaṃ kanyām upayaṃsye vidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.026a: daridrāya hi me bhāryāṃ ko dāsyati viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.026c: pratigrahīṣye bhikṣāṃ tu yadi kaś cit pradāsyati
GE07mbh_01_u:013.027c: anena vidhinā śaśvan na kariṣye 'ham anyathā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.028a: tatra cotpatsyate jantur bhavatāṃ tāraṇāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:013.028c: śāśvataṃ sthānam āsādya modantāṃ pitaro mama sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:013.029-0253_01: ity uktamātre vacane tathety uktvā pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.029-0253_02: antardhānaṃ gatāḥ sarve vismayaṃ sa yayau muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.029a: tato niveśāya tadā sa vipraḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.029c: mahīṃ cacāra dārārthī na ca dārān avindata
GE07mbh_01_u:013.030a: sa kadā cid vanaṃ gatvā vipraḥ pitṛvacaḥ smaran
GE07mbh_01_u:013.030c: cukrośa kanyābhikṣārthī tisro vācaḥ śanair iva
GE07mbh_01_u:013.031a: taṃ vāsukiḥ pratyagṛhṇād udyamya bhaginīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.031c: na sa tāṃ pratijagrāha na sanāmnīti cintayan
GE07mbh_01_u:013.032a: sanāmnīm udyatāṃ bhāryāṃ gṛhṇīyām iti tasya hi
GE07mbh_01_u:013.033c: kiṃnāmnī bhaginīyaṃ te brūhi satyaṃ bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_01_u:013.034d-0255_01: evam uktvā tataḥ prādād bhāryārthe varavarṇinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:013.035a: mātrā hi bhujagāḥ śaptāḥ pūrvaṃ brahmavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:013.037a: sa ca tāṃ pratijagrāha vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.037c: āstīko nāma putraś ca tasyāṃ jajñe mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.040a: tasmin pravṛtte satre tu sarpāṇām antakāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:013.040c: mocayām āsa taṃ śāpam āstīkaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.041a: nāgāṃś ca mātulāṃś caiva tathā cānyān sa bāndhavān
GE07mbh_01_u:013.041c: pitṝṃś ca tārayām āsa saṃtatyā tapasā tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.041e: vrataiś ca vividhair brahman svādhyāyaiś cānṛṇo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:013.042a: devāṃś ca tarpayām āsa yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.042c: ṛṣīṃś ca brahmacaryeṇa saṃtatyā ca pitāmahān
GE07mbh_01_u:013.043c: jaratkārur gataḥ svargaṃ sahitaḥ svaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.044a: āstīkaṃ ca sutaṃ prāpya dharmaṃ cānuttamaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:013.045a: etad ākhyānam āstīkaṃ yathāvat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:013.045c: prabrūhi bhṛguśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathyatām iti
GE07mbh_01_u:014.001a: saute kathaya tām etāṃ vistareṇa kathāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.001c: āstīkasya kaveḥ sādhoḥ śuśrūṣā paramā hi naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.003a: asmacchuśrūṣaṇe nityaṃ pitā hi niratas tava
GE07mbh_01_u:014.003c: ācaṣṭaitad yathākhyānaṃ pitā te tvaṃ tathā vada
GE07mbh_01_u:014.004a: āyuṣyam idam ākhyānam āstīkaṃ kathayāmi te
GE07mbh_01_u:014.004c: yathā śrutaṃ kathayataḥ sakāśād vai pitur mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:014.006a: te bhārye kaśyapasyāstāṃ kadrūś ca vinatā ca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:014.006c: prādāt tābhyāṃ varaṃ prītaḥ prajāpatisamaḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.007a: varātisargaṃ śrutvaiva kaśyapād uttamaṃ ca te
GE07mbh_01_u:014.007c: harṣād apratimāṃ prītiṃ prāpatuḥ sma varastriyau
GE07mbh_01_u:014.008a: vavre kadrūḥ sutān nāgān sahasraṃ tulyatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.008c: dvau putrau vinatā vavre kadrūputrādhikau bale
GE07mbh_01_u:014.008f-0256_01: bhavato bhavato yuktau prasādāt tanayau mama
GE07mbh_01_u:014.009a: tasyai bhartā varaṃ prādād adhyardhaṃ putram īpsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:014.009c: evam astv iti taṃ cāha kaśyapaṃ vinatā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:014.009d-0257_01: ukte samāhite garbhāv etau dhārayatas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:014.009d-0258_01: yathāvat prārthitaṃ labdhvā varaṃ tuṣṭābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:014.010a: kṛtakṛtyā tu vinatā labdhvā vīryādhikau sutau
GE07mbh_01_u:014.010c: kadrūś ca labdhvā putrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ tulyatejasām
GE07mbh_01_u:014.011a: dhāryau prayatnato garbhāv ity uktvā sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.011c: te bhārye varasaṃhṛṣṭe kaśyapo vanam āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:014.012a: kālena mahatā kadrūr aṇḍānāṃ daśatīr daśa
GE07mbh_01_u:014.012c: janayām āsa viprendra dve aṇḍe vinatā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:014.014c: aṇḍābhyāṃ vinatāyās tu mithunaṃ na vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_01_u:014.015a: tataḥ putrārthiṇī devī vrīḍitā sā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:014.015c: aṇḍaṃ bibheda vinatā tatra putram adṛkṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:014.016c: sa putro roṣasaṃpannaḥ śaśāpainām iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.017a: yo 'ham evaṃ kṛto mātas tvayā lobhaparītayā
GE07mbh_01_u:014.018a: pañca varṣaśatāny asyā yayā vispardhase saha
GE07mbh_01_u:014.018c: eṣa ca tvāṃ suto mātar dāsyatvān mokṣayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:014.019a: yady enam api mātas tvaṃ mām ivāṇḍavibhedanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:014.019c: na kariṣyasy adehaṃ vā vyaṅgaṃ vāpi tapasvinam
GE07mbh_01_u:014.021a: evaṃ śaptvā tataḥ putro vinatām antarikṣagaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.021d-0260_01: udyann atha sahasrāṃśur dṛṣṭvā tam aruṇaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.021d-0260_04: so 'pi taṃ ratham āruhya bhānor amitatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:014.022c: sa jātamātro vinatāṃ parityajya kham āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:014.023a: ādāsyann ātmano bhojyam annaṃ vihitam asya yat
GE07mbh_01_u:015.001a: etasminn eva kāle tu bhaginyau te tapodhana
GE07mbh_01_u:015.002a: yaṃ taṃ devagaṇāḥ sarve hṛṣṭarūpā apūjayan
GE07mbh_01_u:015.004a: kathaṃ tad amṛtaṃ devair mathitaṃ kva ca śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_01_u:015.004b-0261_01: kāraṇaṃ cātha mathane kiṃ jātam amṛtāt param
GE07mbh_01_u:015.005b-0262_01: pūrvaṃ suragaṇāḥ sarve tathā daityāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:015.011a: tatra nārāyaṇo devo brahmāṇam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:015.011c: cintayatsu sureṣv evaṃ mantrayatsu ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:015.013c: manthadhvam udadhiṃ devā vetsyadhvam amṛtaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.002c: kiṃnarair apsarobhiś ca devair api ca sevitam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.003c: adho bhūmeḥ sahasreṣu tāvatsv eva pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.004a: tam uddhartuṃ na śaktā vai sarve devagaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:016.004c: viṣṇum āsīnam abhyetya brahmāṇaṃ cedam abruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:016.005a: bhavantāv atra kurutāṃ buddhiṃ naiḥśreyasīṃ parām
GE07mbh_01_u:016.005c: mandaroddharaṇe yatnaḥ kriyatāṃ ca hitāya naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.006a: tatheti cābravīd viṣṇur brahmaṇā saha bhārgava
GE07mbh_01_u:016.006e: nārāyaṇena cāpy uktas tasmin karmaṇi vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:016.008a: tatas tena surāḥ sārdhaṃ samudram upatasthire
GE07mbh_01_u:016.009a: apāṃpatir athovāca mamāpy aṃśo bhavet tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.010c: girer adhiṣṭhānam asya bhavān bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_01_u:016.011a: kūrmeṇa tu tathety uktvā pṛṣṭham asya samarpitam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.012a: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā tathā netraṃ ca vāsukim
GE07mbh_01_u:016.012c: devā mathitum ārabdhāḥ samudraṃ nidhim ambhasām
GE07mbh_01_u:016.013c: vibudhāḥ sahitāḥ sarve yataḥ pucchaṃ tataḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.014a: ananto bhagavān devo yato nārāyaṇas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.014c: śira udyamya nāgasya punaḥ punar avākṣipat
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015c: sadhūmāḥ sārciṣo vātā niṣpetur asakṛn mukhāt sūtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0001: vāsuker mathyamānasya niḥsṛtena viṣeṇa ca abhavan miśritaṃ toyaṃ tadā bhārgavanandana
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0004: viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ samudbhūtaṃ hālāhalam iti śrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0005: devāś ca dānavāś caiva dagdhās tena viṣeṇa ha apākrāmaṃs tato bhītā viṣādam agamaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0007: brahmāṇam abruvan devāḥ sametya munipuṃgavaiḥ mathyamāne 'mṛte jātaṃ viṣaṃ kālānalaprabham
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0009: tenaiva tāpitā lokās tasya pratikuruṣva ha
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0010: evam uktas tadā brahmā dadhyau lokeśvaraṃ haram
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0011: tryakṣaṃ triśūlinaṃ rudraṃ devadevam umāpatim tadātha cintito devas taj jñātvā drutam āyayau
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0013: tasyātha devas tat sarvam ācacakṣe prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0014: tac chrutvā devadeveśo lokasyāsya hitepsayā apibat tad viṣaṃ rudraḥ kālānalasamaprabham
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0017: yasmāt tu nīlatā kaṇṭhe nīlakaṇṭhas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.015d-009_0019: devāḥ prītāḥ punar jagmuś cakrur vai karma tat tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:016.022a: teṣāṃ saṃgharṣajaś cāgnir arcirbhiḥ prajvalan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.022c: vidyudbhir iva nīlābhram āvṛṇon mandaraṃ girim
GE07mbh_01_u:016.023a: dadāha kuñjarāṃś caiva siṃhāṃś caiva viniḥsṛtān
GE07mbh_01_u:016.024a: tam agnim amaraśreṣṭhaḥ pradahantaṃ tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.026c: amaratvaṃ surā jagmuḥ kāñcanasya ca niḥsravāt
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027a: atha tasya samudrasya taj jātam udakaṃ payaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027c: rasottamair vimiśraṃ ca tataḥ kṣīrād abhūd ghṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0001: etasmin nantare jātaṃ vāsuker mukhaniḥsravāt kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ sarvasattvabhayaṃkaram
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0003: tasmin samutthite ghore viṣe kālānalaprabhe saṃtrastāsuradevaughā diśaḥ sarvāḥ prapedire
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0005: yena viṣṇuḥ kṛtaḥ kṛṣṇo viṣeṇa mahatā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0006: yatra hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad āsīc carācaram
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0007: tatas tu brahmaṇo vākyād devadevo maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0008: apibat tad viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pratyakṣaṃ daivateṣu vai
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0010: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur devāś ca munidānavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0011: tataḥ kaṇṭham anuprāptaṃ viṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā harasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0012: brahmā provāca deveśaṃ kaṇṭhe dhāraya vai prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:016.027d-010_0013: svayaṃbhuvacanāc chaṃbhur dadhāra viṣam uttamam kaṇṭhe hālāhalaṃ ghoraṃ nīlakaṇṭhas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.028a: tato brahmāṇam āsīnaṃ devā varadam abruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:016.028c: śrāntāḥ sma subhṛśaṃ brahman nodbhavaty amṛtaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_01_u:016.029a: ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ daityā nāgottamās tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:016.029d-0266_01: glānir asmān samāviṣṭā na cātrāmṛtam utthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.030a: tato nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ brahmā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:016.030c: vidhatsvaiṣāṃ balaṃ viṣṇo bhavān atra parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.031a: balaṃ dadāmi sarveṣāṃ karmaitad ye samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.032c: tat payaḥ sahitā bhūyaś cakrire bhṛśam ākulam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.032d-0268_01: tatra pūrvaṃ viṣaṃ jātaṃ tad brahmavacanāc chivaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.034c: surā devī samutpannā turagaḥ pāṇḍuras tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:016.035d-0269_01: pārijātaś ca tatraiva surabhiś ca mahāmune
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036a: śrīḥ surā caiva somaś ca turagaś ca manojavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0271_01: viṣaṃ jyeṣṭhā ca somaś ca śrīḥ surā turagas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0273_01: airāvataḥ sa vai nāgo nāgānāṃ pravaraḥ śubhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0274_01: śvetair dantaiś caturbhis tu mahākāyas tataḥ param
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0274_04: jagad āvṛtya sahasā sadhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0274_05: trailokyaṃ mohitaṃ yasya gandham āghrāya tad viṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0274_07: tadā prabhṛti devas tu nīlakaṇṭha iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0275_01: etasminn antare daityā devān nirjitya kṛtsnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0277_01: etat tad adbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirāśā dānavāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036b-0277_02: amṛtārthe ca lakṣmyarthe mahāntaṃ vairam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036c: yato devās tato jagmur ādityapatham āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036d-011_0001: bhramamāṇasya tu girer mandarasya tu vipruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.036d-011_0002: teṣv aṣṭāpsaraso jajñe ṣaṣṭiḥ koṭyo varāṅganāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.037c: śvetaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ bibhrad amṛtaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_01_u:016.038c: amṛtārthe mahān nādo mamedam iti jalpatām
GE07mbh_01_u:016.039a: tato nārāyaṇo māyām āsthito mohinīṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.040a: tatas tad amṛtaṃ tasyai dadus te mūḍhacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.040d-0278_01: sā tu nārāyaṇī māyā dhārayantī kamaṇḍalum
GE07mbh_01_u:016.040d-0278_02: āsyamāneṣu daityeṣu paṅktyā ca prati dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:016.040d-0278_03: devān apāyayad devī na daityāṃs te ca cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.002a: tatas tad amṛtaṃ devo viṣṇur ādāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:017.003a: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve papus tad amṛtaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:017.003c: viṣṇoḥ sakāśāt saṃprāpya saṃbhrame tumule sati
GE07mbh_01_u:017.003d-0279_01: pāyayaty amṛtaṃ devān harau bāhubalena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:017.004a: tataḥ pibatsu tatkālaṃ deveṣv amṛtam īpsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:017.004b-0280_01: ye ye 'mṛtaṃ pibanti sma te te yudhyanti dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.006a: tato bhagavatā tasya śiraś chinnam alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:017.008c: śāśvataś candrasūryābhyāṃ grasaty adyāpi caiva tau
GE07mbh_01_u:017.009a: vihāya bhagavāṃś cāpi strīrūpam atulaṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.011c: tomarāś ca sutīkṣṇāgrāḥ śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:017.013a: chinnāni paṭṭiśaiś cāpi śirāṃsi yudhi dāruṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:017.016a: parighaiś cāyasaiḥ pītaiḥ saṃnikarṣe ca muṣṭibhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.019a: tatra divyaṃ dhanur dṛṣṭvā narasya bhagavān api
GE07mbh_01_u:017.019c: cintayām āsa vai cakraṃ viṣṇur dānavasūdanam
GE07mbh_01_u:017.020a: tato 'mbarāc cintitamātram āgataṃ; mahāprabhaṃ cakram amitratāpanam
GE07mbh_01_u:017.020c: vibhāvasos tulyam akuṇṭhamaṇḍalaṃ; sudarśanaṃ bhīmam ajayyam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:017.021a: tad āgataṃ jvalitahutāśanaprabhaṃ; bhayaṃkaraṃ karikarabāhur acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.021c: mumoca vai capalam udagravegavan; mahāprabhaṃ paranagarāvadāraṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:017.022a: tad antakajvalanasamānavarcasaṃ; punaḥ punar nyapatata vegavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:017.022c: vidārayad ditidanujān sahasraśaḥ; kareritaṃ puruṣavareṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_01_u:017.023a: dahat kva cij jvalana ivāvalelihat; prasahya tān asuragaṇān nyakṛntata
GE07mbh_01_u:017.023c: praveritaṃ viyati muhuḥ kṣitau tadā; papau raṇe rudhiram atho piśācavat
GE07mbh_01_u:017.024a: athāsurā giribhir adīnacetaso; muhur muhuḥ suragaṇam ardayaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:017.024c: mahābalā vigalitameghavarcasaḥ; sahasraśo gaganam abhiprapadya ha
GE07mbh_01_u:017.025c: mahādrayaḥ pravigalitāgrasānavaḥ; parasparaṃ drutam abhihatya sasvanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.026a: tato mahī pravicalitā sakānanā; mahādripātābhihatā samantataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.026c: parasparaṃ bhṛśam abhigarjatāṃ muhū; raṇājire bhṛśam abhisaṃpravartite
GE07mbh_01_u:017.027a: naras tato varakanakāgrabhūṣaṇair; maheṣubhir gaganapathaṃ samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_01_u:017.028a: tato mahīṃ lavaṇajalaṃ ca sāgaraṃ; mahāsurāḥ praviviśur arditāḥ suraiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.028c: viyadgataṃ jvalitahutāśanaprabhaṃ; sudarśanaṃ parikupitaṃ niśāmya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:017.029a: tataḥ surair vijayam avāpya mandaraḥ; svam eva deśaṃ gamitaḥ supūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:017.029c: vinādya khaṃ divam api caiva sarvaśas; tato gatāḥ saliladharā yathāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:017.030a: tato 'mṛtaṃ sunihitam eva cakrire; surāḥ parāṃ mudam abhigamya puṣkalām
GE07mbh_01_u:017.030c: dadau ca taṃ nidhim amṛtasya rakṣituṃ; kirīṭine balabhid athāmaraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:018.001a: etat te sarvam ākhyātam amṛtaṃ mathitaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:018.002a: yaṃ niśāmya tadā kadrūr vinatām idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:018.002c: uccaiḥśravā nu kiṃvarṇo bhadre jānīhi māciram vinatovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:018.003a: śveta evāśvarājo 'yaṃ kiṃ vā tvaṃ manyase śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:018.003c: brūhi varṇaṃ tvam apy asya tato 'tra vipaṇāvahe
GE07mbh_01_u:018.004a: kṛṣṇavālam ahaṃ manye hayam enaṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_01_u:018.004c: ehi sārdhaṃ mayā dīvya dāsībhāvāya bhāmini
GE07mbh_01_u:018.005a: evaṃ te samayaṃ kṛtvā dāsībhāvāya vai mithaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:018.005c: jagmatuḥ svagṛhān eva śvo drakṣyāva iti sma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:018.006a: tataḥ putrasahasraṃ tu kadrūr jihmaṃ cikīrṣatī
GE07mbh_01_u:018.007a: āviśadhvaṃ hayaṃ kṣipraṃ dāsī na syām ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:018.007c: tad vākyaṃ nānvapadyanta tāñ śaśāpa bhujaṃgamān
GE07mbh_01_u:018.009a: śāpam enaṃ tu śuśrāva svayam eva pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:018.009c: atikrūraṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ kadrvā daivād atīva hi
GE07mbh_01_u:018.010a: sārdhaṃ devagaṇaiḥ sarvair vācaṃ tām anvamodata
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011c: teṣāṃ tīkṣṇaviṣatvād dhi prajānāṃ ca hitāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011d-0285_02: anyeṣām api sattvānāṃ nityaṃ doṣaparās tu ye
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011d-0285_04: evaṃ saṃbhāṣya devas tu pūjya kadrūṃ ca tāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011d-0285_05: āhūya kaśyapaṃ deva idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011d-0285_06: yad ete dandaśūkāś ca sarpā jātās tvayānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011d-0285_08: tatra manyus tvayā tāta na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011d-0285_09: dṛṣṭaṃ purātanaṃ hy etad yajñe sarpavināśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011d-0285_10: ity uktvā sṛṣṭikṛd devas taṃ prasādya prajāpatim
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011f-0286_01: evaṃ śapteṣu nāgeṣu kadrvā ca dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:018.011f-0286_06: evam astv iti taṃ putraṃ pratyuvāca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:019.001a: tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ prabhāta udite ravau
GE07mbh_01_u:019.001c: kadrūś ca vinatā caiva bhaginyau te tapodhana
GE07mbh_01_u:019.003a: dadṛśāte tadā tatra samudraṃ nidhim ambhasām
GE07mbh_01_u:019.004b-0289_01: bhīṣaṇair vikṛtair anyair ghorair jalacarais tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:019.005c: nāgānām ālayaṃ ramyam uttamaṃ saritāṃ patim
GE07mbh_01_u:019.006c: bhayaṃkaraṃ ca sattvānāṃ payasāṃ nidhim arṇavam
GE07mbh_01_u:019.012a: brahmarṣiṇā ca tapatā varṣāṇāṃ śatam atriṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:019.016c: vistīrṇaṃ dadṛśatur ambaraprakāśaṃ; te 'gādhaṃ nidhim urum ambhasām anantam
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017a: ity evaṃ jhaṣamakarormisaṃkulaṃ taṃ; gambhīraṃ vikasitam ambaraprakāśam
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017c: pātālajvalanaśikhāvidīpitaṃ taṃ; paśyantyau drutam abhipetatus tadānīm
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017d-012_0000: sautir uvāca tatas te paṇitaṃ kṛtvā bhaginyau
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017d-012_0002: jagmatuḥ paramaprīte paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ kadrūś ca vinatā caiva dākṣāyaṇyau vihāyasā
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017d-012_0004: ālokayantyāv akṣobhyaṃ samudraṃ nidhim ambhasām vāyunātīva mahatā kṣobhyamāṇaṃ mahāsvanam
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017d-012_0007: saṃyutaṃ bahusāhasraiḥ sattvair nānāvidhair api ghorair ghoram anādhṛṣyaṃ gambhīram atibhairavam
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017d-012_0010: nāgānām ālayaṃ cāpi suramyaṃ saritāṃ patim
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017d-012_0012: bhayaṃkarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ payaso nidhim avyayam śubhaṃ divyam amartyānām amṛtasyākaraṃ param
GE07mbh_01_u:019.017d-012_0015: mahānadībhir bahvībhis tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ āpūryamāṇam atyarthaṃ nṛtyantam iva cormibhiḥ sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:020.001-013_0001: nāgāś ca saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā kartavyam iti tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.001-013_0003: prasannā mokṣayed asmāṃs tasmāc chāpāc ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_01_u:020.001-013_0004: kṛṣṇaṃ pucchaṃ kariṣyāmas turagasya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.001-013_0005: tathā hi gatvā te tasya pucche vālā iva sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.001-013_0006: etasminn antare te tu sapatnyau paṇite tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:020.001a: taṃ samudram atikramya kadrūr vinatayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:020.001d-0292_01: tatas te taṃ hayaśreṣṭhaṃ dadṛśāte mahājavam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.002a: niśāmya ca bahūn vālān kṛṣṇān pucchaṃ samāśritān
GE07mbh_01_u:020.002b-0293_02: dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ tu pucchaṃ sā vājirājasya vismitā
GE07mbh_01_u:020.003a: tataḥ sā vinatā tasmin paṇitena parājitā
GE07mbh_01_u:020.004a: etasminn antare caiva garuḍaḥ kāla āgate
GE07mbh_01_u:020.005d-0296_01: ghoro ghorasvano raudro vahnir aurva ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.006a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ prajāḥ sarvā vibhāvasum
GE07mbh_01_u:020.007a: agne mā tvaṃ pravardhiṣṭhāḥ kaccin no na didhakṣasi
GE07mbh_01_u:020.007c: asau hi rāśiḥ sumahān samiddhas tava sarpati
GE07mbh_01_u:020.008a: naitad evaṃ yathā yūyaṃ manyadhvam asurārdanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.008c: garuḍo balavān eṣa mama tulyaḥ svatejasā
GE07mbh_01_u:020.008d-0297_02: tejorāśim imaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuṣmān mohaḥ samāviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:020.008d-0298_02: devānāṃ ca hite yuktas tv ahito daityarakṣasām
GE07mbh_01_u:020.008d-0298_03: na bhīḥ kāryā kathaṃ cātra paśyadhvaṃ sahitā mama
GE07mbh_01_u:020.009a: evam uktās tato gatvā garuḍaṃ vāgbhir astuvan
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010a: tvam ṛṣis tvaṃ mahābhāgas tvaṃ devaḥ patageśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010c: tvaṃ prabhus tapanaprakhyas tvaṃ nas trāṇam anuttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010d-0299_01: tvaṃ vibhus tapanaḥ sūryaḥ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010d-0299_02: tvam indras tvaṃ hayamukhas tvaṃ śaras tvaṃ jagatpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010d-0299_03: tvaṃ mukhaṃ padmajo vipras tvam agniḥ pavanas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010d-0299_04: tvaṃ hi dhātā vidhātā ca tvaṃ viṣṇuḥ surasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010d-0299_05: tvaṃ mahān abhibhūḥ śaśvad amṛtaṃ tvaṃ mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010d-0299_06: tvaṃ prabhās tvam abhipretaṃ tvaṃ nas trāṇam anuttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.010d-0299_07: tvaṃ gatiḥ satataṃ tvattaḥ kathaṃ naḥ prāpnuyād bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.011a: balormimān sādhur adīnasattvaḥ; samṛddhimān duṣprasahas tvam eva
GE07mbh_01_u:020.011c: tapaḥ śrutaṃ sarvam ahīnakīrte; anāgataṃ copagataṃ ca sarvam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.012a: tvam uttamaḥ sarvam idaṃ carācaraṃ; gabhastibhir bhānur ivāvabhāsase
GE07mbh_01_u:020.012c: samākṣipan bhānumataḥ prabhāṃ muhus; tvam antakaḥ sarvam idaṃ dhruvādhruvam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.013a: divākaraḥ parikupito yathā dahet; prajās tathā dahasi hutāśanaprabha
GE07mbh_01_u:020.013c: bhayaṃkaraḥ pralaya ivāgnir utthito; vināśayan yugaparivartanāntakṛt
GE07mbh_01_u:020.014a: khageśvaraṃ śaraṇam upasthitā vayaṃ; mahaujasaṃ vitimiram abhragocaram
GE07mbh_01_u:020.014c: mahābalaṃ garuḍam upetya khecaraṃ; parāvaraṃ varadam ajayyavikramam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.014d-0301_05: ṛṣeḥ sutas tvam asi dayāvataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:020.014d-0301_07: sa mā krudhaḥ kuru jagato dayāṃ parāṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.014d-0301_08: tvam īśvaraḥ praśamam upaihi pāhi naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.014d-0301_16: śivaś ca no bhava bhagavan sukhāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.014d-0302_01: tvaṃ pāhi sarvāṃś ca surān mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015a: evaṃ stutaḥ suparṇas tu devaiḥ sarṣigaṇais tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015c: tejasaḥ pratisaṃhāram ātmanaḥ sa cakāra ha sautir uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014x0034: pramatir uvāca sa śrutvāthātmano dehaṃ suparṇaḥ prekṣya ca svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0003: na me sarvāṇi bhūtāni bibhiyur dehadarśanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0004: bhīmarūpāt samudvignās tasmāt tejas tu saṃhare
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0005: aruṇaṃ cātmanaḥ pṛṣṭham āropya sa pitur gṛhāt
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0006: tataḥ kāmagamaḥ pakṣī kāmavīryo vihaṃgamaḥ mātur antikam āgacchat parayā mudayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0008: tatrāruṇaḥ sa nikṣiptaḥ diśaṃ pūrvāṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0010: kimarthaṃ bhagavān sūryo lokān dagdhumanās tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0011: kim asyāpakṛtaṃ devair yenemaṃ manyur āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0012: candrādityair yadā rāhur ākhyāto hy amṛtaṃ piban
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0014: vadhyamāne graheṇātha āditye manyur āviśat surārthāya samutpanno roṣo rāhos tu māṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0017: sahāya ekaḥ kāryeṣu na me kṛcchreṣu jāyate
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0018: paśyanti grasyamānaṃ māṃ saha devair divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0019: tasmāl lokavināśāya hy avatiṣṭhe na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0020: evaṃ kṛtamatiḥ sūryo hy astam abhyagamad girim
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0022: utpatsyate mahān dāhas trailokyasya vināśanaḥ tato devāḥ sarṣigaṇā upagamya pitāmaham
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0024: bhagavan kimidaṃ cādya mahad dāhakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0025: na tāvad dṛśyate sūryaḥ kṣapeyaṃ na prabhāti ca udite bhagavan bhānau katham etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0027: eṣa lokavināśāya ravir udyantum udyataḥ dṛśyann eva hi lokān sa bhasmarāśīkariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0029: tasya pratividhānaṃ ca vihitaṃ pūrvam eva hi
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0030: kaśyapasya suto vidvān aruṇety abhiviśrutaḥ mahākāyo mahātejāḥ sa sthāsyati puro raveḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0032: kariṣyati ca sārathyaṃ tejaś cāsya hariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0033: lokānāṃ śāntir evaṃ syād ṛṣīṇāṃ ca divaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0034: tataḥ pitāmahājñātaḥ sarvaṃ cakre tadāruṇaḥ uditaś caiva savitā aruṇena tadāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0036: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yat sūryaṃ manyur āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0037: aruṇaś ca yathaivāsya sārathyam akarot prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:020.015d-014_0038: bhūya evāparaṃ praśnaṃ śṛṇu pūrvam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:021.001c: mātur antikam āgacchat paraṃ tīraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.002a: yatra sā vinatā tasmin paṇitena parājitā
GE07mbh_01_u:021.003a: tataḥ kadā cid vinatāṃ pravaṇāṃ putrasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_01_u:021.003c: kāla āhūya vacanaṃ kadrūr idam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:021.004c: samudrakukṣāv ekānte tatra māṃ vinate vaha
GE07mbh_01_u:021.006e: tadavasthān sutān dṛṣṭvā kadrūḥ śakram athāstuvat
GE07mbh_01_u:021.007a: namas te devadeveśa namas te balasūdana
GE07mbh_01_u:021.008a: sarpāṇāṃ sūryataptānāṃ vāriṇā tvaṃ plavo bhava
GE07mbh_01_u:021.008c: tvam eva paramaṃ trāṇam asmākam amarottama
GE07mbh_01_u:021.009a: īśo hy asi payaḥ sraṣṭuṃ tvam analpaṃ puraṃdara
GE07mbh_01_u:021.009c: tvam eva meghas tvaṃ vāyus tvam agnir vaidyuto 'mbare
GE07mbh_01_u:021.010a: tvam abhraghanavikṣeptā tvām evāhuḥ punar ghanam
GE07mbh_01_u:021.010c: tvaṃ vajram atulaṃ ghoraṃ ghoṣavāṃs tvaṃ balāhakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.011a: sraṣṭā tvam eva lokānāṃ saṃhartā cāparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.011c: tvaṃ jyotiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvam ādityo vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.012a: tvaṃ mahad bhūtam āścaryaṃ tvaṃ rājā tvaṃ surottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.012c: tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ sahasrākṣas tvaṃ devas tvaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:021.013a: tvaṃ sarvam amṛtaṃ deva tvaṃ somaḥ paramārcitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.013c: tvaṃ muhūrtas tithiś ca tvaṃ lavas tvaṃ vai punaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.014a: śuklas tvaṃ bahulaś caiva kalā kāṣṭhā truṭis tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:021.014c: saṃvatsarartavo māsā rajanyaś ca dināni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:021.015a: tvam uttamā sagirivanā vasuṃdharā; sabhāskaraṃ vitimiram ambaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:021.015c: mahodadhiḥ satimitimiṃgilas tathā; mahormimān bahumakaro jhaṣālayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.016a: mahad yaśas tvam iti sadābhipūjyase; manīṣibhir muditamanā maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:021.016c: abhiṣṭutaḥ pibasi ca somam adhvare; vaṣaṭkṛtāny api ca havīṃṣi bhūtaye
GE07mbh_01_u:021.017a: tvaṃ vipraiḥ satatam ihejyase phalārthaṃ; vedāṅgeṣv atulabalaugha gīyase ca
GE07mbh_01_u:021.017c: tvaddhetor yajanaparāyaṇā dvijendrā; vedāṅgāny abhigamayanti sarvavedaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:022.001a: evaṃ stutas tadā kadrvā bhagavān harivāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:022.001b-0303_01: meghān ājñāpayām āsa varṣadhvam udakaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_01_u:022.002a: te meghā mumucus toyaṃ prabhūtaṃ vidyudujjvalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:022.004c-0304_02: tair meghaiḥ saṃtatāsāraṃ varṣadbhir aniśaṃ tadā naṣṭacandrārkakiraṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:022.005a: nāgānām uttamo harśas tadā varṣati vāsave
GE07mbh_01_u:022.005d-0305_02: tadā bhūr abhavac channā jalormibhir anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:022.005d-0305_03: rāmaṇīyakam āgacchan mātrā saha bhujaṃgamāḥ sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:023.001a: suparṇenohyamānās te jagmus taṃ deśam āśu vai
GE07mbh_01_u:023.002c: bhavanair āvṛtaṃ ramyais tathā padmākarair api
GE07mbh_01_u:023.006a: tat te vanaṃ samāsādya vijahruḥ pannagā mudā
GE07mbh_01_u:023.007c: tvaṃ hi deśān bahūn ramyān patan paśyasi khecara
GE07mbh_01_u:023.008a: sa vicintyābravīt pakṣī mātaraṃ vinatāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:023.008c: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ mayā mātaḥ kartavyaṃ sarpabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:023.008d-0310_01: kimarthaṃ ca vayaṃ sarpān vahāmo durbalādhamān
GE07mbh_01_u:023.008d-0311_01: evam uktas tadā tena vinatā prāha khecaram
GE07mbh_01_u:023.009c: paṇaṃ vitatham āsthāya sarpair upadhinā kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:023.010a: tasmiṃs tu kathite mātrā kāraṇe gaganecaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:023.010c: uvāca vacanaṃ sarpāṃs tena duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:023.011a: kim āhṛtya viditvā vā kiṃ vā kṛtveha pauruṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:023.011c: dāsyād vo vipramucyeyaṃ satyaṃ śaṃsata lelihāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:023.012a: śrutvā tam abruvan sarpā āharāmṛtam ojasā
GE07mbh_01_u:023.012c: tato dāsyād vipramokṣo bhavitā tava khecara
GE07mbh_01_u:024.001a: ity ukto garuḍaḥ sarpais tato mātaram abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:024.001c: gacchāmy amṛtam āhartuṃ bhakṣyam icchāmi veditum vinatovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:024.003a: na tu te brāhmaṇaṃ hantuṃ kāryā buddhiḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004a: agnir arko viṣaṃ śastraṃ vipro bhavati kopitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004b-0313_01: evamādibhī rūpais tu satāṃ vai brāhmaṇo mataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004b-0313_02: sa te tāta na hantavyaḥ saṃkruddhenāpi sarvadā
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004b-0313_03: brāhmaṇānām abhidroho na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004b-0313_04: na hy evam agnir nādityo bhasma kuryāt tathānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004b-0313_06: tad etair vividhair liṅgais tvaṃ vidyās taṃ dvijottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004b-0315_01: tarhi vakṣyāmi vispaṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ tan nibodhatha
GE07mbh_01_u:024.004c: bhūtānām agrabhug vipro varṇaśreṣṭhaḥ pitā guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:024.005c: tan me kāraṇato mātaḥ pṛcchato vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:024.005d-0316_02: kiṃ svid agninibho bhāti kiṃ svit saumyapradarśanaḥ vinatovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:024.006-015_0003: vaiṇavīṃ dhārayan yaṣṭim upavītaṃ kamaṇḍalum etais tu lakṣaṇair yuktaṃ gṛhastham iti lakṣayet
GE07mbh_01_u:024.006-015_0007: muṇḍī tridaṇḍī kāṣāyī kamaṇḍaludharo yatiḥ etais tu lakṣaṇaiḥ putra viddhi tān brāhmaṇān ṛjūn
GE07mbh_01_u:024.006a: yas te kaṇṭham anuprāpto nigīrṇaṃ baḍiśaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:024.006c: dahed aṅgāravat putra taṃ vidyād brāhmaṇarṣabham
GE07mbh_01_u:024.007a: provāca cainaṃ vinatā putrahārdād idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:024.007b-0317_01: jaṭhare na ca jīryed yas taṃ jānīhi dvijottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:024.008a: pakṣau te mārutaḥ pātu candraḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ tu putraka
GE07mbh_01_u:024.008c: śiras tu pātu te vahnir bhāskaraḥ sarvam eva tu
GE07mbh_01_u:024.008d-0320_01: viṣṇuḥ sarvagataḥ sarvam aṅgāni tava caiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:024.009a: ahaṃ ca te sadā putra śāntisvastiparāyaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:024.009b-0322_02: bhaviṣyati na saṃdeho yāvad āgamanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:024.010a: tataḥ sa mātur vacanaṃ niśamya; vitatya pakṣau nabha utpapāta
GE07mbh_01_u:024.010c: tato niṣādān balavān upāgamad; bubhukṣitaḥ kāla ivāntako mahān
GE07mbh_01_u:024.011a: sa tān niṣādān upasaṃharaṃs tadā; rajaḥ samuddhūya nabhaḥspṛśaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:024.011c: samudrakukṣau ca viśoṣayan payaḥ; samīpagān bhūmidharān vicālayan
GE07mbh_01_u:024.012a: tataḥ sa cakre mahad ānanaṃ tadā; niṣādamārgaṃ pratirudhya pakṣirāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:024.012c: tato niṣādās tvaritāḥ pravavrajur; yato mukhaṃ tasya bhujaṃgabhojinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:024.013a: tadānanaṃ vivṛtam atipramāṇavat; samabhyayur gaganam ivārditāḥ khagāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:024.014a: tataḥ khago vadanam amitratāpanaḥ; samāharat paricapalo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.001a: tasya kaṇṭham anuprāpto brāhmaṇaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_01_u:025.002c: na hi me brāhmaṇo vadhyaḥ pāpeṣv api rataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:025.002d-016_0001: kathaṃ ca tvam ihāyāto niṣādānāṃ mahālayam
GE07mbh_01_u:025.002d-016_0002: aspṛśyā yājināṃ nityaṃ satyaṃ ca vada me dvija
GE07mbh_01_u:025.003b-016_0003: brāhmaṇa uvāca madhyadeśāt samāyāto dhanārthī medinīṃ bhraman
GE07mbh_01_u:025.003b-016_0004: tato niṣādān saṃprāpto ratiṃ cāpy atra labdhavān
GE07mbh_01_u:025.003b-016_0005: gāṃ hiraṇyaṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ ghaṭāṃś ca kaṭakāṃs tathā niṣādā me prayacchanti satataṃ priyakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.003b-016_0007: niṣādī śobhanā cātra bhāryā jātā khagottama
GE07mbh_01_u:025.003b-016_0008: tayā saha vasan nityaṃ ratim agryām avāptavān
GE07mbh_01_u:025.003c: niṣādī mama bhāryeyaṃ nirgacchatu mayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:025.004a: etām api niṣādīṃ tvaṃ parigṛhyāśu niṣpata
GE07mbh_01_u:025.005a: tataḥ sa vipro niṣkrānto niṣādīsahitas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:025.005c: vardhayitvā ca garuḍam iṣṭaṃ deśaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:025.006a: sahabhārye viniṣkrānte tasmin vipre sa pakṣirāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007a: tato 'paśyat sa pitaraṃ pṛṣṭaś cākhyātavān pituḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0324_01: yathānyāyam ameyātmā taṃ covāca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0324_02: kaccid vaḥ kuśalaṃ nityaṃ bhojane bahulaṃ suta
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0324_03: kaccic ca mānuṣe loke tavānnaṃ vidyate bahu
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0326_01: vavande patatāṃ śreṣṭho brahma brahmavidāṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0326_02: pṛṣṭaś ca pitrā balavān vainateyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0326_03: kva gantāsīti vegena mama tvaṃ vaktum arhasi garuḍa uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0327_01: mātā me kuśalā śaśvat tathā bhrātā tathā hy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007b-0327_02: na hi me kuśalaṃ tāta bhojane bahule sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007c: ahaṃ hi sarpaiḥ prahitaḥ somam āhartum udyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.007e: mātur dāsyavimokṣārtham āhariṣye tam adya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:025.008a: mātrā cāsmi samādiṣṭo niṣādān bhakṣayeti vai
GE07mbh_01_u:025.008c: na ca me tṛptir abhavad bhakṣayitvā sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.009a: tasmād bhoktavyam aparaṃ bhagavan pradiśasva me
GE07mbh_01_u:025.009c: yad bhuktvāmṛtam āhartuṃ samarthaḥ syām ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:025.009d-0328_01: kṣutpipāsāvighātārthaṃ bhakṣyam ākhyātu me bhavān kaśyapa uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:025.010-0329_02: yatra kūrmāgrajaṃ hastī sadā karṣaty avāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.010-0329_03: tayor janma tu te kṛtsnaṃ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.010-0329_04: tan me tattvaṃ nibodhasva yatpramāṇau ca tau matau
GE07mbh_01_u:025.010-0330_01: śṛṇu tvaṃ vatsa bhadraṃ te kathāṃ vairāgyavardhinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:025.010a: āsīd vibhāvasur nāma maharṣiḥ kopano bhṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:025.011a: sa necchati dhanaṃ bhrātrā sahaikasthaṃ mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.012a: athābravīc ca taṃ bhrātā supratīkaṃ vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.012c: vibhāgaṃ bahavo mohāt kartum icchanti nityadā
GE07mbh_01_u:025.013a: tataḥ svārthaparān mūḍhān pṛthag bhūtān svakair dhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.014a: viditvā cāpare bhinnān antareṣu patanty atha
GE07mbh_01_u:025.014c: bhinnānām atulo nāśaḥ kṣipram eva pravartate
GE07mbh_01_u:025.015a: tasmāc caiva vibhāgārthaṃ na praśaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.015d-0333_01: teṣāṃ madhye tvam apy ekaś chadmakṛc ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.016a: niyantuṃ na hi śakyas tvaṃ bhedato dhanam icchasi
GE07mbh_01_u:025.017a: śaptas tv evaṃ supratīko vibhāvasum athābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:025.022a: taṃ dṛṣṭvāveṣṭitakaraḥ pataty eṣa gajo jalam
GE07mbh_01_u:025.024a: ṣaḍ ucchrito yojanāni gajas tad dviguṇāyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.025d-0334_02: mahāgirisamaprakhyaṃ ghorarūpaṃ ca hastinam sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026-0335_01: ity uktvā garuḍaṃ sarṣiḥ māṅgalyam akarot tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026-0335_02: yudhyataḥ saha devais te yuddhe bhavatu maṅgalam
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026-0335_03: pūrṇakumbho dvijā gāvo yac cānyat kiṃ cid uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026-0335_06: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni pavitrāṇi havīṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026-0335_07: rahasyāni ca sarvāṇi sarve vedāś ca te balam
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026-0335_08: ity ukto garuḍaḥ pitrā gatas taṃ hradam antikāt
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026-0336_01: etasminn eva kāle tu tāv ṛṣī vittalolupau
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026a: sa tac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ bhīmavego 'ntarikṣagaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.026c: nakhena gajam ekena kūrmam ekena cākṣipat
GE07mbh_01_u:025.028c: na no bhañjyād iti tadā divyāḥ kanakaśākhinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.030d-0337_01: teṣāṃ madhye mahān āsīt pādapaḥ sumanoharaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.030d-0337_04: yasya chāyāṃ samāśritya sadyo bhavati nirvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:025.032c: etām āsthāya śākhāṃ tvaṃ khādemau gajakacchapau
GE07mbh_01_u:025.033c: khagottamo drutam abhipatya vegavān; babhañja tām aviralapatrasaṃvṛtām
GE07mbh_01_u:026.001a: spṛṣṭamātrā tu padbhyāṃ sā garuḍena balīyasā
GE07mbh_01_u:026.001c: abhajyata taroḥ śākhā bhagnāṃ cainām adhārayat
GE07mbh_01_u:026.002a: tāṃ bhagnāṃ sa mahāśākhāṃ smayan samavalokayan
GE07mbh_01_u:026.002d-0338_01: ṛṣayo hy atra lambante na hanyām iti tān ṛṣīn
GE07mbh_01_u:026.002d-0341_01: hanyād etān saṃpatantī śākhety atha vicintya saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.003d-0343_01: atidaivaṃ tu tat tasya karma dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.004c: dayārthaṃ vālakhilyānāṃ na ca sthānam avindata
GE07mbh_01_u:026.005c: dadarśa kaśyapaṃ tatra pitaraṃ tapasi sthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:026.006a: dadarśa taṃ pitā cāpi divyarūpaṃ vihaṃgamam
GE07mbh_01_u:026.010a: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya bhagavān kaśyapas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:026.010c: viditvā cāsya saṃkalpam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:026.011a: putra mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīr mā sadyo lapsyase vyathām
GE07mbh_01_u:026.011c: mā tvā daheyuḥ saṃkruddhā vālakhilyā marīcipāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.012a: prasādayām āsa sa tān kaśyapaḥ putrakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:026.013c: cikīrṣati mahat karma tad anujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_01_u:026.014a: evam uktā bhagavatā munayas te samabhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.014c: muktvā śākhāṃ giriṃ puṇyaṃ himavantaṃ taporthinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.016a: bhagavan kva vimuñcāmi taruśākhām imām aham
GE07mbh_01_u:026.016c: varjitaṃ brāhmaṇair deśam ākhyātu bhagavān mama
GE07mbh_01_u:026.017c: agamyaṃ manasāpy anyais tasyācakhyau sa kaśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.019a: na tāṃ vadhraḥ pariṇahec chatacarmā mahān aṇuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.019c: śākhino mahatīṃ śākhāṃ yāṃ pragṛhya yayau khagaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.021a: sa taṃ gatvā kṣaṇenaiva parvataṃ vacanāt pituḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.021c: amuñcan mahatīṃ śākhāṃ sasvanāṃ tatra khecaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.023a: śṛṅgāṇi ca vyaśīryanta gires tasya samantataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.026a: tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅgam āsthāya sa khagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:026.026c: bhakṣayām āsa garuḍas tāv ubhau gajakacchapau
