GE07mbh_01_u:032.004d-0377_02: dharme manaḥ samādhāya snāne triṣavaṇe tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:032.005a: tapyamānaṃ tapo ghoraṃ taṃ dadarśa pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.006c: kim idaṃ kuruṣe śeṣa prajānāṃ svasti vai kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:032.007a: tvaṃ hi tīvreṇa tapasā prajās tāpayase 'nagha
GE07mbh_01_u:032.007c: brūhi kāmaṃ ca me śeṣa yat te hṛdi ciraṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:032.008a: sodaryā mama sarve hi bhrātaro mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.008c: saha tair notsahe vastuṃ tad bhavān anumanyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:032.009c: tato 'haṃ tapa ātiṣṭhe naitān paśyeyam ity uta
GE07mbh_01_u:032.010a: na marṣayanti satataṃ vinatāṃ sasutāṃ ca te
GE07mbh_01_u:032.011a: taṃ ca dviṣanti te 'tyarthaṃ sa cāpi sumahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.012c: kathaṃ me pretyabhāve 'pi na taiḥ syāt saha saṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.012d-0378_01: tam evaṃvādinaṃ śeṣaṃ pitāmaha uvāca ha brahmovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:032.013a: jānāmi śeṣa sarveṣāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ te viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_01_u:032.013c: mātuś cāpy aparādhād vai bhrātṝṇāṃ te mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:032.014a: kṛto 'tra parihāraś ca pūrvam eva bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_01_u:032.014c: bhrātṝṇāṃ tava sarveṣāṃ na śokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:032.014d-0379_01: śāpāt tasmān mahāghorād uktān mātrā mahābala
GE07mbh_01_u:032.015a: vṛṇīṣva ca varaṃ mattaḥ śeṣa yat te 'bhikāṅkṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:032.015c: ditsāmi hi varaṃ te 'dya prītir me paramā tvayi
GE07mbh_01_u:032.016a: diṣṭyā ca buddhir dharme te niviṣṭā pannagottama
GE07mbh_01_u:032.016c: ato bhūyaś ca te buddhir dharme bhavatu susthirā
GE07mbh_01_u:032.017a: eṣa eva varo me 'dya kāṅkṣitaḥ prapitāmaha
GE07mbh_01_u:032.017c: dharme me ramatāṃ buddhiḥ śame tapasi ceśvara brahmovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:032.018a: prīto 'smy anena te śeṣa damena praśamena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:032.018c: tvayā tv idaṃ vacaḥ kāryaṃ manniyogāt prajāhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:032.019a: imāṃ mahīṃ śailavanopapannāṃ; sasāgarāṃ sākarapattanāṃ ca
GE07mbh_01_u:032.019c: tvaṃ śeṣa samyak calitāṃ yathāvat; saṃgṛhya tiṣṭhasva yathācalā syāt
GE07mbh_01_u:032.019d-0380_01: anyam eva varaṃ dadmi tavāhaṃ bhujagottama
GE07mbh_01_u:032.019d-0380_02: imāṃ tvaṃ sakalāṃ pṛthvīṃ mūrdhnā saṃdhārayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:032.020a: yathāha devo varadaḥ prajāpatir; mahīpatir bhūtapatir jagatpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.020c: tathā mahīṃ dhārayitāsmi niścalāṃ; prayaccha tāṃ me śirasi prajāpate
GE07mbh_01_u:032.021a: adho mahīṃ gaccha bhujaṃgamottama; svayaṃ tavaiṣā vivaraṃ pradāsyati
GE07mbh_01_u:032.021c: imāṃ dharāṃ dhārayatā tvayā hi me; mahat priyaṃ śeṣa kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:032.022a: tatheti kṛtvā vivaraṃ praviśya sa; prabhur bhuvo bhujagavarāgrajaḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.022c: bibharti devīṃ śirasā mahīm imāṃ; samudranemiṃ parigṛhya sarvataḥ brahmovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:032.023a: śeṣo 'si nāgottama dharmadevo; mahīm imāṃ dhārayase yad ekaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.023c: anantabhogaḥ parigṛhya sarvāṃ; yathāham evaṃ balabhid yathā vā
GE07mbh_01_u:032.024a: adho bhūmer vasaty evaṃ nāgo 'nantaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_01_u:032.024c: dhārayan vasudhām ekaḥ śāsanād brahmaṇo vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.025a: suparṇaṃ ca sakhāyaṃ vai bhagavān amarottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:032.025d-0381_02: abhyaṣicyata nāgais tu daivatair iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.001a: mātuḥ sakāśāt taṃ śāpaṃ śrutvā pannagasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.001c: vāsukiś cintayām āsa śāpo 'yaṃ na bhavet katham
GE07mbh_01_u:033.002a: tataḥ sa mantrayām āsa bhrātṛbhiḥ saha sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.003a: ayaṃ śāpo yathoddiṣṭo viditaṃ vas tathānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.004a: sarveṣām eva śāpānāṃ pratighāto hi vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:033.004c: na tu mātrābhiśaptānāṃ mokṣo vidyeta pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.004d-019_0001: ārādhya tu jagannāthaṃ brahmāṇaṃ pannagottamāḥ mātṛśāpavimokṣārthaṃ na śeṣo labdhavān varam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.005c: śaptā ity eva me śrutvā jāyate hṛdi vepathuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.006b-0382_01: śāpaḥ sṛṣṭo mahāghoro mātrā khalv avinītayā
GE07mbh_01_u:033.006c: na hy enāṃ so 'vyayo devaḥ śapantīṃ pratyaṣedhayat
GE07mbh_01_u:033.007c: yathā bhaveta sarveṣāṃ mā naḥ kālo 'tyagād ayam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.007d-0383_01: sarva eva hi nas tāvad buddhimanto vicakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.008a: api mantrayamāṇā hi hetuṃ paśyāma mokṣaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:033.008c: yathā naṣṭaṃ purā devā gūḍham agniṃ guhāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.009a: yathā sa yajño na bhaved yathā vāpi parābhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:033.010a: tathety uktvā tu te sarve kādraveyāḥ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.011a: eke tatrābruvan nāgā vayaṃ bhūtvā dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.011c: janamejayaṃ taṃ bhikṣāmo yajñas te na bhaved iti
GE07mbh_01_u:033.012a: apare tv abruvan nāgās tatra paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.013a: sa naḥ prakṣyati sarveṣu kāryeṣv arthaviniścayam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.013c: tatra buddhiṃ pravakṣyāmo yathā yajño nivartate
GE07mbh_01_u:033.014a: sa no bahumatān rājā buddhvā buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.014c: yajñārthaṃ prakṣyati vyaktaṃ neti vakṣyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.015a: darśayanto bahūn doṣān pretya ceha ca dāruṇān
GE07mbh_01_u:033.015c: hetubhiḥ kāraṇaiś caiva yathā yajño bhaven na saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.016a: athavā ya upādhyāyaḥ kratau tasmin bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:033.017a: taṃ gatvā daśatāṃ kaś cid bhujagaḥ sa mariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:033.017c: tasmin hate yajñakare kratuḥ sa na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:033.018a: ye cānye sarpasatrajñā bhaviṣyanty asya ṛtvijaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.018c: tāṃś ca sarvān daśiṣyāmaḥ kṛtam evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:033.019c: abuddhir eṣā yuṣmākaṃ brahmahatyā na śobhanā
GE07mbh_01_u:033.020a: samyak saddharmamūlā hi vyasane śāntir uttamā
GE07mbh_01_u:033.021a: apare tv abruvan nāgāḥ samiddhaṃ jātavedasam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.022a: srugbhāṇḍaṃ niśi gatvā vā apare bhujagottamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.022c: pramattānāṃ harantv āśu vighna evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:033.023a: yajñe vā bhujagās tasmiñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.023c: janaṃ daśantu vai sarvam evaṃ trāso bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:033.025a: apare tv abruvaṃs tatra ṛtvijo 'sya bhavāmahe
GE07mbh_01_u:033.025e: vaśyatāṃ ca gato 'sau naḥ kariṣyati yathepṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.026a: apare tv abruvaṃs tatra jale prakrīḍitaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.026c: gṛham ānīya badhnīmaḥ kratur evaṃ bhaven na saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.027a: apare tv abruvaṃs tatra nāgāḥ sukṛtakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.027e: chinnaṃ mūlam anarthānāṃ mṛte tasmin bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:033.028a: eṣā vai naiṣṭhikī buddhiḥ sarveṣām eva saṃmatā
GE07mbh_01_u:033.028c: yathā vā manyase rājaṃs tat kṣipraṃ saṃvidhīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:033.029c: vāsukiś cāpi saṃcintya tān uvāca bhujaṃgamān
GE07mbh_01_u:033.030a: naiṣā vo naiṣṭhikī buddhir matā kartuṃ bhujaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.030c: sarveṣām eva me buddhiḥ pannagānāṃ na rocate
GE07mbh_01_u:033.031a: kiṃ tv atra saṃvidhātavyaṃ bhavatāṃ yad bhaved dhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:033.031b-0385_03: na ca jānāti me buddhiḥ kiṃ cit kartuṃ vaco hi vaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:033.031b-0385_04: mayā hīdaṃ vidhātavyaṃ bhavatāṃ yad dhitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:034.001a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣām iti ceti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:034.001c: vāsukeś ca vacaḥ śrutvā elāpatro 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_01_u:034.001d-0386_01: prāg eva darśitā buddhir mayaiṣā bhujagottamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.001d-0386_02: heyeti yadi vo buddhis tavāpi ca tathā prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:034.001d-0386_03: astu kāmaṃ mamādyāpi buddhiḥ smaraṇam āgatā
GE07mbh_01_u:034.002a: na sa yajño na bhavitā na sa rājā tathāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.003a: daivenopahato rājan yo bhaved iha pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.003c: sa daivam evāśrayate nānyat tatra parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:034.004a: tad idaṃ daivam asmākaṃ bhayaṃ pannagasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.004c: daivam evāśrayāmo 'tra śṛṇudhvaṃ ca vaco mama
GE07mbh_01_u:034.005a: ahaṃ śāpe samutsṛṣṭe samaśrauṣaṃ vacas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:034.006a: devānāṃ pannagaśreṣṭhās tīkṣṇās tīkṣṇā iti prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:034.007a: kā hi labdhvā priyān putrāñ śaped evaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_01_u:034.008a: tatheti ca vacas tasyās tvayāpy uktaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_01_u:034.008c: etad icchāma vijñātuṃ kāraṇaṃ yan na vāritā brahmovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:034.010a: ye dandaśūkāḥ kṣudrāś ca pāpacārā viṣolbaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.010c: teṣāṃ vināśo bhavitā na tu ye dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.011a: yannimittaṃ ca bhavitā mokṣas teṣāṃ mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:034.013c: āstīko nāma yajñaṃ sa pratiṣetsyati taṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:034.013e: tatra mokṣyanti bhujagā ye bhaviṣyanti dhārmikāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.014c: kasyāṃ putraṃ mahātmānaṃ janayiṣyati vīryavān brahmovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:034.015-0388_02: tasmai dāsyati tāṃ kanyāṃ vāsukir bhujagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.015d-0389_02: sa tasyāṃ bhavitā putraḥ śāpān nāgāṃś ca mokṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:034.016a: evam astv iti taṃ devāḥ pitāmaham athābruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:034.016c: uktvā caivaṃ gatā devāḥ sa ca devaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:034.017a: so 'ham evaṃ prapaśyāmi vāsuke bhaginīṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:034.017c: jaratkārur iti khyātāṃ tāṃ tasmai pratipādaya
GE07mbh_01_u:034.018c: ṛṣaye suvratāya tvam eṣa mokṣaḥ śruto mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:035.001a: elāpatrasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā nāgā dvijottama
GE07mbh_01_u:035.001c: sarve prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan
GE07mbh_01_u:035.002a: tataḥ prabhṛti tāṃ kanyāṃ vāsukiḥ paryarakṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:035.002c: jaratkāruṃ svasāraṃ vai paraṃ harṣam avāpa ca
GE07mbh_01_u:035.004a: tatra netram abhūn nāgo vāsukir balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:035.004c: samāpyaiva ca tat karma pitāmaham upāgaman
GE07mbh_01_u:035.006a: tasyedaṃ mānasaṃ śalyaṃ samuddhartuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:035.007a: hito hy ayaṃ sadāsmākaṃ priyakārī ca nāgarāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:035.007c: kuru prasādaṃ deveśa śamayāsya manojvaram brahmovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:035.008c: elāpatreṇa nāgena yad asyābhihitaṃ purā mātṛśāpo nānyathāyaṃ kartuṃ śakyo mayā surāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:035.008d-020_0002: yasmān mātā gurutarī sarveṣām eva dehinām
GE07mbh_01_u:035.009a: tat karotv eṣa nāgendraḥ prāptakālaṃ vacas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:035.009c: vinaśiṣyanti ye pāpā na tu ye dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:035.010a: utpannaḥ sa jaratkārus tapasy ugre rato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:035.011a: yad elāpatreṇa vacas tadoktaṃ bhujagena ha
GE07mbh_01_u:035.011c: pannagānāṃ hitaṃ devās tat tathā na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_01_u:035.012a: etac chrutvā sa nāgendraḥ pitāmahavacas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:035.012b-0390_02: svasāram udyamya tadā jaratkārum ṛṣiṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:035.013a: jaratkārur yadā bhāryām icched varayituṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:035.013c: śīghram etya mamākhyeyaṃ tan naḥ śreyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:036.001a: jaratkārur iti proktaṃ yat tvayā sūtanandana
GE07mbh_01_u:036.001c: icchāmy etad ahaṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ śrotuṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.002a: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ jaratkāror nāmaitat prathitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:036.002d-0391_01: tat tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā provāca sa mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.003a: jareti kṣayam āhur vai dāruṇaṃ kārusaṃjñitam
GE07mbh_01_u:036.003c: śarīraṃ kāru tasyāsīt tat sa dhīmāñ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.004a: kṣapayām āsa tīvreṇa tapasety ata ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:036.004c: jaratkārur iti brahman vāsuker bhaginī tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:036.005a: evam uktas tu dharmātmā śaunakaḥ prāhasat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:036.005c: ugraśravasam āmantrya upapannam iti bruvan śaunaka uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:036.005d-0392_01: uktaṃ nāma yathāpūrvaṃ sarvaṃ tac chrutavān aham
GE07mbh_01_u:036.005d-0392_02: yathā tu jāto hy āstīka etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_01_u:036.005d-0392_03: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya sūtaḥ provāca śāstrataḥ sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:036.006-0393_02: svasāram udyamya tadā jaratkārum ṛṣiṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:036.006a: atha kālasya mahataḥ sa muniḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.006c: tapasy abhirato dhīmān na dārān abhyakāṅkṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:036.007a: sa ūrdhvaretās tapasi prasaktaḥ; svādhyāyavān vītabhayaklamaḥ san
GE07mbh_01_u:036.007c: cacāra sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahātmā; na cāpi dārān manasāpy akāṅkṣat
GE07mbh_01_u:036.008a: tato 'parasmin saṃprāpte kāle kasmiṃś cid eva tu
GE07mbh_01_u:036.010a: mṛgān vidhyan varāhāṃś ca tarakṣūn mahiṣāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:036.010c: anyāṃś ca vividhān vanyāṃś cacāra pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.011a: sa kadā cin mṛgaṃ viddhvā bāṇena nataparvaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:036.011c: pṛṣṭhato dhanur ādāya sasāra gahane vane
GE07mbh_01_u:036.012a: yathā hi bhagavān rudro viddhvā yajñamṛgaṃ divi
GE07mbh_01_u:036.013a: na hi tena mṛgo viddho jīvan gacchati vai vanam
GE07mbh_01_u:036.013c: pūrvarūpaṃ tu tan nūnam āsīt svargagatiṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:036.013e: parikṣitas tasya rājño viddho yan naṣṭavān mṛgaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.014a: dūraṃ cāpahṛtas tena mṛgeṇa sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.016a: tam abhidrutya vegena sa rājā saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_01_u:036.016c: apṛcchad dhanur udyamya taṃ muniṃ kṣucchramānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.017a: bho bho brahmann ahaṃ rājā parikṣid abhimanyujaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.017c: mayā viddho mṛgo naṣṭaḥ kaccit tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi
GE07mbh_01_u:036.018a: sa munis tasya novāca kiṃ cin maunavrate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.018c: tasya skandhe mṛtaṃ sarpaṃ kruddho rājā samāsajat
GE07mbh_01_u:036.019c: na ca kiṃ cid uvācainaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_01_u:036.020a: sa rājā krodham utsṛjya vyathitas taṃ tathāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:036.020c: dṛṣṭvā jagāma nagaram ṛṣis tv āste tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.020d-0395_01: na hi taṃ rājaśārdūlaṃ kṣamāśīlo mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.020d-0396_01: na hi taṃ rājaśārdūlas tathā dharmaparāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:036.022a: sa devaṃ param īśānaṃ sarvabhūtahite ratam
GE07mbh_01_u:036.022c: brahmāṇam upatasthe vai kāle kāle susaṃyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.022e: sa tena samanujñāto brahmaṇā gṛham eyivān
GE07mbh_01_u:036.023a: sakhyoktaḥ krīḍamānena sa tatra hasatā kila
GE07mbh_01_u:036.023d-0397_01: uddiśya pitaraṃ tasya yac chrutvā roṣam āharat
GE07mbh_01_u:036.024a: tejasvinas tava pitā tathaiva ca tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.024c: śavaṃ skandhena vahati mā śṛṅgin garvito bhava
GE07mbh_01_u:036.025a: vyāharatsv ṛṣiputreṣu mā sma kiṃ cid vaco vadīḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.026a: kva te puruṣamānitvaṃ kva te vācas tathāvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:036.026c: darpajāḥ pitaraṃ yas tvaṃ draṣṭā śavadharaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:036.026d-0398_01: pitrā ca tava tat karma nānurūpam ivātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.001a: evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī śṛṅgī kopasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.002a: sa taṃ kṛśam abhipreṣkya sūnṛtāṃ vācam utsṛjan
GE07mbh_01_u:037.002c: apṛcchata kathaṃ tātaḥ sa me 'dya mṛtadhārakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.002d-0399_03: evaṃbhūtaḥ sa tejasvī sa me 'dya mṛtadhārakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.003c: avasaktaḥ pitus te 'dya mṛtaḥ skandhe bhujaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.004a: kiṃ me pitrā kṛtaṃ tasya rājño 'niṣṭaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.004c: brūhi tvaṃ kṛśa tattvena paśya me tapaso balam
GE07mbh_01_u:037.005a: sa rājā mṛgayāṃ yātaḥ parikṣid abhimanyujaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.005c: sasāra mṛgam ekākī viddhvā bāṇena patriṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.006a: na cāpaśyan mṛgaṃ rājā caraṃs tasmin mahāvane
GE07mbh_01_u:037.007c: punaḥ punar mṛgaṃ naṣṭaṃ papraccha pitaraṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:037.008a: sa ca maunavratopeto naiva taṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:037.008c: tasya rājā dhanuṣkoṭyā sarpaṃ skandhe samāsṛjat
GE07mbh_01_u:037.010a: śrutvaivam ṛṣiputras tu divaṃ stabdhveva viṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.011a: āviṣṭaḥ sa tu kopena śaśāpa nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.012a: yo 'sau vṛddhasya tātasya tathā kṛcchragatasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:037.014d-0400_01: no cet tatas takṣako 'pi yāsyate yamamandiram
GE07mbh_01_u:037.015a: iti śaptvā nṛpaṃ kruddhaḥ śṛṅgī pitaram abhyayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:037.016a: sa tam ālakṣya pitaraṃ śṛṅgī skandhagatena vai
GE07mbh_01_u:037.017a: duḥkhāc cāśrūṇi mumuce pitaraṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:037.017c: śrutvemāṃ dharṣaṇāṃ tāta tava tena durātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.018a: rājñā parikṣitā kopād aśapaṃ tam ahaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_01_u:037.020a: tam abravīt pitā brahmaṃs tathā kopasamanvitam
GE07mbh_01_u:037.020c: na me priyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta naiṣa dharmas tapasvinām kāmaṃ krodhaṃ tathā lobhaṃ yas tapasvī na śaknuyāt
GE07mbh_01_u:037.020d-021_0002: vijetum akṛtaprajñaḥ sa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_01_u:037.020d-021_0003: trividhaṃ narakasyedaṃ dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_01_u:037.020d-021_0005: yaḥ pravrajyāṃ gṛhītvā tu na bhaved vijitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.021c: nyāyato rakṣitās tena tasya pāpaṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_01_u:037.022a: sarvathā vartamānasya rājño hy asmadvidhaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.022c: kṣantavyaṃ putra dharmo hi hato hanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.023a: yadi rājā na rakṣeta pīḍā vai naḥ parā bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:037.023c: na śaknuyāma carituṃ dharmaṃ putra yathāsukham
GE07mbh_01_u:037.024c: carāmo vipulaṃ dharmaṃ teṣāṃ cāṃśo 'sti dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.024d-0401_01: sarvathā vartamānasya rājñaḥ kṣantavyam eva hi
GE07mbh_01_u:037.025c: rakṣaty asmān yathā rājñā rakṣitavyāḥ prajās tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026c: ajānatā vratam idaṃ kṛtam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_01: arājake janapade doṣā jāyanti vai sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_02: udvṛttaṃ satataṃ lokaṃ rājā daṇḍena śāsti vai
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_03: daṇḍāt pratibhayaṃ bhūyaḥ śāntir utpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_04: nodvignaś carate dharmaṃ nodvignaś carate kriyām
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_05: rājñā pratiṣṭhito dharmo dharmāt svargaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_06: rājño yajñakriyāḥ sarvā yajñād devāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_07: devād vṛṣṭiḥ pravarteta vṛṣṭer oṣadhayaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_09: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yo dhātā rājā rājyakaraḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:037.026d-0402_10: daśaśrotriyasamo rājā ity evaṃ manur abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:037.027a: tasmād idaṃ tvayā bālyāt sahasā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:037.027c: na hy arhati nṛpaḥ śāpam asmattaḥ putra sarvathā krodhāt śāpam utsṛjatā tapohānir anuttamā
GE07mbh_01_u:037.027d-022_0003: ato 'haṃ tvāṃ prabravīmi śāpo 'sya na bhaved yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.001a: yady etat sāhasaṃ tāta yadi vā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:038.001c: priyaṃ vāpy apriyaṃ vā te vāg uktā na mṛṣā mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.002a: naivānyathedaṃ bhavitā pitar eṣa bravīmi te
GE07mbh_01_u:038.002c: nāhaṃ mṛṣā prabravīmi svaireṣv api kutaḥ śapan
GE07mbh_01_u:038.003a: jānāmy ugraprabhāvaṃ tvāṃ putra satyagiraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.003c: nānṛtaṃ hy uktapūrvaṃ te naitan mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:038.004a: pitrā putro vayaḥstho 'pi satataṃ vācya eva tu
GE07mbh_01_u:038.004c: yathā syād guṇasaṃyuktaḥ prāpnuyāc ca mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.005a: kiṃ punar bāla eva tvaṃ tapasā bhāvitaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:038.005d-0403_01: utsīdeyur ime lokāḥ kṣamā cāsya pratikriyā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.006a: so 'haṃ paśyāmi vaktavyaṃ tvayi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:038.006c: putratvaṃ bālatāṃ caiva tavāvekṣya ca sāhasam
GE07mbh_01_u:038.007a: sa tvaṃ śamayuto bhūtvā vanyam āhāram āharan
GE07mbh_01_u:038.007c: cara krodham imaṃ tyaktvā naivaṃ dharmaṃ prahāsyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:038.008a: krodho hi dharmaṃ harati yatīnāṃ duḥkhasaṃcitam
GE07mbh_01_u:038.008c: tato dharmavihīnānāṃ gatir iṣṭā na vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:038.008d-023_0001: te 'tra dhanyāḥ śubhadhiyo ye dharme satataṃ ratāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.009a: śama eva yatīnāṃ hi kṣamiṇāṃ siddhikārakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.009c: kṣamāvatām ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś caiva kṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_01_u:038.011a: mayā tu śamam āsthāya yac chakyaṃ kartum adya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:038.011c: tat kariṣye 'dya tātāhaṃ preṣayiṣye nṛpāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:038.011d-023_0003: tato gauramukhaṃ śiṣyaṃ śīlavantaṃ guṇānvitam āhūya yāhi rājānaṃ vṛttāntam idam ucyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:038.012c: mamemāṃ dharṣaṇāṃ tvattaḥ prekṣya rājann amarṣiṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.013a: evamādiśya śiṣyaṃ sa preṣayām āsa suvrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.015c: viveśa bhavanaṃ rājñaḥ pūrvaṃ dvāḥsthair niveditaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.016a: pūjitaś ca narendreṇa dvijo gauramukhas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.017a: śamīko nāma rājendra viṣaye vartate tava
GE07mbh_01_u:038.018a: tasya tvayā naravyāghra sarpaḥ prāṇair viyojitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.018e: kṣāntavāṃs tava tat karma putras tasya na cakṣame
GE07mbh_01_u:038.019a: tena śapto 'si rājendra pitur ajñātam adya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:038.019c: takṣakaḥ saptarātreṇa mṛtyus te vai bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:038.020a: tatra rakṣāṃ kuruṣveti punaḥ punar athābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:038.020c: tad anyathā na śakyaṃ ca kartuṃ kena cid apy uta
GE07mbh_01_u:038.021a: na hi śaknoti saṃyantuṃ putraṃ kopasamanvitam
GE07mbh_01_u:038.021c: tato 'haṃ preṣitas tena tava rājan hitārthinā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.022a: iti śrutvā vaco ghoraṃ sa rājā kurunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.022c: paryatapyata tat pāpaṃ kṛtvā rājā mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.023a: taṃ ca maunavratadharaṃ śrutvā munivaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.024c: paryatapyata bhūyo 'pi kṛtvā tat kilbiṣaṃ muneḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.025a: na hi mṛtyuṃ tathā rājā śrutvā vai so 'nvatapyata
GE07mbh_01_u:038.025c: aśocad amaraprakhyo yathā kṛtveha karma tat
GE07mbh_01_u:038.026a: tatas taṃ preṣayām āsa rājā gauramukhaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.026c: bhūyaḥ prasādaṃ bhagavān karotv iti mameti vai
GE07mbh_01_u:038.026d-0404_01: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ rājño munir gauramukhas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.027a: tasmiṃś ca gatamātre vai rājā gauramukhe tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:038.029a: rakṣāṃ ca vidadhe tatra bhiṣajaś cauṣadhāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:038.029c: brāhmaṇān siddhamantrāṃś ca sarvato vai nyaveśayat
GE07mbh_01_u:038.030a: rājakāryāṇi tatrasthaḥ sarvāṇy evākaroc ca saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:038.030d-0405_01: na cainaṃ kaś cid ārūḍhaṃ labhate rājasattamam
GE07mbh_01_u:038.031a: prāpte tu divase tasmin saptame dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:038.032a: śrutaṃ hi tena tad abhūd adya taṃ rājasattamam
GE07mbh_01_u:038.033c: tatra me 'rthaś ca dharmaś ca bhaviteti vicintayan
GE07mbh_01_u:038.034a: taṃ dadarśa sa nāgendras takṣakaḥ kāśyapaṃ pathi
GE07mbh_01_u:038.035c: kva bhavāṃs tvarito yāti kiṃ ca kāryaṃ cikīrṣati
GE07mbh_01_u:038.037e: gacchāmi saumya tvaritaṃ sadyaḥ kartum apajvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:038.038a: ahaṃ sa takṣako brahmaṃs taṃ dhakṣyāmi mahīpatim
GE07mbh_01_u:038.038c: nivartasva na śaktas tvaṃ mayā daṣṭaṃ cikitsitum
GE07mbh_01_u:038.039a: ahaṃ taṃ nṛpatiṃ nāga tvayā daṣṭam apajvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:038.039c: kariṣya iti me buddhir vidyābalam upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:039.001a: daṣṭaṃ yadi mayeha tvaṃ śaktaḥ kiṃ cic cikitsitum
GE07mbh_01_u:039.001c: tato vṛkṣaṃ mayā daṣṭam imaṃ jīvaya kāśyapa
GE07mbh_01_u:039.002a: paraṃ mantrabalaṃ yat te tad darśaya yatasva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:039.002c: nyagrodham enaṃ dhakṣyāmi paśyatas te dvijottama sūtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:039.002d-0407_01: evam uktas takṣakeṇa kāśyapaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:039.003a: daśa nāgendra vṛkṣaṃ tvaṃ yam enam abhimanyase
GE07mbh_01_u:039.003c: aham enaṃ tvayā daṣṭaṃ jīvayiṣye bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_01_u:039.003d-0408_01: paśya mantrabalaṃ me 'dya nyagrodhaṃ daśa pannaga
GE07mbh_01_u:039.004a: evam uktaḥ sa nāgendraḥ kāśyapena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:039.005a: sa vṛkṣas tena daṣṭaḥ san sadya eva mahādyute
GE07mbh_01_u:039.006a: taṃ dagdhvā sa nagaṃ nāgaḥ kāśyapaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:039.007c: bhasma sarvaṃ samāhṛtya kāśyapo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:039.008c: ahaṃ saṃjīvayāmy enaṃ paśyatas te bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_01_u:039.009a: tataḥ sa bhagavān vidvān kāśyapo dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:039.010a: aṅkuraṃ taṃ sa kṛtavāṃs tataḥ parṇadvayānvitam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.010c: palāśinaṃ śākhinaṃ ca tathā viṭapinaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:039.011a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvitaṃ vṛkṣaṃ kāśyapena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:039.011c: uvāca takṣako brahmann etad atyadbhutaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_01_u:039.012a: viprendra yad viṣaṃ hanyā mama vā madvidhasya vā
GE07mbh_01_u:039.012c: kaṃ tvam artham abhiprepsur yāsi tatra tapodhana
GE07mbh_01_u:039.013a: yat te 'bhilaṣitaṃ prāptuṃ phalaṃ tasmān nṛpottamāt
GE07mbh_01_u:039.013c: aham eva pradāsyāmi tat te yady api durlabham
GE07mbh_01_u:039.014c: ghaṭamānasya te vipra siddhiḥ saṃśayitā bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:039.015a: tato yaśaḥ pradīptaṃ te triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.015c: viraśmir iva gharmāṃśur antardhānam ito vrajet
GE07mbh_01_u:039.016a: dhanārthī yāmy ahaṃ tatra tan me ditsa bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_01_u:039.016d-0409_01: yatteyaṃ ca pragṛhya vai vinivarte bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_01_u:039.017a: yāvad dhanaṃ prārthayase tasmād rājñas tato 'dhikam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.017d-024_0001: tad dhanaṃ tasya vo rājā na grahīṣyati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:039.017d-024_0002: ime nāgā vahiṣyanti dattaṃ hema mayā bahu
GE07mbh_01_u:039.019a: divyajñānaḥ sa tejasvī jñātvā taṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:039.019d-025_0001: daśako prastaṃ me dehi dhanaṃ pannagasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:039.019d-025_0002: na rājānaṃ gamiṣyāmi kiṃ tena nṛpasūnunā
GE07mbh_01_u:039.019d-025_0003: ity uktas takṣakas tena viṃśat koṭīr dhanaṃ dadau sa jagāma tato vipro dhanaṃ labdhvā yathāsukham
GE07mbh_01_u:039.019e: labdhvā vittaṃ munivaras takṣakād yāvad īpsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.021a: atha śuśrāva gacchan sa takṣako jagatīpatim
GE07mbh_01_u:039.022a: sa cintayām āsa tadā māyāyogena pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:039.022c: mayā vañcayitavyo 'sau ka upāyo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_01_u:039.025c: upaninyus tathā rājñe darbhān āpaḥ phalāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:039.026a: tac ca sarvaṃ sa rājendraḥ pratijagrāha vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:039.026c: kṛtvā ca teṣāṃ kāryāṇi gamyatām ity uvāca tān
GE07mbh_01_u:039.027c: amātyān suhṛdaś caiva provāca sa narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:039.029a: tato rājā sasacivaḥ phalāny ādātum aicchata
GE07mbh_01_u:039.029b-0410_01: vidhinā saṃprayukto vai ṛṣivākyena tena tu
GE07mbh_01_u:039.029b-0410_02: yasminn eva phale nāgas tam evābhakṣayat svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.029c: yad gṛhītaṃ phalaṃ rājñā tatra kṛmir abhūd aṇuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:039.030a: sa taṃ gṛhya nṛpaśreṣṭhaḥ sacivān idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:039.030c: astam abhyeti savitā viṣād adya na me bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.031a: satyavāg astu sa muniḥ kṛmiko māṃ daśatv ayam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.031c: takṣako nāma bhūtvā vai tathā parihṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:039.032c: evam uktvā sa rājendro grīvāyāṃ saṃniveśya ha
GE07mbh_01_u:039.033c: tasmāt phalād viniṣkramya yat tad rājñe niveditam
GE07mbh_01_u:039.033d-0411_01: veṣṭayitvā ca bhogena vinadya ca mahāsvanam
GE07mbh_01_u:040.001a: taṃ tathā mantriṇo dṛṣṭvā bhogena pariveṣṭitam
GE07mbh_01_u:040.002a: taṃ tu nādaṃ tataḥ śrutvā mantriṇas te pradudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.002c: apaśyaṃś caiva te yāntam ākāśe nāgam adbhutam
GE07mbh_01_u:040.004a: tatas tu te tad gṛham agninā vṛtaṃ; pradīpyamānaṃ viṣajena bhoginaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.004c: bhayāt parityajya diśaḥ prapedire; papāta tac cāśanitāḍitaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:040.005a: tato nṛpe takṣakatejasā hate; prayujya sarvāḥ paralokasatkriyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.005c: śucir dvijo rājapurohitas tadā; tathaiva te tasya nṛpasya mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.006a: nṛpaṃ śiśuṃ tasya sutaṃ pracakrire; sametya sarve puravāsino janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.006c: nṛpaṃ yam āhus tam amitraghātinaṃ; kurupravīraṃ janamejayaṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.007a: sa bāla evāryamatir nṛpottamaḥ; sahaiva tair mantripurohitais tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:040.007c: śaśāsa rājyaṃ kurupuṃgavāgrajo; yathāsya vīraḥ prapitāmahas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:040.008a: tatas tu rājānam amitratāpanaṃ; samīkṣya te tasya nṛpasya mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.008c: suvarṇavarmāṇam upetya kāśipaṃ; vapuṣṭamārthaṃ varayāṃ pracakramuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.009a: tataḥ sa rājā pradadau vapuṣṭamāṃ; kurupravīrāya parīkṣya dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.009c: sa cāpi tāṃ prāpya mudā yuto 'bhavan; na cānyanārīṣu mano dadhe kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:040.010a: saraḥsu phulleṣu vaneṣu caiva ha; prasannacetā vijahāra vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:040.010c: tathā sa rājanyavaro vijahrivān; yathorvaśīṃ prāpya purā purūravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:040.011a: vapuṣṭamā cāpi varaṃ patiṃ tadā; pratītarūpaṃ samavāpya bhūmipam
GE07mbh_01_u:040.011c: bhāvena rāmā ramayāṃ babhūva vai; vihārakāleṣv avarodhasundarī
GE07mbh_01_u:041.001a: etasminn eva kāle tu jaratkārur mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.002c: tīrtheṣv āplavanaṃ kurvan puṇyeṣu vicacāra ha
GE07mbh_01_u:041.003c: sa dadarśa pitṝn garte lambamānān adhomukhān
GE07mbh_01_u:041.004c: taṃ ca tantuṃ śanair ākhum ādadānaṃ bilāśrayam
GE07mbh_01_u:041.005a: nirāhārān kṛśān dīnān garte ''rtāṃs trāṇam icchataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.007a: vīraṇastambake mūlaṃ yad apy ekam iha sthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:041.007c: tad apy ayaṃ śanair ākhur ādatte daśanaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.008c: tataḥ stha patitāro 'tra garte asminn adhomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.009a: tato me duḥkham utpannaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuṣmān adhomukhān
GE07mbh_01_u:041.009c: kṛcchrām āpadam āpannān priyaṃ kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.010c: ardhena vāpi nistartum āpadaṃ brūta māciram
GE07mbh_01_u:041.011c: bhavantaḥ sarva evāsmāt kāmam evaṃ vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:041.012a: ṛddho bhavān brahmacārī yo nas trātum ihecchati
GE07mbh_01_u:041.012c: na tu viprāgrya tapasā śakyam etad vyapohitum
GE07mbh_01_u:041.013a: asti nas tāta tapasaḥ phalaṃ pravadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:041.013d-0412_01: saṃtānaṃ hi paro dharma evam āha pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.014a: lambatām iha nas tāta na jñānaṃ pratibhāti vai
GE07mbh_01_u:041.015a: ṛddho bhavān mahābhāgo yo naḥ śocyān suduḥkhitān
GE07mbh_01_u:041.015b-0413_01: śocyān suduḥkhitān asmān kasmād vedavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:041.015c: śocasy upetya kāruṇyāc chṛṇu ye vai vayaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_01_u:041.016c: lokāt puṇyād iha bhraṣṭāḥ saṃtānaprakṣayād vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:041.017a: pranaṣṭaṃ nas tapaḥ puṇyaṃ na hi nas tantur asti vai
GE07mbh_01_u:041.017c: asti tv eko 'dya nas tantuḥ so 'pi nāsti yathā tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:041.018a: mandabhāgyo 'lpabhāgyānāṃ bandhuḥ sa kila naḥ kule
GE07mbh_01_u:041.019a: tena sma tapaso lobhāt kṛcchram āpāditā vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:041.019c: na tasya bhāryā putro vā bāndhavo vāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_01_u:041.020a: tasmāl lambāmahe garte naṣṭasaṃjñā hy anāthavat
GE07mbh_01_u:041.020c: sa vaktavyas tvayā dṛṣṭvā asmākaṃ nāthavattayā
GE07mbh_01_u:041.021c: sādhu dārān kuruṣveti prajāyasveti cābhibho na tac ca kutapodānaiḥ prāpyate phalam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:041.021d-026_0003: kṣālanas tāta jāyaṃte sarva eva hi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.021d-026_0005: athānyathā vartamānā vāryāḥ syus tridivaukasām tvaṃ tāta samyag jānīhi dharmajñaḥ san na vetsi kim
GE07mbh_01_u:041.021e: kulatantur hi naḥ śiṣṭas tvam evaikas tapodhana
GE07mbh_01_u:041.022a: yaṃ tu paśyasi no brahman vīraṇastambam āśritān
GE07mbh_01_u:041.023a: yāni paśyasi vai brahman mūlānīhāsya vīrudhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.023c: ete nas tantavas tāta kālena paribhakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.024a: yat tv etat paśyasi brahman mūlam asyārdhabhakṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:041.024c: tatra lambāmahe sarve so 'py ekas tapa āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.025a: yam ākhuṃ paśyasi brahman kāla eṣa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.025c: sa taṃ taporataṃ mandaṃ śanaiḥ kṣapayate tudan
GE07mbh_01_u:041.026a: na hi nas tat tapas tasya tārayiṣyati sattama
GE07mbh_01_u:041.027a: asmāsu patiteṣv atra saha pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.027c: chinnaḥ kālena so 'py atra gantā vai narakaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:041.028a: tapo vāpy athavā yajño yac cānyat pāvanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:041.028c: tat sarvaṃ na samaṃ tāta saṃtatyeti satāṃ matam
GE07mbh_01_u:041.029a: sa tāta dṛṣṭvā brūyās tvaṃ jaratkāruṃ tapasvinam
GE07mbh_01_u:041.030a: yathā dārān prakuryāt sa putrāṃś cotpādayed yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:041.030c: tathā brahmaṃs tvayā vācyaḥ so 'smākaṃ nāthavattayā
GE07mbh_01_u:041.030d-0414_02: kas tvaṃ bandhum ivāsmākam anuśocasi sattama
GE07mbh_01_u:041.030d-0414_03: śrotum icchāma sarveṣāṃ ko bhavān iha tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_01_u:042.001c: uvāca svān pitṝn duḥkhād bāṣpasaṃdigdhayā girā jaratkārur uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:042.001d-0415_02: tad brūta yan mayā kāryaṃ bhavatāṃ priyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_01_u:042.002a: aham eva jaratkāruḥ kilbiṣī bhavatāṃ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.002c: tad daṇḍaṃ dhārayata me duṣkṛter akṛtātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.003a: putra diṣṭyāsi saṃprāpta imaṃ deśaṃ yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_01_u:042.003c: kimarthaṃ ca tvayā brahman na kṛto dārasaṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.003d-027_0001: dharmārthakāmais tu sukhaprahīṇā; bhikṣāṭanāḥ karpaṭabaddhagātrāḥ kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhā vasudhāṃ bhramanti; dārān parityajya gatā narā ye
GE07mbh_01_u:042.003d-027_0003: na te kratuśatair lokāḥ prāpyante divi mānada; tapobhir vividhair vāpi yāṃl lokān putriṇo gatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.004a: mamāyaṃ pitaro nityaṃ hṛdy arthaḥ parivartate
GE07mbh_01_u:042.004c: ūrdhvaretāḥ śarīraṃ vai prāpayeyam amutra vai
GE07mbh_01_u:042.004d-0416_01: na dārān vai kariṣye 'ham iti me bhāvitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.005a: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu bhavataḥ śakuntān iva lambataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.006a: kariṣye vaḥ priyaṃ kāmaṃ nivekṣye nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.006c: sanāmnīṃ yady ahaṃ kanyām upalapsye kadā cana
GE07mbh_01_u:042.007a: bhaviṣyati ca yā kā cid bhaikṣavat svayam udyatā
GE07mbh_01_u:042.007c: pratigrahītā tām asmi na bhareyaṃ ca yām aham
GE07mbh_01_u:042.008a: evaṃvidham ahaṃ kuryāṃ niveśaṃ prāpnuyāṃ yadi
GE07mbh_01_u:042.008c: anyathā na kariṣye tu satyam etat pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.008d-0417_01: tatra cotpatsyate jantur bhavatāṃ tāraṇāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:042.008d-0417_02: śāśvatāś cāvyayāś caiva tiṣṭhantu pitaro mama
GE07mbh_01_u:042.009a: evam uktvā tu sa pitṝṃś cacāra pṛthivīṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.009c: na ca sma labhate bhāryāṃ vṛddho 'yam iti śaunaka
GE07mbh_01_u:042.010a: yadā nirvedam āpannaḥ pitṛbhiś coditas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:042.010d-0418_01: sa tv araṇyagataḥ prājñaḥ pitṝṇāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_01_u:042.010d-0418_02: uvāca kanyāṃ yācāmi tisro vācaḥ śanair imāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.011a: yāni bhūtāni santīha sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:042.011c: antarhitāni vā yāni tāni śṛṇvantu me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.012a: ugre tapasi vartantaṃ pitaraś codayanti mām
GE07mbh_01_u:042.013a: niveśārthy akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ kanyābhaikṣaṃ carāmi bhoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.014a: yasya kanyāsti bhūtasya ye mayeha prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.014c: te me kanyāṃ prayacchantu carataḥ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_01_u:042.015a: mama kanyā sanāmnī yā bhaikṣavac codyatā bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:042.015c: bhareyaṃ caiva yāṃ nāhaṃ tāṃ me kanyāṃ prayacchata
GE07mbh_01_u:042.016a: tatas te pannagā ye vai jaratkārau samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:042.016c: tām ādāya pravṛttiṃ te vāsukeḥ pratyavedayan
GE07mbh_01_u:042.017a: teṣāṃ śrutvā sa nāgendraḥ kanyāṃ tāṃ samalaṃkṛtām
GE07mbh_01_u:042.018a: tatra tāṃ bhaikṣavat kanyāṃ prādāt tasmai mahātmane
GE07mbh_01_u:042.018c: nāgendro vāsukir brahman na sa tāṃ pratyagṛhṇata
GE07mbh_01_u:042.020a: tato nāma sa kanyāyāḥ papraccha bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_01_u:042.020c: vāsuke bharaṇaṃ cāsyā na kuryām ity uvāca ha rurur uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:042.020d-028_0001: kimarthaṃ sā tu nāgendro dvijendrāya kṛtātmane
GE07mbh_01_u:042.020d-028_0002: avijñātāya vai dattā svasā rājīvalocanā pramatir uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:043.001a: vāsukis tv abravīd vākyaṃ jaratkārum ṛṣiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.001c: sanāmā tava kanyeyaṃ svasā me tapasānvitā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.002a: bhariṣyāmi ca te bhāryāṃ pratīcchemāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_01_u:043.002c: rakṣaṇaṃ ca kariṣye 'syāḥ sarvaśaktyā tapodhana ṛṣir uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:043.002d-0419_02: na bhariṣye 'ham etāṃ vai eṣa me samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.002d-0419_03: apriyaṃ ca na kartavyaṃ kṛte caināṃ tyajāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:043.003a: pratiśrute tu nāgena bhariṣye bhaginīm iti
GE07mbh_01_u:043.003c: jaratkārus tadā veśma bhujagasya jagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:043.006c: tatra bhāryāsahāyaḥ sa jaratkārur uvāsa ha
GE07mbh_01_u:043.007a: sa tatra samayaṃ cakre bhāryayā saha sattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.007c: vipriyaṃ me na kartavyaṃ na ca vācyaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_01_u:043.008a: tyajeyam apriye hi tvāṃ kṛte vāsaṃ ca te gṛhe
GE07mbh_01_u:043.008c: etad gṛhāṇa vacanaṃ mayā yat samudīritam
GE07mbh_01_u:043.009a: tataḥ paramasaṃvignā svasā nāgapates tu sā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.009c: atiduḥkhānvitā vācaṃ tam uvācaivam astv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:043.010a: tathaiva sā ca bhartāraṃ duḥkhaśīlam upācarat
GE07mbh_01_u:043.011a: ṛtukāle tataḥ snātā kadā cid vāsukeḥ svasā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.012e: śuklapakṣe yathā somo vyavardhata tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.014a: tasmiṃś ca supte viprendre savitāstam iyād girim
GE07mbh_01_u:043.014c: ahnaḥ parikṣaye brahmaṃs tataḥ sācintayat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.015a: kiṃ nu me sukṛtaṃ bhūyād bhartur utthāpanaṃ na vā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.016a: kopo vā dharmaśīlasya dharmalopo 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.016c: dharmalopo garīyān vai syād atrety akaron manaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.017a: utthāpayiṣye yady enaṃ dhruvaṃ kopaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:043.019c: saṃdhyām upāssva bhagavann apaḥ spṛṣṭvā yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.020c: saṃdhyā pravartate ceyaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:043.021a: evam uktaḥ sa bhagavāñ jaratkārur mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.022c: samīpe te na vatsyāmi gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:043.023a: na hi tejo 'sti vāmoru mayi supte vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.023c: astaṃ gantuṃ yathākālam iti me hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_01_u:043.024a: na cāpy avamatasyeha vastuṃ roceta kasya cit
GE07mbh_01_u:043.024c: kiṃ punar dharmaśīlasya mama vā madvidhasya vā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.026c: dharmalopo na te vipra syād ity etat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.027a: uvāca bhāryām ity ukto jaratkārur mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.028a: na me vāg anṛtaṃ prāha gamiṣye 'haṃ bhujaṃgame
GE07mbh_01_u:043.028c: samayo hy eṣa me pūrvaṃ tvayā saha mithaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.029a: sukham asmy uṣito bhadre brūyās tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:043.029c: ito mayi gate bhīru gataḥ sa bhagavān iti
GE07mbh_01_u:043.029e: tvaṃ cāpi mayi niṣkrānte na śokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:043.030a: ity uktā sānavadyāṅgī pratyuvāca patiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.032a: na mām arhasi dharmajña parityaktum anāgasam
GE07mbh_01_u:043.032c: dharme sthitāṃ sthito dharme sadā priyahite ratām
GE07mbh_01_u:043.033a: pradāne kāraṇaṃ yac ca mama tubhyaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_01_u:043.033b-0421_01: apatyārthaṃ tu me bhrātā jñātīnāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_01_u:043.033c: tad alabdhavatīṃ mandāṃ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati vāsukhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.034c: apatyam īpṣitaṃ tvattas tac ca tāvan na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_01_u:043.035a: tvatto hy apatyalābhena jñātīnāṃ me śivaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:043.035c: saṃprayogo bhaven nāyaṃ mama moghas tvayā dvija
GE07mbh_01_u:043.036a: jñātīnāṃ hitam icchantī bhagavaṃs tvāṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_01_u:043.036c: imam avyaktarūpaṃ me garbham ādhāya sattama
GE07mbh_01_u:043.036e: kathaṃ tyaktvā mahātmā san gantum icchasy anāgasam
GE07mbh_01_u:043.037a: evam uktas tu sa munir bhāryāṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:043.037c: yady uktam anurūpaṃ ca jaratkārus tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.038a: asty eṣa garbhaḥ subhage tava vaiśvānaropamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:043.039a: evam uktvā sa dharmātmā jaratkārur mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:044.002a: tataḥ sa bhujagaśreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā sumahad apriyam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.002c: uvāca bhaginīṃ dīnāṃ tadā dīnataraḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.003a: jānāsi bhadre yat kāryaṃ pradāne kāraṇaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_01_u:044.003c: pannagānāṃ hitārthāya putras te syāt tato yadi
GE07mbh_01_u:044.004a: sa sarpasatrāt kila no mokṣayiṣyati vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:044.004c: evaṃ pitāmahaḥ pūrvam uktavān māṃ suraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:044.005a: apy asti garbhaḥ subhage tasmāt te munisattamāt
GE07mbh_01_u:044.005c: na cecchāmy aphalaṃ tasya dārakarma manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:044.006a: kāmaṃ ca mama na nyāyyaṃ praṣṭuṃ tvāṃ kāryam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.006c: kiṃ tu kāryagarīyastvāt tatas tvāham acūcudam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.007c: nainam anvāgamiṣyāmi kadā cid dhi śapet sa mām
GE07mbh_01_u:044.008a: ācakṣva bhadre bhartus tvaṃ sarvam eva viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.008c: śalyam uddhara me ghoraṃ bhadre hṛdi cirasthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.009a: jaratkārus tato vākyam ity uktā pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:044.010c: astīty udaram uddiśya mamedaṃ gatavāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:044.011a: svaireṣv api na tenāhaṃ smarāmi vitathaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:044.011c: uktapūrvaṃ kuto rājan sāṃparāye sa vakṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:044.012a: na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ kāryaṃ prati bhujaṃgame
GE07mbh_01_u:044.013a: ity uktvā hi sa māṃ bhrātar gato bhartā tapovanam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.013c: tasmād vyetu paraṃ duḥkhaṃ tavedaṃ manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.014a: etac chrutvā sa nāgendro vāsukiḥ parayā mudā
GE07mbh_01_u:044.014c: evam astv iti tad vākyaṃ bhaginyāḥ pratyagṛhṇata
GE07mbh_01_u:044.016a: tataḥ sa vavṛdhe garbho mahātejā raviprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:044.017a: yathākālaṃ tu sā brahman prajajñe bhujagasvasā
GE07mbh_01_u:044.019c: nāma cāsyābhavat khyātaṃ lokeṣv āstīka ity uta
GE07mbh_01_u:044.020a: astīty uktvā gato yasmāt pitā garbhastham eva tam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.020c: vanaṃ tasmād idaṃ tasya nāmāstīketi viśrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:044.021a: sa bāla eva tatrasthaś carann amitabuddhimān
GE07mbh_01_u:044.022c: vivardhamānaḥ sarvāṃs tān pannagān abhyaharṣayat śaunaka uvāca

GE07mbh_01_u:053.033a: śrāvayām āsa vidhivat tadā karmāntareṣu saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:053.033c: tām ahaṃ vidhivat puṇyāṃ śrotum icchāmi vai kathām

GE07mbh_01_u:053.035a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mahad ākhyānam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:054.002a: janayām āsa yaṃ kālī śakteḥ putrāt parāśarāt
GE07mbh_01_u:054.003a: jātamātraś ca yaḥ sadya iṣṭyā deham avīvṛdhat
GE07mbh_01_u:054.004a: yaṃ nātitapasā kaś cin na vedādhyayanena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:054.004c: na vratair nopavāsaiś ca na prasūtyā na manyunā
GE07mbh_01_u:054.005a: vivyāsaikaṃ caturdhā yo vedaṃ vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:054.006a: yaḥ pāṇḍuṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca viduraṃ cāpy ajījanat
GE07mbh_01_u:054.007a: janamejayasya rājarṣeḥ sa tad yajñasadas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:054.008c: vṛtaṃ sadasyair bahubhir devair iva puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_01_u:054.010a: janamejayas tu rājarṣir dṛṣṭvā tam ṛṣim āgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:054.011c: āsanaṃ kalpayām āsa yathā śakro bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:054.013a: pādyam ācamanīyaṃ ca arghyaṃ gāṃ ca vidhānataḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:054.018c: teṣāṃ caritam icchāmi kathyamānaṃ tvayā dvija

GE07mbh_01_u:054.024a: tasmai rājñe sadasyebhyaḥ kṣatriyebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:055.003d-031_0021: aṣṭādaśāratnikaṃ ca tad vāsaḥ paridhāya ca

GE07mbh_01_u:055.008a: tato duryodhanaḥ krūraḥ karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:055.012d-0474_01: upāyair bahubhiḥ kṣudraiḥ saṃvṛtair vivṛtair api
GE07mbh_01_u:055.012d-0474_02: pāṇḍavān pīḍayām āsa na ca kiṃ cid asādhayat

GE07mbh_01_u:055.017a: tatra tān vāsayām āsa pāṇḍavān amitaujasaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:055.021d-0476_05: yena muktā jatugṛhān niśīthe prādravan vanam
GE07mbh_01_u:055.021d-0476_11: ādīpya jātuṣaṃ veśma dagdhvā caiva purocanam
GE07mbh_01_u:055.021d-0476_14: hatvā ca taṃ rākṣasendraṃ bhītāḥ samanubodhanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:055.021d-0476_18: te tatra prayatāḥ kālaṃ kaṃ cid ūṣur nararṣabhāḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:055.023a: ta uktā dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa rājñā śāṃtanavena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:055.023c: bhrātṛbhir vigrahas tāta kathaṃ vo na bhaved iti

GE07mbh_01_u:055.040a: vanaṃ prasthāpayām āsa sapta varṣāṇi pañca ca

GE07mbh_01_u:056.031d-033_0017: ubhau khyātau ratnanidhī tathā bhāratam ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:056.031d-033_0018: idaṃ hi vedaiḥ samitaṃ pavitram api cottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:056.031d-033_0019: śravyaṃ śrutisukhaṃ caiva pāvanaṃ śīlavardhanam pārikṣita kathāṃ divyāṃ puṇyāya vijayāya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:056.031d-033_0021: kathyamānāṃ mayā kṛtsnāṃ śṛṇu harṣakarīm imām
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032c: mahābhāratam ākhyānaṃ kṛtavān idam uttamam yas tu rājā śṛṇotīdam akhilām aśnute mahīm
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0002: prasūte garbhiṇī putraṃ kanyā cāśu pradīyate
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0003: vaṇijaḥ siddhayātrāḥ syur vīrā vijayam āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0004: āstikāñ śrāvayen nityaṃ brāhmaṇān anasūyakān vedavidyāvratasnātān kṣatriyāñ jayam āsthitān
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0006: svadharmanityān vaiśyāṃś ca śrāvayet kṣatrasaṃśritān eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭaḥ sarvavarṇeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0008: brāhmaṇāc chravaṇaṃ rājan viśeṣeṇa vidhīyate bhūyo bhūyaḥ paṭhen nityaṃ gacchet sa paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0010: ślokaṃ vāpy anugṛhṇīta tathārdhaṃ ślokam eva vā
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0011: api pādaṃ paṭhen nityaṃ na ca nirbhārato bhavet iha naikāśrayaṃ janma rājarṣīṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0014: iha yuddhāni citrāṇi rājñāṃ vṛddhir ihaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0015: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca kathās tāta iha gandharvarakṣasām
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0016: iha tat tat samāsādya vihito vākyavistaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0017: tīrthānāṃ nāma puṇyānāṃ darśanaṃ caiva kīrtitam
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0018: vanānāṃ parvatānāṃ ca nadīnāṃ sāgarasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0019: deśānāṃ caiva divyānāṃ purāṇāṃ caiva kīrtanam
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0021: iha satkārayogaś ca bhārate paramarṣiṇā rathāśvavāraṇendrāṇāṃ kalpanā yuddhakauśalam
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0023: vākyajātir anekā ca sarvam asmin samarpitam
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0024: yathā samudro 'timahān yathā ca himavān giriḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0025: khyātau ratnākarau tadvan mahābhāratam ucyate nāprītir upapadyeta yathā prāpya triviṣṭapam
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0027: puṇyaṃ tathedam ākhyānaṃ śrutvā prītir bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0028: striyaś ca śūdrāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ puraskṛtya dvijottamān
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0029: prāpnuvanti yathoktāni phalāny avikalāni ca kulasya vṛddhaye rājann āyuṣe vijayāya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0031: śṛṇu kīrtayataḥ kṛtsnam itihāsaṃ purātanam yaś cedaṃ śrāvayet pitrye brāhmaṇān pādam antataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0033: akṣayyam annapānaṃ tat pitṝṃs tasyopatiṣṭhati ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0035: sa brahmaṇaḥ sthānam etya prāpnuyād devatulyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0036: prātar yad enaḥ kurute indriyair brāhmaṇaś caran
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0037: mahābhāratam ākhyāya paścāt saṃdhyāṃ pramucyate rātryāṃ yad enaḥ kurute indriyair brāhmaṇaś caran
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0039: mahābhāratam ākhyāya pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ pramucyate bhāratānāṃ mahaj janma mahābhāratam ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:056.032d-032_0041: niruktam asya yo veda sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:056.033a: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:056.033c: yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:056.033d-0497_01: idaṃ hi brāhmaṇair loke ākhyātaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv iha
GE07mbh_01_u:056.033d-034_0001: dātuṃ bhoktuṃ tathā śrotuṃ prahartum aribhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:056.033d-034_0002: sa kiṃ jānāti puruṣo bhārataṃ yena na śrutam ya idaṃ bhārataṃ rājan vācakāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_01_u:056.033d-034_0004: tena sarvā mahī dattā bhavet sāgaramekhalā
GE07mbh_01_u:056.033d-034_0005: parvāṇy aṣṭādaśemāni vyāsena kathitāni vai yady ekam api yo dadyāt tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:057.001c: babhūva mṛgayāṃ gantuṃ sa kadā cid dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.003c: devaḥ sākṣāt svayaṃ vajrī samupāyān mahīpatim
GE07mbh_01_u:057.004a: indratvam arho rājāyaṃ tapasety anucintya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:057.004b-0498_01: tvaṃ no gatir mahārājann iti vajry avadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.004c: taṃ sāntvena nṛpaṃ sākṣāt tapasaḥ saṃnyavartayat indra uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:057.005-0499_01: devān ahaṃ pālayitā pālaya tvaṃ hi mānuṣān
GE07mbh_01_u:057.005c: taṃ pāhi dharmo hi dhṛtaḥ kṛtsnaṃ dhārayate jagat
GE07mbh_01_u:057.006a: lokyaṃ dharmaṃ pālaya tvaṃ nityayuktaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.006c: dharmayuktas tato lokān puṇyān āpsyasi śāśvatān
GE07mbh_01_u:057.007a: diviṣṭhasya bhuviṣṭhas tvaṃ sakhā bhūtvā mama priyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.007c: ūdhaḥ pṛthivyā yo deśas tam āvasa narādhipa
GE07mbh_01_u:057.008a: paśavyaś caiva puṇyaś ca susthiro dhanadhānyavān
GE07mbh_01_u:057.008c: svārakṣyaś caiva saumyaś ca bhogyair bhūmiguṇair yutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.009a: aty anyān eṣa deśo hi dhanaratnādibhir yutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.009c: vasupūrṇā ca vasudhā vasa cediṣu cedipa
GE07mbh_01_u:057.010c: na ca mithyāpralāpo 'tra svaireṣv api kuto 'nyathā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.011a: na ca pitrā vibhajyante narā guruhite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.011c: yuñjate dhuri no gāś ca kṛśāḥ saṃdhukṣayanti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:057.012a: sarve varṇāḥ svadharmasthāḥ sadā cediṣu mānada
GE07mbh_01_u:057.012c: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu yad bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:057.013a: devopabhogyaṃ divyaṃ ca ākāśe sphāṭikaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:057.014c: cariṣyasy uparistho vai devo vigrahavān iva
GE07mbh_01_u:057.015c: dhārayiṣyati saṃgrāme yā tvāṃ śastrair avikṣatam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.016a: lakṣaṇaṃ caitad eveha bhavitā te narādhipa
GE07mbh_01_u:057.017a: yaṣṭiṃ ca vaiṇavīṃ tasmai dadau vṛtraniṣūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.017d-0501_01: prayayau devataiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛtvā kāryaṃ divaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:057.018a: tasyāḥ śakrasya pūjārthaṃ bhūmau bhūmipatis tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.018c: praveśaṃ kārayām āsa gate saṃvatsare tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.019c: praveśaḥ kriyate rājan yathā tena pravartitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.020a: aparedyus tathā cāsyāḥ kriyate ucchrayo nṛpaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.020c: alaṃkṛtāyāḥ piṭakair gandhair mālyaiś ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.020e-0505_01: caturviṃśaty aṅgulātmā hastaḥ kiṣkur iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.020e-0506_03: vāsobhiḥ pañcavarṇais tu samālyair bhūṣitaṃ dhvajam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.021b-0507_06: ramante nāgarāḥ sarve tathā jānapadaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:057.021b-0507_07: sūtāś ca māgadhāś caiva naṭante naṭanartakaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.021b-0507_08: prītyā ca naraśārdūla sarve cakrur mahotsavam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.021b-0507_12: evaṃ jānapadāḥ sarve cakrur indramahaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.021b-0508_01: reje cedipatis tatra divi devapatir yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.021c: svayam eva gṛhītena vasoḥ prītyā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.022a: etāṃ pūjāṃ mahendras tu dṛṣṭvā deva kṛtāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_01_u:057.022b-0509_02: āsthāya saha śacyā ca vṛto hy apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.023a: ye pūjayiṣyanti narā rājānaś ca mahaṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:057.023c: kārayiṣyanti ca mudā yathā cedipatir nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.024a: teṣāṃ śrīr vijayaś caiva sarāṣṭrāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:057.024c: tathā sphīto janapado muditaś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:057.024d-0510_02: rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca na lumpante kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:057.025d-0511_01: evaṃ kṛtvā mahendras tu jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.026a: utsavaṃ kārayiṣyanti sadā śakrasya ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.026c: bhūmidānādibhir dānair yathā pūtā bhavanti vai
GE07mbh_01_u:057.027c: pālayām āsa dharmeṇa cedisthaḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_01_u:057.028c: nānārājyeṣu ca sutān sa samrāḍ abhyaṣecayat
GE07mbh_01_u:057.029c: pratyagrahaḥ kuśāmbaś ca yam āhur maṇivāhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.029e: macchillaś ca yaduś caiva rājanyaś cāparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.030a: ete tasya sutā rājan rājarṣer bhūritejasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.030c: nyaveśayan nāmabhiḥ svais te deśāṃś ca purāṇi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:057.030e: vāsavāḥ pañca rājānaḥ pṛthagvaṃśāś ca śāśvatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.031a: vasantam indraprāsāde ākāśe sphāṭike ca tam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.033a: giriṃ kolāhalaṃ taṃ tu padā vasur atāḍayat
GE07mbh_01_u:057.034a: tasyāṃ nadyām ajanayan mithunaṃ parvataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.034c: tasmād vimokṣaṇāt prītā nadī rājñe nyavedayat
GE07mbh_01_u:057.034d-0512_01: mahiṣī bhavitā kanyā pauṣyaḥ senāpatir bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:057.034d-0512_02: śuktimatyā vacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā tau rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.035a: yaḥ pumān abhavat tatra taṃ sa rājarṣisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.035e: cakāra patnīṃ kanyāṃ tu dayitāṃ girikāṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.036a: vasoḥ patnī tu girikā kāmāt kāle nyavedayat
GE07mbh_01_u:057.037a: tadahaḥ pitaraś cainam ūcur jahi mṛgān iti
GE07mbh_01_u:057.037c: taṃ rājasattamaṃ prītās tadā matimatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.038a: sa pitṝṇāṃ niyogaṃ tam avyatikramya pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.038c: cacāra mṛgayāṃ kāmī girikām eva saṃsmaran
GE07mbh_01_u:057.038f-0513_03: panasair nārikelaiś ca candanaiś cārjunais tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.038f-0513_04: etair anyair mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair yutam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.038f-0513_13: vāyunā preryamāṇaṃ tam āghrāya mudam anvagāt
GE07mbh_01_u:057.039a: tasya retaḥ pracaskanda carato rucire vane
GE07mbh_01_u:057.039b-0515_01: tad retaś cāpi tatraiva pratijagrāha bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.039c: skannamātraṃ ca tad reto vṛkṣapatreṇa bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.040a: pratijagrāha mithyā me na skanded reta ity uta
GE07mbh_01_u:057.040b-0516_01: idaṃ vṛthā pariskannaṃ reto vai na bhaved iti
GE07mbh_01_u:057.040b-0517_03: idaṃ vṛthaiva skannaṃ me retaḥ sa sumahān vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.040c: ṛtuś ca tasyāḥ patnyā me na moghaḥ syād iti prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.041a: saṃcintyaivaṃ tadā rājā vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.042c: abhimantryātha tac chukram ārāt tiṣṭhantam āśugam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.043a: matpriyārtham idaṃ saumya śukraṃ mama gṛhaṃ naya
GE07mbh_01_u:057.043c: girikāyāḥ prayacchāśu tasyā hy ārtavam adya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:057.044a: gṛhītvā tat tadā śyenas tūrṇam utpatya vegavān
GE07mbh_01_u:057.045a: tam apaśyad athāyāntaṃ śyenaṃ śyenas tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.046c: yudhyator apatad retas tac cāpi yamunāmbhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:057.049a: kadā cid atha matsīṃ tāṃ babandhur matsyajīvinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.049c: māse ca daśame prāpte tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:057.049e: ujjahrur udarāt tasyāḥ strīpumāṃsaṃ ca mānuṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.050a: āścaryabhūtaṃ matvā tad rājñas te pratyavedayan
GE07mbh_01_u:057.050c: kāye matsyā imau rājan saṃbhūtau mānuṣāv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:057.051c: sa matsyo nāma rājāsīd dhārmikaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.053a: tataḥ sā janayitvā tau viśastā matsyaghātinā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.053c: saṃtyajya matsyarūpaṃ sā divyaṃ rūpam avāpya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:057.054a: yā kanyā duhitā tasyā matsyā matsyasagandhinī
GE07mbh_01_u:057.054c: rājñā dattātha dāśāya iyaṃ tava bhavatv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:057.055c: āsīn matsyasagandhaiva kaṃ cit kālaṃ śucismitā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.056a: śuśrūṣārthaṃ pitur nāvaṃ tāṃ tu vāhayatīṃ jale
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057c: dṛṣṭvaiva ca sa tāṃ dhīmāṃś cakame cārudarśanām
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057e: vidvāṃs tāṃ vāsavīṃ kanyāṃ kāryavān munipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0001: saṃbhavaṃ cintayitvā tāṃ jñātvā provāca śaktijaḥ matsyagandhā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0002: kva karṇadhāro naur yena nīyate brūhi bhāmini
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0004: sahasrajanasaṃpūrṇā naur mayā vāhyate dvija parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0005: śobhanaṃ vāsavi śubhe kiṃ cirāyasi vāhyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0006: kalaśaṃ bhavitā bhadre sahasrārdhena saṃmitam ahaṃ śeṣo bhaviṣyāmi nīyatām acireṇa nauḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0008: matsyagandhā tathety uktvā nāvaṃ vāhayatī jale matsyagandhā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0009: vīkṣamāṇaṃ muniṃ dṛṣṭvā provācedaṃ vacas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0010: matsyagandheti mām āhur dāśarājasutāṃ janāḥ parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0011: janma śokābhitaptāyāḥ kathaṃ jñāsyasi kathyatām divyajñānena dṛṣṭaṃ hi dṛṣṭamātreṇa te vapuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0013: praṇayagrahaṇārthāya vakṣye vāsavi tac chṛṇu barhiṣada iti khyātāḥ pitaraḥ somapās tu te
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0015: teṣāṃ tvaṃ mānasī kanyā acchodā nāma viśrutā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0016: acchodaṃ nāma tad divyaṃ saro yasmāt samutthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0017: tvayā na dṛṣṭapūrvās tu pitaras te kadā cana saṃbhūtā manasā teṣāṃ pitṝn svān nābhijānatī
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0019: sā tv anyaṃ pitaraṃ vavre svān atikramya tān pitṝn
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0020: nāmnā vasur iti khyātaṃ manuputraṃ mahīśvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0021: adrikāpsarasā yuktaṃ vimāne divi viṣṭhitam sā tena vyabhicāreṇa manasā kāmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0023: pitaraṃ prārthayitvānyaṃ yogād bhraṣṭā papāta sā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0024: apaśyat patamānā sā vimānatrayam antikāt trasareṇupramāṇāṃs tāṃs tatrāpaśyat svakān pitṝn
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0027: trāteti tān uvācārtā patantī sā hy adhomukhī
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0028: tair uktā sā tu mā bhaiṣīs tena sā saṃsthitā divi
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0029: tataḥ prasādayām āsa svān pitṝn dīnayā girā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0030: tām ūcuḥ pitaraḥ kanyāṃ bhraṣṭaiśvaryāṃ vyatikramāt
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0031: bhraṣṭaiśvaryā svadoṣeṇa patasi tvaṃ śucismite yair ārabhante karmāṇi śarīrair iha devatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0033: tair eva tatkarmaphalaṃ prāpnuvanti sma devatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0034: manuṣyās tv anyadehena śubhāśubham iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0035: sadyaḥ phalanti karmāṇi devatve pretya mānuṣe
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0036: tasmāt tvaṃ patase putri pretya tvaṃ prāpsyase phalam pitṛhīnā tu kanyā tvaṃ vasor hi tvaṃ samāgatā
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0040: parāśarasya dāyādaṃ tvaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyasi yo vedam ekaṃ brahmarṣiś caturdhā vibhajiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:057.057f-035_0043: jyeṣṭhaṃ citrāṅgadaṃ vīraṃ citravīraṃ ca viśrutam

GE07mbh_01_u:061.072a: śakunir nāma yas tv āsīd rājā loke mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.072c: dvāparaṃ viddhi taṃ rājan saṃbhūtam arimardanam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.073c: pakṣāt sa jajñe marutāṃ devānām arimardanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.074a: drupadaś cāpi rājarṣis tata evābhavad gaṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:061.075a: tataś ca kṛtavarmāṇaṃ viddhi rājañ janādhipam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.076a: marutāṃ tu gaṇād viddhi saṃjātam arimardanam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.077a: ariṣṭāyās tu yaḥ putro haṃsa ity abhiviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.078e: mātur doṣād ṛṣeḥ kopād andha eva vyajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:061.078f-0560_02: sa pāṇḍur iti vikhyātaḥ satyadharmarataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.078f-0561_01: marutāṃ tu gaṇād vīraḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.079a: atres tu sumahābhāgaṃ putraṃ putravatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.079c: viduraṃ viddhi loke 'smiñ jātaṃ buddhimatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.080a: kaler aṃśāt tu saṃjajñe bhuvi duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.081a: jagato yaḥ sa sarvasya vidviṣṭaḥ kalipūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.081c: yaḥ sarvāṃ ghātayām āsa pṛthivīṃ puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.082a: paulastyā bhrātaraḥ sarve jajñire manujeṣv iha
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083a: durmukho duḥsahaś caiva ye cānye nānuśabditāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0001: janamejaya uvāca vaiśyāputro yuyutsuś ca dhārtarāṣṭraḥ śatādhikaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0003: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇām ānupūrvyeṇa kīrtaya
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0004: duryodhano yuyutsuś ca rājan duḥśāsanas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0005: duḥsaho duḥśalaś caiva durmukhaś ca tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0006: viviṃśatir vikarṇaś ca jalasaṃdhaḥ sulocanaḥ vindānuvindau durdharṣaḥ subāhur duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0008: durmarṣaṇo durmukhaś ca duṣkarṇaḥ karṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0009: citropacitrau citrākṣaś cārucitrāṅgadaś ca ha durmado duṣpraharṣaś ca vivitsur vikaṭaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0011: ūrṇanābhaḥ sunābhaś ca tathā nandopanandakau senāpatiḥ suṣeṇaś ca kuṇḍodaramahodarau
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0023: kavacī niṣaṅgī pāśī daṇḍadhāro dhanurgrahaḥ ugro bhīmaratho vīro vīrabāhur alolupaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0025: abhayo raudrakarmā ca tathā dṛḍharathaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0028: kuṇḍāśī virajāś caiva duḥśalā ca śatādhikā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0029: vaiśyāputro yuyutsuś ca dhārtarāṣṭraḥ śatādhikaḥ etad ekaśataṃ rājan kanyā caikā prakīrtitā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0032: sarve tv atirathāḥ śūrāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0033: sarve vedavidaś caiva rājaśāstre ca pāragāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0035: sarveṣām anurūpāś ca kṛtā dārā mahīpate
GE07mbh_01_u:061.083d-041_0036: duḥśalāṃ caiva samaye sindhurājāya kauravaḥ jayadrathāya pradadau saubalānumate tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.084a: dharmasyāṃśaṃ tu rājānaṃ viddhi rājan yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086a: yaḥ suvarcā iti khyātaḥ somaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0002: nāhaṃ dadyāṃ priyaṃ putraṃ preyāṃsam api jīvitāt
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0003: samayaḥ kriyatām eṣa na śakyam ativartitum
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0004: surakāryaṃ hi naḥ kāryam asurāṇāṃ kṣitau vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0005: tatra yāsyatyayaṃ varcā na ca sthāsyati me ciram aindrir naras tu bhavitā yasya nārāyaṇaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0008: tasyāyaṃ bhavitā putro bālo bhuvi mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0009: tatra ṣoḍaśa varṣāṇi sthāsyaty amarasattamāḥ asya ṣoḍaśavarṣasya sa saṃgrāmo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0014: vimukhāñ śātravān sarvān kārayiṣyati me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0015: bālaḥ praviśya taṃ vyūham abhedyaṃ vicariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0016: mahārathānāṃ vīrāṇāṃ kadanaṃ ca kariṣyati sarveṣāṃ caiva śatrūṇāṃ caturthāṃśaṃ nayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0019: tato mahārathair vīraiḥ sametya bahubhī raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0020: dinakṣaye mahābāhur mayā bhūyaḥ sameṣyati ekaṃ vaṃśakaraṃ vīraṃ putraṃ vai janayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0022: pranaṣṭaṃ bhārataṃ vaṃśaṃ sa bhūyo dhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0023: etat somavacaḥ śrutvā tathāstv iti divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.086d-042_0024: pratyūcuḥ sahitāḥ sarve tārādhipam apūjayan evaṃ te kathitaṃ rājaṃs tava janma pituḥ pituḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.087a: agner aṃśaṃ tu viddhi tvaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_01_u:061.087c: śikhaṇḍinam atho rājan strīpuṃsaṃ viddhi rākṣasam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088a: draupadeyāś ca ye pañca babhūvur bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-0562_02: jayasya parirakṣārthaṃ sa hi sṛṣṭo mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-0563_01: sarveṣāṃ devatābhāgaṃ dattvā viddhi mahīpate prativindhyaḥ sutasomaḥ śrutakīrtis tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0002: nākuliś ca śatānīkaḥ śrutasenaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0004: tasya kanyā pṛthā nāma rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0006: agram agre pratijñāya svasyāpatyasya vai tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0008: adadat kuntibhojāya sa tāṃ duhitaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0009: sā niyuktā pitur gehe brāhmaṇātithipūjane ugraṃ paryacarad ghoraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0011: nigūḍhaniścayaṃ dharme yaṃ taṃ durvāsasaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0012: tam ugraṃ śaṃsitātmānaṃ sarvayatnair atoṣayat tuṣṭo 'bhicārasaṃyuktam ācacakṣe yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0014: uvāca caināṃ bhagavān prīto 'smi subhage tava
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0015: yaṃ yaṃ devaṃ tvam etena mantreṇāvāhayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0016: tasya tasya prasādāt tvaṃ devi putrāñ janiṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0017: evam uktā ca sā bālā tadā kautūhalānvitā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0018: kanyā satī devam arkam ājuhāva yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0019: prakāśakarmā tapanas tasyāṃ garbhaṃ dadhau tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0020: ajījanat sutaṃ cāsyāṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam sakuṇḍalaṃ sakavacaṃ devagarbhaṃ śriyānvitam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0023: nigūhayantī jātaṃ vai bandhupakṣabhayāt tadā utsasarja jale kuntī taṃ kumāraṃ yaśasvinam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0025: tam utsṛṣṭaṃ jale garbhaṃ rādhābhartā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0026: rādhāyāḥ kalpayām āsa putraṃ so 'dhirathas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0027: cakratur nāmadheyaṃ ca tasya bālasya tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0028: dampatī vasuṣeṇeti dikṣu sarvāsu viśrutam sa vardhamāno balavān sarvāstreṣūttamo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0030: ā pṛṣṭhatāpāc ca tadā jajāpa japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0031: yasmin kāle japann āste dhīmān satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0032: nādeyaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv āsīt tasmin kāle mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0033: tam indro brāhmaṇo bhūtvā putrārthe bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0034: yayāce kuṇḍale vīraṃ kavacaṃ ca sahāṅgajam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0035: utkṛtya karṇo hy adadat kuṇḍale kavacaṃ ca tat śaktiṃ śakro 'dadat tasmai vismitaś cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0037: devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām yasmin kṣepsyasi durdharṣa sa eko na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0039: purā nāma tu tasyāsīd vasuṣeṇeti viśrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:061.088d-043_0040: tato vaikartanaḥ karṇaḥ karmaṇā tena so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:061.089a: āmuktakavacaḥ karṇo yas tu jajñe mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.089b-0564_01: karṇa ity abhivikhyātaḥ pṛthāyāḥ prathamaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.089b-0564_02: sa tu sūtakule vīro vavṛdhe rājasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:061.090a: yas tu nārāyaṇo nāma devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.093a: gaṇas tv apsarasāṃ yo vai mayā rājan prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.093c: tasya bhāgaḥ kṣitau jajñe niyogād vāsavasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:061.095a: śriyas tu bhāgaḥ saṃjajñe ratyarthaṃ pṛthivītale
GE07mbh_01_u:061.095b-0566_01: bhīṣmakasya kule sādhvī rukmiṇī nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.095b-0566_02: draupadī tv atha saṃjajñe śacībhāgād aninditā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.098a: siddhir dhṛtiś ca ye devyau pañcānāṃ mātarau tu te
GE07mbh_01_u:061.098c: kuntī mādrī ca jajñāte matis tu subalātmajā
GE07mbh_01_u:061.100c: mahātmāno yadūnāṃ ca ye jātā vipule kule
GE07mbh_01_u:061.100d-0567_01: ye ca yasmin kule jātā rājāno bhūritejasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.100d-0568_01: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā mayā te parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:061.100d-0569_01: ete tu mukhyāḥ kathitā mayā te rājasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:062.002-0570_02: pavitraṃ kīrtyamānaṃ me nibodhedaṃ manīṣiṇām janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:062.002-0571_02: janma karma ca śuśrūṣus tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:062.002a: imaṃ tu bhūya icchāmi kurūṇāṃ vaṃśam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:062.004a: caturbhāgaṃ bhuvaḥ kṛtsnaṃ sa bhuṅkte manujeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:062.006c: na pāpakṛt kaś cid āsīt tasmin rājani śāsati
GE07mbh_01_u:062.008a: nāsīc corabhayaṃ tāta na kṣudhābhayam aṇv api
GE07mbh_01_u:062.009a: svair dharmai remire varṇā daive karmaṇi niḥspṛhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:062.010a: kālavarṣī ca parjanyaḥ sasyāni phalavanti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:062.014c: bhūyo dharmaparair bhāvair viditaṃ janam āvasat janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:063.000-0573_03: duṣyantena ca vīreṇa yathā prāptā śakuntalā
GE07mbh_01_u:063.000-0573_04: taṃ vai puruṣasiṃhasya bhagavan vistaraṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_01_u:063.000-0573_05: śrotum icchāmi tattvajña sarvaṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:063.005c: dadṛśus taṃ striyas tatra śūram ātmayaśaskaram
GE07mbh_01_u:063.006c: paśyantaḥ strīgaṇās tatra śastrapāṇiṃ sma menire
GE07mbh_01_u:063.007c: yasya bāhubalaṃ prāpya na bhavanty asuhṛdgaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.008a: iti vāco bruvantyas tāḥ striyaḥ premṇā narādhipam
GE07mbh_01_u:063.008c: tuṣṭuvuḥ puṣpavṛṣṭīś ca sasṛjus tasya mūrdhani
GE07mbh_01_u:063.009a: tatra tatra ca viprendraiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.009d-0576_03: dadṛśur vardhamānās te āśīrbhiś ca jayena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:063.010c: nyavartanta tataḥ paścād anujñātā nṛpeṇa ha
GE07mbh_01_u:063.011c: mahīm āpūrayām āsa ghoṣeṇa tridivaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:063.012a: sa gacchan dadṛśe dhīmān nandanapratimaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_01_u:063.013e: mṛgasaṃghair vṛtaṃ ghorair anyaiś cāpi vanecaraiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.014c: loḍayām āsa duḥṣantaḥ sūdayan vividhān mṛgān
GE07mbh_01_u:063.015c: pātayām āsa duḥṣanto nirbibheda ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.016a: dūrasthān sāyakaiḥ kāṃś cid abhinat sa nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.017a: kāṃś cid eṇān sa nirjaghne śaktyā śaktimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.018c: cacāra sa vinighnan vai vanyāṃs tatra mṛgadvijān
GE07mbh_01_u:063.020c: mṛgayūthāny athautsukyāc chabdaṃ cakrus tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.022a: kṣutpipāsāparītāś ca śrāntāś ca patitā bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:063.022c: ke cit tatra naravyāghrair abhakṣyanta bubhukṣitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.023a: ke cid agnim athotpādya samidhya ca vanecarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.023c: bhakṣayanti sma māṃsāni prakuṭya vidhivat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:063.024a: tatra ke cid gajā mattā balinaḥ śastravikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:063.025a: śakṛnmūtraṃ sṛjantaś ca kṣarantaḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_01_u:063.025c: vanyā gajavarās tatra mamṛdur manujān bahūn
GE07mbh_01_u:064.001c: rājā mṛgaprasaṅgena vanam anyad viveśa ha
GE07mbh_01_u:064.002c: sa vanasyāntam āsādya mahad īriṇam āsadat
GE07mbh_01_u:064.006a: nāpuṣpaḥ pādapaḥ kaś cin nāphalo nāpi kaṇṭakī
GE07mbh_01_u:064.006c: ṣaṭpadair vāpy anākīrṇas tasmin vai kānane 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:064.007a: vihagair nāditaṃ puṣpair alaṃkṛtam atīva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:064.008c: puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ vicitrāṃ sma vyasṛjaṃs te punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:064.010c: ruvanti rāvaṃ vihagāḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ sahitā mṛdu
GE07mbh_01_u:064.011e: saṃpaśyan sa mahātejā babhūva muditas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:064.017c: mahākacchair bṛhadbhiś ca vibhrājitam atīva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:064.018a: mālinīm abhito rājan nadīṃ puṇyāṃ sukhodakām
GE07mbh_01_u:064.018e: tatra vyālamṛgān saumyān paśyan prītim avāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:064.019a: taṃ cāpy atirathaḥ śrīmān āśramaṃ pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:064.025e: maharṣiṃ kāśyapaṃ draṣṭum atha kaṇvaṃ tapodhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:064.026c: avasthāpya vanadvāri senām idam uvāca saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:064.028c: kṣutpipāse jahau rājā harṣaṃ cāvāpa puṣkalam
GE07mbh_01_u:064.029e: didṛkṣus tatra tam ṛṣiṃ taporāśim athāvyayam
GE07mbh_01_u:064.030d-0582_03: amitābhir uktābhi(sic) suśruve sa nṛpas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:064.032a: yajñavidyāṅgavidbhiś ca kramadbhiś ca kramān api
GE07mbh_01_u:064.033c: saṃhitām īrayanti sma padakramayutāṃ tu te
GE07mbh_01_u:064.034c: nāditaḥ sa babhau śrīmān brahmaloka ivāśramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:064.037b-0586_04: nānāśāstreṣu mukhyaiś ca śuśrāva svanam īritam
GE07mbh_01_u:064.038a: tatra tatra ca viprendrān niyatān saṃśitavratān
GE07mbh_01_u:064.040a: devatāyatanānāṃ ca pūjāṃ prekṣya kṛtāṃ dvijaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:064.042a: sa kāśyapasyāyatanaṃ mahāvratair; vṛtaṃ samantād ṛṣibhis tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:065.001a: tato gacchan mahābāhur eko 'mātyān visṛjya tān
GE07mbh_01_u:065.001c: nāpaśyad āśrame tasmiṃs tam ṛṣiṃ saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_01_u:065.002a: so 'paśyamānas tam ṛṣiṃ śūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tam āśramam
GE07mbh_01_u:065.002c: uvāca ka ihety uccair vanaṃ saṃnādayann iva
GE07mbh_01_u:065.003a: śrutvātha tasya taṃ śabdaṃ kanyā śrīr iva rūpiṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:065.003d-0587_01: suvratābhyāgataṃ taṃ tu pūjyaṃ prāptam atheśvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:065.004a: sā taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rājānaṃ duḥṣantam asitekṣaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:065.004c: svāgataṃ ta iti kṣipram uvāca pratipūjya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:065.006a: yathāvad arcayitvā sā pṛṣṭvā cānāmayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:065.006c: uvāca smayamāneva kiṃ kāryaṃ kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_01_u:065.006d-0588_02: kas tvam adyeha saṃprāpto maharṣer āśramaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_01_u:065.007a: tām abravīt tato rājā kanyāṃ madhurabhāṣiṇīm
GE07mbh_01_u:065.007d-0589_02: duḥṣanta iti me nāma satyaṃ puṣkaralocane
