GE07mbh_01_u:067.022c: evaṃ saṃcintayann eva praviveśa svakaṃ puram
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023a: muhūrtayāte tasmiṃs tu kaṇvo 'py āśramam āgamat
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023c: śakuntalā ca pitaraṃ hriyā nopajagāma tam
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0001: śaṅkiteva ca viprarṣim upacakrāma sā śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0002: tato 'sya bhāraṃ jagrāha āsanaṃ cāpy akalpayat prākṣālayac ca sā pādau kāśyapasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0004: na cainaṃ lajjayāśaknod akṣibhyām abhivīkṣitum śakuntalā ca savrīḍā tam ṛṣiṃ nābhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0006: tasmāt svadharmāt skhalitā bhītā sā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0008: sa tadā vrīḍitāṃ dṛṣṭvā ṛṣis tāṃ pratyabhāṣata kaṇvaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0009: savrīḍaiva ca dīrghāyuḥ pureva bhavitā na ca vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0010: vṛttaṃ kathaya rambhoru mā trāsaṃ ca prakalpaya
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0011: tataḥ prakṣālya pādau sā viśrāntaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0012: nidhāya kāmaṃ tasyarṣeḥ kandāni ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0013: tataḥ saṃvāhya pādau sā viśrāntaṃ vedimadhyamā
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0014: śakuntalā pauravāṇāṃ duḥṣantaṃ jagmuṣī patim tataḥ kṛcchrād atiśubhā savrīḍā śrīmatī tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0016: sagadgadam uvācedaṃ kāśyapaṃ sā śucismitā śakuntalā
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0018: mayā patir vṛto yo 'sau daivayogād ihāgataḥ tasya tāta prasīda tvaṃ bhartā me sumahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.023d-045_0020: ataḥ sarvaṃ tu yad vṛttaṃ divyajñānena paśyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:067.024a: vijñāyātha ca tāṃ kaṇvo divyajñāno mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.024b-0614_01: tato dharmiṣṭhatāṃ matvā dharme cāskhalitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.024c: uvāca bhagavān prītaḥ paśyan divyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_01_u:067.025c: puṃsā saha samāyogo na sa dharmopaghātakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.025d-0616_01: na bhayaṃ vidyate bhadre mā śucaḥ sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:067.026a: kṣatriyasya hi gāndharvo vivāhaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:067.026d-0617_01: kiṃ punar vidhivat kṛtvā suprajās tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:067.027a: dharmātmā ca mahātmā ca duḥṣantaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.027c: abhyagacchaḥ patiṃ yaṃ tvaṃ bhajamānaṃ śakuntale
GE07mbh_01_u:067.028a: mahātmā janitā loke putras tava mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.028c: ya imāṃ sāgarāpāṅgāṃ kṛtsnāṃ bhokṣyati medinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:067.030a: tataḥ prakṣālya pādau sā viśrāntaṃ munim abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:067.030c: vinidhāya tato bhāraṃ saṃnidhāya phalāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:067.031a: mayā patir vṛto yo 'sau duḥṣantaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.031b-0618_01: mama caiva patir dṛṣṭo devatānāṃ samakṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.031c: tasmai sasacivāya tvaṃ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:067.032b-0619_01: ṛtavo bahavas te vai gatā vyarthāḥ śucismite
GE07mbh_01_u:067.032b-0619_02: sārthakaṃ sāṃprataṃ hy etan na ca pāpo 'sti te 'naghe
GE07mbh_01_u:067.032c: gṛhāṇa ca varaṃ mattas tatkṛte yad abhīpsitam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033-0620_01: ity evam uktvā sahasā praṇidhāya manasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033a: tato dharmiṣṭhatāṃ vavre rājyāc cāskhalanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033d-0621_01: evam astv iti tāṃ prāha kaṇvo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033d-0621_02: pasparśa cāpi pāṇibhyāṃ sutāṃ śrīm iva rūpiṇīm
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033d-0621_03: adya prabhṛti devi tvaṃ duḥṣantasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033d-0621_04: pativratānāṃ yad vṛttis tāṃ vṛttim anupālaya
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033d-0621_05: ity evam uktvā dharmātmā tāṃ viśudhyartham aspṛśat
GE07mbh_01_u:067.033d-0621_06: spṛṣṭamātre śarīre tu paraṃ harṣam avāpa sā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_01: garbhaś ca vavṛdhe tasyāṃ rājaputryāṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_05: adya śvo vā paraśvo vā samāyāntīti niścitā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_06: dinān pakṣān ṛtūn māsān ayanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_10: śṛṇu bhadre lokavṛttaṃ śrutvā yad rocate tava
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_11: tat kuruṣva hitaṃ devi nāvamānyaṃ guror vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_12: devānāṃ daivataṃ viṣṇur viprāṇām agnir eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_13: nārīṇāṃ daivataṃ bhartā lokānāṃ brāhmaṇo guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_15: kariṣyāmīti kartavyaṃ tadā te sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:068.001b-0623_16: patnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā sādhu sādhv ity acintayat
GE07mbh_01_u:068.002d-0624_01: jāte tasminn antarikṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha
GE07mbh_01_u:068.002d-0624_03: gāyadbhir madhuraṃ tatra devaiḥ śakro 'bhyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:068.002d-0624_05: balaṃ tejaś ca rūpaṃ ca na samaṃ bhuvi kena cit
GE07mbh_01_u:068.002d-0624_08: svārthaṃ brāhmaṇasāt kṛtvā dakṣiṇām amitāṃ dadat
GE07mbh_01_u:068.002d-0624_11: śakuntalā ca tac chrutvā paraṃ harṣam avāpa sā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.002d-0624_12: dvijān āhūya munibhiḥ satkṛtya ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.003d-0625_01: yathāvidhi yathānyāyaṃ kriyāḥ sarvās tv akārayat
GE07mbh_01_u:068.004f-0627_01: ṛṣer bhayāt tu duḥṣantaḥ smaran naivāhvayat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.004f-0627_02: gate kāle tu mahati na sasmāra tapovanam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.005a: ṣaḍvarṣa eva bālaḥ sa kaṇvāśramapadaṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:068.005c: vyāghrān siṃhān varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca mahiṣāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.005d-0628_01: ṛkṣāṃś cāpi dvipān anyān vyālān āśramapīḍakān
GE07mbh_01_u:068.005d-0628_02: balād bhujābhyāṃ saṃgṛhya balavān saṃniyamya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006c: ārohan damayaṃś caiva krīḍaṃś ca paridhāvati
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_01: vanaṃ ca loḍayām āsa siṃhavyāghragaṇair vṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_02: tataś ca rākṣasān sarvān piśācāṃś ca ripūn raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_03: muṣṭiyuddhena tān hatvā ṛṣīn ārādhayat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_04: kaś cid ditisutas taṃ tu hantukāmo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_05: vadhyamānāṃs tu daiteyān amarṣī taṃ samabhyayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_06: tam āgataṃ prahasyaiva bāhubhyāṃ parigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_07: dṛḍhaṃ cābadhya bāhubhyāṃ pīḍayām āsa taṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_09: prākrośad bhairavaṃ tatra dvārebhyo niḥsṛtaṃ tv asṛk
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_10: tena śabdena vitrastā mṛgāḥ siṃhādayo gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_11: susruvuś ca śakṛnmūtram āśramasthāś ca susruvuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_12: nirasuṃ jānubhiḥ kṛtvā visasarja ca so 'patat
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_13: tad dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ jagmuḥ kumārasya viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.006d-0629_15: kumārasya bhayād eva naiva jagmus tadāśramam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.007c: astv ayaṃ sarvadamanaḥ sarvaṃ hi damayaty ayam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.008d-0631_04: śakuntalāṃ ca saṃprekṣya pradadhyau sa munis tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009a: taṃ kumāram ṛṣir dṛṣṭvā karma cāsyātimānuṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009c: samayo yauvarājyāyety abravīc ca śakuntalām kaṇvaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0001: śakuntalāṃ samāhūya kaṇvo vacanam abravīt śṛṇu bhadre mama sute mama vākyaṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0003: pativratānāṃ nārīṇāṃ viśiṣṭam iti cocyate patiśuśrūṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ manovākkāyaceṣṭitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0005: anujñātā mayā pūrvaṃ pūjayaitad vrataṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0006: etenaiva ca vṛttena puṇyāṃl lokān avāpya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0007: tasyānte mānuṣe loke viśiṣṭāṃ lapsyase śriyam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0008: tasmād bhadre 'dya yātavyaṃ samīpaṃ pauravasya ha
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0009: svayaṃ nāyāti matvā te gataṃ kālaṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0011: dauḥṣantiṃ yauvarājyasthaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim avāpsyasi devatānāṃ gurūṇāṃ ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0013: bhartṝṇāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa hitaṃ saṃgamanaṃ satām
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0014: tasmāt putri kumāreṇa gantavyaṃ matpriyepsayā prativākyaṃ na dadyās tvaṃ śāpitā mama pādayoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0016: evam uktvā sutāṃ tatra pautraṃ kaṇvo 'bhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0017: pariṣvajya ca bāhubhyāṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya pauravam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0018: somavaṃśodbhavo rājā duḥṣanta iti viśrutaḥ tasyāgramahiṣī caiṣā tava mātā śucivratā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0022: sa pitā tava rājendras tasya tvaṃ vaśago bhava pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyam ātiṣṭhasva svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0024: tasmin kāle svarājyastho mām anusmara paurava
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0025: abhivādya muneḥ pādau pauravo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0026: tvaṃ pitā mama viprarṣe tvaṃ mātā tvaṃ gatiś ca me
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0027: na cānyaṃ pitaraṃ manye tvām ṛte tu mahātapaḥ tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ puṇyam iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0029: śakuntalā bhartṛkāmā svayaṃ yātu yatheṣṭataḥ ahaṃ śuśrūṣaṇaparaḥ pādamūle vasāmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0031: krīḍāṃ vyālamṛgaiḥ sārdhaṃ kariṣye na purā yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0032: tvac chāsanaparo nityaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca karomy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0033: evam uktvā tu saṃśliṣya pādau kaṇvasya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0034: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā praruroda śakuntalā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0035: snehāt pituś ca putrasya harṣaśokasamanvitā niśāmya rudatīm ārtāṃ dauḥṣantir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0037: śrutvā bhagavato vākyaṃ kiṃ rodiṣi śakuntale
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0038: gantavyaṃ kālya utthāya bhartṛprītis tavāsti cet
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0039: ekas tu kurute pāpaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0040: bhoktāras tatra mucyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0041: mayā nivārito nityaṃ na karoṣi vaco mama
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0042: niḥsṛtān kuñjarān nityaṃ bāhubhyāṃ saṃpramathya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0043: vanaṃ ca loḍayan nityaṃ siṃhavyāghragaṇair yutam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0044: evaṃvidhāni cānyāni kṛtvā vai purunandana ruṣito bhagavāṃs tāta tasmād āvāṃ vivāsitau
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0046: ahaṃ na gacche duḥṣantaṃ nāsmi putrahitaiṣiṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0048: evam uktvā tu rudatī papāta munipādayoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0049: evaṃ vilapatīṃ kaṇvaś cānunīya ca hetubhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0050: punaḥ provāca bhagavān ānṛśaṃsyād dhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0051: śakuntale śṛṇuṣvedaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0052: pativratābhāvaguṇān hitvā sādhyaṃ na kiṃcana pativratānāṃ devā vai tuṣṭāḥ sarvavarapradāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0054: prasādaṃ ca kariṣyanti āpadarthe ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0055: patiprasādāt puṇyagatiṃ prāpnuvanti na cāśubham tasmād gatvā tu rājānam ārādhaya śucismite
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0057: śakuntalāṃ tathoktvā vai śākuntalam athābravīt dauhitro mama pautras tvam ililasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0059: śṛṇuṣva vacanaṃ satyaṃ prabravīmi tavānagha manasā bhartṛkāmā vai vāgbhir uktvā pṛthagvidham
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0061: gantuṃ necchati kalyāṇī tasmāt tāta vahasva vai
GE07mbh_01_u:068.009d-046_0062: śaktas tvaṃ pratigantuṃ ca munibhiḥ saha paurava
GE07mbh_01_u:068.010a: tasya tad balam ājñāya kaṇvaḥ śiṣyān uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011a: nārīṇāṃ ciravāso hi bāndhaveṣu na rocate
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0001: dharmābhipūjitaṃ putraṃ kāśyapena niśāmya tu kāśyapāt prāpya cānujñāṃ mumude ca śakuntalā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0003: kaṇvasya vacanaṃ śrutvā pratigaccheti cāsakṛt tathety uktvā tu kaṇvaṃ ca mātaraṃ pauravo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0005: kiṃ cirāyasi mātas tvaṃ gamiṣyāmo nṛpālayam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0006: evam uktvā tu tāṃ devīṃ duḥṣantasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0007: abhivādya muneḥ pādau gantum aicchat sa pauravaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0008: śakuntalā ca pitaram abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tadā pitaraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0010: ajñānān me pitā ceti duruktaṃ vāpi cānṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0011: akāryaṃ vāpy aniṣṭaṃ vā kṣantum arhati tad bhavān evam ukto nataśirā munir novāca kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0014: abbhakṣān vāyubhakṣāṃś ca śīrṇaparṇāśanān munīn phalamūlāśino dāntān kṛśān dhamanisaṃtatān
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0017: samāhūya muniḥ kaṇvaḥ kāruṇyād idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0018: mayā tu lālitā nityaṃ mama putrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0019: vane jātā vivṛddhā ca na ca jānāti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0020: āśrameṇa pathā sarvair nīyatāṃ kṣatriyālayam dvitīyayojane viprāḥ pratiṣṭhānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0023: adhyuvāsa ciraṃ kālam urvaśyā sahitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0026: tatra saṃgamam āsādya snātvā hutahutāśanāḥ śākamūlaphalāhārā nivartadhvaṃ mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.011d-047_0028: anyathā tu bhaved viprā adhvano gamane śramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.012a: tathety uktvā tu te sarve prātiṣṭhantāmitaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013c: ājagāma tataḥ śubhrā duḥṣantaviditād vanāt ṛṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0002: te vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0003: kandarāṇi nitambāṃś ca rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0004: āśramāṇi ca puṇyāni gatvā caiva gataśramāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0006: tāṃ purīṃ puruhūtena ailasyārthe vinirmitām parighāṭṭālakair mukhyair upatalpaśatair api
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0008: śataghnīśatayantraiś ca guptām anyair durāsadām harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ nānāpaṇyavibhūṣitām
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0010: maṇṭapaiḥ sasabhai ramyaiḥ prapābhiś ca samāvṛtām
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0015: sarvapuṣkariṇībhiś ca udyānaiś ca samāvṛtām varṇāśramaiḥ svadharmasthair nityotsavasamāhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.013d-048_0018: kratuyuktaiś ca vidvadbhir agnihotraparaiḥ sadā varjitākāryakaraṇair dānaśīlair dayāparaiḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:068.069d-051_0012: āśrame parṇaśālāyāṃ kumārīṃ vijane vane dhātrā pracoditāṃ śūnye pitrā virahitāṃ mithaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.069d-051_0014: vāgbhis tvaṃ sūnṛtābhir mām apatyārtham acūcudaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.069d-051_0015: akārṣīs tv āśrame vāsaṃ dharmakāmārthaniścitam gāndharveṇa vivāhena vidhinā pāṇim agrahīḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.069d-051_0017: sāhaṃ kulaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca satyavāditvam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.069d-051_0018: svadharmaṃ ca puraskṛtya tvām adya śaraṇaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.069d-051_0019: tasmān nārhasi saṃśrutya tatheti vitathaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.069d-051_0020: svadharmaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā parityaktum upasthitām tvannāthāṃ lokanāthas tvaṃ nārhasi tvam anāgasam

GE07mbh_01_u:068.072a: na putram abhijānāmi tvayi jātaṃ śakuntale
GE07mbh_01_u:068.072c: asatyavacanā nāryaḥ kas te śraddhāsyate vacaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:068.074d-0656_02: aho jānāmi te janma kutsitaṃ kulaṭe janaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:068.075a: menakāpsarasāṃ śreṣṭhā maharṣīṇāṃ ca te pitā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.075d-0657_01: jātiś cāpi nikṛṣṭā te kulīneti vijalpase
GE07mbh_01_u:068.075d-0657_02: janayitvā tvam utsṛṣṭā kokileva parair bhṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.075d-0657_03: ariṣṭair iva durbuddhiḥ kaṇvo vardhayitā pitā
GE07mbh_01_u:068.075d-0657_04: aśraddheyam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvaṃ jalpasi tāpasi
GE07mbh_01_u:068.076a: aśraddheyam idaṃ vākyaṃ kathayantī na lajjase

GE07mbh_01_u:068.079a: sunikṛṣṭā ca yonis te puṃścalī pratibhāsi me
GE07mbh_01_u:068.079c: yadṛcchayā kāmarāgāj jātā menakayā hy asi
GE07mbh_01_u:068.080a: sarvam etat parokṣaṃ me yat tvaṃ vadasi tāpasi

GE07mbh_01_u:068.080b-0658_03: asatyoktāḥ striyaḥ sarvā na kaṇvaṃ vaktum arhasi

GE07mbh_01_u:069.001c: ātmano bilvamātrāṇi paśyann api na paśyasi

GE07mbh_01_u:069.003a: kṣitāv aṭasi rājaṃs tvam antarikṣe carāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:069.004c: bhavanāny anusaṃyāmi prabhāvaṃ paśya me nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:069.004d-0659_01: purā naravaraḥ putra urvaśyāṃ janitas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:069.004d-0659_03: maharṣayaś ca bahavaḥ kṣatriyāś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:069.004d-0659_04: apsarassu mṛgīṇāṃ ca mātṛdoṣo na vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:069.005a: satyaś cāpi pravādo 'yaṃ yaṃ pravakṣyāmi te 'nagha

GE07mbh_01_u:069.006a: virūpo yāvad ādarśe nātmanaḥ paśyate mukham
GE07mbh_01_u:069.007a: yadā tu mukham ādarśe vikṛtaṃ so 'bhivīkṣate
GE07mbh_01_u:069.008a: atīva rūpasaṃpanno na kiṃ cid avamanyate

GE07mbh_01_u:069.009c: aśubhaṃ vākyam ādatte purīṣam iva sūkaraḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.010c: guṇavad vākyam ādatte haṃsaḥ kṣīram ivāmbhasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.010d-0661_04: aśaktās tāṃ gatiṃ gantuṃ tato nindāṃ prakurvate
GE07mbh_01_u:069.011a: anyān parivadan sādhur yathā hi paritapyate

GE07mbh_01_u:069.012a: abhivādya yathā vṛddhān santo gacchanti nirvṛtim

GE07mbh_01_u:069.013c: yatra vācyāḥ paraiḥ santaḥ parān āhus tathāvidhān
GE07mbh_01_u:069.014a: ato hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃ cid anyan na vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:069.014c: yatra durjana ity āha durjanaḥ sajjanaṃ svayam

GE07mbh_01_u:069.016d-0664_02: durācāre kalir bhūyān na kalir dharmacāriṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:069.017c: uttamaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tasmāt putraṃ na saṃtyajet

GE07mbh_01_u:069.020b-0666_02: ubhayaṃ pālayan hy etan nānṛtaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:069.020e: narendrasiṃha kapaṭaṃ na voḍhuṃ tvam ihārhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:069.021a: varaṃ kūpaśatād vāpī varaṃ vāpīśatāt kratuḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.022a: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:069.023c: satyaṃ ca vadato rājan samaṃ vā syān na vā samam

GE07mbh_01_u:069.025a: rājan satyaṃ paraṃ brahma satyaṃ ca samayaḥ paraḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.025d-0668_01: yaḥ pāpaṃ na vijānāti karma kṛtvā narādhipa
GE07mbh_01_u:069.025d-0668_02: na hi tādṛk paraṃ pāpam anṛtād iha vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:069.025d-0668_03: yasya te hṛdayaṃ veda satyasyaivānṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:069.025d-0668_04: kalyāṇaṃ sākṣiṇaṃ tasmāt kartum arhasi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.025d-0668_05: yo na kāmān na ca krodhān na mohād abhivartate

GE07mbh_01_u:069.026d-0669_02: gatiḥ svaraḥ smṛtiḥ sattvaṃ śīlaṃ vidyā ca vikramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.026d-0669_04: samā yasya yadi syus te tasya putro na saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.026d-0669_07: ṛte 'pi gardabhakṣīrāt payaḥ pāsyati me sutaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.027d-0670_01: evam ukto mahendreṇa bhaviṣyati ca nānyathā
GE07mbh_01_u:069.027d-0670_03: na bruvanti tathā satyam utāho vānṛtaṃ kila
GE07mbh_01_u:069.029a: bhastrā mātā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.029c-0672_02: sarvebhyo hy aṅgam aṅgebhyaḥ sākṣād utpadyate sutaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.029c-0672_04: āhitaṃ hy ātmanātmānaṃ parirakṣa imaṃ sutam
GE07mbh_01_u:069.029d-0673_01: striyaḥ pavitram atulam etad duḥṣanta dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.029d-0673_02: māsi māsi rajo hy āsāṃ duritāny apakarṣati

GE07mbh_01_u:069.030c: tvaṃ cāsya dhātā garbhasya satyam āha śakuntalā
GE07mbh_01_u:069.030d-0674_01: patir jāyāṃ praviśati sa tasyāṃ jāyate punaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.033c: tasmād bhavatv ayaṃ nāmnā bharato nāma te sutaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.033d-0675_01: evam uktvā tato devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.034a: tac chrutvā pauravo rājā vyāhṛtaṃ vai divaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:069.035b-0677_01: śṛṇvantu devatānāṃ ca maharṣīṇāṃ ca bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:069.035c: aham apy evam evainaṃ jānāmi svayam ātmajam
GE07mbh_01_u:069.036a: yady ahaṃ vacanād eva gṛhṇīyām imam ātmajam

GE07mbh_01_u:069.037c: hṛṣṭaḥ pramuditaś cāpi pratijagrāha taṃ sutam
GE07mbh_01_u:069.037d-0678_01: tatas tasya tadā rājā pitṛkāryāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.037d-0678_02: kārayām āsa muditaḥ prītimān ātmajasya ha
GE07mbh_01_u:069.038c: sabhājyamāno vipraiś ca stūyamānaś ca bandibhiḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.039a: tāṃ caiva bhāryāṃ dharmajñaḥ pūjayām āsa dharmataḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.042a: yac ca kopitayātyarthaṃ tvayokto 'smy apriyaṃ priye
GE07mbh_01_u:069.042c: praṇayinyā viśālākṣi tat kṣāntaṃ te mayā śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:069.042d-0682_01: anṛtaṃ vāpy aniṣṭaṃ vā duruktaṃ vāpi duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:069.042d-0682_02: tvayāpy evaṃ viśālākṣi kṣantavyaṃ mama durvacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.042d-0682_03: kṣamyāḥ patikṛtaṃ nāryaḥ pātivratyaṃ vrajanti yāḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:069.043d-0684_02: mama putro vane jātas tava śokapraṇāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.043d-0684_03: ṛṇād adya vimukto 'haṃ tava pautreṇa śobhane
GE07mbh_01_u:069.043d-0684_06: putrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā pautraṃ sā pariṣasvaje

GE07mbh_01_u:069.043d-0684_09: uvāca vacanaṃ satyaṃ lakṣaye lakṣaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:069.043d-0684_12: divyān bhogān anuprāptā bhava tvaṃ varavarṇini
GE07mbh_01_u:069.043d-0684_13: evam uktā rathantaryā paraṃ harṣam avāpa sā
GE07mbh_01_u:069.043d-0684_16: brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sainikānāṃ ca bhūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.044a: duḥṣantaś ca tato rājā putraṃ śākuntalaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:069.044d-0685_01: tataś cirāya rājyaṃ tat kṛtvā rājany upeyuṣi

GE07mbh_01_u:069.049a: bharatād bhāratī kīrtir yenedaṃ bhārataṃ kulam

GE07mbh_01_u:069.051f-0687_02: sa putravān bhaved rājan duḥṣantavad iti dhruvam
GE07mbh_01_u:069.051f-0687_03: tasmāc chrotavyam etad vai śrāvayec ca prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:069.051f-0687_04: śrī[ḥ] kīrtir viśadā nṝṇāṃ dvaipāyanavaco yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:070.001a: prajāpates tu dakṣasya manor vaivasvatasya ca

GE07mbh_01_u:070.003c: daśa pracetasaḥ putrāḥ santaḥ pūrvajanāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:070.003e: meghajenāgninā ye te pūrvaṃ dagdhā mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:070.004a: tebhyaḥ prācetaso jajñe dakṣo dakṣād imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:070.005a: vīriṇyā saha saṃgamya dakṣaḥ prācetaso muniḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:070.010c: mārtaṇḍaś ca yamasyāpi putro rājann ajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:070.011a: mārtaṇḍasya manur dhīmān ajāyata sutaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:070.011b-0689_01: yamaś cāpi suto jajñe khyātas tasyānujaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:070.011b-0689_02: dharmātmā sa manur dhīmān yatra vaṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:070.011e: brahmakṣatrādayas tasmān manor jātās tu mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:070.012a: tatrābhavat tadā rājan brahma kṣatreṇa saṃgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:070.012c: brāhmaṇā mānavās teṣāṃ sāṅgaṃ vedam adīdharan

GE07mbh_01_u:080.009d-0840_01: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
GE07mbh_01_u:080.009d-0840_03: yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.009d-0840_04: ekasyāpi na paryāptaṃ tasmāt tṛṣṇāṃ parityajet
GE07mbh_01_u:080.009d-0840_05: yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.009d-0840_06: yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_01_u:080.009d-0840_09: tasmād enām ahaṃ tyaktvā brahmaṇy ādhāya mānasam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.009d-0840_10: nirdvandvo nirmamo bhūtvā cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:080.010a: pūro prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te gṛhāṇedaṃ svayauvanam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.010c: rājyaṃ caiva gṛhāṇedaṃ tvaṃ hi me priyakṛt sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.010c-0842_02: yāvad icchasi tāvac ca yauvanena samanvitam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.011a: pratipede jarāṃ rājā yayātir nāhuṣas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:080.011c: yauvanaṃ pratipede ca pūruḥ svaṃ punar ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.013a: kathaṃ śukrasya naptāraṃ devayānyāḥ sutaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:080.013c: jyeṣṭhaṃ yadum atikramya rājyaṃ pūroḥ pradāsyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:080.014a: yadur jyeṣṭhas tava suto jātas tam anu turvasuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.014c: śarmiṣṭhāyāḥ suto druhyus tato 'nuḥ pūrur eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:080.015a: kathaṃ jyeṣṭhān atikramya kanīyān rājyam arhati
GE07mbh_01_u:080.015c: etat saṃbodhayāmas tvāṃ dharmaṃ tvam anupālaya
GE07mbh_01_u:080.015d-0843_01: dharmaṃ collaṅghayan rājā prajānāṃ duḥkham āvahet
GE07mbh_01_u:080.016a: brāhmaṇapramukhā varṇāḥ sarve śṛṇvantu me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.016c: jyeṣṭhaṃ prati yathā rājyaṃ na deyaṃ me kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:080.017c: pratikūlaḥ pitur yaś ca na sa putraḥ satāṃ mataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018a: mātāpitror vacanakṛd dhitaḥ pathyaś ca yaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018c: sa putraḥ putravad yaś ca vartate pitṛmātṛṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018d-0844_01: aputrī tu naraḥ svargād duḥkhaṃ narakam āviśet
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018d-0845_01: pud iti narakasyākhyā duḥkhaṃ hi narakaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018d-0845_02: putas trāṇāt tataḥ putram ihecchanti paratra ca
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018d-0845_04: yo bahūnāṃ guṇataraḥ sa putro jyeṣṭha ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018d-0845_05: jyeṣṭhāṃśahāro guṇakṛd iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018d-0845_06: śreyān putraguṇopetaḥ sa putro netaro vṛthā
GE07mbh_01_u:080.018d-0846_02: coraḥ kilbiṣakaḥ putro jyeṣṭho na jyeṣṭha ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:080.019c: druhyunā cānunā caiva mayy avajñā kṛtā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.020a: pūruṇā me kṛtaṃ vākyaṃ mānitaś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.020c: kanīyān mama dāyādo jarā yena dhṛtā mama
GE07mbh_01_u:080.020d-0847_02: tasya jātam idaṃ kṛtsnam ātmā putra iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.020e: mama kāmaḥ sa ca kṛtaḥ pūruṇā putrarūpiṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:080.021a: śukreṇa ca varo dattaḥ kāvyenośanasā svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.021c: putro yas tvānuvarteta sa rājā pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.021d-0848_01: yo vānuvartī putrāṇāṃ sa putro dāyabhāg bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:080.022a: yaḥ putro guṇasaṃpanno mātāpitror hitaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:080.022c: sarvam arhati kalyāṇaṃ kanīyān api sa prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:080.023a: arhaḥ pūrur idaṃ rājyaṃ yaḥ sutaḥ priyakṛt tava
GE07mbh_01_u:080.023c: varadānena śukrasya na śakyaṃ vaktum uttaram
GE07mbh_01_u:080.024a: paurajānapadais tuṣṭair ity ukto nāhuṣas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:080.024c: abhyaṣiñcat tataḥ pūruṃ rājye sve sutam ātmajam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.024d-0850_01: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ cobhau druhyuṃ caiva sahānujam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.024d-0850_02: anteṣu sa vinikṣipya nāhuṣaḥ svātmajān sutān
GE07mbh_01_u:080.025a: dattvā ca pūrave rājyaṃ vanavāsāya dīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.025c: purāt sa niryayau rājā brāhmaṇais tāpasaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:080.025d-0851_01: devayānyā ca sahitaḥ śarmiṣṭhayā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:080.025d-0851_02: akarot sa vane rājā sabhāryas tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:080.026a: yados tu yādavā jātās turvasor yavanāḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.026c: druhyor api sutā bhojā anos tu mlecchajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:080.027a: pūros tu pauravo vaṃśo yatra jāto 'si pārthiva
GE07mbh_01_u:081.001a: evaṃ sa nāhuṣo rājā yayātiḥ putram īpsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:081.002a: uṣitvā ca vane vāsaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha saṃśritaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.002c: phalamūlāśano dānto yathā svargam ito gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.003a: sa gataḥ suravāsaṃ taṃ nivasan muditaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_01_u:081.003c: kālasya nātimahataḥ punaḥ śakreṇa pātitaḥ janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.003d-0852_01: sādhubhiḥ saṃgatiṃ labdhvā punaḥ svargam upeyivān
GE07mbh_01_u:081.003d-0852_02: svargataś ca punar brahman nivasan devaveśmani
GE07mbh_01_u:081.004c: sthita āsīd antarikṣe sa tadeti śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:081.005a: tata eva punaś cāpi gataḥ svargam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.005c: rājñā vasumatā sārdham aṣṭakena ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:081.006a: karmaṇā kena sa divaṃ punaḥ prāpto mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.006c: sarvam etad aśeṣeṇa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.008c: caritaṃ śrotum icchāmi divi ceha ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.009a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yayāter uttarāṃ kathām
GE07mbh_01_u:081.010a: yayātir nāhuṣo rājā pūruṃ putraṃ kanīyasam
GE07mbh_01_u:081.013a: atithīn pūjayām āsa vanyena haviṣā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.014a: pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ sa evaṃvṛttir abhūn nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.015c: pañcāgnimadhye ca tapas tepe saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:081.016b-0853_01: evam eva tathābdānāṃ paryāyeṇa gataṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:082.001a: svargataḥ sa tu rājendro nivasan devasadmani
GE07mbh_01_u:082.001c: pūjitas tridaśaiḥ sādhyair marudbhir vasubhis tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:082.003a: sa kadā cin nṛpaśreṣṭho yayātiḥ śakram āgamat
GE07mbh_01_u:082.003b-0855_01: kathayitvā kathās tāta śakreṇa saha pauravaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.003c: kathānte tatra śakreṇa pṛṣṭaḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.004a: yadā sa pūrus tava rūpeṇa rājañ; jarāṃ gṛhītvā pracacāra bhūmau
GE07mbh_01_u:082.004c: tadā rājyaṃ saṃpradāyaiva tasmai; tvayā kim uktaḥ kathayeha satyam
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005c: madhye pṛthivyās tvaṃ rājā bhrātaro 'ntyādhipās tava indraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_01: na ca kuryān naro dainyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ krodhaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_02: jaihmyaṃ ca matsaraṃ vairaṃ sarvatraitan na kārayet
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_03: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva vidvāṃsaṃ ca tapodhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_05: śaktas tu kṣamate nityam aśaktaḥ krośate naraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_07: rūpavantam arūpī ca dhanavantaṃ ca nirdhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_08: akarmī karmiṇaṃ dveṣṭi dhārmikaṃ cāpy adhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_11: brāhmaṇo vātha rājā vā vaiśyo vā śūdra eva vā
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_13: tasmāt praśaste devendra naraḥ saktamanā bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_14: alokajñā hy apraśastā bhrātaras te hy abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_15: antādhipatayaḥ sarve hy abhavan mama śāsanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:082.005d-0856_16: tvaṃ hi vai dharmado rājan kathyase dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:082.006a: akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyo viśiṣṭas; tathā titikṣur atitikṣor viśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.006c: amānuṣebhyo mānuṣāś ca pradhānā; vidvāṃs tathaivāviduṣaḥ pradhānaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.008a: nāruṃtudaḥ syān na nṛśaṃsavādī; na hīnataḥ param abhyādadīta
GE07mbh_01_u:082.008c: yayāsya vācā para udvijeta; na tāṃ vaded ruśatīṃ pāpalokyām
GE07mbh_01_u:082.009a: aruṃtudaṃ puruṣaṃ rūkṣavācaṃ; vākkaṇṭakair vitudantaṃ manuṣyān
GE07mbh_01_u:082.009c: vidyād alakṣmīkatamaṃ janānāṃ; mukhe nibaddhāṃ nirṛtiṃ vahantam
GE07mbh_01_u:082.010a: sadbhiḥ purastād abhipūjitaḥ syāt; sadbhis tathā pṛṣṭhato rakṣitaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_01_u:082.010c: sadāsatām ativādāṃs titikṣet; satāṃ vṛttaṃ cādadītāryavṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:082.011a: vāksāyakā vadanān niṣpatanti; yair āhataḥ śocati rātryahāni
GE07mbh_01_u:082.011c: parasya vā marmasu ye patanti; tān paṇḍito nāvasṛjet pareṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:082.012a: na hīdṛśaṃ saṃvananaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:082.012c: yathā maitrī ca bhūteṣu dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāk
GE07mbh_01_u:082.013a: tasmāt sāntvaṃ sadā vācyaṃ na vācyaṃ paruṣaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:082.013c: pūjyān saṃpūjayed dadyān na ca yācet kadā cana
GE07mbh_01_u:083.001a: sarvāṇi karmāṇi samāpya rājan; gṛhān parityajya vanaṃ gato 'si
GE07mbh_01_u:083.001c: tat tvāṃ pṛcchāmi nahuṣasya putra; kenāsi tulyas tapasā yayāte
GE07mbh_01_u:083.002c: ātmanas tapasā tulyaṃ kaṃ cit paśyāmi vāsava
GE07mbh_01_u:083.003a: yadāvamaṃsthāḥ sadṛśaḥ śreyasaś ca; pāpīyasaś cāviditaprabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.003c: tasmāl lokā antavantas taveme; kṣīṇe puṇye patitāsy adya rājan
GE07mbh_01_u:083.004a: surarṣigandharvanarāvamānāt; kṣayaṃ gatā me yadi śakra lokāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.004c: iccheyaṃ vai suralokād vihīnaḥ; satāṃ madhye patituṃ devarāja
GE07mbh_01_u:083.005a: satāṃ sakāśe patitāsi rājaṃś; cyutaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ yatra labdhāsi bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.005c: evaṃ viditvā tu punar yayāte; na te 'vamānyāḥ sadṛśaḥ śreyasaś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:083.007a: kas tvaṃ yuvā vāsavatulyarūpaḥ; svatejasā dīpyamāno yathāgniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.007c: patasy udīrṇāmbudharāndhakārāt; khāt khecarāṇāṃ pravaro yathārkaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.008a: dṛṣṭvā ca tvāṃ sūryapathāt patantaṃ; vaiśvānarārkadyutim aprameyam
GE07mbh_01_u:083.008c: kiṃ nu svid etat patatīti sarve; vitarkayantaḥ parimohitāḥ smaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.009a: dṛṣṭvā ca tvāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ devamārge; śakrārkaviṣṇupratimaprabhāvam
GE07mbh_01_u:083.009c: abhyudgatās tvāṃ vayam adya sarve; tattvaṃ pāte tava jijñāsamānāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.010a: na cāpi tvāṃ dhṛṣṇumaḥ praṣṭum agre; na ca tvam asmān pṛcchasi ye vayaṃ smaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.010c: tat tvāṃ pṛcchāmaḥ spṛhaṇīyarūpaṃ; kasya tvaṃ vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.011a: bhayaṃ tu te vyetu viṣādamohau; tyajāśu devendrasamānarūpa
GE07mbh_01_u:083.011c: tvāṃ vartamānaṃ hi satāṃ sakāśe; nālaṃ prasoḍhuṃ balahāpi śakraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.012a: santaḥ pratiṣṭhā hi sukhacyutānāṃ; satāṃ sadaivāmararājakalpa
GE07mbh_01_u:083.012c: te saṃgatāḥ sthāvarajaṅgameśāḥ; pratiṣṭhitas tvaṃ sadṛśeṣu satsu
GE07mbh_01_u:083.013a: prabhur agniḥ pratapane bhūmir āvapane prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:083.013c: prabhuḥ sūryaḥ prakāśitve satāṃ cābhyāgataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.001a: ahaṃ yayātir nahuṣasya putraḥ; pūroḥ pitā sarvabhūtāvamānāt
GE07mbh_01_u:084.002a: ahaṃ hi pūrvo vayasā bhavadbhyas; tenābhivādaṃ bhavatāṃ na prayuñje
GE07mbh_01_u:084.002c: yo vidyayā tapasā janmanā vā; vṛddhaḥ sa pūjyo bhavati dvijānām
GE07mbh_01_u:084.003a: avādīś ced vayasā yaḥ sa vṛddha; iti rājan nābhyavadaḥ kathaṃ cit
GE07mbh_01_u:084.003c: yo vai vidvān vayasā san sma vṛddhaḥ; sa eva pūjyo bhavati dvijānām
GE07mbh_01_u:084.004a: pratikūlaṃ karmaṇāṃ pāpam āhus; tad vartate 'pravaṇe pāpalokyam
GE07mbh_01_u:084.004c: santo 'satāṃ nānuvartanti caitad; yathā ātmaiṣām anukūlavādī
GE07mbh_01_u:084.005a: abhūd dhanaṃ me vipulaṃ mahad vai; viceṣṭamāno nādhigantā tad asmi
GE07mbh_01_u:084.005c: evaṃ pradhāryātmahite niviṣṭo; yo vartate sa vijānāti jīvan
GE07mbh_01_u:084.006c: tat tat prāpya na vihanyeta dhīro; diṣṭaṃ balīya iti matvātmabuddhyā
GE07mbh_01_u:084.007a: sukhaṃ hi jantur yadi vāpi duḥkhaṃ; daivādhīnaṃ vindati nātmaśaktyā
GE07mbh_01_u:084.007c: tasmād diṣṭaṃ balavan manyamāno; na saṃjvaren nāpi hṛṣyet kadā cit
GE07mbh_01_u:084.008a: duḥkhe na tapyen na sukhena hṛṣyet; samena varteta sadaiva dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.008c: diṣṭaṃ balīya iti manyamāno; na saṃjvaren nāpi hṛṣyet kadā cit
GE07mbh_01_u:084.008d-0858_01: dṛṣṭo hi me parataś cāpi lokaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.009a: bhaye na muhyāmy aṣṭakāhaṃ kadā cit; saṃtāpo me mānaso nāsti kaś cit
GE07mbh_01_u:084.009c: dhātā yathā māṃ vidadhāti loke; dhruvaṃ tathāhaṃ bhaviteti matvā
GE07mbh_01_u:084.010a: saṃsvedajā aṇḍajā udbhidāś ca; sarīsṛpāḥ kṛmayo 'thāpsu matsyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.010c: tathāśmānas tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ ca sarvaṃ; diṣṭakṣaye svāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhajante
GE07mbh_01_u:084.011a: anityatāṃ sukhaduḥkhasya buddhvā; kasmāt saṃtāpam aṣṭakāhaṃ bhajeyam
GE07mbh_01_u:084.011c: kiṃ kuryāṃ vai kiṃ ca kṛtvā na tapye; tasmāt saṃtāpaṃ varjayāmy apramattaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:084.012a: ye ye lokāḥ pārthivendra pradhānās; tvayā bhuktā yaṃ ca kālaṃ yathā ca
GE07mbh_01_u:084.012c: tan me rājan brūhi sarvaṃ yathāvat; kṣetrajñavad bhāṣase tvaṃ hi dharmān
GE07mbh_01_u:084.013a: rājāham āsam iha sārvabhaumas; tato lokān mahato ajayaṃ vai
GE07mbh_01_u:084.013c: tatrāvasaṃ varṣasahasramātraṃ; tato lokaṃ param asmy abhyupetaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.014a: tataḥ purīṃ puruhūtasya ramyāṃ; sahasradvārāṃ śatayojanāyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:084.014c: adhyāvasaṃ varṣasahasramātraṃ; tato lokaṃ param asmy abhyupetaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.015a: tato divyam ajaraṃ prāpya lokaṃ; prajāpater lokapater durāpam
GE07mbh_01_u:084.015c: tatrāvasaṃ varṣasahasramātraṃ; tato lokaṃ param asmy abhyupetaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.016a: devasya devasya niveśane ca; vijitya lokān avasaṃ yatheṣṭam
GE07mbh_01_u:084.017a: tathāvasaṃ nandane kāmarūpī; saṃvatsarāṇām ayutaṃ śatānām
GE07mbh_01_u:084.017c: sahāpsarobhir viharan puṇyagandhān; paśyan nagān puṣpitāṃś cārurūpān
GE07mbh_01_u:084.018a: tatrasthaṃ māṃ devasukheṣu saktaṃ; kāle 'tīte mahati tato 'timātram
GE07mbh_01_u:084.018c: dūto devānām abravīd ugrarūpo; dhvaṃsety uccais triḥ plutena svareṇa
GE07mbh_01_u:084.019a: etāvan me viditaṃ rājasiṃha; tato bhraṣṭo 'haṃ nandanāt kṣīṇapuṇyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:084.019c: vāco 'śrauṣaṃ cāntarikṣe surāṇām; anukrośāc chocatāṃ mānavendra
GE07mbh_01_u:084.020a: aho kaṣṭaṃ kṣīṇapuṇyo yayātiḥ; pataty asau puṇyakṛt puṇyakīrtiḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:090.042A: viḍūrathas tu māgadhīm upayeme saṃpriyāṃ nāma
GE07mbh_01_u:090.044A: parikṣit khalu bāhudām upayeme suyaśāṃ nāma
GE07mbh_01_u:090.045A: bhīmasenaḥ khalu kaikeyīm upayeme sukumārīṃ nāma
GE07mbh_01_u:090.046A: pratīpaḥ khalu śaibyām upayeme sunandāṃ nāma
GE07mbh_01_u:090.046B: tasyāṃ putrān utpādayām āsa devāpiṃ śaṃtanuṃ bāhlīkaṃ ceti
GE07mbh_01_u:090.048a: yaṃ yaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati jīrṇaṃ sa sukham aśnute
GE07mbh_01_u:090.048c: punar yuvā ca bhavati tasmāt taṃ śaṃtanuṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.051A: bhīṣmaḥ khalu pituḥ priyacikīrṣayā satyavatīm udavahan mātaram
GE07mbh_01_u:090.052B: tasyām eva śaṃtanor dvau putrau babhūvatuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.053A: tayor aprāptayauvana eva citrāṅgado gandharveṇa hataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.055A: vicitravīryas tv anapatya eva videhatvaṃ prāptaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.060A: sa param ity uktvā trīn putrān utpādayām āsa dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ pāṇḍuṃ viduraṃ ceti
GE07mbh_01_u:090.061A: tatra dhṛtarāṣṭrasya rājñaḥ putraśataṃ babhūva gāndhāryāṃ varadānād dvaipāyanasya
GE07mbh_01_u:090.062A: teṣāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇāṃ catvāraḥ pradhānā babhūvur duryodhano duḥśāsano vikarṇaś citrasena iti
GE07mbh_01_u:090.063A: pāṇḍos tu dve bhārye babhūvatuḥ kuntī mādrī cety ubhe strīratne
GE07mbh_01_u:090.064A: atha pāṇḍur mṛgayāṃ caran maithunagatam ṛṣim apaśyan mṛgyāṃ vartamānam
GE07mbh_01_u:090.065B: caratā dharmam imaṃ yena tvayābhijñena kāmarasasyāham anavāptakāmaraso 'bhihatas tasmāt tvam apy etām avasthām āsādyānavāptakāmarasaḥ pañcatvam āpsyasi kṣipram eveti
GE07mbh_01_u:090.065B-0902_01: yo 'kṛtārthaṃ hi māṃ krūra bāṇenāhan mṛgavratam
GE07mbh_01_u:090.065B-0902_02: tvām apy etādṛśo bhāvaḥ kṣipram evāgamiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:090.066A: sa vivarṇarūpaḥ pāṇḍuḥ śāpaṃ pariharamāṇo nopāsarpata bhārye
GE07mbh_01_u:090.069A: sā tatra putrān utpādayām āsa dharmād yudhiṣṭhiraṃ mārutād bhīmasenaṃ śakrād arjunam iti
GE07mbh_01_u:090.071A: sa evam astv ity uktaḥ kuntyā
GE07mbh_01_u:090.073A: mādrīṃ khalv alaṃkṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍur bhāvaṃ cakre
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A: tatas te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ kuntyā sahitā hāstinapuram ānīya tāpasair bhīṣmasya vidurasya ca niveditāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A-0903_01: sarvavarṇānāṃ ca nivedyāntarhitās tāpasā babhūvuḥ prekṣamāṇānām
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A-0903_02: eva teṣām | tac ca vākyam upaśrutya bhagavatām antarikṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A-0903_03: papāta devadundubhayaś ca praṇeduḥ | pratigṛhītāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A-0903_04: pitur nidhanam āvedayan | tasyaurdhvadehikaṃ nyāyataḥ kṛtavantaḥ | tāṃs tatra
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A-0903_05: nivasataḥ pāṇḍavān bālyāt prabhṛti duryodhano nāmarṣayat pāpācāro
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A-0903_06: rākṣasīṃ buddhim āśrito 'nekair upāyair uddhartuṃ ca vyavasito bhāvitvāc
GE07mbh_01_u:090.077A-0903_07: cārthasya na śakitāḥ samuddhartum | tataś ca dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa vyājena
GE07mbh_01_u:090.078A: tatrāpi jatugṛhe dagdhuṃ samārabdhā na śakitā viduramantritena
GE07mbh_01_u:090.079A: tataś ca hiḍimbam antarā hatvā ekacakrāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.080A: tasyām apy ekacakrāyāṃ bakaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ hatvā pāñcālanagaram abhigatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.081A: tasmād draupadīṃ bhāryām avindan svaviṣayaṃ cājagmuḥ kuśalinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.083A: yudhiṣṭhiras tu govāsanasya śaibyasya devikāṃ nāma kanyāṃ svayaṃvare lebhe
GE07mbh_01_u:090.083B: tasyāṃ putraṃ janayām āsa yaudheyaṃ nāma
GE07mbh_01_u:090.085A: arjunaḥ khalu dvāravatīṃ gatvā bhaginīṃ vāsudevasya subhadrāṃ nāma bhāryām udavahat
GE07mbh_01_u:090.085B: tasyāṃ putram abhimanyuṃ nāma janayām āsa
GE07mbh_01_u:090.085B-0904_01: so 'rjunas tu nāgakanyāyām ulūpyām irāvantaṃ nāma putraṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.085B-0904_02: janayām āsa | maṇalūrapatikanyāyāṃ citrāṅgadāyām arjunaḥ putram
GE07mbh_01_u:090.086A: nakulas tu caidyāṃ kareṇuvatīṃ nāma bhāryām udavahat
GE07mbh_01_u:090.087A: sahadevo 'pi mādrīm eva svayaṃvare vijayāṃ nāmopayeme
GE07mbh_01_u:090.088A: bhīmasenas tu pūrvam eva hiḍimbāyāṃ rākṣasyāṃ ghaṭotkacaṃ nāma putraṃ janayām āsa
GE07mbh_01_u:090.091A: tam utsaṅgena pratijagrāha pṛthā niyogāt puruṣottamasya vāsudevasya
GE07mbh_01_u:090.091B-0907_01: vāsudeva uvāca | ahaṃ jīvayāmi kumāram anantavīryam |
GE07mbh_01_u:090.091B-0907_02: jāta evāyam abhimanyoḥ | satyena ceyaṃ pṛthivī dhārayatv iti |
GE07mbh_01_u:090.092B: parikṣīṇe kule jāto bhavatv ayaṃ parikṣin nāmeti
GE07mbh_01_u:090.092B-0908_02: parikṣid abhavat tasmāt saubhadrāt tu yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.094A: janamejayāt tu vapuṣṭamāyāṃ dvau putrau śatānīkaḥ śaṅkuś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:090.096a: ity eṣa pūror vaṃśas tu pāṇḍavānāṃ ca kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.096c: pūror vaṃśam imaṃ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:090.096d-0909_01: itihāsam imaṃ puṇyam aśeṣataḥ śrāvayiṣyanti ye brāhmaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.096d-0909_02: śroṣyanti vā niyatātmāno vimatsarā maitrā devaparās te 'pi
GE07mbh_01_u:090.096d-0909_04: mānyāḥ saṃpūjyāś ca | paraṃ hīdaṃ bhārataṃ bhagavatā vyāsena proktaṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.096d-0909_05: pāvanaṃ ye brāhmaṇādayo varṇāḥ śraddadhānā vimatsarā maitrā vedavratasaṃpannāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:090.096d-0909_08: idaṃ hi vedaiḥ samitaṃ pavitram api cottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:091.002c: toṣayām āsa devendraṃ svargaṃ lebhe tataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.002d-0910_02: saṃsmaraṃś cākṣayāṃl lokān viditāṃś ca svakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:091.003a: tataḥ kadā cid brahmāṇam upāsāṃ cakrire surāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.003c: tatra rājarṣayo āsan sa ca rājā mahābhiṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.005c: mahābhiṣas tu rājarṣir aśaṅko dṛṣṭavān nadīm
GE07mbh_01_u:091.006c: uktaś ca jāto martyeṣu punar lokān avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:091.006d-0911_01: manuṣyeṣu ciraṃ sthitvā lokān prāpsyasi śobhanān
GE07mbh_01_u:091.006d-0911_02: yayā hṛtamanāś cāsi gaṅgayā tvaṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_01_u:091.006d-0911_03: sā te vai mānuṣe loke vipriyāṇy ācariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:091.006d-0911_04: yadā te bhavitā manyus tadā śāpād vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_01_u:091.007a: sa cintayitvā nṛpatir nṛpān sarvāṃs tapodhanān
GE07mbh_01_u:091.008a: mahābhiṣaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā nadī dhairyāc cyutaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_01_u:091.008d-0912_01: bhāvaṃ manasi vai kṛtvā jagāma nṛpatiṃ patim
GE07mbh_01_u:091.009c: dadarśa pathi gacchantī vasūn devān divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.010a: tathārūpāṃś ca tān dṛṣṭvā papraccha saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_01_u:091.010c: kim idaṃ naṣṭarūpāḥ stha kaccit kṣemaṃ divaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:091.010d-0913_01: sukhāni na prasannāni vivarṇāni kṛtāni kim
GE07mbh_01_u:091.011a: tām ūcur vasavo devāḥ śaptāḥ smo vai mahānadi
GE07mbh_01_u:091.012a: vimūḍhā hi vayaṃ sarve pracchannam ṛṣisattamam
GE07mbh_01_u:091.012c: saṃdhyāṃ vasiṣṭham āsīnaṃ tam atyabhisṛtāḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:091.013a: tena kopād vayaṃ śaptā yonau saṃbhavateti ha
GE07mbh_01_u:091.013c: na śakyam anyathā kartuṃ yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_01_u:091.014a: tvaṃ tasmān mānuṣī bhūtvā sūṣva putrān vasūn bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:091.015a: ity uktā tān vasūn gaṅgā tathety uktvābravīd idam
GE07mbh_01_u:091.015c: martyeṣu puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ ko vaḥ kartā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:091.015d-0915_01: ity uktā gaṅgayā te ca tām ūcur vasavas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:091.016a: pratīpasya suto rājā śaṃtanur nāma dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.016c: bhavitā mānuṣe loke sa naḥ kartā bhaviṣyati gaṅgovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:091.017a: mamāpy evaṃ mataṃ devā yathāvadata mānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.017c: priyaṃ tasya kariṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ caitad īpśitam
GE07mbh_01_u:091.018a: jātān kumārān svān apsu prakṣeptuṃ vai tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:091.018c: yathā nacirakālaṃ no niṣkṛtiḥ syāt trilokage gaṅgovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:091.019a: evam etat kariṣyāmi putras tasya vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:091.019c: nāsya moghaḥ saṃgamaḥ syāt putrahetor mayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:091.020c: tena vīryeṇa putras te bhavitā tasya cepsitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.021a: na saṃpatsyati martyeṣu punas tasya tu saṃtatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:091.021c: tasmād aputraḥ putras te bhaviṣyati sa vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:091.022a: evaṃ te samayaṃ kṛtvā gaṅgayā vasavaḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:092.001a: tataḥ pratīpo rājā sa sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.002a: tasya rūpaguṇopetā gaṅgā śrīr iva rūpiṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:092.004a: pratīpas tu mahīpālas tām uvāca manasvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:092.004c: karavāṇi kiṃ te kalyāṇi priyaṃ yat te 'bhikāṅkṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.005a: tvām ahaṃ kāmaye rājan kuruśreṣṭha bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_01_u:092.005c: tyāgaḥ kāmavatīnāṃ hi strīṇāṃ sadbhir vigarhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.006c: na cāsavarṇāṃ kalyāṇi dharmyaṃ tad viddhi me vratam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.006d-0918_01: yaḥ svadārān parityajya pārakyāṃ sevate svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.006d-0918_02: sa saṃsārān na mucyeta yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.007a: nāśreyasy asmi nāgamyā na vaktavyā ca karhi cit
GE07mbh_01_u:092.007c: bhaja māṃ bhajamānāṃ tvaṃ rājan kanyāṃ varastriyam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.008a: mayātivṛttam etat te yan māṃ codayasi priyam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.009a: prāpya dakṣiṇam ūruṃ me tvam āśliṣṭā varāṅgane
GE07mbh_01_u:092.009c: apatyānāṃ snuṣāṇāṃ ca bhīru viddhy etad āsanam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.010a: savyataḥ kāminībhāgas tvayā sa ca vivarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.010c: tasmād ahaṃ nācariṣye tvayi kāmaṃ varāṅgane
GE07mbh_01_u:092.011a: snuṣā me bhava kalyāṇi putrārthe tvāṃ vṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:092.011c: snuṣāpakṣaṃ hi vāmoru tvam āgamya samāśritā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.012a: evam apy astu dharmajña saṃyujyeyaṃ sutena te
GE07mbh_01_u:092.013a: pṛthivyāṃ pārthivā ye ca teṣāṃ yūyaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.013c: guṇā na hi mayā śakyā vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api
GE07mbh_01_u:092.013e: kulasya ye vaḥ prasthitās tatsādhutvam anuttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.014a: sa me nābhijanajñaḥ syād ācareyaṃ ca yad vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:092.014c: tat sarvam eva putras te na mīmāṃseta karhi cit
GE07mbh_01_u:092.015a: evaṃ vasantī putre te vardhayiṣyāmy ahaṃ priyam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.015c: putraiḥ puṇyaiḥ priyaiś cāpi svargaṃ prāpsyati te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.016a: tathety uktvā tu sā rājaṃs tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_01_u:092.016c: putrajanma pratīkṣaṃs tu sa rājā tad adhārayat
GE07mbh_01_u:092.017a: etasminn eva kāle tu pratīpaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.017d-0920_01: pratīpasya tu bhāryāyāṃ garbhaḥ śrīmān avardhata
GE07mbh_01_u:092.017d-0920_02: śriyā paramayā yuktaḥ śaracchukle yathā śaśī
GE07mbh_01_u:092.017d-0920_03: tatas tu daśame māsi prājāyata raviprabham
GE07mbh_01_u:092.018a: tayoḥ samabhavat putro vṛddhayoḥ sa mahābhiṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.018c: śāntasya jajñe saṃtānas tasmād āsīt sa śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.018d-0921_03: nāmakarma ca viprās tu cakruḥ paramasatkṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.018d-0921_06: sa tu lebhe parāṃ niṣṭhāṃ prāpya dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.018d-0921_07: dhanurvede ca vede ca gatiṃ sa paramāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.018d-0921_08: yauvanaṃ cāpi saṃprāptaḥ kumāro vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.018d-0922_01: dṛṣṭvā tu yauvanasthaṃ taṃ tatprītyā rājasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:092.019a: saṃsmaraṃś cākṣayāṃl lokān vijitān svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.019b-0925_01: mahābhiṣaḥ sa saṃjajñe kṣetre tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.020c: purā māṃ strī samabhyāgāc chaṃtano bhūtaye tava
GE07mbh_01_u:092.021a: tvām āvrajed yadi rahaḥ sā putra varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_01_u:092.021e: sā tvayā nānuyoktavyā kāsi kasyāsi vāṅgane
GE07mbh_01_u:092.022a: yac ca kuryān na tat kāryaṃ praṣṭavyā sā tvayānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:092.022c: manniyogād bhajantīṃ tāṃ bhajethā ity uvāca tam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.023a: evaṃ saṃdiśya tanayaṃ pratīpaḥ śaṃtanuṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.023c: sve ca rājye 'bhiṣicyainaṃ vanaṃ rājā viveśa ha
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024a: sa rājā śaṃtanur dhīmān khyātaḥ pṛthvyāṃ dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0001: babhūva sarvalokasya satyavāg iti saṃmataḥ pīnaskandho mahābāhur mattavāraṇavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0004: amātyasaṃpadopetaḥ kṣatradharmaviśeṣavit vaśe cakre mahīm eko vijitya vasudhādhipān
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0006: vedān āgamayat kṛtsnān rājadharmāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0007: īje ca bahubhiḥ satraiḥ kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0008: tarpayām āsa viprāṃś ca vedādhyayanakovidān ratnair uccāvacair gobhir grāmair aśvair dhanair api
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0010: vayorūpeṇa saṃpannaḥ pauruṣeṇa balena ca aiśvaryeṇa pratāpena vikrameṇa dhanena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0013: taṃ mahīpaṃ mahīpālā rājarājam akurvata vītaśokabhayābādhāḥ sukhasvapnaprabodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0019: brahmakṣatrānulomāś ca śūdrāḥ paryacaran viśaḥ evaṃ paśuvarāhāṇāṃ tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0021: śaṃtanāv atha rājyasthe nāvartata vṛthā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0023: sa eva rājā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām abhavat pitā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0024: sa hastināmni dharmātmā viharan kurunandanaḥ tejasā sūryakalpo 'bhūd vāyunā ca samo bale
GE07mbh_01_u:092.024b-053_0027: babhūva rājā sumatiḥ prajānāṃ satyavikramaḥ sa vaneṣu ca ramyeṣu śailaprasravaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:092.025a: sa mṛgān mahiṣāṃś caiva vinighnan rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.025b-0927_01: nadīm anvacarad rājā śaṃtanuḥ parayā mudā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.026a: sa kadā cin mahārāja dadarśa paramastriyam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.026b-0928_01: sā ca śaṃtanum abhyāgād alakṣmīm apakarṣatī
GE07mbh_01_u:092.026c: jājvalyamānāṃ vapuṣā sākṣāt padmām iva śriyam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.027d-0930_06: vāṇīṃ ca girijāṃ lakṣmīṃ yoṣito 'nyāḥ surāṅganāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.028b-0932_03: tām uvāca tato rājā kāminīṃ tu manoramām
GE07mbh_01_u:092.028c: pibann iva ca netrābhyāṃ nātṛpyata narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.029a: sā ca dṛṣṭvaiva rājānaṃ vicarantaṃ mahādyutim
GE07mbh_01_u:092.030a: tām uvāca tato rājā sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.030c: devī vā dānavī vā tvaṃ gandharvī yadi vāpsarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.031a: yakṣī vā pannagī vāpi mānuṣī vā sumadhyame
GE07mbh_01_u:092.031c: yā vā tvaṃ suragarbhābhe bhāryā me bhava śobhane
GE07mbh_01_u:092.031d-0935_01: tvadgatā hi mama prāṇā vasu yan me 'sti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:092.032a: etac chrutvā vaco rājñaḥ sasmitaṃ mṛdu valgu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:092.032b-0936_01: yaśasvinī ca sāgacchac chaṃtanor bhūtaye tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.032b-0936_02: sā ca dṛṣṭvā nṛpaśreṣṭhaṃ carantī tīram āśritam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.032b-0937_03: kālo 'yam iti matvā sā vasūnāṃ śāpacoditā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.032b-0938_01: abravīc chaṃtanuṃ gaṅgā bhaja māṃ tvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_01_u:092.033a: uvāca caiva rājñaḥ sā hlādayantī mano girā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.033d-0939_01: jñāto 'si mahyaṃ pitrā te bhartā me tvaṃ bhava prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:092.033d-0940_01: nanu tvaṃ vā dvitīyo vā jñātum iccheḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:092.034a: yat tu kuryām ahaṃ rājañ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham

GE07mbh_01_u:092.035a: evaṃ hi vartamāne 'haṃ tvayi vatsyāmi pārthiva
GE07mbh_01_u:092.035c: vāritā vipriyaṃ coktā tyajeyaṃ tvām asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.035d-0941_01: eṣa me samayo rājan bhaja māṃ tvaṃ yathepsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.035d-0941_02: anunītāsmi te pitrā bhartā me tvaṃ bhava prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:092.036a: tatheti rājñā sā tūktā tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:092.036c: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe prāpya taṃ pārthivottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.036d-0942_01: pratijñāya tu tat tasyās tatheti manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.036d-0942_02: ratham āropya tāṃ devīṃ jagāma sa tayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:092.036d-0942_03: sā ca śaṃtanum abhyāgāt sākṣāl lakṣmīr ivāparā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.037a: āsādya śaṃtanus tāṃ ca bubhuje kāmato vaśī
GE07mbh_01_u:092.037c: na praṣṭavyeti manvāno na sa tāṃ kiṃ cid ūcivān
GE07mbh_01_u:092.039a: divyarūpā hi sā devī gaṅgā tripathagā nadī
GE07mbh_01_u:092.039c: mānuṣaṃ vigrahaṃ śrīmat kṛtvā sā varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_01_u:092.041c: rājānaṃ ramayām āsa yathā reme tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.042c: saṃvatsarān ṛtūn māsān na bubodha bahūn gatān
GE07mbh_01_u:092.043b-0945_01: diviṣṭhān mānuṣāṃś caiva bhogān bhuṅkte sma vai nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.043b-0945_02: āsādya śaṃtanuḥ śrīmān mumude ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.043b-0945_03: ṛtukāle ca sā devī divyaṃ garbham adhārayat
GE07mbh_01_u:092.044a: jātaṃ jātaṃ ca sā putraṃ kṣipaty ambhasi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:092.044b-0946_01: sūtake kaṇṭham ākramya tān nināya yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_01_u:092.044c: prīṇāmi tvāham ity uktvā gaṅgāsrotasy amajjayat
GE07mbh_01_u:092.045a: tasya tan na priyaṃ rājñaḥ śaṃtanor abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.045c: na ca tāṃ kiṃ canovāca tyāgād bhīto mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.045d-0947_03: jātaṃ jātaṃ ca vai hanti sā strī sapta varān sutān
GE07mbh_01_u:092.045d-0947_04: śaṃtanur dharmabhaṅgāc ca nāpṛcchat tāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:092.045d-0947_05: aṣṭamaṃ tu jighāṃsantyā cukṣubhe śaṃtanor dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.046a: atha tām aṣṭame putre jāte prahasitām iva
GE07mbh_01_u:092.046c: uvāca rājā duḥkhārtaḥ parīpsan putram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.046d-0948_01: ārabhantīṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sa kauravanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.047a: mā vadhīḥ kāsi kasyāsi kiṃ hiṃsasi sutān iti
GE07mbh_01_u:092.047c: putraghni sumahat pāpaṃ mā prāpas tiṣṭha garhite
GE07mbh_01_u:092.048a: putrakāma na te hanmi putraṃ putravatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:092.048c: jīrṇas tu mama vāso 'yaṃ yathā sa samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.051a: teṣāṃ janayitā nānyas tvad ṛte bhuvi vidyate

GE07mbh_01_u:092.052b-0949_01: vasavas te sutā jātā rājaṃl lokasya kīrtaye
GE07mbh_01_u:092.052c: janayitvā vasūn aṣṭau jitā lokās tvayākṣayāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.053a: devānāṃ samayas tv eṣa vasūnāṃ saṃśruto mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:092.053c: jātaṃ jātaṃ mokṣayiṣye janmato mānuṣād iti
GE07mbh_01_u:092.054a: tat te śāpād vinirmuktā āpavasya mahātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:092.054d-0950_01: ayaṃ tava sutas teṣāṃ vīryeṇa kulanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:092.054d-0950_02: saṃbhūto 'ti janān anyān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:092.055d-0951_01: tasmād devavrataś caiva gaṅgādattaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:092.055d-0951_02: dvināmā śaṃtanoḥ putraḥ śaṃtanor adhiko guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.001a: āpavo nāma ko nv eṣa vasūnāṃ kiṃ ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:093.001b-0952_01: śaśāpa yasmāt kalyāṇi sa vasūṃś cārudarśane
GE07mbh_01_u:093.001c: yasyābhiśāpāt te sarve mānuṣīṃ tanum āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.002a: anena ca kumāreṇa gaṅgādattena kiṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:093.003a: īśānāḥ sarvalokasya vasavas te ca vai katham
GE07mbh_01_u:093.004a: saivam uktā tato gaṅgā rājānam idam abravīt

GE07mbh_01_u:093.005c: vasiṣṭho nāma sa muniḥ khyāta āpava ity uta
GE07mbh_01_u:093.007a: sa vāruṇis tapas tepe tasmin bharatasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:093.008a: dakṣasya duhitā yā tu surabhīty atigarvitā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.008c: gāṃ prajātā tu sā devī kaśyapād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:093.009c: tāṃ lebhe gāṃ tu dharmātmā homadhenuṃ sa vāruṇiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.010c: cacāra ramye dharmye ca gaur apetabhayā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.011a: atha tad vanam ājagmuḥ kadā cid bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:093.012a: te sadārā vanaṃ tac ca vyacaranta samantataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.013a: tatraikasya tu bhāryā vai vasor vāsavavikrama
GE07mbh_01_u:093.013c: sā carantī vane tasmin gāṃ dadarśa sumadhyamā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.013e: yā sā vasiṣṭhasya muneḥ sarvakāmadhug uttamā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.014c: dive vai darśayām āsa tāṃ gāṃ govṛṣabhekṣaṇa
GE07mbh_01_u:093.015a: svāpīnāṃ ca sudogdhrīṃ ca suvāladhimukhāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_01_u:093.017a: dyaus tadā tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvaiva gāṃ gajendrendravikrama
GE07mbh_01_u:093.017b-0954_01: uvāca rājaṃs tāṃ devīṃ nṛpottama sumadhyamāṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.017c: uvāca rājaṃs tāṃ devīṃ tasyā rūpaguṇān vadan
GE07mbh_01_u:093.018a: eṣā gaur uttamā devi vāruṇer asitekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:093.018c: ṛṣes tasya varārohe yasyedaṃ vanam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:093.019a: asyāḥ kṣīraṃ piben martyaḥ svādu yo vai sumadhyame
GE07mbh_01_u:093.020a: etac chrutvā tu sā devī nṛpottama sumadhyamā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.021a: asti me mānuṣe loke naradevātmajā sakhī
GE07mbh_01_u:093.023a: tasyā hetor mahābhāga savatsāṃ gāṃ mamepsitām
GE07mbh_01_u:093.024a: yāvad asyāḥ payaḥ pītvā sā sakhī mama mānada
GE07mbh_01_u:093.025a: etan mama mahābhāga kartum arhasy anindita
GE07mbh_01_u:093.025c: priyaṃ priyataraṃ hy asmān nāsti me 'nyat kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:093.026a: etac chrutvā vacas tasyā devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.026c: pṛthvādyair bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ dyaus tadā tāṃ jahāra gām

GE07mbh_01_u:093.028c: na cāpaśyata gāṃ tatra savatsāṃ kānanottame
GE07mbh_01_u:093.029a: tataḥ sa mṛgayām āsa vane tasmiṃs tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.029c: nādhyagacchac ca mṛgayaṃs tāṃ gāṃ munir udāradhīḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.030c: yayau krodhavaśaṃ sadyaḥ śaśāpa ca vasūṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.031a: yasmān me vasavo jahrur gāṃ vai dogdhrīṃ suvāladhim

GE07mbh_01_u:093.033f-0955_01: evaṃ śaptās tatas tena muninā yāmunena vai
GE07mbh_01_u:093.033f-0955_02: aṣṭau samastā vasavo mune roṣeṇa sattama

GE07mbh_01_u:093.038b-0957_01: prajā hy anṛtavākyena hiṃsyām apy ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.038c: na prajāsyati cāpy eṣa mānuṣeṣu mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.039e: evam uktvā vasūn sarvāñ jagāma bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.040a: tato mām upajagmus te samastā vasavas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:093.040c: ayācanta ca māṃ rājan varaṃ sa ca mayā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.040e: jātāñ jātān prakṣipāsmān svayaṃ gaṅge tvam ambhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:093.041a: evaṃ teṣām ahaṃ samyak śaptānāṃ rājasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:093.041c: mokṣārthaṃ mānuṣāl lokād yathāvat kṛtavaty aham
GE07mbh_01_u:093.042a: ayaṃ śāpād ṛṣes tasya eka eva nṛpottama
GE07mbh_01_u:093.042c: dyau rājan mānuṣe loke ciraṃ vatsyati bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:093.042d-0958_01: ayaṃ kumāraḥ putras te vivṛddhaḥ punar eṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:093.042d-0958_02: ahaṃ ca te bhaviṣyāmi āhvānopagatā nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:093.043c: ādāya ca kumāraṃ taṃ jagāmātha yathepsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:093.043d-0959_01: tasmād devavrataś caiva gaṅgādattaś ca so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:093.044a: sa tu devavrato nāma gāṅgeya iti cābhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:093.044c: dvināmā śaṃtanoḥ putraḥ śaṃtanor adhiko guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.045a: śaṃtanuś cāpi śokārto jagāma svapuraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:093.045b-0960_01: tasya kīrtiṃ ca vṛttiṃ ca mahato nṛpasadguṇān
GE07mbh_01_u:094.001d-0961_01: śaṃtanoḥ kīrtayiṣyāmi sarvān eva guṇān aham
GE07mbh_01_u:094.002a: damo dānaṃ kṣamā buddhir hrīr dhṛtis teja uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.004b-0962_02: tasya kīrtimato vṛttam avekṣya satataṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.004c: dharma eva paraḥ kāmād arthāc ceti vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.005c: na cāsya sadṛśaḥ kaś cit kṣatriyo dharmato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:094.006a: vartamānaṃ hi dharme sve sarvadharmavidāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.009a: brahma paryacarat kṣatraṃ viśaḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.015c: na cādharmeṇa keṣāṃ cit prāṇinām abhavad vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.016c: sa eva rājā bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām abhavat pitā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.017c: śritā vāg abhavat satyaṃ dānadharmāśritaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.017d-0965_01: yajñārthaṃ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ saṃtānārthaṃ ca maithunam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.018a: sa samāḥ ṣoḍaśāṣṭau ca catasro 'ṣṭau tathāparāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.019c: gāṅgeyas tasya putro 'bhūn nāmnā devavrato vasuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.020a: sarvāstreṣu sa niṣṇātaḥ pārthiveṣv itareṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:094.021a: sa kadā cin mṛgaṃ viddhvā gaṅgām anusaran nadīm
GE07mbh_01_u:094.022a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayām āsa śaṃtanuḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.022c: syandate kiṃ nv iyaṃ nādya saricchreṣṭhā yathā purā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.023a: tato nimittam anvicchan dadarśa sa mahāmanāḥ
