GE07mbh_01_u:094.026a: jātamātraṃ purā dṛṣṭaṃ taṃ putraṃ śaṃtanus tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.026c: nopalebhe smṛtiṃ dhīmān abhijñātuṃ tam ātmajam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.026d-0967_01: na smṛtiḥ śaṃtanor āsīd abhijñātuṃ svam ātmajam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.027a: sa tu taṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mohayām āsa māyayā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.028a: tad adbhutaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā tatra rājā sa śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.028c: śaṅkamānaḥ sutaṃ gaṅgām abravīd darśayeti ha
GE07mbh_01_u:094.028d-0968_01: śaṅkamānaḥ sutaṃ prāpya gaṅgā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:094.029a: darśayām āsa taṃ gaṅgā bibhratī rūpam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.029c: gṛhītvā dakṣiṇe pāṇau taṃ kumāram alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.030c: dṛṣṭapūrvām api satīṃ nābhyajānāt sa śaṃtanuḥ gaṅgovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:094.031a: yaṃ putram aṣṭamaṃ rājaṃs tvaṃ purā mayy ajāyithāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.032a: vedān adhijage sāṅgān vasiṣṭhād eva vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:094.033a: surāṇāṃ saṃmato nityam asurāṇāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.033c: uśanā veda yac chāstram ayaṃ tad veda sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.034c: yad veda śāstraṃ tac cāpi kṛtsnam asmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.035c: yad astraṃ veda rāmaś ca tad apy asmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.036c: mayā dattaṃ nijaṃ putraṃ vīraṃ vīra gṛhān naya
GE07mbh_01_u:094.039a: pauravāñ śaṃtanoḥ putraḥ pitaraṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.039c: rāṣṭraṃ ca rañjayām āsa vṛttena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:094.039d-0974_02: putro devavrato nāma śaṃtanor adhiko guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.040a: sa tathā saha putreṇa ramamāṇo mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.041a: sa kadā cid vanaṃ yāto yamunām abhito nadīm
GE07mbh_01_u:094.042c: sa dadarśa tadā kanyāṃ dāśānāṃ devarūpiṇīm
GE07mbh_01_u:094.043a: tām apṛcchat sa dṛṣṭvaiva kanyām asitalocanām
GE07mbh_01_u:094.043c: kasya tvam asi kā cāsi kiṃ ca bhīru cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_01_u:094.044c: pitur niyogād bhadraṃ te dāśarājño mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.045c: samīkṣya rājā dāśeyīṃ kāmayām āsa śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.046a: sa gatvā pitaraṃ tasyā varayām āsa tāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.046d-0975_01: icchāmi dāśadattāṃ me sutāṃ bhāryām aninditām
GE07mbh_01_u:094.047a: sa ca taṃ pratyuvācedaṃ dāśarājo mahīpatim
GE07mbh_01_u:094.047e: hṛdi kāmas tu me kaś cit taṃ nibodha janeśvara
GE07mbh_01_u:094.048c: satyavāg asi satyena samayaṃ kuru me tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.049a: samayena pradadyāṃ te kanyām aham imāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:094.049c: na hi me tvatsamaḥ kaś cid varo jātu bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:094.050a: śrutvā tava varaṃ dāśa vyavasyeyam ahaṃ na vā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.050c: dātavyaṃ cet pradāsyāmi na tv adeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:094.051a: asyāṃ jāyeta yaḥ putraḥ sa rājā pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.051c: tvad ūrdhvam abhiṣektavyo nānyaḥ kaś cana pārthiva
GE07mbh_01_u:094.052a: nākāmayata taṃ dātuṃ varaṃ dāśāya śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.053a: sa cintayann eva tadā dāśakanyāṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.054a: tataḥ kadā cic chocantaṃ śaṃtanuṃ dhyānam āsthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.055b-0976_01: sa kasmād rājaśārdūla śocaṃs tu paridahyase
GE07mbh_01_u:094.055e: dhyāyann iva ca kiṃ rājan nābhibhāṣasi kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:094.055f-0977_01: na cāśvena viniryāsi vivarṇo hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.055f-0977_02: vyādhim icchāmi te jñātuṃ pratikuryāṃ hi tatra vai
GE07mbh_01_u:094.055f-0978_01: sa taṃ kāmam avācyaṃ vai dāśakanyāṃ pratīdṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.055f-0978_02: vivṛtaṃ nāśakat tasmai pitā putrāya śaṃsitum
GE07mbh_01_u:094.056a: evam uktaḥ sa putreṇa śaṃtanuḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.056c: asaṃśayaṃ dhyānaparaṃ yathā māttha tathāsmy uta
GE07mbh_01_u:094.057a: apatyaṃ nas tvam evaikaḥ kule mahati bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.057b-0979_01: śastranityaś ca satataṃ pauruṣe dhury avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.057c: anityatā ca martyānām ataḥ śocāmi putraka
GE07mbh_01_u:094.058a: kathaṃ cit tava gāṅgeya vipattau nāsti naḥ kulam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.058c: asaṃśayaṃ tvam evaikaḥ śatād api varaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.059a: na cāpy ahaṃ vṛthā bhūyo dārān kartum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_01_u:094.059f-0980_01: cakṣur ekaṃ ca putraṃ ca asti nāsti ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.060a: agnihotraṃ trayo vedā yajñāś ca sahadakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.060c: sarvāṇy etāny apatyasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm
GE07mbh_01_u:094.061a: evam eva manuṣyeṣu syāc ca sarvaprajāsv api
GE07mbh_01_u:094.061c: yad apatyaṃ mahāprājña tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.061e: eṣā trayī purāṇānām uttamānāṃ ca śāśvatī
GE07mbh_01_u:094.061f-0982_01: apatyaṃ karma vidyā ca trīṇi jyotīṃṣi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.061f-0982_02: yad idaṃ kāraṇaṃ tāta sarvam ākhyātam añjasā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.062a: tvaṃ ca śūraḥ sadāmarṣī śastranityaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.062c: nānyatra śastrāt tasmāt te nidhanaṃ vidyate 'nagha
GE07mbh_01_u:094.063a: so 'smi saṃśayam āpannas tvayi śānte kathaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:094.063c: iti te kāraṇaṃ tāta duḥkhasyoktam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064a: tatas tat kāraṇaṃ jñātvā kṛtsnaṃ caivam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0001: apatyaphalasaṃyuktam etac chrutvā pitur vacaḥ sūtaṃ bhūyo 'pi saṃtapta āhvayām āsa vai pituḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0004: tam uvāca mahāprājño bhīṣmo vai sārathiṃ pituḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0005: tvaṃ sārathe pitur mahyaṃ sakhāsi rathadhūrgataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0006: abhijānāsi yadi vai kasyāṃ bhāvo nṛpasya tu
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0007: etad ācakṣva me pṛṣṭaḥ kariṣye na tadanyathā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0008: dāśakanyā naraśreṣṭha tatra bhāvaḥ pitur gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0009: vṛtaḥ sa naradevena tadā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0010: yo 'syāṃ pumān bhaved garbhaḥ sa rājā tvadanantaram
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0011: nākāmayata taṃ dātuṃ pitā tava varaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0012: sa cāpi niścayas tasya na ca dadyām ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0013: evaṃ te kathitaṃ vīra kuruṣva yad anantaram
GE07mbh_01_u:094.064d-054_0014: tataḥ sa pitur ājñāya mataṃ samyag avekṣya ca jñātvā vimanasaṃ putraḥ prayayau yamunāṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:094.065c: tam apṛcchat tadābhyetya pitus tac chokakāraṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.066c: varaṃ śaśaṃsa kanyāṃ tām uddiśya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:094.067a: tato devavrato vṛddhaiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ sahitas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.067c: abhigamya dāśarājānaṃ kanyāṃ vavre pituḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.068a: taṃ dāśaḥ pratijagrāha vidhivat pratipūjya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:094.068c: abravīc cainam āsīnaṃ rājasaṃsadi bhārata uccaiḥśravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.068d-0983_02: apatyaṃ yad bhaved asyāḥ sa rājāstu pituḥ param
GE07mbh_01_u:094.069a: tvam eva nāthaḥ paryāptaḥ śaṃtanoḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:094.069c: putraḥ putravatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.069d-0984_01: kumārikāyāḥ śulkena kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.070a: ko hi saṃbandhakaṃ ślāghyam īpsitaṃ yaunam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.070c: atikrāman na tapyeta sākṣād api śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.071a: apatyaṃ caitad āryasya yo yuṣmākaṃ samo guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.072a: tena me bahuśas tāta pitā te parikīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.073a: asito hy api devarṣiḥ pratyākhyātaḥ purā mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.073c: satyavatyā bhṛśaṃ hy arthī sa āsīd ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.074a: kanyāpitṛtvāt kiṃ cit tu vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:094.074c: balavat sapatnatām atra doṣaṃ paśyāmi kevalam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.074d-0985_01: bhūyāṃsaṃ tvayi paśyāmi taṃ doṣam aparājita
GE07mbh_01_u:094.075a: yasya hi tvaṃ sapatnaḥ syā gandharvasyāsurasya vā
GE07mbh_01_u:094.075c: na sa jātu sukhaṃ jīvet tvayi kruddhe paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:094.076a: etāvān atra doṣo hi nānyaḥ kaś cana pārthiva
GE07mbh_01_u:094.076c: etaj jānīhi bhadraṃ te dānādāne paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:094.077a: evam uktas tu gāṅgeyas tadyuktaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.078a: idaṃ me matam ādatsva satyaṃ satyavatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:094.078c: naiva jāto na vājāta īdṛśaṃ vaktum utsahet
GE07mbh_01_u:094.079a: evam etat kariṣyāmi yathā tvam anubhāṣase
GE07mbh_01_u:094.079c: yo 'syāṃ janiṣyate putraḥ sa no rājā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:094.080a: ity uktaḥ punar evātha taṃ dāśaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.081a: tvam eva nāthaḥ paryāptaḥ śaṃtanor amitadyuteḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.081c: kanyāyāś caiva dharmātman prabhur dānāya ceśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.082a: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ saumya kāryaṃ caiva nibodha me
GE07mbh_01_u:094.084a: nānyathā tan mahābāho saṃśayo 'tra na kaś cana
GE07mbh_01_u:094.084c: tavāpatyaṃ bhaved yat tu tatra naḥ saṃśayo mahān
GE07mbh_01_u:094.086b-0987_01: ṛṣayo vātha vā devā bhūtāny antarhitāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:094.086b-0987_02: yāni tānīha śṛṇvantu nāsti vaktāsya matsamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.086b-0987_03: idaṃ vacanam ādhatsva satyena mama jalpataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.086c: śṛṇvatāṃ bhūmipālānāṃ yad bravīmi pituḥ kṛte
GE07mbh_01_u:094.087a: rājyaṃ tāvat pūrvam eva mayā tyaktaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_01_u:094.087c: apatyahetor api ca karomy eṣa viniścayam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.088a: adya prabhṛti me dāśa brahmacaryaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:094.088c: aputrasyāpi me lokā bhaviṣyanty akṣayā divi
GE07mbh_01_u:094.088d-0988_01: na hi janmaprabhṛty uktaṃ mayā kiṃ cid ihānṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.088d-0988_02: yāvat prāṇā dhriyante vai mama dehaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.088d-0988_03: tāvan na janayiṣyāmi pitre kanyāṃ prayaccha me
GE07mbh_01_u:094.088d-0988_04: parityajāmy ahaṃ rājyaṃ maithunaṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.088d-0988_05: ūrdhvaretā bhaviṣyāmi dāśa satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_01_u:094.089c: dadānīty eva taṃ dāśo dharmātmā pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:094.090b-0989_01: taṃ dṛṣṭvā duṣkaraṃ karma praśaśaṃsuś ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.091a: tataḥ sa pitur arthāya tām uvāca yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:094.091c: adhiroha rathaṃ mātar gacchāvaḥ svagṛhān iti
GE07mbh_01_u:094.092a: evam uktvā tu bhīṣmas tāṃ ratham āropya bhāminīm
GE07mbh_01_u:094.093a: tasya tad duṣkaraṃ karma praśaśaṃsur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.093c: sametāś ca pṛthak caiva bhīṣmo 'yam iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:094.094a: tad dṛṣṭvā duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhīṣmeṇa śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:094.094b-0990_02: sa tena karmaṇā sūnoḥ prītas tasmai varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_01_u:094.094c: svacchandamaraṇaṃ tasmai dadau tuṣṭaḥ pitā svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:094.094d-0991_01: na te prabhavitā mṛtyur yāvad icchasi jīvitum
GE07mbh_01_u:094.094d-0992_01: tvatto hy anujñāṃ saṃprāpya mṛtyuḥ prabhavitānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:094.094d-0993_01: svena kāmena kartāsi nākāmas tvaṃ kathaṃ cana vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:095.001a: tato vivāhe nirvṛtte sa rājā śaṃtanur nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:095.002c: vīraś citrāṅgado nāma vīryeṇa manujān ati
GE07mbh_01_u:095.004c: sa rājā śaṃtanur dhīmān kāladharmam upeyivān
GE07mbh_01_u:095.005c: sthāpayām āsa vai rājye satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:095.006a: sa tu citrāṅgadaḥ śauryāt sarvāṃś cikṣepa pārthivān
GE07mbh_01_u:095.006c: manuṣyaṃ na hi mene sa kaṃ cit sadṛśam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:095.007a: taṃ kṣipantaṃ surāṃś caiva manuṣyān asurāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:095.007d-0995_01: tvaṃ vai sadṛśanāmāsi yuddhaṃ dehi nṛpātmaja
GE07mbh_01_u:095.007d-0995_02: nāma vānyat pragṛhṇīṣva yadi yuddhaṃ na dāsyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:095.007d-0995_03: tvayāhaṃ yuddham icchāmi tvatsakāśāt tu nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:095.007d-0995_04: āgato 'smi vṛthābhāṣyo na gacchen nāmato mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:095.007d-0995_05: ity uktvā garjamānau tau hiraṇyātīram āśritau
GE07mbh_01_u:095.007e: tenāsya sumahad yuddhaṃ kurukṣetre babhūva ha
GE07mbh_01_u:095.008c: nadyās tīre hiraṇvatyāḥ samās tisro 'bhavad raṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:095.010c: antāya kṛtvā gandharvo divam ācakrame tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:095.013a: vicitravīryas tu tadā bhīṣmasya vacane sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:095.014c: pūjayām āsa dharmeṇa sa cainaṃ pratyapālayat
GE07mbh_01_u:096.001a: hate citrāṅgade bhīṣmo bāle bhrātari cānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:096.001c: pālayām āsa tad rājyaṃ satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.003c: śuśrāva sahitā rājan vṛṇvatīr vai svayaṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.004a: tataḥ sa rathināṃ śreṣṭho rathenaikena varmabhṛt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.005c: dadarśa kanyās tāś caiva bhīṣmaḥ śaṃtanunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.005d-0997_02: vaṅgāḥ puṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāś ca te jagmus tāṃ purīṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:096.006a: kīrtyamāneṣu rājñāṃ tu nāmasv atha sahasraśaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.006b-0998_02: sodvegā iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā kanyāḥ paramaśobhanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.006b-0998_03: apākrāmanta tāḥ sarvā vṛddha ity eva cintayā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.006b-0998_07: brahmacārīti bhīṣmo hi vṛthaiva prathito bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:096.006b-0998_08: ity evaṃ prabruvantas te hasanti sma nṛpādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.006b-0998_09: kṣatriyāṇāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhīṣmaś cukrodha bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:096.006c: bhīṣmaḥ svayaṃ tadā rājan varayām āsa tāḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.007c: ratham āropya tāḥ kanyā bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.008a: āhūya dānaṃ kanyānāṃ guṇavadbhyaḥ smṛtaṃ budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.008c: alaṃkṛtya yathāśakti pradāya ca dhanāny api
GE07mbh_01_u:096.009a: prayacchanty apare kanyāṃ mithunena gavām api
GE07mbh_01_u:096.010a: pramattām upayānty anye svayam anye ca vindate
GE07mbh_01_u:096.010b-0999_01: ārṣaṃ vidhiṃ puraskṛtya dārān vindanti cāpare
GE07mbh_01_u:096.010c: aṣṭamaṃ tam atho vitta vivāhaṃ kavibhiḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.011a: svayaṃvaraṃ tu rājanyāḥ praśaṃsanty upayānti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:096.011c: pramathya tu hṛtām āhur jyāyasīṃ dharmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.012a: tā imāḥ pṛthivīpālā jihīrṣāmi balād itaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.012c: te yatadhvaṃ paraṃ śaktyā vijayāyetarāya vā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.013a: evam uktvā mahīpālān kāśirājaṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:096.013c: sarvāḥ kanyāḥ sa kauravyo ratham āropayat svakam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.013e: āmantrya ca sa tān prāyāc chīghraṃ kanyāḥ pragṛhya tāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.014a: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve samutpetur amarṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.015c: āmuñcatāṃ ca varmāṇi saṃbhramaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.016c: bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca śubhrāṇāṃ kavacānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.017a: savarmabhir bhūṣaṇais te drāg bhrājadbhir itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.019a: tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ teṣāṃ tasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:096.019c: ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.020a: te tv iṣūn daśasāhasrāṃs tasmai yugapad ākṣipan
GE07mbh_01_u:096.020c: aprāptāṃś caiva tān āśu bhīṣmaḥ sarvāṃs tadācchinat
GE07mbh_01_u:096.021a: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve sarvataḥ parivārayan
GE07mbh_01_u:096.022a: sa tad bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ śarair āvārya sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.022c: tataḥ sarvān mahīpālān pratyavidhyat tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.022d-1001_01: ekaikas tu tato bhīṣmaṃ rājan vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.022d-1001_02: sa ca tān prativivyādha dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ parākramī
GE07mbh_01_u:096.022d-1001_03: tad yuddham āsīt tumulaṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.022d-1001_05: sa dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:096.024c: kanyābhiḥ sahitaḥ prāyād bhārato bhāratān prati
GE07mbh_01_u:096.025a: tatas taṃ pṛṣṭhato rājañ śālvarājo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.026a: vāraṇaṃ jaghane nighnan dantābhyām aparo yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.027a: strīkāma tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti bhīṣmam āha sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.028d-1005_01: dahan yathā kṛṣṇagatiḥ kakṣaṃ vāteritaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.029c: nivartayām āsa rathaṃ śālvaṃ prati mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.030a: nivartamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_01_u:096.031a: tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntare
GE07mbh_01_u:096.031d-1006_01: tataḥ kruddhaḥ śāṃtanavo dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpam āgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.031d-1006_03: saṃspṛśaṃś ca dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ sajyaṃ kṛtvā nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.031d-1006_08: kanyārthaṃ vai tataḥ sālvaṃ prāvartata mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.031d-1006_09: tatas tu yuddham abhavat tadā rājan svayaṃvare
GE07mbh_01_u:096.031d-1006_10: bhīṣmasya caiva rājarṣeḥ sālvasyāpi tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:096.032d-1008_01: vivyādha ca tadā bhīṣmaṃ vāmapārśve stanāntare
GE07mbh_01_u:096.033a: pūrvam abhyarditaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaṃ śālvena te nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.033c: vismitāḥ samapadyanta sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:096.034a: lāghavaṃ tasya te dṛṣṭvā saṃyuge sarvapārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.035c: kruddhaḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmas tiṣṭha tiṣṭhety abhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:096.036a: sārathiṃ cābravīt kruddho yāhi yatraiṣa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.036c: yāvad enaṃ nihanmy adya bhujaṃgam iva pakṣirāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.036d-1009_01: tadvacaḥ sārathiḥ śrutvā yatra śālvas tato yayau
GE07mbh_01_u:096.036d-1010_01: na bhetavyaṃ tvayā sūta tasmāt sālvanṛpātmajāt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.036d-1010_02: paśyatas te vadhiṣyāmi sālveśaṃ paśya me balam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.036d-1010_03: patet tvayi śaraḥ kaś cin nāhaṃ sālvasya śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.037a: tato 'straṃ vāruṇaṃ samyag yojayām āsa kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.038a: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya śālvarājñaḥ sa kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.038f-1012_01: sālvas tu viratho rājan hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.038f-1012_02: nikṣipya ca dhanuḥ śrīmān bhūmau tiṣṭhad avāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.039f-1013_01: svarājyam anvaśāc caiva dharmeṇa nṛpatis tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.040c: svāny eva te 'pi rāṣṭrāṇi jagmuḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:096.040d-1014_01: te vanāni ca ramyāṇi śailāṃś ca saritas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.040d-1014_02: atikramya ca rājānaḥ svaṃ svaṃ rājyaṃ pracakramuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.041a: evaṃ vijitya tāḥ kanyā bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.041b-1015_01: nihatyājau nṛpān kāṃś cit kaś cid vidrāvya sainikān
GE07mbh_01_u:096.041b-1015_02: yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ nṛpāṇām apahṛtya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:096.041c: prayayau hāstinapuraṃ yatra rājā sa kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.041c-1016_02: atikramya ca rājānaḥ svaṃ svaṃ rājyaṃ pracakramuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.042c: vanāni saritaś caiva śailāṃś ca vividhadrumān
GE07mbh_01_u:096.044a: snuṣā iva sa dharmātmā bhaginya iva cānujāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.044c: yathā duhitaraś caiva pratigṛhya yayau kurūn
GE07mbh_01_u:096.045a: tāḥ sarvā guṇasaṃpannā bhrātā bhrātre yavīyase
GE07mbh_01_u:096.046e: satyavatyā saha mithaḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmavān
GE07mbh_01_u:096.047c: jyeṣṭhā tāsām idaṃ vākyam abravīd dha satī tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.048c: tena cāsmi vṛtā pūrvam eṣa kāmaś ca me pituḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.049c: etad vijñāya dharmajña tatas tvaṃ dharmam ācara
GE07mbh_01_u:096.050a: evam uktas tayā bhīṣmaḥ kanyayā viprasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_01_u:096.050c: cintām abhyagamad vīro yuktāṃ tasyaiva karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.050d-1019_01: anyāsaktā tv iyaṃ kanyā jyeṣṭhā kṣātre mayā jitā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.050d-1019_03: nirdiṣṭā tu parasyaiva sā tyājyā paracintanī
GE07mbh_01_u:096.051c: anujajñe tadā jyeṣṭām ambāṃ kāśipateḥ sutām
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0002: ambām anyasya kīrtyantīm abravīc cārudarśanām pratyakṣaphala evaiṣa kāmo 'sādhur nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0004: paratantropabhoge mām ārya nāyoktum arhasi pratiṣṭhitaḥ śaṃtanor vai tāta yasya tvam anvayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0006: akāmavṛtto dharmātman sādhu manye mataṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0007: ity uktvāmbāṃ samālokya vidhivad vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0008: visṛṣṭā hy asi gaccha tvaṃ yathākāmam anindite
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0010: anyabhāvagatāṃ cāpi ko nārīṃ vāsayed gṛhe
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0011: atas tvāṃ na niyokṣyāmi anyakāmāsi gamyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0012: aham apy ūrdhvaretā vai nivṛtto dārakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0013: na saṃbandhas tad āvābhyāṃ bhavitā vai kathaṃ cana ity uktā sā gatā tatra sakhībhiḥ parivāritā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0015: nirdiṣṭā hi śanai rājan sālvarājapuraṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0016: athāmbā sālvam āgamya sābravīn manasā vṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0017: purā nirdiṣṭabhāvā tvām āgatāsmi varānana devavrataṃ samutsṛjya sānujaṃ bharatarṣabham
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0019: pratigṛhṇīṣva bhadraṃ te vidhivan māṃ samudyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0020: tayaivam uktaḥ sālvo 'pi prahasann idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0021: nirjitāsīha bhīṣmeṇa māṃ vinirjitya rājasu anyena nirjitāṃ bhadre visṛṣṭāṃ tena cālayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0023: na gṛhṇāmi varārohe tatra caiva tu gamyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0024: ity uktā sā samāgamya bhīṣmaṃ punar athābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0025: ambābravīt tato bhīṣmaṃ tvayāhaṃ sahasā hṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0026: kṣatradharmam avekṣasva tvaṃ bhartā mama dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0027: yāṃ yaḥ svayaṃvare kanyāṃ nirjayec chauryasaṃpadā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0028: rājñaḥ sarvān vinirjitya sa tām udvāhayed dhruvam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0029: atas tvam eva bhartā me tvayāhaṃ nirjitā yataḥ tasmād vahasva māṃ bhīṣma nirjitāṃ saṃsadi tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0031: ūrdhvaretā hy aham iti pratyuvāca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0032: bhīṣmaṃ sā cābravīd ambā yathājaiṣīs tathā kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0033: evam anvagamad bhīṣmaṃ ṣaṭ samāḥ puṣkarekṣaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0035: tam eva sālvaṃ gaccha tvaṃ yaḥ purā manasā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0036: anyasaktaṃ kimarthaṃ tvam ātmānam avadaḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0037: anyasaktāṃ vadhūṃ kanyāṃ vāsayet svagṛhe na hi
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0038: nāham udvāhayiṣye tvāṃ mama bhrātre yavīyase
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0039: vicitravīryāya śubhe yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām iti bhūyaḥ sālvaṃ samabhyetya rājan gṛhṇīṣva mām iti
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0041: nāhaṃ gṛhṇāmy anyajitām iti sālvanirākṛtā ūrdhvaretās tv aham iti bhīṣmeṇa ca nirākṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0043: ambā bhīṣmaṃ punaḥ sālvaṃ bhīṣmaṃ sālvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ gamanāgamanenaivam anaiṣīt ṣaṭ samā nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0045: aśrubhir bhūmim ukṣantī śocantī sā manasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0049: sā tato dvādaśa samā bāhudāmabhito nadīm
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0050: pārśve himavato ramye tapo ghoraṃ samādade
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0051: saṃkṣiptakaraṇā tatra tapa āsthāya suvratā pādāṅguṣṭhena sātiṣṭhad akampanta tataḥ surāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0053: tasyās tat tu tapo dṛṣṭvā surāṇāṃ kṣobhakārakam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0054: vismitaś caiva hṛṣṭaś ca tasyānugrahabuddhimān anantaseno bhagavān kumāro varadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0056: mānayan rājaputrīṃ tāṃ dadau tasyai śubhāṃ srajam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0057: eṣā puṣkariṇī divyā yathāvat samupasthitā ambe tvacchokaśamanī mālā bhuvi bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0059: etāṃ caiva mayā dattāṃ mālāṃ yo dhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0060: so 'sya bhīṣmasya nidhane kāraṇaṃ vai bhaviṣyati anyapūrveti māṃ sālvo nābhinandati bāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0062: sāhaṃ dharmāc ca kāmāc ca vihīnā śokadhāriṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0063: apatiḥ kṣatriyān sarvān ākrandāmi samantataḥ iyaṃ vaḥ kṣatriyā mālā yā bhīṣmaṃ nihaniṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0065: ahaṃ ca bhāryā tasya syāṃ yo bhīṣmaṃ ghātayiṣyati tasyāś caṅkramyamāṇāyāḥ samāḥ pañca gatāḥ parāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0067: nābhavac charaṇaṃ kaś cit kṣatriyo bhīṣmajād bhayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0068: agacchat somakaṃ sāmbā pāñcāleṣu yaśasvinam satyasaṃdhaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ satyadharmaparāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0070: sā sabhādvāram āgamya pāñcālair abhirakṣitam pāñcālarājam ākrandat pragṛhya subhujā bhujau
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0072: bhīṣmeṇa hanyamānāṃ māṃ majjantīm iva ca hrade
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0074: tena me sarvadharmāś ca ratibhogāś ca kevalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0075: ubhau ca lokau kīrtiś ca samūlau saphalau hṛtau krośanty evaṃ na vindāmi rājanyaṃ śaraṇaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0078: samāgamya tu rājāno mayoktā rājasattamāḥ ikṣvākūṇāṃ tu ye vṛddhāḥ pāñcālānāṃ ca ye varāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0080: tvatprasādād vivāhe 'smin mā dharmo mā parājayet
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0081: prasīda yajñaseneha gatir me bhava somaka
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0082: jānāmi tvāṃ bodhayāmi rājaputri viśeṣataḥ yathāśakti yathādharmaṃ balaṃ saṃdhārayāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0084: anyasmāt pārthivād yat te bhayaṃ syāt pārthivātmaje
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0085: tasyāpanayane hetuṃ saṃvidhātum ahaṃ prabhuḥ na hi śāṃtanavasyāhaṃ mahāstrasya prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0088: sā sādhu vraja kalyāṇi na māṃ bhīṣmo dahed balāt
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0089: na hi bhīṣmād ahaṃ dharmaṃ śakto dātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0090: ity uktā srajam āsajya dvāri rājño vyapādravat
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0092: tām anvagacchad drupadaḥ sāntvaṃ jalpan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0093: srajaṃ gṛhāṇa kalyāṇi na no vairaṃ prasañjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0094: evam eva tvayā kāryam iti sma pratikāṅkṣate
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0095: na tu tasyānyathā bhāvo daivam etad amānuṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0096: yaś caināṃ srajam ādāya svayaṃ vai pratimokṣate
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0097: sa bhīṣmaṃ samare hantā mama dharmapraṇāśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0098: tāṃ srajaṃ drupado rājā kaṃ cit kālaṃ rarakṣa saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0099: tato visrambham āsthāya tūṣṇīm etām upaikṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0100: tāṃ śikhaṇḍiny abadhnāt tu bālā pitur avajñayā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0101: tāṃ pitā tv atyajac chīghraṃ trasto bhīṣmasya kilbiṣāt iṣīkaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhītā sābhyagacchat tapasvinam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0105: gaṅgādvāre vibhajanaṃ bhavitā nacirād iva tatra gandharvarājānaṃ tumburuṃ priyadarśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0107: ārādhayitum īhasva samyak paricarasva tam aham apy atra sācivyaṃ kartāsmi tava śobhane
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0109: taṃ tadācara bhadraṃ te sa te śreyo vidhāsyati tato vibhajanaṃ tatra gandharvāṇām avartata
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0112: tayor ekaḥ samīkṣyaināṃ strībubhūṣur uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0113: idaṃ gṛhṇīṣva puṃliṅgaṃ vṛṇe strīliṅgam eva te
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0114: niyamaṃ cakratus tatra strī pumāṃś caiva tāv ubhau tataḥ pumān samabhavac chikhaṇḍī paravīrahā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0116: strī bhūtvā hy apacakrāma sa gandharvo mudānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0117: labdhvā tu mahatīṃ prītiṃ yājñasenir mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0118: tato budbudakaṃ gatvā punar astrāṇi so 'karot
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0119: tatra cāstrāṇi divyāni kṛtvā sa sumahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0122: uvāca bhavatā bhīṣmān na bhetavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0123: ambāyāṃ nirgatāyāṃ tu bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:096.053e-055_0124: nyāyena kārayām āsa rājño vaivāhikīṃ kriyām
GE07mbh_01_u:096.055a: ātmanaḥ pratirūpo 'sau labdhaḥ patir iti sthite
GE07mbh_01_u:096.055c: vicitravīryaṃ kalyāṇaṃ pūjayām āsatus tu te
GE07mbh_01_u:096.055d-1020_01: anyonyaṃ prītisakte ca ekabhāvāv iva sthite
GE07mbh_01_u:096.057a: tābhyāṃ saha samāḥ sapta viharan pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:096.059e: ṛtvigbhiḥ sahito bhīṣmaḥ sarvaiś ca kurupuṃgavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.001c: putrasya kṛtvā kāryāṇi snuṣābhyāṃ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:097.001d-1022_01: samāśvāsya snuṣe te ca bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:097.001d-1023_01: mātā satyavatī bhīṣmam uvāca vadatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:097.002a: dharmaṃ ca pitṛvaṃśaṃ ca mātṛvaṃśaṃ ca māninī
GE07mbh_01_u:097.002d-1024_01: duḥkhārditā tu śokena majjantīva ca sāgare
GE07mbh_01_u:097.003c: tvayi piṇḍaś ca kīrtiś ca saṃtānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:097.003d-1025_01: bhrātā vicitravīryas te bhūtānām antam eyivān
GE07mbh_01_u:097.004a: yathā karma śubhaṃ kṛtvā svargopagamanaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_01_u:097.004c: yathā cāyur dhruvaṃ satye tvayi dharmas tathā dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.005a: vettha dharmāṃś ca dharmajña samāsenetareṇa ca
GE07mbh_01_u:097.005c: vividhās tvaṃ śrutīr vettha vettha vedāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.006a: vyavasthānaṃ ca te dharme kulācāraṃ ca lakṣaye
GE07mbh_01_u:097.007a: tasmāt subhṛśam āśvasya tvayi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:097.007c: kārye tvāṃ viniyokṣyāmi tac chrutvā kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:097.008a: mama putras tava bhrātā vīryavān supriyaś ca te
GE07mbh_01_u:097.008c: bāla eva gataḥ svargam aputraḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:097.009a: ime mahiṣyau bhrātus te kāśirājasute śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:097.011c: dārāṃś ca kuru dharmeṇa mā nimajjīḥ pitāmahān
GE07mbh_01_u:097.011d-1028_01: agnihotraṃ trayo vedāḥ saṃtānam api cākṣayam
GE07mbh_01_u:097.012a: tathocyamāno mātrā ca suhṛdbhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.012c: pratyuvāca sa dharmātmā dharmyam evottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.013a: asaṃśayaṃ paro dharmas tvayā mātar udāhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.013c: tvam apatyaṃ prati ca me pratijñāṃ vettha vai parām
GE07mbh_01_u:097.013d-1029_02: bhavatyā matam ājñāya kṛtam etad vrataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:097.014c: sa satyavati satyaṃ te pratijānāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.015a: parityajeyaṃ trailokyaṃ rājyaṃ deveṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.015c: yad vāpy adhikam etābhyāṃ na tu satyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:097.016a: tyajec ca pṛthivī gandham āpaś ca rasam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.016c: jyotis tathā tyajed rūpaṃ vāyuḥ sparśaguṇaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_01_u:097.017c: tyajec chabdaṃ tathākāśaḥ somaḥ śītāṃśutāṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_01_u:097.018a: vikramaṃ vṛtrahā jahyād dharmaṃ jahyāc ca dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.018c: na tv ahaṃ satyam utsraṣṭuṃ vyavaseyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:097.018d-1030_01: tan na jātv anyathā kāryaṃ lokānām api saṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_01_u:097.020a: jānāmi te sthitiṃ satye parāṃ satyaparākrama
GE07mbh_01_u:097.020c: icchan sṛjethās trīṃl lokān anyāṃs tvaṃ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_01_u:097.021a: jānāmi caiva satyaṃ tan madarthaṃ yad abhāṣathāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.022a: yathā te kulatantuś ca dharmaś ca na parābhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:097.022c: suhṛdaś ca prahṛṣyeraṃs tathā kuru paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:097.022d-1031_01: ātmanaś ca hitaṃ tāta priyaṃ ca mama bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:097.023c: dharmād apetaṃ bruvatīṃ bhīṣmo bhūyo 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_01_u:097.024a: rājñi dharmān avekṣasva mā naḥ sarvān vyanīnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:097.024c: satyāc cyutiḥ kṣatriyasya na dharmeṣu praśasyate
GE07mbh_01_u:097.025a: śaṃtanor api saṃtānaṃ yathā syād akṣayaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:097.025c: tat te dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi kṣātraṃ rājñi sanātanam
GE07mbh_01_u:097.026a: śrutvā taṃ pratipadyethāḥ prājñaiḥ saha purohitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.001e: śatāni daśa bāhūnāṃ nikṛttāny arjunasya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:098.002a: punaś ca dhanur ādāya mahāstrāṇi pramuñcatā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.002c: nirdagdhaṃ kṣatram asakṛd rathena jayatā mahīm
GE07mbh_01_u:098.003d-1034_01: evaṃ niḥkṣatriye loke kṛte tena maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.005c: dharmaṃ manasi saṃsthāpya brāhmaṇāṃs tāḥ samabhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.005f-1035_01: tataḥ punaḥ samuditaṃ kṣatraṃ samabhavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.006a: athotathya iti khyāta āsīd dhīmān ṛṣiḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.008a: uvāca mamatā taṃ tu devaraṃ vadatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:098.009a: ayaṃ ca me mahābhāga kukṣāv eva bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_01_u:098.010a: amogharetās tvaṃ cāpi nūnaṃ bhavitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:098.011a: evam uktas tayā samyag bṛhattejā bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.012a: saṃbabhūva tataḥ kāmī tayā sārdham akāmayā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.012c: utsṛjantaṃ tu taṃ retaḥ sa garbhastho 'bhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013a: bhos tāta kanyasa vade dvayor nāsty atra saṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013c: amoghaśukraś ca bhavān pūrvaṃ cāham ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013d-1036_01: amogharetāś ca bhavān na pīḍāṃ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013d-1036_02: aśrutvaiva tu tad vākyaṃ garbhasthasya bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013d-1036_04: śukrotsargaṃ tato buddhvā tasyā garbhagato muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013d-1036_05: padbhyām ārodhayan mārgaṃ śukrasya ca bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013d-1036_06: sthānam aprāptam atha tac chukraṃ pratihataṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.013d-1036_07: papāta sahasā bhūmau tataḥ kruddho bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.014a: śaśāpa taṃ tataḥ kruddha evam ukto bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.015a: yasmāt tvam īdṛśe kāle sarvabhūtepsite sati
GE07mbh_01_u:098.015c: evam āttha vacas tasmāt tamo dīrghaṃ pravekṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:098.016a: sa vai dīrghatamā nāma śāpād ṛṣir ajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:098.016d-1037_01: jātyandho vedavit prājñaḥ patnīṃ lebhe svavidyayā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017a: sa putrāñ janayām āsa gautamādīn mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-1038_02: godharmaṃ saurabheyāc ca so 'dhītya nikhilaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-1038_03: prāvartata tathā kartuṃ śraddhāvāṃs tam aśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-1038_07: tasmād enaṃ vayaṃ sarve pāpātmānaṃ tyajāmahe
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-1038_08: ity anyonyaṃ samābhāṣya te dīrghatamasaṃ munim patnī
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0001: putralābhāc ca sā patnī na tutoṣa patiṃ tadā pradviṣantīṃ patir bhāryāṃ kiṃ māṃ dveṣṭīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0003: patir bhāryānubharaṇād bhartā ceti prakīrtyate ahaṃ tvāṃ bharaṇaṃ kṛtvā jātyandhaṃ sasutā sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0005: nityakālaṃ śrameṇārtā na bhareyaṃ mahātapaḥ tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣiḥ kopasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0007: pratyuvāca tataḥ patnīṃ pradveṣīṃ sasutāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0008: nīyatāṃ kṣatriyakule dhanārthī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi tvayā dattaṃ dhanaṃ vipra neccheyaṃ duḥkhakārakam
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0010: yatheṣṭaṃ kuru viprendra na bhareyaṃ yathā purā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0011: adya prabhṛti maryādā mayā loke pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0012: eka eva patir nāryā yāvajjīvaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0013: mṛte jīvati vā tasmin nāparaṃ prāpnuyān naram
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0014: abhigamya paraṃ nārī patiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0015: apatīnāṃ tu nārīṇām adya prabhṛti pātakam
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0016: yady asti ced dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vṛthābhogā bhavantu tāḥ akīrtiḥ parivādaś ca nityakālaṃ bhavantu vai
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0018: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇī bhṛśakopitā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.017d-056_0019: gaṅgām ānīyatām eṣa putrā ity evam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:098.019a: na syād andhaś ca vṛddhaś ca bhartavyo 'yam iti sma te
GE07mbh_01_u:098.019b-1039_01: karmaṇy atha tataḥ krūre teṣāṃ buddhir ajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:098.019c: cintayitvā tataḥ krūrāḥ pratijagmur atho gṛhān
GE07mbh_01_u:098.020a: so 'nusrotas tadā rājan plavamāna ṛṣis tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.020c: jagāma subahūn deśān andhas tenoḍupena ha
GE07mbh_01_u:098.021a: taṃ tu rājā balir nāma sarvadharmaviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.022c: jñātvā cainaṃ sa vavre 'tha putrārthaṃ manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:098.022d-1040_01: taṃ pūjayitvā rājarṣir viśrāntaṃ munim abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:098.024a: evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī taṃ tathety uktavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.024c: tasmai sa rājā svāṃ bhāryāṃ sudeṣṇāṃ prāhiṇot tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.025a: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca taṃ matvā na sā devī jagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:098.025c: svāṃ tu dhātreyikāṃ tasmai vṛddhāya prāhiṇot tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:098.026a: tasyāṃ kākṣīvadādīn sa śūdrayonāv ṛṣir vaśī
GE07mbh_01_u:098.026c: janayām āsa dharmātmā putrān ekādaśaiva tu
GE07mbh_01_u:098.027a: kākṣīvadādīn putrāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā sarvān adhīyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.027b-1041_01: mudā ca tān balī rājā dṛṣṭvā kakṣīvadādikān
GE07mbh_01_u:098.027c: uvāca tam ṛṣiṃ rājā mamaita iti vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:098.028a: nety uvāca maharṣis taṃ mamaivaita iti bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:098.029a: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ matvā sudeṣṇā mahiṣī tava
GE07mbh_01_u:098.029c: avamanya dadau mūḍhā śūdrāṃ dhātreyikāṃ hi me
GE07mbh_01_u:098.030a: tataḥ prasādayām āsa punas tam ṛṣisattamam
GE07mbh_01_u:098.030c: baliḥ sudeṣṇāṃ bhāryāṃ ca tasmai tāṃ prāhiṇot punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.031a: tāṃ sa dīrghatamāṅgeṣu spṛṣṭvā devīm athābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:098.031c: bhaviṣyati kumāras te tejasvī satyavāg iti
GE07mbh_01_u:098.032b-1042_01: aṅgo vaṅgaḥ kaliṅgaś ca puṇḍraḥ suhmaś ca te sutāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.032b-1042_03: aṅgasyāṅgo 'bhavad deśo vaṅgo vaṅgasya ca smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.032b-1042_04: kaliṅgaviṣayaś caiva kaliṅgasya ca sa smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.032b-1042_05: puṇḍrasya puṇḍrāḥ prakhyātāḥ suhmāḥ suhmasya ca smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.032b-1042_06: evaṃ baleḥ purā vaṃśaḥ prakhyāto vai maharṣijaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:098.032c: evam anye maheṣvāsā brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyā bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:098.033c: etac chrutvā tvam apy atra mātaḥ kuru yathepsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:099.001c: vakṣyāmi niyataṃ mātas tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003c: vihasantīva savrīḍam idaṃ vacanam abravīt satyavatī
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0001: bhīṣmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā dharmyaṃ hetvarthasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0002: mātā satyavatī bhīṣmaṃ punar evābhyabhāṣata aucathyam adhikṛtyedam aṅgaṃ ca yad udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0004: paurāṇī śrutir ity eṣā prāptakālam idaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0005: tvaṃ hi putra kulasyāsya jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca bhārata yathā ca te pitur vākyaṃ mama kāryaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0007: mama putras tava bhrātā yavīyān supriyaś ca te
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0008: bāla eva gataḥ svargaṃ bhārato bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0009: ime mahiṣyau tasyeha kāśirājasute ubhe rūpayauvanasaṃpanne putrakāme ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0011: dharmam etat paraṃ jñātvā saṃtānāya kulasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0012: ābhyāṃ mama niyogāt tu dharmaṃ caritum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0013: asaṃśayaṃ paro dharmas tvayā mātaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0014: tvam apy etāṃ pratijñāṃ tu vettha yā paramā mayi
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0015: jānīṣe yat tadā vṛttaṃ śulkahetos tvadantare
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0016: tat satyavati satyaṃ vai punar eva bravīmi te tan na jātv anyathā kāryaṃ lokānām api saṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0018: parityajeyaṃ trailokyaṃ rājyaṃ deveṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0019: yad vābhyadhikam etābhyāṃ na tu satyaṃ parityaje
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0020: tyajec ca pṛthivī gandham āpaś ca rasam uttamam jyotiś ca paramaṃ rūpaṃ vāyuḥ sparśaguṇaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0022: tyajec ca ghoṣam ākāśaḥ somaḥ śītatvam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0023: prabhāṃ samutsṛjed arko dhūmaketur athoṣṇatām vṛtrahā vikramaṃ jahyād dharmaṃ jahyāc ca dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0025: amaratvasya vā hetos trailokyasadanasya vā utsṛjeyam ahaṃ prāṇān na tu satyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0027: jānāmi tvayi dharmajña satyaṃ satyavatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0028: icchaṃs tvam iha lokāṃs trīn sṛjer anyān ariṃdama yathā tu vaḥ kulaṃ caiva dharmaś ca na parābhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0030: suhṛdaś ca suhṛṣṭāḥ syus tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi tvam eva kulavṛddhāsi gauravaṃ tu paraṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0032: sopāyaṃ kulasaṃtāne vaktum arhasi naḥ param
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0033: striyo hi paramaṃ guhyaṃ dhārayanti kule kule
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0034: puruṣāṃś cāpi māyābhir bahvībhir upagṛhṇate sā satyavati saṃpaśya dharmaṃ satyaparāyaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:099.003d-057_0036: yathā na jahyāṃ satyaṃ ca na sīdec ca kulaṃ hi naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.004a: satyam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:099.004c: viśvāsāt te pravakṣyāmi saṃtānāya kulasya ca vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.004d-1043_01: evam uktvā tato bhīṣmaṃ taṃ mātā pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:099.004d-1043_02: rocate me vacas tubhyaṃ mamāpi vacanaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_01_u:099.004e: na te śakyam anākhyātum āpad dhīyaṃ tathāvidhā
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005a: tvam eva naḥ kule dharmas tvaṃ satyaṃ tvaṃ parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005b-1044_01: yat tvaṃ vakṣyasi tat kāryam asmābhir iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005b-1045_01: yan me bālye purā vṛttaṃ kumāryās tac chṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005c: tasmān niśamya vākyaṃ me kuruṣva yad anantaram
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005d-1046_01: śṛṇu bhīṣma vaco mahyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005d-1046_02: na ca visrambhakathitaṃ bhavān sūcitum arhati
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005d-1046_03: yas tu rājā vasur nāma śrutas te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005d-1046_04: tasya śuklād ahaṃ matsyā dhṛtā kukṣau purā kila
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005d-1046_05: mātaraṃ me jalād dhṛtvā dāśaḥ paramadharmavit
GE07mbh_01_u:099.005d-1046_06: māṃ tu svagṛham ānīya duhitṛtve hy akalpayat
GE07mbh_01_u:099.006a: dharmayuktasya dharmātman pitur āsīt tarī mama
GE07mbh_01_u:099.006c: sā kadā cid ahaṃ tatra gatā prathamayauvane
GE07mbh_01_u:099.007c: ājagāma tarīṃ dhīmāṃs tariṣyan yamunāṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_01_u:099.008a: sa tāryamāṇo yamunāṃ mām upetyābravīt tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:099.008d-1048_01: uktvā janmakulaṃ mahyaṃ nāsi dāśasuteti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:099.009a: tam ahaṃ śāpabhītā ca pitur bhītā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:099.009c: varair asulabhair uktā na pratyākhyātum utsahe
GE07mbh_01_u:099.009d-1049_01: prekṣya tāṃs tu mahābhāgān pare pāre ṛṣīn sthitān
GE07mbh_01_u:099.009d-1049_05: uktamātro mayā tatra nīhāram asṛjat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.010a: abhibhūya sa māṃ bālāṃ tejasā vaśam ānayat
GE07mbh_01_u:099.010c: tamasā lokam āvṛtya naugatām eva bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011a: matsyagandho mahān āsīt purā mama jugupsitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011c: tam apāsya śubhaṃ gandham imaṃ prādāt sa me muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011d-1050_01: kanyātvaṃ ca dadau prītaḥ punar vidvāṃs tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011d-1050_02: tasya vīryam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā yuktaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011d-1050_03: vismitā vyathitā caiva prādām ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011d-1050_05: kṛtvā vivāhaṃ me sarve pratijagmur yathāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011d-1050_06: tatas tadā mahātmā sa kanyāyāṃ mayi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011d-1051_01: himaṃ caivāsṛjad dhīmān dvīpaṃ ca yamunāmbhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:099.011d-1052_01: tataḥ pitā vasuś caiva pitaraś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.012a: tato mām āha sa munir garbham utsṛjya māmakam
GE07mbh_01_u:099.012c: dvīpe 'syā eva saritaḥ kanyaiva tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:099.012d-1053_01: evam uktvā gataḥ so 'tha ṛṣiḥ paramadharmavit
GE07mbh_01_u:099.012d-1053_02: mamāpi prasavo jātas tatkṣaṇād eva bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:099.013a: pārāśaryo mahāyogī sa babhūva mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.013c: kanyāputro mama purā dvaipāyana iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.014a: yo vyasya vedāṃś caturas tapasā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.014c: loke vyāsatvam āpede kārṣṇyāt kṛṣṇatvam eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:099.015b-1054_01: sadyotpannaḥ sa tu mahān saha pitrā tato gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:099.015c: sa niyukto mayā vyaktaṃ tvayā ca amitadyute
GE07mbh_01_u:099.016a: sa hi mām uktavāṃs tatra smareḥ kṛtyeṣu mām iti
GE07mbh_01_u:099.016c: taṃ smariṣye mahābāho yadi bhīṣma tvam icchasi
GE07mbh_01_u:099.016d-1055_01: tava cānumate kāmam ābhyām utpādayet prajāḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:102.015d-1106_06: gataḥ pāraṃ yadā pāṇḍus tadā senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:102.015d-1106_07: (23) dhṛtarāṣṭras tv acakṣuṣṭvād rājyaṃ na pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:102.015d-1106_08: (23) avaratvāc ca viduraḥ pāṇḍuś cāsīn mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:102.015d-1106_13: (21) pranaṣṭaḥ śaṃtanor vaṃśaḥ bhīṣmeṇa punar uddhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:102.015d-1106_14: (21) tato nirvacanaṃ satsu tad idaṃ paripaṭhyate
GE07mbh_01_u:102.019c: aty anyān balavān āsīd dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:102.020a: triṣu lokeṣu na tv āsīt kaś cid vidurasaṃmitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:102.020c: dharmanityas tato rājan dharme ca paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:102.021a: pranaṣṭaṃ śaṃtanor vaṃśaṃ samīkṣya punar uddhṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:102.023a: dhṛtarāṣṭras tv acakṣuṣṭvād rājyaṃ na pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:102.023c: karaṇatvāc ca viduraḥ pāṇḍur āsīn mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:102.023d-1109_01: tataḥ kāle bahutithe bhīṣmo viduram abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:103.001a: guṇaiḥ samuditaṃ samyag idaṃ naḥ prathitaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_01_u:103.002c: notsādam agamac cedaṃ kadā cid iha naḥ kulam
GE07mbh_01_u:103.003a: mayā ca satyavatyā ca kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:103.004a: vardhate tad idaṃ putra kulaṃ sāgaravad yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:103.004c: tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ tvayā caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:103.005a: śrūyate yādavī kanyā anurūpā kulasya naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:103.006a: kulīnā rūpavatyaś ca nāthavatyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:103.007a: manye varayitavyās tā ity ahaṃ dhīmatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:103.007c: saṃtānārthaṃ kulasyāsya yad vā vidura manyase
GE07mbh_01_u:103.008a: bhavān pitā bhavān mātā bhavān naḥ paramo guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:103.008c: tasmāt svayaṃ kulasyāsya vicārya kuru yad dhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:103.009e: gāndhārī kila putrāṇāṃ śataṃ lebhe varaṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_01_u:103.010a: iti śrutvā ca tattvena bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:103.011c: kulaṃ khyātiṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca buddhyā tu prasamīkṣya saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:103.012a: gāndhārī tv api śuśrāva dhṛtarāṣṭram acakṣuṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:103.012c: ātmānaṃ ditsitaṃ cāsmai pitrā mātrā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:103.013a: tataḥ sā paṭṭam ādāya kṛtvā bahuguṇaṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_01_u:103.013e: nātyaśnīyāṃ patim aham ity evaṃ kṛtaniścayā
GE07mbh_01_u:103.014c: svasāraṃ parayā lakṣmyā yuktām ādāya kauravān
GE07mbh_01_u:103.015a: dattvā sa bhaginīṃ vīro yathārhaṃ ca paricchadam
GE07mbh_01_u:103.016c: tuṣṭiṃ kurūṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ janayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:103.016d-1112_01: gāndhārī sā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā prajñācakṣuṣam īśvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:103.016d-1112_02: aticārād bhṛśaṃ bhītā bhartuḥ sā samacintayat
GE07mbh_01_u:103.016d-1112_03: sā dṛṣṭivinivṛttāpi bhartuś ca samatāṃ yayau
GE07mbh_01_u:103.016d-1112_04: na hi sūkṣme 'py atīcāre bhartuḥ sā vavṛte tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:103.017d-1113_01: tasyāḥ sahodarāḥ kanyāḥ punar eva dadau daśa
GE07mbh_01_u:103.017d-1113_04: tejaḥśravāṃ suśravāṃ ca tathaiva nikṛtiṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_01_u:103.017d-1113_05: śaṃbhuvāṃ ca daśārṇāṃ ca gāndhārīr daśa viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:103.017d-1113_07: tataḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo dhanuṣkrītās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.001c: tasya kanyā pṛthā nāma rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:104.005a: nigūḍhaniścayaṃ dharme yaṃ taṃ durvāsasaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.007a: yaṃ yaṃ devaṃ tvam etena mantreṇāvāhayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:104.007c: tasya tasya prasādena putras tava bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.008a: tathoktā sā tu vipreṇa tena kautūhalāt tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.008b-1116_01: raves tasya parīkṣārthaṃ kuntī kanyāpi bhāskaram
GE07mbh_01_u:104.008c: kanyā satī devam arkam ājuhāva yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:104.008d-1117_01: tato ghanāntaraṃ kṛtvā svamārgaṃ tapanas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.008d-1117_02: upatasthe sa tāṃ kanyāṃ pṛthāṃ pṛthulalocanām
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009a: sā dadarśa tam āyāntaṃ bhāskaraṃ lokabhāvanam
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009c: vismitā cānavadyāṅgī dṛṣṭvā tan mahad adbhutam kunty uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058x0011: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca tāṃ samāsādya devas tu vivasvān idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0002: ayam asmy asitāpāṅge brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0003: kaś cin me brahmavit prādād varaṃ vidyāṃ ca śatruhan
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0004: yad vijijñāsayāhvānaṃ kṛtavaty asmi te vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0005: tad asminn aparādhe tvāṃ śirasābhiprasādaye yoṣito hi sadā rakṣyāḥ svaparāddhāpi nityadā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0007: vedāhaṃ sarvam evaitad yad durvāsā dadau tava
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0008: saṃtyajyobhe mānabhaye kriyatāṃ saṃgamo mayā amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mahyam āhūtaś cāsmi te śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0010: vṛthāhvānād dhi te bhīru doṣo hi syād asaṃśayam saivam uktā bahuvidhaṃ sāntvaṃ krūraṃ vivasvatā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0012: sā tu naicchad varārohā kanyāham iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0013: bandhupakṣabhayād bhītā lajjayā ca tapasvinī tām arkaḥ punar evedam abravīd bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-058_0015: matprasādān na te rājñi bhavitā doṣa ity uta evam uktvā tu bhagavān kuntibhojasutāṃ tadā sūryaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0001: sābravīd bhagavan kas tvaṃ prādurbhūto mamāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0003: viddhi māṃ putralābhāya devam arkaṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0004: putras te nirmitaḥ subhru śṛṇu yādṛk śubhānane
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0005: āditye kuṇḍale bibhrat kavacaṃ caiva māmakam
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0006: śastrāstrāṇām abhedyaṃ ca bhaviṣyati śucismite nāsya kiṃ cid adeyaṃ ca brāhmaṇebhyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0008: codyamāno mayā cāpi na kṣamaṃ cintayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0009: dāsyate sa hi viprebhyo mānī caiva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0010: evam uktā tataḥ kuntī gopatiṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0011: kanyā pitṛvaśā cāhaṃ puruṣārtho na caiva me
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0012: yady evaṃ manyase bhīru kim āhvayasi bhāskaram
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0013: yadi mām avajānāsi ṛṣiḥ sa na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0014: mantradānena yasya tvam avalepena darpitā kulaṃ ca te 'dya dhakṣyāmi krodhadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0016: prasīda bhagavan mahyam avalepo hi nāsti me
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0017: mamaiva parihāryaṃ syāt kanyābhāvasya dūṣaṇam vyapayātu bhayaṃ te 'dya kumāraṃ prasamīkṣyase
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0019: mayā tvaṃ cāpy anujñātā punaḥ kanyā bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:104.009d-059_0020: evam uktā tataḥ kuntī saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhā saṃgatā ca tataḥ subhrūr ādityena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.010a: prakāśakarmā tapanas tasyāṃ garbhaṃ dadhau tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.012a: prādāc ca tasyāḥ kanyātvaṃ punaḥ sa paramadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.012c: dattvā ca dadatāṃ śreṣṭho divam ācakrame tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.012d-1120_01: dṛṣṭvā kumāraṃ jātaṃ sā vārṣṇeyī dīnamānasā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.012d-1120_02: ekāgrā cintayām āsa kiṃ kṛtvā sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:104.013c: utsasarja jale kuntī taṃ kumāraṃ salakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:104.014a: tam utsṛṣṭaṃ tadā garbhaṃ rādhābhartā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.015a: nāmadheyaṃ ca cakrāte tasya bālasya tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_01_u:104.015c: vasunā saha jāto 'yaṃ vasuṣeṇo bhavatv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:104.016b-1121_01: loke caiva hi vikhyātaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.016c: ā pṛṣṭhatāpād ādityam upatasthe sa vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017a: yasmin kāle japann āste sa vīraḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017c: nādeyaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv āsīt tasmin kāle mahātmanaḥ karṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0001: tataḥ kāle tu kasmiṃś cit svapnānte karṇam abravīt ādityo brāhmaṇo bhūtvā śṛṇu vīra vaco mama
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0003: prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tvām āgamiṣyati vāsavaḥ na tasya bhikṣā dātavyā viprarūpī bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0006: atas tvāṃ bodhayāmy eṣa smartāsi vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0007: śakro māṃ viprarūpeṇa yadi vai yācate dvija
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0008: kathaṃ tasmai na dāsyāmi yathā cāsmy avabodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0009: viprāḥ pūjyās tu devānāṃ satataṃ priyam icchatām
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0010: taṃ devadevaṃ jānan vai na śaknomy avamantraṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0011: yady evaṃ śṛṇu me vīra varaṃ te so 'pi dāsyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0012: śaktiṃ tvam api yācethāḥ sarvaśatruvighātinīm evam uktvā dvijaḥ svapne tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_01_u:104.017d-060_0014: karṇaḥ prabuddhas taṃ svapnaṃ cintayāno 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:104.018a: tam indro brāhmaṇo bhūtvā bhikṣārthaṃ bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.018c: kuṇḍale prārthayām āsa kavacaṃ ca mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.018d-1122_01: evam uktas tadā karṇo brāhmaṇena mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.018d-1123_01: karṇaḥ[tu] kuṇḍale bhittvā prāyacchat sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.019c: karṇas tu kuṇḍale chittvā prāyacchat sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.019d-1124_01: pratigṛhya tu deveśas tuṣṭas tenāsya karmaṇā karṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:104.019d-1125_01: aho sāhasam ity āha manasā vāsavo hasan
GE07mbh_01_u:104.019d-1125_03: na taṃ paśyāmi yo hy etat karma kartā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.019d-1125_04: prīto 'smi karmaṇā tena varaṃ vṛṇu yad icchasi
GE07mbh_01_u:104.020a: śaktiṃ tasmai dadau śakraḥ vismito vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:104.020e: yasmai kṣepsyasi ruṣṭaḥ san so 'nayā na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.020f-1127_01: hatvaikaṃ samare śatruṃ tato mām āgamiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:104.020f-1128_01: ity uktvāntardadhe śakro varaṃ dattvā tu tasya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:104.021a: purā nāma tu tasyāsīd vasuṣeṇa iti śrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:104.021c: tato vaikartanaḥ karṇaḥ karmaṇā tena so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:105.001d-1129_02: nāvṛṇvan pārthivāḥ ke cid atīva strīguṇair yutām
GE07mbh_01_u:105.001d-1129_05: tataḥ sā raṅgamadhyasthaṃ teṣāṃ rājñāṃ manasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:105.002b-1130_01: patiṃ vavre maheṣvāsaṃ pāṇḍuṃ kuntī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:105.002b-1131_01: ādityam iva sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ pracchādya vai prabhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.002b-1131_06: vrīḍamānā srajaṃ kuntī rājñaḥ skandhe samāsṛjat
GE07mbh_01_u:105.002b-1131_07: taṃ niśamya vṛtaṃ pāṇḍuṃ kuntyā sarve narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.002b-1131_08: yathāgataṃ samājagmur gajair aśvai rathais tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:105.002b-1131_09: tatas tasyāḥ pitā rājann udvāham akarot prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.004c: viśrutā triṣu lokeṣu mādrī madrapateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_01_u:105.005c: pāṇḍor arthe parikrītā dhanena mahatā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:105.005e: vivāhaṃ kārayām āsa bhīṣmaḥ pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.006c: pāṇḍuṃ dṛṣṭvā naravyāghraṃ vyasmayanta narā bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0000: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca kuntyāḥ pāṇḍoś ca rājendra kuntibhojo mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0002: kṛtvodvāhaṃ tadā taṃ tu nānāvasubhir arcitam
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0003: svapuraṃ preṣayām āsa sa rājā kurusattamam
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0005: stūyamānaḥ sa cāśībhir brāhmaṇaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0006: saṃprāpya nagaraṃ rājā pāṇḍuḥ kauravanandanaḥ nyaveśayata tāṃ bhāryāṃ kuntīṃ svabhavane prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0008: tataḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo rājñaḥ pāṇḍor yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0010: so 'mātyaiḥ sthaviraiḥ sārdhaṃ brāhmaṇaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ balena caturaṅgena yayau madrapateḥ puram
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0014: dattvā tasyāsanaṃ śubhraṃ pādyam arghyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0016: taṃ bhīṣmaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ madrarājaṃ kurūdvahaḥ āgataṃ māṃ vijānīhi varārthinam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0018: śrūyate bhavataḥ sādhvī svasā mādrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0019: tām ahaṃ varayiṣyāmi pāṇḍor arthe yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0020: yuktarūpo hi saṃbandhe tvaṃ no rājan vayaṃ tava etat saṃcintya madreśa gṛhāṇāsmān yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0023: na hi me 'nyo varas tvattaḥ śreyān iti matir mama
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0024: pūrvaiḥ pravartitaṃ kiṃ cit kule 'smin nṛpasattamaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0025: sādhu vā yadi vāsādhu tan nātikrāntum utsahe
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0026: vyaktaṃ tad bhavataś cāpi viditaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0027: na ca yuktaṃ tathā vaktuṃ bhavān dehīti sattama kuladharmaḥ sa no vīra pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0029: tena tvāṃ na bravīmy etad asaṃdigdhaṃ vaco 'rihan
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0030: taṃ bhīṣmaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ madrarājaṃ mahāmatiḥ dharma eṣa paro rājan svayam uktaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0032: nātra kaś cana doṣo 'sti pūrvair vidhir ayaṃ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0033: viditeyaṃ ca te śalya maryādā sādhusaṃmatā
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0034: ity uktvā sa mahātejāḥ śātakumbhaṃ kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0035: ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi śalyāyādāt sahasraśaḥ gajān aśvān rathāṃś caiva vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0037: maṇimuktāpravālaṃ ca gāṅgeyo vyasṛjac chubham tat pragṛhya dhanaṃ sarvaṃ śalyaḥ saṃprītamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0039: dadau tāṃ samalaṃkṛtya svasāraṃ kauravarṣabhe sa tāṃ mādrīm upādāya bhīṣmaḥ sāgaragāsutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0041: ājagāma puraṃ dhīmān praviṣṭo gajasāhvayam tata iṣṭe 'hani prāpte muhūrte sādhusaṃmate
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0043: jagrāha vidhivat pāṇiṃ mādryāḥ pāṇḍur narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0044: tato vivāhe nirvṛtte sa rājā kurunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0045: sthāpayām āsa tāṃ bhāryāṃ śubhe veśmani bhāvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0046: sa tābhyāṃ vyacarat sārdhaṃ bhāryābhyāṃ rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0047: kuntyā mādryā ca rājendro yathākāmaṃ yathāsukham
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0048: tataḥ sa kauravo rājā vihṛtya tridaśā niśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0049: jigīṣayā mahīṃ pāṇḍur niścakrāma purāt prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0050: sa bhīṣmapramukhān vṛddhān abhivādya praṇamya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0051: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca kauravyaṃ tathānyān kurusattamān āmantrya prayayau rājā taiś caivābhyanumoditaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.007d-061_0055: sa rājā devarājābho vijigīṣur vasuṃdharām hṛṣṭapuṣṭabalaḥ prāyāt pāṇḍuḥ śatrūn anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.008a: pūrvam āgaskṛto gatvā daśārṇāḥ samare jitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.011a: tataḥ kośaṃ samādāya vāhanāni balāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:105.011c: pāṇḍunā mithilāṃ gatvā videhāḥ samare jitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.015a: tena te nirjitāḥ sarve pṛthivyāṃ sarvapārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.015c: tam ekaṃ menire śūraṃ deveṣv iva puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_01_u:105.016c: upājagmur dhanaṃ gṛhya ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:105.018a: kharoṣṭramahiṣāṃś caiva yac ca kiṃ cid ajāvikam
GE07mbh_01_u:105.019a: tad ādāya yayau pāṇḍuḥ punar muditavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.020c: pranaṣṭaḥ kīrtijaḥ śabdaḥ pāṇḍunā punar uddhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.021a: ye purā kururāṣṭrāṇi jahruḥ kurudhanāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:105.022a: ity abhāṣanta rājāno rājāmātyāś ca saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.023e: āvṛtaṃ dadṛśur lokaṃ hṛṣṭā bahuvidhair janaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.024e: nāntaṃ dadṛśur āsādya bhīṣmeṇa saha kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:105.026c: putram āsādya bhīṣmas tu harṣād aśrūṇy avartayat
GE07mbh_01_u:106.001c: bhīṣmāya satyavatyai ca mātre copajahāra saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:106.002a: vidurāya ca vai pāṇḍuḥ preṣayām āsa tad dhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:106.003a: tataḥ satyavatīṃ bhīṣmaḥ kausalyāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:106.003c: śubhaiḥ pāṇḍujitai ratnais toṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:106.006a: saṃprayuktaś ca kuntyā ca mādryā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:106.008a: sa caran dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ ramyaṃ himavato gireḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:106.009a: rarāja kuntyā mādryā ca pāṇḍuḥ saha vane vasan
GE07mbh_01_u:106.009c: kareṇvor iva madhyasthaḥ śrīmān pauraṃdaro gajaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:106.011a: tasya kāmāṃś ca bhogāṃś ca narā nityam atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:106.013a: tatas tu varayitvā tām ānāyya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.001c: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya vaiśyāyām ekaś cāpi śatāt paraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.002a: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāṃ ca mādryāṃ ca pañca putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.003c: kiyatā caiva kālena teṣām āyuś ca kiṃ param
GE07mbh_01_u:107.004c: kathaṃ ca sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ gāndhārīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE07mbh_01_u:107.005a: kathaṃ ca śaptasya sataḥ pāṇḍos tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.006c: kathayasva na me tṛptiḥ kathyamāneṣu bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:107.007c: toṣayām āsa gāndhārī vyāsas tasyai varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_01_u:107.008a: sā vavre sadṛśaṃ bhartuḥ putrāṇāṃ śatam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.008c: tataḥ kālena sā garbhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrād athāgrahīt
GE07mbh_01_u:107.008d-1135_05: sa gatvā tapasā siddhiṃ viśvāmitro yathā bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:107.009a: saṃvatsaradvayaṃ taṃ tu gāndhārī garbham āhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:107.009c: aprajā dhārayām āsa tatas tāṃ duḥkham āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:107.013c: tāṃ sa māṃsamayīṃ peśīṃ dadarśa japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.014a: tato 'bravīt saubaleyīṃ kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:107.014c: sā cātmano mataṃ satyaṃ śaśaṃsa paramarṣaye
GE07mbh_01_u:107.016a: śataṃ ca kila putrāṇāṃ vitīrṇaṃ me tvayā purā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.016c: iyaṃ ca me māṃsapeśī jātā putraśatāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:107.017a: evam etat saubaleyi naitaj jātv anyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:107.017c: vitathaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me svaireṣv api kuto 'nyathā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.018c: śītābhir adbhir aṣṭhīlām imāṃ ca pariṣiñcata
GE07mbh_01_u:107.019a: sā sicyamānā aṣṭhīlā abhavac chatadhā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.020b-1137_01: tataḥ kuṇḍaśataṃ tatra ānāyya tu mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.021a: tatas tāṃs teṣu kuṇḍeṣu garbhān avadadhe tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.021c: svanugupteṣu deśeṣu rakṣāṃ ca vyadadhāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.021d-1138_01: śaśāsa caiva kṛṣṇo vai garbhāṇāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.022d-1139_01: ahnottarā kumārās te kuṇḍebhyas tu samutthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.023a: ity uktvā bhagavān vyāsas tathā pratividhāya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:107.024a: jajñe krameṇa caitena teṣāṃ duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.024c: janmatas tu pramāṇena jyeṣṭho rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.024d-1141_01: tadākhyātaṃ tu bhīṣmāya vidurāya ca dhīmate
GE07mbh_01_u:107.024d-1142_01: yasminn ahani durdharṣo jajñe duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.024d-1142_02: tasminn eva mahābāhur jajñe bhīmo 'pi vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:107.024d-1142_06: vātāś ca pravavuś cāpi digdāhaś cābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.025b-1143_03: vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo bhayam āvedayan mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:107.025c: samānīya bahūn viprān bhīṣmaṃ viduram eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:107.025d-1144_01: anyāṃś ca suhṛdo rājan kurūn sarvāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:107.026c: prāptaḥ svaguṇato rājyaṃ na tasmin vācyam asti naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.027a: ayaṃ tv anantaras tasmād api rājā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:107.027c: etad dhi brūta me satyaṃ yad atra bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_01_u:107.027d-1145_01: asmiñ jāte nimittāni śaṃsanti hy aśivaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:107.027d-1145_02: ato bravīmi vidura drutaṃ māṃ bhayam āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:107.029c: te 'bruvan brāhmaṇā rājan viduraś ca mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.029d-1146_02: utthitāni sute jāte jyeṣṭhe te puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:107.030c: tasya śāntiḥ parityāge puṣṭyā tv apanayo mahān
GE07mbh_01_u:107.031a: śatam ekonam apy astu putrāṇāṃ te mahīpate
GE07mbh_01_u:107.031b-1148_01: tyajainam ekaṃ śāntiṃ cet kulasyecchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:107.031c: ekena kuru vai kṣemaṃ lokasya ca kulasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:107.032a: tyajed ekaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_01_u:107.033a: sa tathā vidureṇoktas taiś ca sarvair dvijottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.036c: jajñe dhīmāṃs tatas tasyāṃ yuyutsuḥ karaṇo nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-1150_01: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya rājendra yathā te kathitaṃ mayā janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063x0034: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇām āditaḥ kathitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0002: ṛṣeḥ prasādāt tu śataṃ na ca kanyā prakīrtitā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0003: vaiśyāputro yuyutsuś ca kanyā caikā śatādhikā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0006: kathaṃ tv idānīṃ bhagavan kanyāṃ jātāṃ bravīṣi me yadi bhāgaśataṃ peśī kṛtā tena maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0008: na prajāsyati ced bhūyaḥ saubaleyī kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0009: kathaṃ tu saṃbhavas tasyā duḥśalāyā vadasva me
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0010: yathārham iha viprarṣe paraṃ me 'tra kutūhalam
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0011: sādhv ayaṃ praśna uddiṣṭaḥ pāṇḍaveya bravīmi te
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0012: tāṃ māṃsapeśīṃ bhagavān svayam eva mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0013: śītābhir adbhir āsicya bhāgaṃ bhāgam akalpayat
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0014: yo yathā kalpito bhāgas taṃ taṃ dhātryā tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0015: ghṛtapūrṇeṣu kuṇḍeṣu ekaikaṃ prākṣipat tadā etasmin nantare sādhvī gāndhārī sudṛḍhavratā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0018: manasācintayad devī etat putraśataṃ mama bhaviṣyati na saṃdeho na bravīty anyathā muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0020: mameyaṃ paramā tuṣṭir duhitā me bhaved yadi
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0021: ekā śatādhikā bālā bhaviṣyati kanīyasī tato dauhitrajāl lokād abāhyo 'sau patir mama
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0023: adhikā kila nārīṇāṃ prītir jāmātṛjā bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0024: yadi nāma mamāpi syād duhitaikā śatādhikā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0026: yadi satyaṃ tapas taptaṃ dattaṃ vāpy athavā hutam guravas toṣitā vāpi tathāstu duhitā mama
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0028: etasminn eva kāle tu kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0029: vibhajya tāṃ tadā peśīṃ bhagavān ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0030: gaṇayitvā śataṃ pūrṇam aṃśānām āha saubalīm
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0031: pūrṇaṃ putraśataṃ tv etan na mithyā vāg udāhṛtā daivayogād ayaṃ bhāga ekaḥ śiṣṭaḥ śatāt paraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0033: eṣā te subhage kanyā bhaviṣyati yathepsitā
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0035: taṃ cāpi prākṣipat tatra kanyābhāgaṃ tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0036: etat te kathitaṃ rājan duḥśalājanma bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:107.037d-063_0037: brūhi rājendra kiṃ bhūyo vartayiṣyāmi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_01_u:108.002a: duryodhano yuyutsuś ca rājan duḥśāsanas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:108.002c: duḥsaho duḥśalaś caiva jalasaṃdhaḥ samaḥ sahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:108.003c: durmarṣaṇo durmukhaś ca duṣkarṇaḥ karṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:108.005a: durmado duṣpragāhaś ca vivitsur vikaṭaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:108.008b-1152_01: citrāyudho niṣaṅgī ca pāśī vṛndārakas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:108.010b-1153_01: ajitaś ca jayantaś ca jayatseno 'tha durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:108.011c: kavacī niṣaṅgī pāśī ca daṇḍadhāro dhanurgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:108.012b-1154_01: bhīmakarmā subāhuś ca bhīmavikrānta eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:108.012c: abhayo raudrakarmā ca tathā dṛḍharathas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:108.013b-1155_01: pramathaś ca pramāthī ca dīrghālātaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:108.013b-1156_01: dīrghadhvajo dīrghabhuja adīrgho dīrgha eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:108.013d-1157_01: mahākuṇḍaś ca kuṇḍaś ca kuṇḍajaś citrajas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:108.014a: kuṇḍāśī virajāś caiva duḥśalā ca śatādhikā
GE07mbh_01_u:108.014c: etad ekaśataṃ rājan kanyā caikā prakīrtitā
GE07mbh_01_u:108.015c: sarve tv atirathāḥ śūrāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:108.017a: sarveṣām anurūpāś ca kṛtā dārā mahīpate
GE07mbh_01_u:108.018d-1158_01: iti putraśataṃ rājan yuyutsuś ca śatādhikaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:108.018d-1158_02: kanyakā duḥśalā caiva yathāvat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:109.002c: tvattaḥ śrutāni me brahman pāṇḍavānāṃ tu kīrtaya
GE07mbh_01_u:109.006a: tatas tāṃ ca mṛgīṃ taṃ ca rukmapuṅkhaiḥ supatribhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.006c: nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pāṇḍuḥ pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.007a: sa ca rājan mahātejā ṛṣiputras tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.007d-1159_01: mṛgo ṛṣir mṛgī bhāryā ubhau tau tapasānvitau
GE07mbh_01_u:109.008a: saṃsaktas tu tayā mṛgyā mānuṣīm īrayan giram
GE07mbh_01_u:109.010a: na vidhiṃ grasate prajñā prajñāṃ tu grasate vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.012a: śatrūṇāṃ yā vadhe vṛttiḥ sā mṛgāṇāṃ vadhe smṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:109.012c: rājñāṃ mṛga na māṃ mohāt tvaṃ garhayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:109.013c: sa eva dharmo rājñāṃ tu tad vidvān kiṃ nu garhase
GE07mbh_01_u:109.014a: agastyaḥ satram āsīnaś cacāra mṛgayām ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.016a: na ripūn vai samuddiśya vimuñcanti purā śarān
GE07mbh_01_u:109.017a: pramattam apramattaṃ vā vivṛtaṃ ghnanti caujasā
GE07mbh_01_u:109.017c: upāyair iṣubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ kasmān mṛga vigarhase
GE07mbh_01_u:109.017d-1161_01: maithunasthaṃ mahārāja yat tvaṃ hanyā(t) hy akāraṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:109.018a: nāhaṃ ghnantaṃ mṛgān rājan vigarhe ātmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:109.018c: maithunaṃ tu pratīkṣyaṃ me syāt tvayehānṛśaṃsataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.019c: ko hi vidvān mṛgaṃ hanyāc carantaṃ maithunaṃ vane
GE07mbh_01_u:109.019d-1162_01: asyāṃ mṛgyāṃ ca rājendra harṣān maithunam ācaram
GE07mbh_01_u:109.019e: puruṣārthaphalaṃ kāntaṃ yat tvayā vitathaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:109.020c: vaṃśe jātasya kauravya nānurūpam idaṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:109.021c: asvargyam ayaśasyaṃ ca adharmiṣṭhaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:109.022c: nārhas tvaṃ surasaṃkāśa kartum asvargyam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:109.024a: kiṃ kṛtaṃ te naraśreṣṭha nighnato mām anāgasam
GE07mbh_01_u:109.025a: tvayāhaṃ hiṃsito yasmāt tasmāt tvām apy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_01_u:109.026a: ahaṃ hi kiṃdamo nāma tapasāpratimo muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.027a: mṛgo bhūtvā mṛgaiḥ sārdhaṃ carāmi gahane vane
GE07mbh_01_u:109.027b-1163_03: tat sukhaṃ dvipadāṃ nāsti vidyate tac catuṣpadām
GE07mbh_01_u:109.027b-1163_04: nṛpāṇāṃ mṛgayā dharmas tatrāpi na vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.027c: na tu te brahmahatyeyaṃ bhaviṣyaty avijānataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:109.028a: asya tu tvaṃ phalaṃ mūḍha prāpsyasīdṛśam eva hi
GE07mbh_01_u:109.028e: tvam apy asyām avasthāyāṃ pretalokaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:109.029a: antakāle ca saṃvāsaṃ yayā gantāsi kāntayā
GE07mbh_01_u:109.029e: bhaktyā matimatāṃ śreṣṭha saiva tvām anuyāsyati
GE07mbh_01_u:109.030a: vartamānaḥ sukhe duḥkhaṃ yathāhaṃ prāpitas tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:109.030c: tathā sukhaṃ tvāṃ saṃprāptaṃ duḥkham abhyāgamiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:109.031a: evam uktvā suduḥkhārto jīvitāt sa vyayujyata
GE07mbh_01_u:109.031c: mṛgaḥ pāṇḍuś ca śokārtaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:110.001a: taṃ vyatītam atikramya rājā svam iva bāndhavam
GE07mbh_01_u:110.002a: satām api kule jātāḥ karmaṇā bata durgatim
GE07mbh_01_u:110.003a: śaśvad dharmātmanā jāto bāla eva pitā mama
GE07mbh_01_u:110.004a: tasya kāmātmanaḥ kṣetre rājñaḥ saṃyatavāg ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:110.006a: mokṣam eva vyavasyāmi bandho hi vyasanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:110.006c: suvṛttim anuvartiṣye tām ahaṃ pitur avyayām
GE07mbh_01_u:110.007c: caran bhaikṣaṃ munir muṇḍaś cariṣyāmi mahīm imām
GE07mbh_01_u:110.009a: na śocan na prahṛṣyaṃś ca tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:110.010a: na cāpy avahasan kaṃ cin na kurvan bhrukuṭīṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:110.011c: svāsu prajāsv iva sadā samaḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ prati
