GE07mbh_01_u:114.031a: eṣa madrān vaśe kṛtvā kurūṃś ca saha kekayaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.031d-1221_04: pulomāyās tu tanayān kālakeyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.031d-1221_05: gatvottarāṃ diśaṃ vīro vijitya yudhi pārthivān
GE07mbh_01_u:114.032c: medasā sarvabhūtānāṃ tṛptiṃ yāsyati vai parām
GE07mbh_01_u:114.033a: grāmaṇīś ca mahīpālān eṣa jitvā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.033c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vīras trīn medhān āhariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:114.034d-1222_02: astraṃ pāśupataṃ nāma tasmāt tuṣṭād avāpsyati
GE07mbh_01_u:114.034d-1222_04: śakrājñayā mahābāhus tān vadhiṣyati te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.036c: uktavān vāyur ākāśe kuntī śuśrāva cāsya tām
GE07mbh_01_u:114.037a: vācam uccāritām uccais tāṃ niśamya tapasvinām
GE07mbh_01_u:114.038a: tathā devaṛṣīṇāṃ ca sendrāṇāṃ ca divaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:114.038c: ākāśe dundubhīnāṃ ca babhūva tumulaḥ svanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.039c: samavetya ca devānāṃ gaṇāḥ pārtham apūjayan
GE07mbh_01_u:114.040c: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sarve sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.041a: bharadvājaḥ kaśyapo gautamaś ca; viśvāmitro jamadagnir vasiṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.041c: yaś codito bhāskare 'bhūt pranaṣṭe; so 'py atrātrir bhagavān ājagāma
GE07mbh_01_u:114.042a: marīcir aṅgirāś caiva pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.043d-1224_01: tathā maharṣayaś cāpi jepus tatra samantataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.043e: gandharvaiḥ sahitaḥ śrīmān prāgāyata ca tumburuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.044c: gopatir dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sūryavarcāś ca saptamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.045a: yugapas tṛṇapaḥ kārṣṇir nandiś citrarathas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.046a: kaliḥ pañcadaśaś cātra nāradaś caiva ṣoḍaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.046c: sad vā bṛhad vā bṛhakaḥ karālaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.047c: viśvāvasur bhumanyuś ca sucandro daśamas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.048c: ity ete devagandharvā jagus tatra nararṣabham
GE07mbh_01_u:114.050c: adrikā ca tathā sācī miśrakeśī alambusā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.051c: agnikā lakṣaṇā kṣemā devī rambhā manoramā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.052a: asitā ca subāhuś ca supriyā suvapus tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.052c: puṇḍarīkā sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī
GE07mbh_01_u:114.053a: kāmyā śāradvatī caiva nanṛtus tatra saṃghaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.054a: kratusthalā ghṛtācī ca viśvācī pūrvacitty api
GE07mbh_01_u:114.054c: umlocety abhivikhyātā pramloceti ca tā daśa
GE07mbh_01_u:114.055a: dhātāryamā ca mitraś ca varuṇo 'ṃśo bhagas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.055c: indro vivasvān pūṣā ca tvaṣṭā ca savitā tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.056a: parjanyaś caiva viṣṇuś ca ādityāḥ pāvakārciṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.057a: mṛgavyādhaś ca śarvaś ca nirṛtiś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.058a: dahano 'theśvaraś caiva kapālī ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:114.058c: sthāṇur bhavaś ca bhagavān rudrās tatrāvatasthire
GE07mbh_01_u:114.059a: aśvinau vasavaś cāṣṭau marutaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.059b-1228_01: nāsatyaś caiva dasraś ca smṛtau dvāv aśvināv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:114.059b-1228_02: tau cāśvinau tathā sādhyās tasyāsañ janmani sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.059b-1228_03: kratur dakṣas tapaḥ satyaḥ kālaḥ kāmo dhuris tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.059b-1228_04: kurumān madhumāṃś caiva rocamānaś ca tejasā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.060a: karkoṭako 'tha śeṣaś ca vāsukiś ca bhujaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.060c: kacchapaś cāpakuṇḍaś ca takṣakaś ca mahoragaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.061c: ete cānye ca bahavas tatra nāgā vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.061d-1229_01: mahān pitāmahas tv enaṃ vastreṇārajasā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.061d-1229_08: anye ca bahavas tatra samāsan rājasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.061d-1229_09: ete cānye ca bahavo naralokādhipās tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.061d-1230_01: tāṃś ca devagaṇān sarvāṃs tapaḥsiddhā maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.063a: tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryaṃ vismitā munisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.063c: adhikāṃ sma tato vṛttim avartan pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_01_u:114.063d-1231_03: prādurbhūto hy ayaṃ dharmo devatānāṃ prasādajaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.063d-1231_04: mātariśvā hy ayaṃ bhīmo balavān arimardanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.063d-1231_05: sākṣād indraḥ svayaṃ jātaḥ prasādāc ca śatakratoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.063d-1231_06: pitṛtvād devatānāṃ hi nāsti puṇyataras tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:114.063d-1231_08: ity uktvā devatāḥ sarvā viprajagmur yathāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:114.064a: pāṇḍus tu punar evaināṃ putralobhān mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.064c: prāhiṇod darśanīyāṅgīṃ kuntī tv enam athābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:114.065a: nātaś caturthaṃ prasavam āpatsv api vadanty uta
GE07mbh_01_u:114.065c: ataḥ paraṃ cāriṇī syāt pañcame bandhakī bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:114.066a: sa tvaṃ vidvan dharmam imaṃ buddhigamyaṃ kathaṃ nu mām
GE07mbh_01_u:114.066c: apatyārthaṃ samutkramya pramādād iva bhāṣase pāṇḍuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:114.066d-1232_01: evam etad dharmaśāstraṃ yathā vadasi tat tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.002a: na me 'sti tvayi saṃtāpo viguṇe 'pi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:115.002b-1233_01: na tāpo yauvanasthāyī parābhavaṃ kathaṃ ca naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.003a: gāndhāryāś caiva nṛpate jātaṃ putraśataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.003c: śrutvā na me tathā duḥkham abhavat kurunandana
GE07mbh_01_u:115.004a: idaṃ tu me mahad duḥkhaṃ tulyatāyām aputratā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.004c: diṣṭyā tv idānīṃ bhartur me kuntyām apy asti saṃtatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.005c: kuryād anugraho me syāt tava cāpi hitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:115.006a: stambho hi me sapatnītvād vaktuṃ kuntisutāṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:115.006c: yadi tu tvaṃ prasanno me svayam enāṃ pracodaya
GE07mbh_01_u:115.007a: mamāpy eṣa sadā mādri hṛdy arthaḥ parivartate
GE07mbh_01_u:115.007c: na tu tvāṃ prasahe vaktum iṣṭāniṣṭavivakṣayā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.008a: tava tv idaṃ mataṃ jñātvā prayatiṣyāmy ataḥ param
GE07mbh_01_u:115.008c: manye dhruvaṃ mayoktā sā vaco me pratipatsyate
GE07mbh_01_u:115.009a: tataḥ kuntīṃ punaḥ pāṇḍur vivikta idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:115.009c: kulasya mama saṃtānaṃ lokasya ca kuru priyam
GE07mbh_01_u:115.010c: matpriyārthaṃ ca kalyāṇi kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:115.010d-1235_02: mama ceṣṭasya nirvṛttis tava cāpi paraṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.011a: yaśaso 'rthāya caiva tvaṃ kuru karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_01_u:115.012a: tathā mantravido viprās tapas taptvā suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_01_u:115.013a: tathā rājarṣayaḥ sarve brāhmaṇāś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.014a: sā tvaṃ mādrīṃ plaveneva tārayemām anindite
GE07mbh_01_u:115.014d-1237_01: dharmaṃ vai dharmaśāstroktaṃ yathā vadasi tat tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.015a: evam uktābravīn mādrīṃ sakṛc cintaya daivatam
GE07mbh_01_u:115.015d-1238_01: kuntyā mantre kṛte tasmin vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.015d-1238_02: tato rājasutā snātā śayane saṃviveśa ha
GE07mbh_01_u:115.016c: tāv āgamya sutau tasyāṃ janayām āsatur yamau
GE07mbh_01_u:115.017c: tathaiva tāv api yamau vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:115.017d-1239_01: karmato bhaktitaś caiva balato 'pi nayais tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.019c: bhaktyā ca karmaṇā caiva tathāśīrbhir viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:115.021f-1241_01: anvavartanta pārthāś ca mādrīputrau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:115.021f-1242_02: pāṇḍur dṛṣṭvā sutāṃs tāṃs tu devarūpān mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.021f-1242_03: mudaṃ paramikāṃ lebhe nananda ca narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.021f-1242_05: priyā babhūvus tāsāṃ ca tathaiva muniyoṣitām
GE07mbh_01_u:115.022a: kuntīm atha punaḥ pāṇḍur mādryarthe samacodayat
GE07mbh_01_u:115.022c: tam uvāca pṛthā rājan rahasy uktā satī sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.023a: uktā sakṛd dvandvam eṣā lebhe tenāsmi vañcitā
GE07mbh_01_u:115.023c: bibhemy asyāḥ paribhavān nārīṇāṃ gatir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_01_u:115.024c: tasmān nāhaṃ niyoktavyā tvayaiṣo 'stu varo mama
GE07mbh_01_u:115.025a: evaṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutāḥ pañca devadattā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.027a: vivardhamānās te tatra puṇye haimavate girau
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028c: sarve vavṛdhur alpena kālenāpsv iva nīrajāḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0002: pāṇḍoḥ putrān amanyanta tāpasāḥ svān ivātmajān
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0003: tatas tu vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve vasudevapurogamāḥ pāṇḍuḥ śāpabhayād bhītaḥ śataśṛṅgam upeyivān
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0005: tatraiva munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tāpaso 'bhūt tapaś caran
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0007: yogadhyānaparo rājā babhūveti ca vādakāḥ prabruvanti sma bahavas tac chrutvā śokakarśitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0009: pāṇḍoḥ prītisamāyuktāḥ kadā śroṣyāma satkathāḥ ity evaṃ kathayantas te vṛṣṇayaḥ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0011: pāṇḍoḥ putrāgamaṃ śrutvā sarve harṣasamanvitāḥ sabhājayantas te 'nyonyaṃ vasudevaṃ vaco 'bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0013: na bhaveran kriyāhīnāḥ pāṇḍoḥ putrā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0014: pāṇḍoḥ priyahitānveṣī preṣaya tvaṃ purohitam vasudevas tathety uktvā visasarja purohitam
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0018: gāvo hiraṇyaṃ rūpyaṃ ca preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0019: tāni sarvāṇi saṃgṛhya prayayau sa purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0020: tam āgataṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ kāśyapaṃ vai purohitam
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0021: pūjayām āsa vidhivat pāṇḍuḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ pṛthā mādrī ca saṃhṛṣṭe vasudevaṃ praśaṃsatām
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0023: tataḥ pāṇḍuḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pāṇḍavānām akārayat
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0025: kāśyapaḥ kṛtavān sarvam upākarma ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0028: śaryāteḥ pṛṣataḥ putraḥ śuko nāma paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0029: yena sāgaraparyantā dhanuṣā nirjitā mahī aśvamedhaśatair iṣṭvā sa mahātmā mahāmakhaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0031: ārādhya devatāḥ sarvāḥ pitṝn api mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0035: gadāyāṃ pārago bhīmas tomareṣu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ asicarmaṇi niṣṇātau yamau sattvavatāṃ varau
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0039: anujñāya tato rājā śaktiṃ khaḍgaṃ tathā śarān
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0040: dhanuś ca dadatāṃ śreṣṭhas tālamātraṃ mahāprabham
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0044: mene sarvān mahīpālān aparyāptān svatejasā ekavarṣāntarās tv evaṃ parasparam ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0046: anvavardhanta pārthāś ca mādrīputrau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0047: pāṇḍavānāṃ tathāyus tvaṃ śṛṇu kauravanandana jagāma hāstinapuraṃ ṣoḍaśābdo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0049: bhīmasenaḥ pañcadaśe bībhatsur vai caturdaśe trayodaśābdau ca yamau jagmatur nāgasāhvayam
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0052: ṣaṭ ca māsāñ jatugṛhān muktā jāto ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0053: ṣaṇmāsān ekacakrāyāṃ varṣaṃ pāñcālake gṛhe dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sahoṣitvā pañca varṣāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0057: bhuṅktvā ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ rājyaṃ sāgarāntāṃ vasuṃdharām māsaiḥ ṣaḍbhir mahātmānaḥ sarve kṛṣṇaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0059: rājye parikṣitaṃ sthāpya iṣṭāṃ gatim avāpnuvan
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0060: evaṃ yudhiṣṭhirasyāpi āyur aṣṭottaraṃ śatam arjunāt keśavo jyeṣṭhas tribhir māsair mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:115.028d-067_0062: kṛṣṇāt saṃkarṣaṇo jyeṣṭhas tribhir māsair mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.001a: darśanīyāṃs tataḥ putrān pāṇḍuḥ pañca mahāvane
GE07mbh_01_u:116.002b-1245_01: pūrṇe caturdaśe varṣe phalgunasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.004a: jalasthānaiś ca vividhaiḥ padminībhiś ca śobhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:116.004b-1253_01: samīkṣya ca tatas tatra ramyaṃ kusumitaṃ drumam
GE07mbh_01_u:116.004c: pāṇḍor vanaṃ tu saṃprekṣya prajajñe hṛdi manmathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.004d-1254_02: gāyamānais tu gandharvaiḥ purā nāgapure yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:116.005c: taṃ mādry anujagāmaikā vasanaṃ bibhratī śubham
GE07mbh_01_u:116.006a: samīkṣamāṇaḥ sa tu tāṃ vayaḥsthāṃ tanuvāsasam
GE07mbh_01_u:116.007c: na śaśāka niyantuṃ taṃ kāmaṃ kāmabalātkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.007d-1255_01: atha so 'ṣṭādaśe varṣe ṛtau mādrīm alaṃkṛtām
GE07mbh_01_u:116.008a: tata enāṃ balād rājā nijagrāha rahogatām
GE07mbh_01_u:116.009a: sa tu kāmaparītātmā taṃ śāpaṃ nānvabudhyata
GE07mbh_01_u:116.010c: śāpajaṃ bhayam utsṛjya jagāmaiva balāt priyām
GE07mbh_01_u:116.011a: tasya kāmātmano buddhiḥ sākṣāt kālena mohitā
GE07mbh_01_u:116.012a: sa tayā saha saṃgamya bhāryayā kurunandana
GE07mbh_01_u:116.013c: mumoca duḥkhajaṃ śabdaṃ punaḥ punar atīva ha
GE07mbh_01_u:116.013d-1257_01: taṃ śrutvā karuṇaṃ śabdaṃ sahasotpatitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:116.014a: saha putrais tataḥ kuntī mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_01_u:116.014c: ājagmuḥ sahitās tatra yatra rājā tathāgataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.015a: tato mādry abravīd rājann ārtā kuntīm idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.015c: ekaiva tvam ihāgaccha tiṣṭhantv atraiva dārakāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.016a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasyās tatraivāvārya dārakān
GE07mbh_01_u:116.017a: dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍuṃ ca mādrīṃ ca śayānau dharaṇītale
GE07mbh_01_u:116.018a: rakṣyamāṇo mayā nityaṃ vīraḥ satatam ātmavān
GE07mbh_01_u:116.018c: kathaṃ tvam abhyatikrāntaḥ śāpaṃ jānan vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.019a: nanu nāma tvayā mādri rakṣitavyo janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.019c: sā kathaṃ lobhitavatī vijane tvaṃ narādhipam mādrī
GE07mbh_01_u:116.019d-1258_01: vidhinā coditasyāsya māṃ dṛṣṭvā vijane vane
GE07mbh_01_u:116.020a: kathaṃ dīnasya satataṃ tvām āsādya rahogatām
GE07mbh_01_u:116.021a: dhanyā tvam asi bāhlīki matto bhāgyatarā tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:116.021c: dṛṣṭavaty asi yad vaktraṃ prahṛṣṭasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.022c: ātmā na vārito 'nena satyaṃ diṣṭaṃ cikīrṣuṇā vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.022d-068_0001: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuntī śokāgnidīpitā
GE07mbh_01_u:116.022d-068_0002: papāta sahasā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:116.022d-068_0003: niśceṣṭā patitā bhūmau mohe na tu cacāla sā tasmin kṣaṇe kṛtasnānam amalāmbarasaṃvṛtam

GE07mbh_01_u:116.030d-069_0001: ṛṣayas tān samāśvāsya pāṇḍavān satyavikramān ūcuḥ kuntīṃ ca mādrīṃ ca samāśvāsya tapasvinaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0050: ity uktvā tanayaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ hṛdayena vidūyatā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0051: kṣattāram ānāyya tadā kuntī vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0052: kva gato bhagavan kṣattar bhīmaseno na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0053: udyānān nirgatāḥ sarve bhrātaro bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0054: tatraikas tu mahābāhur bhīmo nābhyeti mām iha
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0055: na ca prīṇayate cakṣuḥ sadā duryodhanasya saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0057: nihanyād api taṃ vīraṃ jātamanyuḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0058: tena me vyākulaṃ cittaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahyatīva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0059: maivaṃ vadasva kalyāṇi śeṣasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ kuru pratyādiṣṭo hi duṣṭātmā śeṣe 'pi praharet tava
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0063: evam uktvā yayau vidvān viduraḥ svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0064: kuntī cintāparā bhūtvā sahāsīnā sutair gṛhe
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0066: tasmiṃs tadā rase jīrṇe so 'prameyabalo balī
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0067: taṃ dṛṣṭvā pratibuddhaṃ tu pāṇḍavaṃ te bhujaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0068: sāntvayām āsur avyagrā vacanaṃ cedam abruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0069: yas te pīto mahābāho raso 'yaṃ vīryasaṃbhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0071: gacchādya ca tvaṃ svagṛhaṃ snāto divyair imair jalaiḥ bhrātaras te nu tapyanti tvāṃ vinā kurupuṃgava
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0073: tataḥ snāto mahābāhuḥ śuciḥ śuklāmbarasrajaḥ tato nāgasya bhavane kṛtakautukamaṅgalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0076: bhuktavān paramānnaṃ ca nāgair dattaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0077: pūjito bhujagair vīra āśīrbhiś cābhinanditaḥ divyābharaṇasaṃchanno nāgān āmantrya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0080: utkṣiptaḥ sa tu nāgena jalāj jalaruhekṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0081: tasminn eva vanoddeśe sthāpitaḥ kurunandanaḥ te cāntardadhire nāgāḥ pāṇḍavasyaiva paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0085: tato 'bhivādya jananīṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0087: taiś cāpi saṃpariṣvaktaḥ saha mātrā nararṣabhaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0089: tatas tat sarvam ācaṣṭa duryodhanaviceṣṭitam bhrātṝṇāṃ bhīmasenaś ca mahābalaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0091: nāgaloke ca yad vṛttaṃ guṇadoṣam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0092: tac ca sarvam aśeṣeṇa kathayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0093: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhīmam āha vaco 'rthavat
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0094: tūṣṇīṃ bhava na te jalpyam idaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038b-072_0095: evam uktvā mahābāhur dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvair apramatto 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038d-1316_01: dharmātmā viduras teṣāṃ pārthānāṃ pradadau matim
GE07mbh_01_u:119.038d-1317_01: tāḍitas tena sūto 'pi yayau sa yamasādanam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.041a: vikāraṃ na hy ajanayat sutīkṣṇam api tad viṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.041c: bhīmasaṃhanano bhīmas tad apy ajarayat tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.042a: evaṃ duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.042c: anekair abhyupāyais tāñ jighāṃsanti sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_01_u:119.042d-1320_01: na jajñire tu tad vṛttaṃ pāṇḍavā mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043a: pāṇḍavāś cāpi tat sarvaṃ pratyajānann ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-1322_01: rājñā niveditās tasmai te ca sarve hy adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-1323_01: adhijagmuś ca kuravo dhanurvedaṃ kṛpāt tu te vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0001: tatas te mantrayām āsur duryodhanapurogamāḥ prāṇahā vikramī cāpi śaurye ca mahati sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0003: spardhate cāpi satatam asmān eko vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0004: taṃ tu suptaṃ purodyāne jalaśūle kṣipāmahe
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0005: tato jalavihārārthaṃ kārayām āsa bhārata celakambalaveśmāni citrāṇi ca śubhāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0009: pramāṇakoṭyām uddeśe sthale kṛtvā paricchadam bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0011: upārjitaṃ narais tatra tathā sūdakṛtaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0012: nyavedayanta puruṣā dhārtarāṣṭrasya tat tathā tato duryodhanas tv āha pāṇḍavāṃs tu sudurmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0015: sahitā bhrātaraḥ sarve jalakrīḍām avāpnumaḥ evam astv iti taṃ cāpi pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0017: te rathair nagarākārair deśajaiś ca hayottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0018: niryayur nagarād vīrāḥ kuravaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0019: udyānavanam āsādya saṃprasṛjya ca vāhanam prāviśaṃs tu mahāvīryāḥ siṃhā iva girer guhām
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0021: udyānaṃ smātha paśyanti bhrātaraḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0022: upasthānagṛhaiḥ śuddhair valabhībhiś ca śobhitam gavākṣakais tathā jālair jalasaṃsārakair api
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0025: dīrghikābhiś ca puṇyābhis tathā kāraṇḍakair api
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0026: jalaṃ tu śuśubhe channaṃ phullair jalaruhais tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0027: upakīrṇā vasumatī tathā puṣpair yathartukaiḥ upaviṣṭās tadā sarve pāṇḍavāḥ kuravas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0029: upapannān bahūn kāmāṃs te 'tha bhuktvā tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0030: athodyānavane tasmiṃs tathā krīḍāgatāś ca te
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0031: parasparasya vaktreṣu dadur bhakṣyāṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0032: tato duryodhanaḥ pāpas tadbhakṣye kālakūṭakam viṣaṃ prakṣepayām āsa bhīmasenajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0034: svayam utthāya caivātha hṛdayena kṣuropamaḥ satkṛtya bhrātṛvat tatra vācā cāmṛtakalpayā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0036: prākṣipad vai svayaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vaktre bhīmasya pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0037: prabhakṣitaṃ ca bhīmena hy asya doṣam ajānatā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0038: tato duryodhanas tatra hṛdayena hasann iva
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0039: kṛtakṛtyam ivātmānaṃ mene sa puruṣādhamaḥ tatas te sahitāḥ sarve jalakrīḍām akurvata
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0042: vihārāyataneṣv eva vīrā vāsam arocayan bhīmas tu balavān bhuktvā vyāyāmābhyadhikaṃ jale
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0044: vāhayitvā kumārāṃs tāñ jale krīḍāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0045: pramāṇakoṭyāṃ vāsārthī suṣvāpāruhya tat sthalam sa hi tat sthalam āsādya śrāntaś cāpsu viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0048: tato baddhvā latāpāśair bhīmaṃ duryodhanaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0049: śūlāny apsu nikhānyāśu sthalāj jalam apātayat
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0050: saśeṣatvān na saṃprāpto jale śūlāni pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0051: papāta yatra tatrāsya śūlaṃ nāsīd yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0052: sa niḥsaṃjño jalasyāntam avāg vai pāṇḍavo 'viśat
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0054: tataḥ sametya bahubhis tadā nāgair mahāviṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0055: daśyate pāṇḍavas tatra viṣadigdho mahāviṣaiḥ tato 'sya daśyamānasya tad viṣaṃ kālakūṭakam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0057: hataṃ sarpaviṣeṇāśu sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamena tu tataḥ prabuddhaḥ kaunteyaḥ sa tat saṃchidya bandhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0059: pothayām āsa tān sarvān kāṃś cit prāṇair vyayojayat te hanyamānāḥ pārthena sarpā vāsukim abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0061: ūcuś ca sarparājānaṃ vāsukiṃ vāsavopamam ayaṃ naro vai nāgendra hy apsu baddhvā praveśitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0063: yathā ca no matir vīra viṣapīto bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0064: viniviṣṭo 'ntaraṃ prāptaḥ sa ca daṣṭo hy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0065: sasaṃjñaś cāpi saṃvṛttaś chittvā bandhanam āśu naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0066: pothayāno mahābāhus taṃ vai tvaṃ jñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0067: tato vāsukir abhyetya nāgair anugatas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0068: paśyati sma mahānāgo bhīmaṃ bhīmaparākramam āryakeṇa ca dṛṣṭaḥ san pṛthāyāś cāryakeṇa tu
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0070: tato dṛṣṭaś ca tenāpi pariṣvaktaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0071: suprītaś cābhavat tasya vāsukiḥ sumahāyaśāḥ abravīt taṃ ca nāgendraḥ kim asya kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0073: priyaṃ dhanaughaṃ ratnāni yāvad asya pradīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0074: evam uktas tadā nāgo vāsukiṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0075: yadi nāgendra prīto 'si kim asya dhanasaṃcayaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0076: rasaṃ pibet kumāro 'yaṃ tvayi prīte mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0077: balaṃ nāgasahasrasya kuṇḍe cāsmin pratiṣṭhitam yāvat pibati bālo 'yaṃ tāvad asmai pradīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0079: evam astv iti taṃ nāgaṃ vāsukiḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0080: tato bhīmas tadā nāgaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0081: prāṅmukhaś copaviṣṭaḥ san rasaṃ pibati pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0082: ekocchvāsāt tadā kuṇḍaṃ pibati sma mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0083: evam aṣṭau tu kuṇḍāni so 'pibat pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0084: tatas tu śayane divye nāgadatte mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0085: śete sma ca tadā bhīmo divasāny aṣṭa caiva tu
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0087: prakṣipya kṛtakṛtyaṃ sma ātmānaṃ manyate tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0088: prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu vanāt praviviśuḥ puram
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0089: vadanto bhīmasenas tu yāto hy agrata eva saḥ yudhiṣṭhiras tu dharmātmā cintayan pāpam ātmani
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0091: svenānumānena paraṃ tadā taṃ smānupaśyati upagamya tataḥ pārthā mātaraṃ mātṛvatsalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0093: abhivādyābruvaṃs te vai amba bhīma ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0094: neti smāha tadā kuntī tatas te vyathitābhavan
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0095: drutaṃ gatvā purodyānaṃ vicinvanti sma pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0096: bhīma bhīmeti te vācaṃ nityam uccair udīrayan
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0097: vicinvanto 'tha te sarve na sma paśyanti bhrātaram
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0098: āgatāḥ svagṛhaṃ bhūya idam ūcuḥ pṛthāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0099: na dṛśyate mahābāhur amba bhīmo vane citaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0100: vicitāni ca sarvāṇi udyānāni nadīs tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0101: tato viduram ānāyya kuntī sā svaniveśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0102: uvāca kṣattar balavān bhīmaseno na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0103: udyānān nirgatāḥ sarve bhrātaro bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0104: tatra hy eko mahābāhur bhīmo nābhyeti mām iha na ca prīṇayate cakṣuḥ sadā duryodhanasya tu
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0106: tataḥ prasuptaṃ manye 'haṃ pāpena nihataṃ sutam
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0107: mā maivaṃ vada kalyāṇi śeṣasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0108: pratyādiṣṭo hi pāpātmā śeṣeṣu prahareta ha
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0109: dīrghāyuṣaḥ sutās tubhyaṃ tathā hy ṛṣir abhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0110: āgamiṣyati te putraḥ prītiṃ te vardhayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0111: evam uktā tadā kuntī niḥśvasantī muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0112: śayyāparā mahābhāgā putraiḥ parivṛtā tadā tato 'ṣṭame 'tha divase pratyabudhyata pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0114: tasmiṃs tadā rase jīrṇe hy aprameyabalo balī
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0116: bhuktvā tu paramānnaṃ ca nāgair dattaṃ mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0117: utkṣipya ca tadā nāgair jalāj jalaruhekṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0118: tasminn eva vanoddeśe sthāpitaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ antardadhuś ca te nāgāḥ pāṇḍavasyaiva paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0120: tata utthāya bhīmas tu ājagāma svakaṃ gṛham
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0121: abhivādya pariṣvaktaḥ samāghrātaś ca mūrdhani praṇamya dharmaputrāya sasvaje phalgunaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0123: abhivāditaś ca tair vīraiḥ sasvaje ca yamāv api
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0124: tac ca sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ākhyāti sma vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0125: yadā tv avagamaṃs te vai pāṇḍavās tasya karma tat
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0126: na tv eva bahulaṃ cakruḥ prayatā mantrarakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0127: dharmātmā viduras teṣāṃ pradadau matimān matim
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0128: duryodhano 'pi taṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaṃ punar āgatam niḥśvasaṃś cintayaṃś caiva ahany ahani tapyate
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0130: evaṃ duryodhanaḥ pāpaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0131: anekair abhyupāyais tāñ jighāṃsanti sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0132: pāṇḍavāś cāpi tat sarvaṃ pratyajānann ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:119.043d-073_0133: udbhāvanam akurvanto vidurasya mate sthitāḥ adhijagmuś ca kuravo dhanurvedaṃ kṛpāt tu te
GE07mbh_01_u:120.001c: śarastambhāt kathaṃ jajñe kathaṃ cāstrāṇy avāptavān
GE07mbh_01_u:120.002c: putraḥ kila mahārāja jātaḥ saha śarair vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:120.003a: na tasya vedādhyayane tathā buddhir ajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:120.004c: tathā sa tapasopetaḥ sarvāṇy astrāṇy avāpa ha
GE07mbh_01_u:120.005c: bhṛśaṃ saṃtāpayām āsa devarājaṃ sa gautamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:120.006c: prāhiṇot tapaso vighnaṃ kuru tasyeti kaurava
GE07mbh_01_u:120.009a: dhanuś ca hi śarāś cāsya karābhyāṃ prāpatan bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:120.009c: vepathuś cāsya tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śarīre samajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:120.010a: sa tu jñānagarīyastvāt tapasaś ca samanvayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:120.011a: yas tv asya sahasā rājan vikāraḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:120.011c: tena susrāva reto 'sya sa ca tan nāvabudhyata
GE07mbh_01_u:120.012a: sa vihāyāśramaṃ taṃ ca tāṃ caivāpsarasaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:120.012c: jagāma retas tat tasya śarastambe papāta ha
GE07mbh_01_u:120.013a: śarastambe ca patitaṃ dvidhā tad abhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:120.014a: mṛgayāṃ carato rājñaḥ śaṃtanos tu yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_01_u:120.014c: kaś cit senācaro 'raṇye mithunaṃ tad apaśyata
GE07mbh_01_u:120.015a: dhanuś ca saśaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā kṛṣṇājināni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:120.015e: sa rājñe darśayām āsa mithunaṃ saśaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:120.016a: sa tad ādāya mithunaṃ rājātha kṛpayānvitaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1377_06: kurūṇām asti yad vittaṃ rājyaṃ cedaṃ sarāṣṭrakam
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1377_07: tvam eva paramo rājā sarve ca kuravas tava
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1377_08: yac ca te prārthitaṃ brahman kṛtaṃ tad iti cintyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1377_09: diṣṭyā prāpto 'si viprarṣe mahān me 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1378_01: droṇas tathokto bhīṣmeṇa pūjito vasatiṃ nayan
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1378_04: tatra kṣatrasya loke 'smin rājaputrā mahābalāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1379_01: tataḥ saṃpūjito droṇo bhīṣmeṇa dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1379_03: viśrānte 'tha gurau tasmin pautrān ādāya kauravān
GE07mbh_01_u:122.038d-1379_04: śiṣyatvena dadau bhīṣmo vasūni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:122.039a: pratijagrāha taṃ bhīṣmo guruṃ pāṇḍusutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:122.039c: pautrān ādāya tān sarvān vasūni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:122.040a: śiṣyā iti dadau rājan droṇāya vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_01_u:122.040c: sa ca śiṣyān maheṣvāsaḥ pratijagrāha kauravān
GE07mbh_01_u:122.041a: pratigṛhya ca tān sarvān droṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:122.042a: kāryaṃ me kāṅkṣitaṃ kiṃ cid dhṛdi saṃparivartate
GE07mbh_01_u:122.042c: kṛtāstrais tat pradeyaṃ me tad ṛtaṃ vadatānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.043a: tac chrutvā kauraveyās te tūṣṇīm āsan viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:122.043c: arjunas tu tataḥ sarvaṃ pratijajñe paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.044a: tato 'rjunaṃ mūrdhni tadā samāghrāya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.044d-1381_02: sakhāyaṃ viddhi te pārthaṃ mayā dattaṃ pragṛhyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:122.044d-1381_03: sādhu sādhv iti taṃ pārthaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:122.044d-1381_04: adya prabhṛti viprendra paravān asmi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.044d-1381_06: ity uktvā tu tadā pārthaḥ pādau jagrāha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.045a: tato droṇaḥ pāṇḍuputrān astrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:122.045c: grāhayām āsa divyāni mānuṣāṇi ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:122.046e: vṛṣṇayaś cāndhakāś caiva nānādeśyāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047a: sūtaputraś ca rādheyo guruṃ droṇam iyāt tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047f-076_0001: abhyayāt sa tato droṇaṃ dhanurvedacikīrṣayā śikṣābhujabalodyogais teṣu sarveṣu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047f-076_0004: tulyeṣv astraprayogeṣu lāghave sauṣṭhaveṣu ca sarveṣām eva śiṣyāṇāṃ babhūvābhyadhiko 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047f-076_0006: aindrim apratimaṃ droṇa upadeśeṣv amanyata evaṃ sarvakumārāṇām iṣvastraṃ pratyapādayat
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047f-076_0008: kamaṇḍaluṃ ca sarveṣāṃ prāyacchac cirakāraṇāt putrāya ca dadau kumbham avilambanakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047f-076_0010: yāvat te nopagacchanti tāvad asmai parāṃ kriyām
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047f-076_0011: droṇa ācaṣṭa putrāya tat karma jiṣṇur auhata
GE07mbh_01_u:122.047f-076_0012: tataḥ sa vāruṇāstreṇa pūrayitvā kamaṇḍalum samam ācāryaputreṇa gurum abhyeti phālgunaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.001a: arjunas tu paraṃ yatnam ātasthe gurupūjane
GE07mbh_01_u:123.001c: astre ca paramaṃ yogaṃ priyo droṇasya cābhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:123.001d-1382_01: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nityam udyuktam iṣvastraṃ prati phālgunam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.001d-1383_01: tato droṇo 'bravīd enaṃ rājña eva niveśane
GE07mbh_01_u:123.002c: andhakāre 'rjunāyānnaṃ na deyaṃ te kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:123.002d-1384_01: na cākhyeyam idaṃ cāpi madvākyaṃ vijaye tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:123.003a: tataḥ kadā cid bhuñjāne pravavau vāyur arjune
GE07mbh_01_u:123.003c: tena tatra pradīpaḥ sa dīpyamāno nivāpitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.004a: bhuṅkta evārjuno bhaktaṃ na cāsyāsyād vyamuhyata
GE07mbh_01_u:123.004e: tad abhyāsakṛtaṃ matvā rātrāv abhyasta pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006a: prayatiṣye tathā kartuṃ yathā nānyo dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0001: astravān nānviyeṣāstraṃ yathā tvaṃ nādya kaś cana
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0003: etad hṛdi tadā jiṣṇor vavṛdhe droṇaśāsanam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0004: paramaṃ cākarod yatnaṃ dhanurvede paraṃtapaḥ arjuno naraśārdūlaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0008: arjunaṃ ca samānīya aśvatthāmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0009: śiśukaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ kṛtvā droṇo gaṅgājale tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0010: śiṣyāṇāṃ paśyatāṃ caiva kṣipati sma mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0011: cakṣuṣī vāsasā caiva baddhvā prādāc charāsanam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0012: śiśukaṃ vidhyatemaṃ vai jalasthaṃ baddhacakṣuṣaḥ tatkṣaṇenaiva bībhatsur āvāpair daśabhir vaśī
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0015: tasya dṛṣṭvā kriyāḥ sarvā droṇo 'manyata pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0016: viśiṣṭaṃ sarvaśiṣyebhyaḥ prītimāṃś cābhavat tadā athābravīn mahātmānaṃ bhāradvājo mahāratham
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0018: astraṃ viśiṣṭam anyeṣu yan na vidyeta pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0019: sasaṃhāraprayogaṃ ca tvam adhīṣva vrataṃ cara
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0020: astraṃ brahmaśiro nāma dahed yatpṛthivīm api
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0021: yāvan mantraprayogo 'pi viniyoge bhaviṣyati tāvān eva tu saṃhāre kartavya iti cāntataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0023: na mānuṣe prayoktavyaṃ brahmaṇo 'straṃ kathaṃ cana bādhate mānuṣāñ śatrūn yadā vāmānuṣaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0025: tasmād etat prayoktavyaṃ brāhmam astraṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0026: tathetyeva ca bībhatsur uvāca ca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0027: cakāra ca tathā sarvaṃ yathoktaṃ manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006b-077_0028: avāptāstraṃ tu bībhatsum anujñāya mahāmatiḥ uvāca paramaprīto matsamo 'sīti pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.006c: tvatsamo bhavitā loke satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_01_u:123.007a: tato droṇo 'rjunaṃ bhūyo ratheṣu ca gajeṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:123.007c: aśveṣu bhūmāv api ca raṇaśikṣām aśikṣayat
GE07mbh_01_u:123.009d-1387_01: tān sarvāñ śikṣayām āsa droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.011a: na sa taṃ pratijagrāha naiṣādir iti cintayan
GE07mbh_01_u:123.012a: sa tu droṇasya śirasā pādau gṛhya paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.013a: tasminn ācāryavṛttiṃ ca paramām āsthitas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:123.013c: iṣvastre yogam ātasthe paraṃ niyamam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.014a: parayā śraddhayā yukto yogena parameṇa ca
GE07mbh_01_u:123.016a: tatropakaraṇaṃ gṛhya naraḥ kaś cid yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_01_u:123.017a: teṣāṃ vicaratāṃ tatra tat tat karma cikīrṣatām
GE07mbh_01_u:123.017c: śvā caran sa vane mūḍho naiṣādiṃ prati jagmivān
GE07mbh_01_u:123.017d-1390_02: śabdaṃ śuśrāva naiṣādiḥ śunas tasya tu māriṣa
GE07mbh_01_u:123.018c: naiṣādiṃ śvā samālakṣya bhaṣaṃs tasthau tadantike
GE07mbh_01_u:123.019a: tadā tasyātha bhaṣataḥ śunaḥ sapta śarān mukhe
GE07mbh_01_u:123.019c: lāghavaṃ darśayann astre mumoca yugapad yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:123.020a: sa tu śvā śarapūrṇāsyaḥ pāṇḍavān ājagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:123.020c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavā vīrā vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.021a: lāghavaṃ śabdavedhitvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tat paramaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:123.021c: prekṣya taṃ vrīḍitāś cāsan praśaśaṃsuś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.022c: dadṛśuḥ pāṇḍavā rājann asyantam aniśaṃ śarān
GE07mbh_01_u:123.023a: na cainam abhyajānaṃs te tadā vikṛtadarśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.023c: athainaṃ paripapracchuḥ ko bhavān kasya vety uta
GE07mbh_01_u:123.023d-1393_01: sa śrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_01_u:123.025a: te tam ājñāya tattvena punar āgamya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.025c: yathāvṛttaṃ ca te sarvaṃ droṇāyācakhyur adbhutam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.026a: kaunteyas tv arjuno rājann ekalavyam anusmaran
GE07mbh_01_u:123.026c: raho droṇaṃ samāgamya praṇayād idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:123.027a: nanv ahaṃ parirabhyaikaḥ prītipūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.027c: bhavatokto na me śiṣyas tvadviśiṣṭo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:123.028a: atha kasmān madviśiṣṭo lokād api ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:123.028c: asty anyo bhavataḥ śiṣyo niṣādādhipateḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.029a: muhūrtam iva taṃ droṇaś cintayitvā viniścayam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.031a: ekalavyas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇam āyāntam antikāt
GE07mbh_01_u:123.032a: pūjayitvā tato droṇaṃ vidhivat sa niṣādajaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.032c: nivedya śiṣyam ātmānaṃ tasthau prāñjalir agrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.033a: tato droṇo 'bravīd rājann ekalavyam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.033c: yadi śiṣyo 'si me tūrṇaṃ vetanaṃ saṃpradīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:123.034a: ekalavyas tu tac chrutvā prīyamāṇo 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.034c: kiṃ prayacchāmi bhagavann ājñāpayatu māṃ guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.035a: na hi kiṃ cid adeyaṃ me gurave brahmavittama
GE07mbh_01_u:123.035c: tam abravīt tvayāṅguṣṭho dakṣiṇo dīyatāṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:123.035d-1394_01: yady avaśyaṃ tvayā deyam ekalavya prayaccha me
GE07mbh_01_u:123.035d-1395_01: bāḍham ity eva naiṣādiś chittvāṅguṣṭhau dadau tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.036a: ekalavyas tu tac chrutvā vaco droṇasya dāruṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.036c: pratijñām ātmano rakṣan satye ca nirataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:123.037d-1396_01: aviṣaṇṇaś ca tau prādāc chittvā droṇasya vetanam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.037d-1397_01: satyasaṃdhaṃ ca naiṣādiṃ dṛṣṭvā prīto 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.037d-1398_01: manīṣitaṃ tvayā vīra guror dattaṃ mamojasā
GE07mbh_01_u:123.037d-1399_01: evaṃ kartavyam iti vai ekalavyam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:123.038a: tataḥ paraṃ tu naiṣādir aṅgulībhir vyakarṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:123.038c: na tathā sa tu śīghro 'bhūd yathā pūrvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_01_u:123.039c: droṇaś ca satyavāg āsīn nānyo 'bhyabhavad arjunam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.039d-1401_01: droṇas tataḥ parāṃ pūjāṃ kuruṣu prāpnuvan dhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.040a: droṇasya tu tadā śiṣyau gadāyogyāṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.040c: duryodhanaś ca bhīmaś ca kurūṇām abhyagacchatām
GE07mbh_01_u:123.041c: tathāti puruṣān anyān tsārukau yamajāv ubhau
GE07mbh_01_u:123.045a: tāṃs tu sarvān samānīya sarvavidyāsu niṣṭhitān
GE07mbh_01_u:123.046a: kṛtrimaṃ bhāsam āropya vṛkṣāgre śilpibhiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.047a: śīghraṃ bhavantaḥ sarve vai dhanūṃṣy ādāya satvarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.049c: saṃdhatsva bāṇaṃ durdharṣa madvākyānte vimuñca ca
GE07mbh_01_u:123.050a: tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pūrvaṃ dhanur gṛhya mahāravam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.053a: sa muhūrtād iva punar droṇas taṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:123.053c: atha vṛkṣam imaṃ māṃ vā bhrātṝn vāpi prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:123.054a: tam uvāca sa kaunteyaḥ paśyāmy enaṃ vanaspatim
GE07mbh_01_u:123.054c: bhavantaṃ ca tathā bhrātṝn bhāsaṃ ceti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.055c: naitac chakyaṃ tvayā veddhuṃ lakṣyam ity eva kutsayan
GE07mbh_01_u:123.057a: anyāṃś ca śiṣyān bhīmādīn rājñaś caivānyadeśajān
GE07mbh_01_u:123.057c: tathā ca sarve sarvaṃ tat paśyāma iti kutsitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.059c: vitatya kārmukaṃ putra tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtakam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.061a: muhūrtād iva taṃ droṇas tathaiva samabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:123.061c: paśyasy enaṃ sthitaṃ bhāsaṃ drumaṃ mām api vety uta
GE07mbh_01_u:123.062a: paśyāmy enaṃ bhāsam iti droṇaṃ pārtho 'bhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:123.062c: na tu vṛkṣaṃ bhavantaṃ vā paśyāmīti ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:123.063a: tataḥ prītamanā droṇo muhūrtād iva taṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.064a: bhāsaṃ paśyasi yady enaṃ tathā brūhi punar vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.064c: śiraḥ paśyāmi bhāsasya na gātram iti so 'bravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:123.066a: tatas tasya nagasthasya kṣureṇa niśitena ha
GE07mbh_01_u:123.066c: śira utkṛtya tarasā pātayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.067c: mene ca drupadaṃ saṃkhye sānubandhaṃ parājitam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.068a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya saśiṣyo 'ṅgirasāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.070a: sa samartho 'pi mokṣāya śiṣyān sarvān acodayat
GE07mbh_01_u:123.070c: grāhaṃ hatvā mokṣayadhvaṃ mām iti tvarayann iva
GE07mbh_01_u:123.071c: āvāpaiḥ pañcabhir grāhaṃ magnam ambhasy atāḍayat
GE07mbh_01_u:123.071e: itare tu visaṃmūḍhās tatra tatra prapedire
GE07mbh_01_u:123.072a: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā kriyopetaṃ droṇo 'manyata pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_01_u:123.073c: grāhaḥ pañcatvam āpede jaṅghāṃ tyaktvā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.075a: na ca te mānuṣeṣv etat prayoktavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:123.076a: asāmānyam idaṃ tāta lokeṣv astraṃ nigadyate
GE07mbh_01_u:123.076c: tad dhārayethāḥ prayataḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_01_u:123.077a: bādhetāmānuṣaḥ śatrur yadā tvāṃ vīra kaś cana
GE07mbh_01_u:123.078a: tatheti tat pratiśrutya bībhatsuḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.078c: jagrāha paramāstraṃ tad āha cainaṃ punar guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:123.078e: bhavitā tvatsamo nānyaḥ pumāṃl loke dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:124.001a: kṛtāstrān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃś ca pāṇḍuputrāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:124.002c: gāṅgeyasya ca sāṃnidhye vyāsasya vidurasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:124.002d-1405_01: trayāṇām iva lokānāṃ prajāpatim iva sthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:124.003c: te darśayeyuḥ svāṃ śikṣāṃ rājann anumate tava
GE07mbh_01_u:124.004c: bhāradvāja mahat karma kṛtaṃ te dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:124.005a: yadā tu manyase kālaṃ yasmin deśe yathā yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:124.005c: tathā tathā vidhānāya svayam ājñāpayasva mām
GE07mbh_01_u:124.006c: astrahetoḥ parākrāntān ye me drakṣyanti putrakān
GE07mbh_01_u:124.007a: kṣattar yad gurur ācāryo bravīti kuru tat tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:124.007c: na hīdṛśaṃ priyaṃ manye bhavitā dharmavatsala
GE07mbh_01_u:124.009a: tasyāṃ bhūmau baliṃ cakre tithau nakṣatrapūjite
GE07mbh_01_u:124.009c: avaghuṣṭaṃ pure cāpi tadarthaṃ vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:124.010c: prekṣāgāraṃ suvihitaṃ cakrus tatra ca śilpinaḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0090: tataḥ śaraśataiḥ pārthaṃ pāñcālaḥ śīghram ardayat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0091: pārthas tu śaravarṣeṇa chādyamāno mahārathaḥ vegaṃ cakre mahāvego dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0093: tataḥ satyajitaś cāpaṃ chittvā rājānam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0094: athānyad dhanur ādāya satyajid vegavattaram sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ sarathaṃ pārthaṃ vivyādha satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0096: sa taṃ na mamṛṣe pārthaḥ pāñcālenārdito mṛdhe
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0097: tatas tasya vināśārthaṃ satvaraṃ vyasṛjac charān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0098: hayān dhvajaṃ dhanur muṣṭim ubhau tau pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0099: sa tathā bhidyamāneṣu kārmukeṣu punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0101: sa satyajitam ālokya tathā vimukham āhave
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0102: vegena mahatā rājann abhyadhāvata pārṣatam tadā cakre mahad yuddham arjuno jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0104: tasya pārtho dhvajaṃ chatraṃ dhanuś corvyām apātayat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0105: pañcabhis tasya vivyādha hayān sūtaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0106: tata utsṛjya tac cāpam ādadānaṃ śarāvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0107: khaḍgam udgṛhya kaunteyaḥ siṃhanādam athākarot pāñcālasya rathasyeṣām āplutya sahasānadat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0110: vikṣobhyāmbhonidhiṃ tārkṣyas taṃ nāgam iva so 'grahīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0111: tatas tu sarve pāñcālā vidravanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0112: darśayan sarvasainyānāṃ bāhvor balam athātmanaḥ siṃhanādasvanaṃ kṛtvā nirjagāma dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0114: āyāntam arjunaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumārāḥ sahitās tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0115: mamṛdus tasya nagaraṃ drupadasya mahātmanaḥ saṃbandhī kuruvīrāṇāṃ drupado rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0117: mā vadhīs tad balaṃ bhīma gurudānaṃ pradīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:128.004b-078_0118: bhīmasenas tadā rājann arjunena nivāritaḥ atṛpto yuddhadharmeṣu nyavartata mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.006a: bhagnadarpaṃ hṛtadhanaṃ tathā ca vaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.006c: sa vairaṃ manasā dhyātvā droṇo drupadam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.007a: pramṛdya tarasā rāṣṭraṃ puraṃ te mṛditaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.007c: prāpya jīvan ripuvaśaṃ sakhipūrvaṃ kim iṣyate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.008a: evam uktvā prahasyainaṃ niścitya punar abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.008c: mā bhaiḥ prāṇabhayād rājan kṣamiṇo brāhmaṇā vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.009a: āśrame krīḍitaṃ yat tu tvayā bālye mayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.009c: tena saṃvardhitaḥ snehas tvayā me kṣatriyarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.010a: prārthayeyaṃ tvayā sakhyaṃ punar eva nararṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.010c: varaṃ dadāmi te rājan rājyasyārdham avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.011a: arājā kila no rājñāṃ sakhā bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.011c: ataḥ prayatitaṃ rājye yajñasena mayā tava
GE07mbh_01_u:128.012c: sakhāyaṃ māṃ vijānīhi pāñcāla yadi manyase
GE07mbh_01_u:128.013c: prīye tvayāhaṃ tvattaś ca prītim icchāmi śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_01_u:128.014a: evam uktas tu taṃ droṇo mokṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:128.015e: dakṣiṇāṃś caiva pāñcālān yāvac carmaṇvatī nadī
GE07mbh_01_u:128.016a: droṇena vairaṃ drupadaḥ saṃsmaran na śaśāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.016c: kṣātreṇa ca balenāsya nāpaśyat sa parājayam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.017a: hīnaṃ viditvā cātmānaṃ brāhmaṇena balena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.017c: putrajanma parīpsan vai sa rājā tad adhārayat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018c: yudhi nirjitya pārthena droṇāya pratipāditā vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0001: droṇena vairaṃ drupado na suṣvāpa smaraṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0002: kṣātreṇa ca balenāsya nāśaśaṃse parājayam hīnaṃ viditvā cātmānaṃ brāhmaṇena balena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0004: drupadas tv amarṣān nṛpatiḥ karmasiddhyai dvijottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0006: nāsti śreṣṭhaṃ mamāpatyaṃ dhig bandhūn iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0008: na santi mama mitrāṇi loke 'smin nāsti vīryavān putrajanma parīpsan vai pṛthivīm anviyād imām
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0014: tatra nāsnātakaḥ kaś cin na cāsīd avrato dvijaḥ tathaiva tau mahābhāgau so 'paśyac chaṃsitavratau
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0017: saṃhitādhyayane yuktau gotrataś cāpi kāśyapau araṇye yuktarūpau tau brāhmaṇāv ṛṣisattamau
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0020: buddhvā tayor balaṃ buddhiṃ kanīyāṃsam upahvare
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0021: prapede chandayan kāmair upayājaṃ dhṛtavratam guruśuśrūṣaṇe yuktaḥ priyakṛt sarvakāmadaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0023: pādyenāsanadānena tathārghyeṇa phalaiś ca tam arcayitvā yathānyāyam upayājo 'bravīt tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0025: kena kāryaviśeṣeṇa tvam asmān abhikāṅkṣase kutaś cāyaṃ samudyogas tad bravītu bhavān iti
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0027: sa buddhvā prītisaṃyuktam ṛṣīṇām uttamaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0028: uvāca chandayan kāmair drupadaḥ sa tapasvinam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0029: yena me karmaṇā brahman putraḥ syād droṇamṛtyave
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0030: arjunasya tathā bhāryā bhaved yā varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0031: upayāja carasvaitat pradāsyāmy arbudaṃ gavām evam uktas tu tenarṣiḥ pratyuvāca punaś ca tam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0033: nāhaṃ phalārthī drupada yo 'rthī syāt tatra gamyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0034: pratyākhyātas tu tenaivaṃ sa vai sajjanasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0035: ārādhayiṣyan drupadaḥ sa taṃ paryacarat tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0038: jyeṣṭho bhrātā mamāgṛhṇād vicaran vananirjhare aparijñātaśaucāyāṃ bhūmau nipatitaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0040: tad apaśyam ahaṃ bhrātur asāṃpratam anuvrajan
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0041: vimarśaṃ ca phalādāne nāyaṃ kuryāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0042: yo nāpaśyat phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā doṣāṃs tasyānubandhikān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0043: vivinakti na śaucārthaṃ so 'nyatrāpi kathaṃ bhavet saṃhitādhyayanasyānte pañca yajñān nirūpya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0045: bhaikṣam uñchena sahitaṃ bhuñjānas tat tadā tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0046: kīrtayaty eva rājarṣe bhojanasya rasaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0047: saṃhitādhyayanaṃ kurvan vane gurukule vasan bhaikṣam ucchiṣṭam anyeṣāṃ bhuṅkte sma satataṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0049: kīrtayan guṇam annānām atha prīto muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0051: taṃ vai gaccheha nṛpate sa tvāṃ saṃyājayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0052: jugupsamāno nṛpatiḥ phalānāṃ kaluṣāṃ gatim upayājavacaḥ śrutvā drupadaḥ sarvadharmavit
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0054: bhṛśaṃ saṃpūjya pūjārham ṛṣiṃ yājam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0055: goyutāni dadāmy aṣṭau yāja yājaya māṃ vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0057: brahmabandhupraṇihitaṃ na kṣatraṃ kṣatriyo jayet tasmād droṇabhayārtaṃ māṃ bhavāṃs trātum ihārhati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0060: sa hi brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṣatrāstre cāpy anuttamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0061: tato droṇas tu mā jaiṣīt sakhivigrahakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0062: kṣatriyo nāsti tulyo 'sya pṛthivyāṃ kaś cid agraṇīḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0065: ṣaḍaratni dhanuś cāsya khaḍgam apratimaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0066: sa hi brāhmaṇavegena kṣatravegam asaṃśayam pratihatya caraty eva bhāradvājo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0069: sahitaṃ kṣatravegena brāhmaṃ vegaṃ hi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0070: upapannaṃ hi manye 'haṃ bhāradvājaṃ yaśasvinam kṣatracchedaparāyattaṃ jāmadagnyam ivodyatam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0072: neṣavas taṃ parākuryur na ca prāsā na cāsayaḥ brāhmaṃ tasya haret tejo mantrāhutihutaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0074: tasya hy astrabalaṃ ghoram aprasahyaṃ parair bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0076: brahmakṣatre ca sahite brahmatejo viśiṣyate so 'haṃ kṣatrabalād dhīno brahmatejaḥ prapedivān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0078: droṇād viśiṣṭam āsādya bhavantaṃ brahmavittamam droṇāntakam ahaṃ putraṃ labheyaṃ yudhi durjayam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0080: droṇamṛtyur yathā me 'dya putro jāyeta vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0081: tat karma kuru me yāja nirvapāmy arbudaṃ gavām tathety uktvā tu taṃ yājo yājyārthaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0083: mā bhais tvaṃ saṃpradātāsmi karmaṇā bhavataḥ sutam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0084: kṣipram uttiṣṭha cāvyagraḥ saṃbhārāṃś copakalpaya evam uktvā pratijñāya karma cāsyādade muniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0086: yājo droṇavināśāya yājayām āsa taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0087: gurvarthaṃ yājayan karma yājasyāpi samīpagaḥ tatas tasya narendrasya upayājo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0089: ācakhyau karma vaitānaṃ tadā putraphalāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0090: sa ca putro mahāvīryo mahātejā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0091: iṣyate yadvidho rājan bhavitā sa tathāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0093: ājahre taṃ tathā yajñaṃ drupadaḥ karmasiddhaye
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0094: brāhmaṇo dvipadāṃ śreṣṭho juhāva ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0095: kaukilīṃ nāma tāṃ tasya cakre vai putragṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0096: sautrāmaṇīṃ tu taṃ patnīṃ tataḥ kāle 'bhyayāt tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0097: yājas tu havanasyānte devīm āhvāpayat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0098: praihi vai rājñi pṛṣati mithunaṃ tvām upasthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0099: kumāraś ca kumārī ca pitṛvaṃśavivṛddhaye nāliptaṃ vai mama mukhaṃ puṇyān gandhān bibharmi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0101: na patnī te 'smi sūtyarthaṃ tiṣṭha yāja mama priye
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0103: kathaṃ kāmaṃ na saṃdadhyāt pṛṣati praihi tiṣṭha vā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0104: evam ukte tu yājena hute haviṣi saṃskṛte
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0105: uttasthau pāvakāt tasmāt kumāro devasaṃmitaḥ jvālārūpo ghoravarṇaḥ kirīṭī varma dhārayan
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0107: vīraḥ sakhaḍgaḥ saśaro dhanuṣmān vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0108: so 'dhyārohad rathavaraṃ tena ca prayayau tadā jātamātre kumāre ca vāk kilāntarhitābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0110: eṣa śiṣyaś ca mṛtyuś ca bhāradvājasya jāyate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0111: tataḥ praṇeduḥ pāñcālāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0113: rājñaḥ śokāpaho jāta eṣa droṇavadhāya hi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0114: ity avocan mahad bhūtam adṛśyaṃ khecaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0115: dvitīyāyāṃ ca hotrāyāṃ hute haviṣi mantrite
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0116: kumārī caiva pāñcālī vedimadhyāt samutthitā pratyākhyāte pṛṣatyā ca yājake bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0121: mānuṣaṃ vigrahaṃ kṛtvā sākṣād amaravarṇinī nīlotpalasamo gandho yasyāḥ krośāt pravāyati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0123: yā bibharti paraṃ rūpaṃ yasyā nāsty upamā bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0125: tāṃ cāpi jātāṃ suśroṇīṃ vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0126: sarvayoṣidvarā kṛṣṇā kṣayaṃ kṣatraṃ ninīṣati surakāryam iyaṃ kāle kariṣyati sumadhyamā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0128: asyā hetoḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahad utpatsyate bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0129: tac chrutvā sarvapāñcālāḥ praṇeduḥ siṃhasaṃghavat na cainān harṣasaṃpūrṇān iyaṃ sehe vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0131: tathā tu mithunaṃ jajñe drupadasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0132: kumāraś ca kumārī ca manojñau bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0133: śriyā paramayā yuktau kṣātreṇa vapuṣā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0134: tau dṛṣṭvā pṛṣatī rājan prapede sā sutārthinī
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0135: na vai mad anyāṃ jananīṃ jānīyātām imāv iti tathety uvāca tāṃ yājo rājñaḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0137: tayos tu nāmanī cakrur dvijāḥ saṃpūrṇamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0138: dhṛṣṭatvād apradhṛṣyatvāt dharmād dyumnabhavād api dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ kumāro 'yaṃ drupadasya bhavatv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0140: kṛṣṇety evābruvan kṛṣṇāṃ kṛṣṇābhūt sā hi varṇataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0141: tathā tan mithunaṃ jajñe drupadasya mahāmakhe
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0142: vaidikādhyayane pāraṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno gatas tadā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tu pañcālyam ānīya drupadātmajam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0145: amokṣaṇīyaṃ daivaṃ hi bhāvitatvān mahāmatiḥ tathā tat kṛtavān droṇa ātmakīrtyartharakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0147: sarvāstrāṇi tu sa kṣipram āptavān dṛṣṭamātrayā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0148: drupadasyāpi brahmarṣe śrotum icchāmi saṃbhavam kathaṃ cāpi samutpannaḥ katham astrāṇy avāptavān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0150: etad icchāmi bhagavaṃs tvattaḥ śrotuṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0151: kautuhalaṃ janmasu me kathyamāneṣv atīva hi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0152: rājā babhūva pāñcālaḥ putrārthī putrakāraṇāt vanaṃ gatvā mahārājas tapas tepe sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0156: kālas tu sumahān rājan pratyayāt sutakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0157: sa tu rājā mahāvīryas tapas tīvraṃ samādade
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0158: kiṃ cit kālaṃ vāyubhakṣo nirāhāras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0159: tasyaivaṃ tu mahābāho vartamānasya bhārata kālas tatra mahān rājan pratyayān nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0161: tataḥ prāpte mahārāja vasante kāmadīpane phullāśokavane kāle prāṇināṃ sumanohare
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0163: nadyās tīram atho gatvā gaṅgāyāḥ padmalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0164: niyamasthaḥ sa rājāsīt tadā bharatasattama tato nāticirāt kālād vanaṃ tan manujeśvara
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0166: saṃprāptā sahasā rājan menaketi pariśrutā nadyās tīre carantī vai krīḍantī ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0169: na dadarśa tu sā rājaṃs tathā sthānagataṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0170: dṛṣṭvā cāpsarasaṃ tāṃ tu śuklaṃ rājño 'patad bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0171: tac ca rājā tu rājendra lajjayā nṛpatiḥ svayam padbhyām ākramatāyuṣmaṃs tatas tu drupado 'bhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0173: tatas tu tasya tapasā rājarṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0174: putraḥ samabhavat tv ārdrāt pādāntasyāntareṇa tu
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0175: te tasya ṛṣayaḥ sarve samāgamya tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0176: nāma cakrar hi vidvāṃso drupado 'stv iti bhūmipa sa tasyaivāśrame rājan bharadvājasya bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0178: vavṛdhe ca sukhaṃ tatra kāmaiḥ sarvair nṛpottama
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0179: pāñcālo 'pi hi rājendra svarājyaṃ gatavān prabhuḥ bharadvājasya śikṣārthaṃ sutaṃ dattvā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0181: sa kumāras tato rājan droṇena sahito vane
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0182: vedāṃś cādhijage sāṅgān dhanurvedaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0183: parayā sa mudā yukto vicacāra vane sukham
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0184: tasyaivaṃ vartamānasya vane vanacaraiḥ saha kālān nāticirād rājan pitā svargam upeyivān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0186: sa samāgamya pāñcālaiḥ pāñcāleṣv abhiṣecitaḥ prāptaś ca rājyaṃ rājendra suhṛdāṃ prītivardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0188: rājyaṃ rarakṣa dharmeṇa yathā cendras triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0189: etan mayā te rājendra yathāvat parikīrtitam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0190: drupadasya janma rājarṣe dhṛṣṭadyumnasya caiva hi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0191: dhṛtarāṣṭras tu rājendra yadā pauravanandanaḥ yudhiṣṭhiram ajānād vai samarthaṃ rājyadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-079_0194: te tu buddhvānvatapyanta dhṛtarāṣṭrātmajās tadā vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0004: bhṛtyānām anukampāc ca tathaiva sthirasauhṛdāt tato 'dīrgheṇa kālena kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0007: asiyuddhe gadāyuddhe rathayuddhe ca pāṇḍavaḥ saṃkarṣaṇād aśikṣad vai śaśvac chikṣāṃ vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0009: samāptaśikṣo bhīmas tu dyumatsenasamo bale parākrameṇa saṃpanno bhrātṝṇām acarad vaśe
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0014: lāghave sauṣṭhave caiva nānyaḥ kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0015: bībhatsusadṛśo loke iti droṇo vyavasthitaḥ tato 'bravīd guḍākeśaṃ droṇaḥ kauravasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0017: agastyasya dhanurvede śiṣyo mama guruḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0018: agniveśya iti khyātas tasya śiṣyo 'smi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0019: tīrthāt tīrthaṃ gamayitum aham etat samudyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0020: tapasā yan mayā prāptam amogham aniśaprabham
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0021: astraṃ brahmaśiro nāma yad dahet pṛthivīm api
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0022: dadatā guruṇā coktaṃ na manuṣyeṣv idaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0023: bhāradvāja vimoktavyam alpavīryeṣv api prabho yat tvayāptam idaṃ vīra divyaṃ nānyo 'rhati tv idam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0025: samayas tu tvayā rakṣyo munisṛṣṭo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0029: tatheti ca pratijñāya droṇāya kurupuṃgavaḥ upasaṃgṛhya caraṇau sa prāyād uttarāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0031: svabhāvād agamac chabdo mahīṃ sāgaramekhalām arjunasya samo loke nāsti kaś cid dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0034: pāragaś ca dhanuryuddhe babhūvātha dhanaṃjayaḥ nītimān sakalāṃ nītiṃ vibudhādhipates tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0037: droṇenaiva vinītaś ca bhrātṝṇāṃ nakulaḥ priyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0040: arjunapramukhaiḥ pārthaiḥ sauvīraḥ samare hataḥ na śaśāka vaśe kartuṃ yaṃ pāṇḍur api vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0043: atīva balasaṃpannaḥ sadā mānī kurūn prati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0044: vittalo nāma sauvīraḥ śastaḥ pārthena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0049: tathaivaikaratho gatvā dakṣiṇām ajayad diśam dhanaughaṃ prāpayām āsa kururāṣṭraṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-080_0055: sa cintāparamo rājā na nidrām alabhan niśi vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0007: kaṇika matam ācakṣva kariṣye 'haṃ vacas tava sa prasannamanās tena paripṛṣṭo dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0010: śṛṇu rājann idaṃ tatra procyamānaṃ mayānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0012: nityam udyatadaṇḍaḥ syān nityaṃ vivṛtapauruṣaḥ acchidraś chidradarśī syāt pareṣāṃ vivarānugaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0014: nityam udyatadaṇḍād dhi bhṛśam udvijate janaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0015: tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi daṇḍenaiva vidhārayet nāsya cchidraṃ paraḥ paśyec chidreṇa param anviyāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0017: gūhet kūrma ivāṅgāni rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0018: nāsamyak kṛtakārī syād upakramya kadā cana
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0019: kaṇṭako hy api duśchinna āsrāvaṃ janayec ciram
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0020: vadham eva praśaṃsanti śatrūṇām apakāriṇām suvidīrṇaṃ suvikrāntaṃ suyuddhaṃ supalāyitam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0022: āpady āpadi kāle ca kurvīta na vicārayet
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0023: nāvajñeyo ripus tāta durbalo 'pi kathaṃ cana alpo 'py agnir vanaṃ kṛtsnaṃ dahaty āśrayasaṃśrayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0025: andhaḥ syād andhavelāyāṃ bādhiryam api cāśrayet
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0026: kuryāt tṛṇamayaṃ cāpaṃ śayīta mṛgaśāyikām sāntvādibhir upāyais tu hanyāc chatruṃ vaśe sthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0028: dayā tasmin na kartavyā śaraṇāgata ity uta
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0029: nirudvigno hi bhavati na hatāj jāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0030: hanyād amitraṃ dānena tathā pūrvāpakāriṇam hanyāt trīn pañca sapteti parapakṣasya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0032: mūlam evāditaś chindyāt parapakṣasya nityaśaḥ tataḥ sahāyāṃs tatpakṣān sarvāṃś ca tadanantaram
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0034: chinnamūle hy adhiṣṭhāne sarve tajjīvino hatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0035: kathaṃ nu śākhās tiṣṭheraṃś chinnamūle vanaspatau
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0036: ekāgraḥ syād avivṛto nityaṃ vivaradarśakaḥ rājan rājyaṃ sapatneṣu nityodvignaḥ samācaret
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0039: lokān viśvāsayitvā ca tato lumped yathā vṛkaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0040: aṅkuśaṃ śaucam ity āhur arthānām upadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0041: ānāmya phalinīṃ śākhāṃ pakvaṃ pakvaṃ praśātayet
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0043: vahed amitraṃ skandhena yādat kālasya paryayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0044: tataḥ paryāgate kāle bhindyād ghaṭam ivāśmani
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0045: amitro na vimoktavyaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bahv api bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0046: kṛpā tasmin na kartavyā hanyād evāpakāriṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0047: hanyād amitraṃ sāntvena tathā dānena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0049: kathaṃ sāntvena dānena bhedair daṇḍena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0050: amitraḥ śakyate hantuṃ tan me brūhi yathātatham
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0051: śṛṇu rājan yathā vṛttaṃ vane nivasataḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0053: atha kaś cit kṛtaprajñaḥ śṛgālaḥ svārthapaṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0056: aśaktā grahaṇe tasya tato mantram amantrayan
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0057: asakṛd yatito hy eṣa hantuṃ vyāghra vane tvayā yuvā vai javasaṃpanno buddhiśālī na śakyate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0060: athainaṃ bhakṣitaiḥ pādair vyāghro gṛhṇātu vai tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0061: tato vai bhakṣayiṣyāmaḥ sarve muditamānasāḥ jambukasya tu tad vākyaṃ tathā cakruḥ samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0064: dṛṣṭvā viceṣṭamānaṃ tu bhūmau mṛgakalevaram snātvāgacchata bhadraṃ vo rakṣāmīty āha jambukaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0066: śṛgālavacanāt te 'pi gatāḥ sarve nadīṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0067: sa cintāparamo bhūtvā tasthau tatraiva jambukaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0068: athājagāma pūrvaṃ tu snātvā vyāghro mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0070: kiṃ śocasi mahāprājña tvaṃ no buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0071: aśitvā piśitāny adya vihariṣyāmahe vayam śṛṇu me tvaṃ mahābāho yad vākyaṃ mūṣiko 'bravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0073: dhig balaṃ mṛgarājasya mayādyāyaṃ mṛgo hataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0074: madbāhubalam āśritya tṛptim adya gamiṣyati garjamānasya tasyaivam ato bhakṣyaṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0076: bravīti yadi sa hy evaṃ kāle hy asmin prabodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0078: khādiṣye tatra māṃsāni ity uktvā prasthito vanam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0079: etasminn eva kāle tu mūṣiko 'pyājagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0080: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya śṛgālo 'py abravīd vacaḥ śṛṇu mūṣika bhadraṃ te nakulo yad ihābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0082: mṛgamāṃsaṃ na khādeyaṃ garam etan na rocate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0083: mūṣikaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi tad bhavān anumanyatām tac chrutvā mūṣiko vākyaṃ saṃtrastaḥ prādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0085: tataḥ snātvā sa vai tatra ājagāma vṛko nṛpa tam āgatam idaṃ vākyam abravīj jambukas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0087: mṛgarājo hi saṃkruddho na te sādhu bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0088: sakalatras tv ihāyāti kuruṣva yad anantaram
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0089: evaṃ saṃcoditas tena jambukena tadā vṛkaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0091: etasminn eva kāle tu nakulo 'py ājagāma ha tam uvāca mahārāja nakulaṃ jambuko vane
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0094: mama dattvā niyuddhaṃ tvaṃ bhuṅkṣva māṃsaṃ yathepsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0095: mṛgarājo vṛkaś caiva buddhimān api mūṣikaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0096: nirjitā yat tvayā vīrās tasmād vīrataro bhavān
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0097: na tvayābhyutsahe yoddhum ity uktvā so 'py upāgamat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0098: evaṃ teṣu prayāteṣu jambuko hṛṣṭamānasaḥ khādati sma tadā māṃsam ekaḥ san mantraniścayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0100: evaṃ samācaran nityaṃ sukham edhati bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0101: bhayena bhedayed bhīruṃ śūram añjalikarmaṇā lubdham arthapradānena samaṃ nyūnaṃ tathaujasā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0103: evaṃ te kathitaṃ rājañ śṛṇu cāpy aparaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0104: putraḥ sakhā vā bhrātā vā pitā vā yadi vā guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0106: śapathenāpy ariṃ hanyād arthadānena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0107: viṣeṇa māyayā vāpi nopekṣeta kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0108: ubhau cet saṃśayopetau śraddhāvāṃs tatra vardhate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0109: guror apy avaliptasya kāryākāryam ajānataḥ utpathapratipannasya nyāyyaṃ bhavati śāsanam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0112: na cāpy anyam apadhvaṃset kadā cit kopasaṃyutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0113: prahariṣyan priyaṃ brūyāt praharann api bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0114: prahṛtya ca kṛpāyīta śoceta ca rudeta ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0116: athāsya praharet kāle yadā vicalite pathi
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0117: api ghorāparādhasya dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhataḥ sa hi pracchādyate doṣaḥ śailo meghair ivāsitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0119: yaḥ syād anuprāptavadhas tasyāgāraṃ pradīpayet adhanān dāmbhikāṃś corān viṣye sve na vāsayet
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0123: aśaṅkitebhyaḥ śaṅketa śaṅkitebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ aśaṅkyād bhayam utpannam api mūlaṃ nikṛntati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0125: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste nātiviśvaset viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0127: cāraḥ suvihitaḥ kārya ātmanaś ca parasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0128: pāṣaṇḍāṃs tāpasādīṃś ca pararāṣṭreṣu yojayet udyāneṣu vihāreṣu devatāyataneṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0130: pānāgāreṣu rathyāsu sarvatīrtheṣu cāpy atha catvareṣu ca dyūteṣu parvateṣu vaneṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0132: samavāyeṣu sarveṣu saritsu ca vicārayet vācā bhṛśaṃ vinītaḥ syād hṛdayena tathā kṣuraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0134: ślakṣṇapūrvābhibhāṣī syāt sṛṣṭo raudreṇa karmaṇā añjaliṃ śapathaṃ sāntvaṃ śirasā pādavandanam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0136: āśākaraṇam ity ekaṃ kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0137: supuṣpitaḥ syād aphalaḥ phalavān syād durāruhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0138: āmaḥ syāt pakvasaṃkāśo na ca jīryeta karhi cit trivarge trividhā pīḍā anubandhās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0140: anubandhāḥ śubhā jñeyāḥ pīḍās tu parivarjayet
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0141: dharmaṃ vicarataḥ pīḍā sāpi dvābhyāṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0144: avekṣitārthaḥ śuddhātmā mantrayīta dvijaiḥ saha karmaṇā yena teneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0146: uddhared dīnam ātmānaṃ samartho dharmam ācaret
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0147: na saṃśayam anārūḍho naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0148: saṃśayaṃ punar āruhya yadi jīvati paśyati
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0149: yasya buddhiḥ paribhavet tam atītena sāntvayet
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0152: sa vṛkṣāgre yathā suptaḥ patitaḥ pratibudhyate
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0154: ākāraś cātmano rakṣyaś cāreṇāpy anupālitaḥ nācchitvā paramarmāṇi nākṛtvā karma dāruṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0160: tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sāvaśeṣāṇi kārayet saṃgrahe vigrahe caiva yatnaḥ kāryo 'nasūyatā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0162: utsāhaś cāpi yatnena kartavyo bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0163: nāsya kṛtyāni budhyeran mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0164: ārabdhāny eva paśyeran suparyavasitāni ca bhītavat saṃvidhātavyaṃ yāvad bhayam anāgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0166: āgataṃ tu bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahartavyam abhītavat
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0167: daṇḍenopanataṃ śatrum anugṛhṇāti yo naraḥ sa mṛtyum upagṛhyāste garbham aśvatarī yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0169: anāgataṃ hi budhyeta yac ca kāryaṃ puraḥ sthitam na tu buddhikṣayāt kiṃ cid atikrāmet prayojanam
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0171: utsāhaś cāpi yatnena kartavyo bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0172: vibhajya deśakālau ca daivaṃ dharmādayas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0173: naiḥśreyasau tu tau jñeyau deśakālāv iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0174: tālavat kurute mūlaṃ bālaḥ śatrur upekṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0176: agniṃ stokam ivātmānaṃ saṃdhukṣayati yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:128.018d-081_0177: sa vardhamāno grasate mahāntam api saṃcayam

GE07mbh_01_u:133.001a: pāṇḍavās tu rathān yuktvā sadaśvair anilopamaiḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:133.010a: piteva hi nṛpo 'smākam abhūc chāṃtanavaḥ purā

GE07mbh_01_u:133.012a: vayam etad amṛṣyantaḥ sarva eva purottamāt
