GE07mbh_01_u:135.018c: sa tatra ca gṛhadvāri vasaty aśubhadhīḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:135.019a: tatra te sāyudhāḥ sarve vasanti sma kṣapāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:135.019c: divā caranti mṛgayāṃ pāṇḍaveyā vanād vanam
GE07mbh_01_u:136.001c: viśvastān iva saṃlakṣya harṣaṃ cakre purocanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.003a: asmān ayaṃ suviśvastān vetti pāpaḥ purocanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.005c: cakre niśi mahad rājann ājagmus tatra yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.006a: tā vihṛtya yathākāmaṃ bhuktvā pītvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:136.006c: jagmur niśi gṛhān eva samanujñāpya mādhavīm
GE07mbh_01_u:136.007a: niṣādī pañcaputrā tu tasmin bhojye yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_01_u:136.007d-1476_01: pāpā ca pañcaputrā sā pṛthāyāḥ sakhimāninī
GE07mbh_01_u:136.008a: sā pītvā madirāṃ mattā saputrā madavihvalā
GE07mbh_01_u:136.008c: saha sarvaiḥ sutai rājaṃs tasminn eva niveśane
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009a: atha pravāte tumule niśi supte jane vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009c: tad upādīpayad bhīmaḥ śete yatra purocanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009d-1477_02: samantato dadau paścād agniṃ tatra niveśane
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009d-1477_03: jñātvā tu tad gṛhaṃ sarvam ādīptaṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009d-1477_04: suraṅgāṃ (!) viviśus tūrṇaṃ mātrā sārdham ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009d-1478_01: pūrvam eva bilaṃ śodhya bhīmaseno mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009d-1478_02: pāṇḍavaiḥ sahitāṃ kuntīṃ prāveśayata tad bilam
GE07mbh_01_u:136.009d-1478_03: dattvāgniṃ sahasā bhīmo nirjagāma bilena saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.010a: tataḥ pratāpaḥ sumahāñ śabdaś caiva vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.010c: prādurāsīt tadā tena bubudhe sa janavrajaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.010d-1480_01: tad avekṣya gṛhaṃ dīptam āhuḥ paurāḥ kṛśānanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.011c: gṛham ātmavināśāya kāritaṃ dāhitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_01_u:136.011d-1481_01: aho dhik pāṇḍavāḥ sarve dahyanta iti cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.011d-1481_02: cakruś ca paramaṃ yatnaṃ narās teṣāṃ pramokṣaṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:136.011d-1481_03: tatas te jātuṣaṃ veśma dadṛśū romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:136.012c: yaḥ śucīn pāṇḍavān bālān dāhayām āsa mantriṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:136.013a: diṣṭyā tv idānīṃ pāpātmā dagdho 'yam atidurmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.014a: evaṃ te vilapanti sma vāraṇāvatakā janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.014c: parivārya gṛhaṃ tac ca tasthū rātrau samantataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.015a: pāṇḍavāś cāpi te rājan mātrā saha suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.015c: bilena tena nirgatya jagmur gūḍham alakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.016c: na śekuḥ sahasā gantuṃ saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.017c: jagāma bhrātṝn ādāya sarvān mātaram eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:136.018a: skandham āropya jananīṃ yamāv aṅkena vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:136.018d-1483_01: bilena yojanaṃ dūraṃ gatvā siddhapade śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:136.018d-1483_03: bilān nirgatya sahasā bhrātṝn mātaram eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:136.018d-1483_04: gaṅgātīravanaṃ prāpya vahan prāyāt sa mārutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019a: tarasā pādapān bhañjan mahīṃ padbhyāṃ vidārayan
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0000: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca etasminn eva kāle tu yathāsaṃpraty ayaṃ kaviḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0002: viduraḥ preṣayām āsa tadvanaṃ puruṣaṃ śucim
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0003: sa gatvā tu yathoddeśaṃ pāṇḍavān dadṛśe vane
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0004: jananyā saha kauravya māpayānān nadījalam viditaṃ tan mahābuddher vidurasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0007: tataḥ saṃpreṣito vidvān vidureṇa naras tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0010: śive bhāgīrathītīre narair visrambhibhiḥ kṛtām tataḥ punar athovāca jñāpakaṃ pūrvacoditam
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0014: na hantīty evam ātmānaṃ yo rakṣati sa jīvati
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0015: tena māṃ preṣitaṃ viddhi viśvastaṃ saṃjñayānayā
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0016: bhūyaś caivāha māṃ kṣattā viduraḥ sarvato 'rthavit
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0017: karṇaṃ duryodhanaṃ caiva bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0018: śakuniṃ caiva kaunteya vijetāsi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0019: iyaṃ vāripathe yuktā naur apsu sukhagāminī
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0020: mocayiṣyati vaḥ sarvān asmād deśān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0021: atha tān vyathitān dṛṣṭvā saha mātrā narottamān
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0022: nāvam āropya gaṅgāyāṃ prasthitān abravīt punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0023: viduro mūrdhny upāghrāya pariṣvajya ca vo muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0024: ariṣṭaṃ gacchatāvyagrāḥ panthānam iti cābravīt ity uktvā sa tu tān vīrān pumān viduracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0026: tārayām āsa rājendra gaṅgāṃ nāvā nararṣabhān
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0027: tārayitvā tato gaṅgāṃ pāraṃ prāptāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0028: jayāśiṣaḥ prayujyātha yathāgatam agād dhi saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0029: pāṇḍavāś ca mahātmānaḥ pratisaṃdiśya vai kaveḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:136.019d-085_0030: gaṅgām uttīrya vegena jagmur gūḍham alakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.001a: atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyām aśeṣo nāgaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.002a: nirvāpayanto jvalanaṃ te janā dadṛśus tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.002c: jātuṣaṃ tad gṛhaṃ dagdham amātyaṃ ca purocanam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.003c: pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśāya ity evaṃ cukruṣur janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.004c: dagdhavān pāṇḍudāyādān na hy enaṃ pratiṣiddhavān
GE07mbh_01_u:137.005a: nūnaṃ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo na dharmam anuvartate
GE07mbh_01_u:137.005c: droṇaś ca viduraś caiva kṛpaś cānye ca kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.005d-1485_01: nāvekṣante hataṃ dharmaṃ dharmajñā apy aho vidhe
GE07mbh_01_u:137.006c: saṃvṛttas te paraḥ kāmaḥ pāṇḍavān dagdhavān asi
GE07mbh_01_u:137.007d-1486_01: itaḥ paśyata kuntīyaṃ dagdhā śete yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:137.007d-1486_02: putraiḥ sahaiva vārṣṇeyī hanta paśyata nāgarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.008a: khanakena tu tenaiva veśma śodhayatā bilam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.008d-1487_01: ity eva sarve śocantaḥ pṛthak caiva tathābruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:137.009a: tatas te preṣayām āsur dhṛtarāṣṭrasya nāgarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.009c: pāṇḍavān agninā dagdhān amātyaṃ ca purocanam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.010a: śrutvā tu dhṛtarāṣṭras tad rājā sumahad apriyam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.010d-1488_02: antaḥ śīto bahiś coṣṇo grīṣme 'gādhahrado yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.011a: adya pāṇḍur mṛto rājā bhrātā mama sudurlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.011c: teṣu vīreṣu dagdheṣu mātrā saha viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.012c: satkārayantu tān vīrān kuntirājasutāṃ ca tām
GE07mbh_01_u:137.013a: kārayantu ca kulyāni śubhrāṇi ca mahānti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:137.013c: ye ca tatra mṛtās teṣāṃ suhṛdo 'rcantu tān api
GE07mbh_01_u:137.014a: evaṃgate mayā śakyaṃ yad yat kārayituṃ hitam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.014c: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca kuntyāś ca tat sarvaṃ kriyatāṃ dhanaiḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.014d-1490_01: sametās tu tataḥ sarve bhīṣmeṇa saha kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.014d-1490_02: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputraś ca gaṅgām abhimukhā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.014d-1491_02: acchatrāś cāntarā rājan gaṅgām abhimukhā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.015a: evam uktvā tataś cakre jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016b-1492_01: hā yudhiṣṭhira kauravya hā bhīma iti cāpare
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016b-1492_02: hā phālguneti cāpy anye hā yamāv iti cāpare
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016b-1492_03: kuntīm ārtāś ca śocanta udakaṃ cakrire janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016b-1493_01: aho rūpaṃ tu lāvaṇyam atha vidyābalaṃ muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016b-1493_02: aucityam athavā prema kiṃ kiṃ śocāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016b-1493_03: ity evaṃ bahu bhāṣanto rurudur nāgarā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016c: viduras tv alpaśaś cakre śokaṃ veda paraṃ hi saḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0001: tataḥ pravyathito bhīṣmaḥ pāṇḍurājasutān mṛtān mātrā saheti tāñ śrutvā vilalāpa ruroda ca
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0003: hā yudhiṣṭhira hā bhīma hā dhanaṃjaya hā yamau hā pṛthe saha putrais tvam ekarātreṇa svargatā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0005: mātrā saha kumārās te sarve tatraiva saṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0006: na hi tau notsaheyātāṃ bhīmasenadhanaṃjayau tarasā vegitātmānau nirbhettum api mandiram
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0008: parāsutvaṃ na paśyāmi pṛthāyāḥ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0009: sarvathā vikṛtaṃ tat tu yadi te nidhanaṃ gatāḥ dharmarājaḥ sa nirdiṣṭo nanu viprair yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0011: pṛthivyāṃ caratāṃ śreṣṭho bhavitā sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0013: kathaṃ kālavaśaṃ prāptaḥ pāṇḍaveyo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ātmānam upamāṃ kṛtvā pareṣāṃ vartate tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0015: saha mātrā tu kauravyaḥ kathaṃ kālavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0016: paripālitaś ciraṃ kālaṃ phalakāle yathā drumaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0017: bhagnaḥ syād vāyuvegena tathā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0019: ātmanaś ca pituś caiva satyadharmāryavṛttibhiḥ sa brahmaṇyaḥ paraprekṣī hṛdi śokaṃ nidhāya me
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0021: kālena sa hi saṃbhagno dhik kṛtāntam anarthadam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0022: yac ca sā vanavāsena kleśitā duḥkhabhāginī
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0023: putragṛdhnutayā kuntī na bhartāraṃ mṛtā tv anu
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0024: alpakālaṃ kule jātā bhartuḥ prītim avāpa yā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0025: dagdhādya saha putraiḥ sā asaṃpūrṇamanorathā etac ca cintayānasya bahudhā vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0027: avadhūya ca me dehaṃ hṛdaye 'gnir na dīryate pīnaskandhaś cārubāhur merukūṭasamo yuvā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0029: mṛto bhīma iti śrutvā mano na śraddadhāti me atityāgī ca yogī ca kṣiprahasto dṛḍhāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0032: dūrapātī tv asaṃbhrānto mahāvīryo mahāstravit adīnātmā naravyāghraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0034: yena prācyās tu sauvīrā dākṣiṇātyāś ca nirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0035: khyāpitaṃ yena śūreṇa triṣu lokeṣu pauruṣam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0036: yasmiñ jāte viśokābhūt kuntī pāṇḍuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0037: puraṃdarasamo jiṣṇuḥ kathaṃ kālavaśaṃ gataḥ kathaṃ tau vṛṣabhaskandhau siṃhavikrāntagāminau
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0040: tasya vikranditaṃ śrutvā udakaṃ ca prasiñcataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0042: mā śocas tvaṃ naravyāghra jahi śokaṃ mahāvrata
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0043: na teṣāṃ vidyate pāpaṃ prāptakālaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0044: tac ca tebhyaḥ sa udakaṃ vipraṣiñcatu bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0045: so 'bravīt kiṃ cid uccārya kauravāṇām aśṛṇvatām kṣattāram anusaṃgṛhya bāṣpotpīḍakalasvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0047: kathaṃ te tāta jīvanti pāṇḍoḥ putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0048: katham asmatkṛte pakṣaḥ pāṇḍor na hi nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0049: kathaṃ matpramukhāḥ sarve pramuktā mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0050: jananī garuḍeneva kumārās te samuddhṛtāḥ evam uktas tu kauravyaḥ kauravāṇām aśṛṇvatām
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0053: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya śakuneḥ rājño duryodhanasya ca vināśe pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ kṛto mativiniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0055: tatrāham api ca jñātvā tasya pāpasya niścayam
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0056: taṃ jighāṃsur ahaṃ cāpi teṣām anumate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0058: pṛthāyāś ca saputrāyā dhārtarāṣṭrasya śāsanāt tataḥ khanakam āhūya suraṅgāṃ vai bile tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0060: saguhāṃ kārayitvā te kuntyā pāṇḍusutās tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0061: niṣkrāmitā mayā pūrvaṃ mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ tatas tu nāvam āropya sahaputrāṃ pṛthām aham
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0063: dattvābhayaṃ saputrāyai kuntyai gṛham adāhayam tasmāt te mā sma bhūd duḥkhaṃ muktāḥ pāpāt tu pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0065: nirgatāḥ pāṇḍavā rājan mātrā saha paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0066: agnidāhān mahāghorān mayā tasmād upāyataḥ mā sma śokam imaṃ kārṣīr jīvanty eva ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0068: pracchannā vicariṣyanti yāvat kālasya paryayaḥ tasmin yudhiṣṭhiraṃ kāle drakṣyanti bhuvi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0071: na tasya nāśaṃ paśyāmi yasya bhrātā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.016d-086_0072: bhīmasenaś ca durdharṣo mādrīputrau ca bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:137.017c: javena prayayū rājan dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.019c: punar ūcur mahāvīryaṃ bhīmasenam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.020a: itaḥ kaṣṭataraṃ kiṃ nu yad vayaṃ gahane vane
GE07mbh_01_u:137.020c: diśaś ca na prajānīmo gantuṃ caiva na śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.021a: taṃ ca pāpaṃ na jānīmo yadi dagdhaḥ purocanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.021c: kathaṃ nu vipramucyema bhayād asmād alakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:137.022a: punar asmān upādāya tathaiva vraja bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:137.022c: tvaṃ hi no balavān eko yathā satatagas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:137.023c: ādāya kuntīṃ bhrātṝṃś ca jagāmāśu mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:138.002a: sa mṛdnan puṣpitāṃś caiva phalitāṃś ca vanaspatīn
GE07mbh_01_u:138.002c: ārujan dārugulmāṃś ca pathas tasya samīpajān
GE07mbh_01_u:138.002d-1497_01: sa roṣita iva kruddho vane bhañjan mahādrumān
GE07mbh_01_u:138.004b-1500_01: mātaraṃ ca vahan bhrātṝn aśrameṇa samīrajaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:138.005a: kṛcchreṇa mātaraṃ tv ekāṃ sukumārīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:138.005c: avahat tatra pṛṣṭhena rodhaḥsu viṣameṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:138.007c: aprakāśā diśaḥ sarvā vātair āsann anārtavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:138.008a: te śrameṇa ca kauravyās tṛṣṇayā ca prapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:138.008c: nāśaknuvaṃs tadā gantuṃ nidrayā ca pravṛddhayā
GE07mbh_01_u:138.008d-1502_01: atīva gahanaṃ ghoraṃ durvijñeyapathaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:138.008d-1503_01: nyaviśanta hi te sarve nirāsvāde mahāvane
GE07mbh_01_u:138.008d-1503_03: mātā satī pāṇḍavānāṃ pañcānāṃ madhyataḥ sthitā
GE07mbh_01_u:138.008d-1503_04: tṛṣṇayā hi parītāsmi putrān bhṛśam athābravīt

GE07mbh_01_u:142.014a: tau te dadṛśur āsaktau vikarṣantau parasparam

GE07mbh_01_u:142.016d-1541_01: te paśyanto mahad yuddhaṃ sarve vyathitacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.017a: rākṣasena tathā bhīmaṃ kliśyamānaṃ nirīkṣya tu
GE07mbh_01_u:142.017c: uvācedaṃ vacaḥ pārthaḥ prahasañ śanakair iva
GE07mbh_01_u:142.018a: bhīma mā bhair mahābāho na tvāṃ budhyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:142.020a: udāsīno nirīkṣasva na kāryaḥ saṃbhramas tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:142.020c: na jātv ayaṃ punar jīven madbāhvantaram āgataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.020d-1543_02: amuktvā pārtha vīryeṇa mṛto mā bhūd iti dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.020d-1543_03: ayam asmān na no hanyāj jātu vai pārtha rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.020d-1543_04: jīvantaṃ na pramokṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīr bharatarṣabha arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:142.021-1544_02: kṣapā vyuṣṭā na cedānīṃ samāpto 'si mahāraṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:142.021a: kim anena ciraṃ bhīma jīvatā pāparakṣasā
GE07mbh_01_u:142.021c: gantavyaṃ na ciraṃ sthātum iha śakyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_01_u:142.022a: purā saṃrajyate prācī purā saṃdhyā pravartate
GE07mbh_01_u:142.022c: raudre muhūrte rakṣāṃsi prabalāni bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:142.023a: tvarasva bhīma mā krīḍa jahi rakṣo vibhīṣaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:142.023c: purā vikurute māyāṃ bhujayoḥ sāram arpaya
GE07mbh_01_u:142.023d-1545_02: rakṣo jahi yathā śakraḥ purā vṛtraṃ mahāvane
GE07mbh_01_u:142.024a: arjunenaivam uktas tu bhīmo bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.024a-1546_02: balam āhārayām āsa yad vāyor jagataḥ kṣaye
GE07mbh_01_u:142.024d-1547_01: iti covāca saṃkruddho bhrāmayan rākṣasaṃ tu saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.025a: vṛthāmāṃsair vṛthā puṣṭo vṛthā vṛddho vṛthāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.025c: vṛthāmaraṇam arhas tvaṃ vṛthādya na bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:142.025d-1548_01: kṣemam adya kariṣyāmi yathā vanam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_01_u:142.025d-1548_02: na punar mānuṣān hatvā bhakṣayiṣyasi rākṣasa
GE07mbh_01_u:142.026a: atha vā manyase bhāraṃ tvam imaṃ rākṣasaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_01_u:142.026c: karomi tava sāhāyyaṃ śīghram eva nihanyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:142.027a: atha vāpy aham evainaṃ haniṣyāmi vṛkodara
GE07mbh_01_u:142.028d-1549_01: athainam ākṣipya balāt paśuvac cāpy amārayat
GE07mbh_01_u:142.029a: sa māryamāṇo bhīmena nanāda vipulaṃ svanam
GE07mbh_01_u:142.029c: pūrayaṃs tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ jalārdra iva dundubhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.030b-1550_01: samudbhrāmya śiraś cāsya sagrīvaṃ tad udāvahat
GE07mbh_01_u:142.030b-1550_02: madhye bhittvā śiraś cāsya sugrīvaṃ tad upākṣipat
GE07mbh_01_u:142.030c: madhye bhaṅktvā sa balavān harṣayām āsa pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_01_u:142.031a: hiḍimbaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃhṛṣṭās te tarasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.031b-1551_01: hiḍimbā caiva saṃprekṣya nihataṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:142.031b-1551_02: adṛśyāś caiva ye svasthāḥ sametā bhūtavādikāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.031b-1551_03: pūjayanti sma saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_01_u:142.033a: nadūre nagaraṃ manye vanād asmād ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:142.033c: śīghraṃ gacchāma bhadraṃ te na no vidyāt suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.034a: tataḥ sarve tathety uktvā saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:142.034c: prayayuḥ puruṣavyāghrā hiḍimbā caiva rākṣasī vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.000-1552_01: sā tato nyapatat tūrṇaṃ bhaginī tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.000-1552_02: abruvāṇā hiḍimbā tu rākṣasī pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_01_u:143.000-1552_03: abhivādya tataḥ kuntīṃ dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_01_u:143.000-1552_04: abhipūjya ca tān sarvān bhīmasenam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:143.000-1552_05: ahaṃ te darśanād eva manmathasya vaśaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.000-1552_06: krūraṃ bhrātṛvaco hitvā sā tvām evānurundhatī
GE07mbh_01_u:143.000-1552_08: ahaṃ śuśrūṣur iccheyaṃ tava gātraṃ niṣevitum
GE07mbh_01_u:143.001a: smaranti vairaṃ rakṣāṃsi māyām āśritya mohinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:143.001c: hiḍimbe vraja panthānaṃ tvaṃ vai bhrātṛniṣevitam
GE07mbh_01_u:143.002a: kruddho 'pi puruṣavyāghra bhīma mā sma striyaṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.003c: rakṣasas tasya bhaginī kiṃ naḥ kruddhā kariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:143.004a: hiḍimbā tu tataḥ kuntīm abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.004c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca kaunteyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:143.005a: ārye jānāsi yad duḥkham iha strīṇām anaṅgajam
GE07mbh_01_u:143.005c: tad idaṃ mām anuprāptaṃ bhīmasenakṛtaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:143.006a: soḍhaṃ tat paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ mayā kālapratīkṣayā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.006c: so 'yam abhyāgataḥ kālo bhavitā me sukhāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:143.007a: mayā hy utsṛjya suhṛdaḥ svadharmaṃ svajanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.007c: vṛto 'yaṃ puruṣavyāghras tava putraḥ patiḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:143.008b-1554_01: tad arhasi kṛpāṃ kartuṃ mayi tvaṃ varavarṇini
GE07mbh_01_u:143.008c: tathā bruvantī hi tadā pratyākhyātā kriyāṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:143.008d-1555_01: bhūmyāṃ duṣkṛtino lokān gamiṣye 'haṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.009a: tvaṃ māṃ mūḍheti vā matvā bhaktā vānugateti vā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.010c: punaś caivāgamiṣyāmi viśrambhaṃ kuru me śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:143.010d-1556_01: ahaṃ hi samaye lipse prāg bhrātur apavarjanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:143.010d-1556_03: yathā yathā vikramate yathā ramati tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_01_u:143.010d-1556_05: na yātudhāny ahaṃ tv ārye na cāsmi rajanīcarī
GE07mbh_01_u:143.010d-1556_06: īśā rakṣaḥsu sādhvy asmi rājñī sālakaṭaṅkaṭī
GE07mbh_01_u:143.011a: ahaṃ hi manasā dhyātā sarvān neṣyāmi vaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.012a: pṛṣṭhena vo vahiṣyāmi śīghrāṃ gatim abhīpsataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.012c: yūyaṃ prasādaṃ kuruta bhīmaseno bhajeta mām
GE07mbh_01_u:143.012d-1557_01: uvāca sā tadā kuntī hiḍimbāṃ nāma rākṣasīm
GE07mbh_01_u:143.013a: āpadas taraṇe prāṇān dhārayed yena yena hi
GE07mbh_01_u:143.013c: sarvam ādṛtya kartavyaṃ tad dharmam anuvartatā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.014a: āpatsu yo dhārayati dharmaṃ dharmavid uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.014c: vyasanaṃ hy eva dharmasya dharmiṇām āpad ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015a: puṇyaṃ prāṇān dhārayati puṇyaṃ prāṇadam ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015c: yena yenācared dharmaṃ tasmin garhā na vidyate vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0001: mahato 'tra striyaṃ kāmād bādhitāṃ trāhi mām api
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0003: taṃ tu dharmam iti prāhur munayo dharmavatsalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0005: tasmād vakṣyāmi vaḥ śreya āsannaṃ sara uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0006: adyāsādya saraḥ snātvā viśramya ca vanaspatau
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0007: śvaḥ prabhāte mahad bhūtaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ jagatpatim
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0008: vyāsaṃ kamalapatrākṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyatha dhṛtarāṣṭrād vivāsaś ca dahanaṃ vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0010: trāṇaṃ ca vidurāt tubhyaṃ viditaṃ jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0011: āvāse śālihotrasya sa vo vāsaṃ vidhāsyati
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0013: pītamātre tu pānīye kṣutpipāse vinaśyataḥ tapasā śālihotreṇa saro vṛkṣaś ca nirmitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0015: kādambāḥ sārasā haṃsāḥ kuraryaḥ kuraraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0017: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuntī vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0019: tvaṃ hi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha mayoktaṃ śṛṇu bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:143.015d-087_0020: rākṣasy eṣā hi vākyena dharmaṃ vadati sādhu vai bhāvena duṣṭā bhīmaṃ sā kiṃ kariṣyati rākṣasī
GE07mbh_01_u:143.016a: evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ hiḍimbe nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.016c: sthātavyaṃ tu tvayā dharme yathā brūyāṃ sumadhyame
GE07mbh_01_u:143.017c: bhīmasenaṃ bhajethās tvaṃ prāg astagamanād raveḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018c: ayaṃ tv ānayitavyas te bhīmasenaḥ sadā niśi vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0001: prāk saṃdhyāto vimoktavyo rakṣitavyaś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0002: evaṃ ramasva bhīmena yāvad garbhasya vedanam
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0003: eṣa te samayo bhadre śuśrūṣyaś cāpramattayā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0004: nityānukūlayā bhūtvā kartavyaṃ śobhanaṃ tvayā yudhiṣṭhireṇaivam uktā kuntyā cāṅke 'dhiropitā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0007: tiryag yudhiṣṭhire yāti hiḍimbā bhīmagāminī śālihotrasaro ramyam āsedus te jalārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0009: tat tatheti pratijñāya hiḍimbā rākṣasī tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0010: vanaspatitalaṃ gatvā parimṛjya gṛhaṃ yathā pāṇḍavānāṃ ca vāsaṃ sā kṛtvā parṇamayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0012: ātmanaś ca tathā kuntyā ekoddeśe cakāra sā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0013: pāṇḍavās tu tataḥ snātvā śuddhāḥ saṃdhyām upāsya ca tṛṣitāḥ kṣutpipāsārtā jalamātreṇa vartayan
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0015: śālihotras tadā jñātvā kṣudhārtān pāṇḍavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0016: manasā cintayām āsa pānīyaṃ bhojanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0017: tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve viśrāntāḥ pṛthayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0018: yathā jatugṛhe vṛttaṃ rākṣasena kṛtaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0019: kṛtvā kathā bahuvidhāḥ kathānte pāṇḍunandanam kuntī rājasutā vākyaṃ bhīmasenam athābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0021: yathā pāṇḍus tathā mānyas tava jyeṣṭho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0022: ahaṃ dharmavidhānena mānyā gurutarī tava tasmāt pāṇḍuhitārthaṃ me yuvarāja hitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0025: duṣkṛtasya pratīkāraṃ na paśyāmi vṛkodara tasmāt katipayāhena yogakṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0027: kṣemaṃ durgam imaṃ vāsaṃ vasiṣyāmo yathāsukham
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0028: idam adya mahad duḥkhaṃ dharmakṛcchraṃ vṛkodara
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0030: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca māṃ caiva varayām āsa dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.018d-088_0031: dharmārthaṃ dehi putraṃ tvaṃ sa naḥ śreyaḥ kariṣyati prativākyaṃ tu necchāmi hy āvābhyāṃ vacanaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:143.019a: tatheti tat pratijñāya hiḍimbā rākṣasī tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.019b-1560_01: śāsanaṃ te kariṣyāmi devaśāsanam ity api
GE07mbh_01_u:143.019b-1561_01: śṛṇu rākṣasi satyena samayaṃ te vadāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:143.019b-1563_02: sā kadā cid vihārārthaṃ hiḍimbā kāmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026c: bibhratī paramaṃ rūpaṃ ramayām āsa pāṇḍavam vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-1565_02: ūṣus tatra ca ṣaṇmāsān vaṭavṛkṣe yathāsukham
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0001: yathā ca sukṛtī svarge modate 'psarasā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0002: sa tathā paramaprītas tayā reme mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0003: śubhaṃ hi jaghanaṃ tasyāḥ suvarṇamaṇimekhalam na tatarpa mudā mṛdnan bhīmaseno muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0005: ramayantī tato bhīmaṃ tatra tatra manojavā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0006: sā reme tena saṃharṣād atṛpyantī muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0007: ahaḥsu vicarantī sā niśākāleṣu pāṇḍavam ānīya vai svake gehe darśayām āsa mātaram
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0009: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito nityaṃ svapate pāṇḍavas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0010: kuntyāḥ paricarantī sā tasyāḥ pārśve 'vasan niśām
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0011: kāmāṃś ca mukhavāsādīn ānayiṣyati bhojanam tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām ājagāma mahāvrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.026d-089_0015: tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sasnuṣā caiva mādhavī
GE07mbh_01_u:143.027a: ramayantī tathā bhīmaṃ tatra tatra manojavā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.027b-1566_02: evaṃ bhrātṝn sapta māsān hiḍimbāvāsayad vane
GE07mbh_01_u:143.027b-1566_04: sukhaṃ sa viharan bhīmas tatkālaṃ paryaṇāmayat
GE07mbh_01_u:143.030c: yaḥ piśācān atīvānyān babhūvāti sa mānuṣān
GE07mbh_01_u:143.031a: bālo 'pi yauvanaṃ prāpto mānuṣeṣu viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:143.031c: sarvāstreṣu paraṃ vīraḥ prakarṣam agamad balī
GE07mbh_01_u:143.032a: sadyo hi garbhaṃ rākṣasyo labhante prasavanti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:143.033a: praṇamya vikacaḥ pādāv agṛhṇāt sa pitus tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.033c: mātuś ca parameṣvāsas tau ca nāmāsya cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.034c: abhavat tena nāmāsya ghaṭotkaca iti sma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035a: anuraktaś ca tān āsīt pāṇḍavān sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035b-1568_01: vikīrṇakeśo ghaṭate pitror agre yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035b-1568_02: purataḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca tena cāsau ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035c: teṣāṃ ca dayito nityam ātmabhūto babhūva saḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035d-1569_02: abhivādya yathānyāyam abravīc ca prabhāṣya tān
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035d-1569_03: kiṃ karomy aham āryāṇāṃ niḥśaṅkaṃ vadatānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035d-1569_04: taṃ bruvantaṃ bhaimaseniṃ kuntī vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035d-1569_05: tvaṃ kurūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sākṣād bhīmasamo hy asi
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035d-1569_06: jyeṣṭhaḥ putro 'si pañcānāṃ sāhāyyaṃ kuru putraka
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035d-1569_07: pṛthayāpy evam uktas tu praṇamyedaṃ vaco 'bravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:143.035d-1569_08: yathā hi rāvaṇo loke indrajid vā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036a: saṃvāsasamayo jīrṇa ity abhāṣata taṃ tataḥ hiḍimbā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036b-1570_01: punar drakṣyasi rājyasthān ity abhāṣata tāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036b-1570_02: yadā me tvaṃ smareḥ kānta riraṃsū rahasi prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036b-1570_03: tadā tava vaśaṃ bhūya āgantāsmy āśu bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036b-1570_04: ity uktvā sā jagāmāśu bhāvam āsajya pāṇḍave
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036c: hiḍimbā samayaṃ kṛtvā svāṃ gatiṃ pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036d-1571_01: tatas tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve śālihotrāśrame tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:143.036d-1571_02: pūjitās tena vanyena tam āmantrya mahāmunim
GE07mbh_01_u:143.038a: sa hi sṛṣṭo maghavatā śaktihetor mahātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:144.001a: te vanena vanaṃ vīrā ghnanto mṛgagaṇān bahūn

GE07mbh_01_u:146.026a: iṣṭāni cāpy apatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:146.026d-1614_01: āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api
GE07mbh_01_u:146.026d-1614_02: ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api
GE07mbh_01_u:146.026d-1614_03: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalārthaṃ hi bhāryā putro dhanaṃ gṛham
GE07mbh_01_u:146.026d-1614_04: sarvam etad vidhātavyaṃ budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:146.027a: ekato vā kulaṃ kṛtsnam ātmā vā kulavardhana
GE07mbh_01_u:146.027c: na samaṃ sarvam eveti budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:146.027d-1615_01: ubhayoḥ ko 'dhiko vidvānn ātmā caivādhikaḥ kulāt
GE07mbh_01_u:146.027d-1615_03: vidyante dvijaśārdūla ātmā rakṣyaḥ sadā tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:146.027d-1615_04: ātmany avidyamāne cet tasya nāstīha kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:146.027d-1615_05: etaj jagad idaṃ sarvam ātmanā na samaṃ kila
GE07mbh_01_u:146.028a: sa kuruṣva mayā kāryaṃ tārayātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:146.028c: anujānīhi mām ārya sutau me parirakṣa ca
GE07mbh_01_u:146.028d-1616_01: kiṃ cānyac chṛṇu me nātha yad vakṣyāmi hitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:146.028d-1616_02: śrutvāvadhāryatāṃ tan me tatas te tad dhitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:146.029a: avadhyāḥ striya ity āhur dharmajñā dharmaniścaye
GE07mbh_01_u:146.029c: dharmajñān rākṣasān āhur na hanyāt sa ca mām api
GE07mbh_01_u:146.030a: niḥsaṃśayo vadhaḥ puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ saṃśayito vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:146.030c: ato mām eva dharmajña prasthāpayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:146.031a: bhuktaṃ priyāṇy avāptāni dharmaś ca carito mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:146.031c: tvatprasūtiḥ priyā prāptā na māṃ tapsyaty ajīvitam
GE07mbh_01_u:146.032a: jātaputrā ca vṛddhā ca priyakāmā ca te sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:146.032c: samīkṣyaitad ahaṃ sarvaṃ vyavasāyaṃ karomy ataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:146.033a: utsṛjyāpi ca mām ārya vetsyasy anyām api striyam
GE07mbh_01_u:146.033b-1618_01: labhasva kulajāṃ kanyāṃ dharmas te bhavitā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:146.033b-1618_02: anāśramī na tiṣṭheta kṣaṇamātram api dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:146.033c: tataḥ pratiṣṭhito dharmo bhaviṣyati punas tava
GE07mbh_01_u:146.034a: na cāpy adharmaḥ kalyāṇa bahupatnīkatā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_01_u:146.034c: strīṇām adharmaḥ sumahān bhartuḥ pūrvasya laṅghane
GE07mbh_01_u:146.035a: etat sarvaṃ samīkṣya tvam ātmatyāgaṃ ca garhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:146.035b-1619_01: kuru vākyaṃ mama vibho nānyathā mānasaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:146.035c: ātmānaṃ tāraya mayā kulaṃ cemau ca dārakau
GE07mbh_01_u:146.036a: evam uktas tayā bhartā tāṃ samāliṅgya bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:146.036d-1621_01: maivaṃ vada sukalyāṇi tiṣṭha gehe sumadhyame
GE07mbh_01_u:146.036d-1621_02: na svāṃ bhāryāṃ tyajet prājñaḥ putrān vāpi kadā cana
GE07mbh_01_u:146.036d-1621_03: viśeṣataḥ striyaṃ rakṣet puruṣo buddhimān iha
GE07mbh_01_u:146.036d-1621_04: tyaktvā tu puruṣo jīven na hātavyān imān sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:146.036d-1621_05: na vetti dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.001a: tayor duḥkhitayor vākyam atimātraṃ niśamya tat
GE07mbh_01_u:147.002c: mamāpi śrūyatāṃ kiṃ cic chrutvā ca kriyatāṃ kṣamam
GE07mbh_01_u:147.003c: tyaktavyāṃ māṃ parityajya trātaṃ sarvaṃ mayaikayā
GE07mbh_01_u:147.004a: ity artham iṣyate 'patyaṃ tārayiṣyati mām iti
GE07mbh_01_u:147.004c: tasminn upasthite kāle tarataṃ plavavan mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:147.005a: iha vā tārayed durgād uta vā pretya tārayet
GE07mbh_01_u:147.005c: sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putra ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.005d-1622_01: punnāmno narakāt trāṇāt tanayaḥ putra ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:147.006a: ākāṅkṣante ca dauhitrān api nityaṃ pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.006c: tān svayaṃ vai paritrāsye rakṣantī jīvitaṃ pituḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.007a: bhrātā ca mama bālo 'yaṃ gate lokam amuṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_01_u:147.008a: tāte 'pi hi gate svargaṃ vinaṣṭe ca mamānuje
GE07mbh_01_u:147.008c: piṇḍaḥ pitṝṇāṃ vyucchidyet tat teṣām apriyaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:147.009a: pitrā tyaktā tathā mātrā bhrātrā cāham asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_01_u:147.010a: tvayi tv aroge nirmukte mātā bhrātā ca me śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.010c: saṃtānaś caiva piṇḍaś ca pratiṣṭhāsyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_01_u:147.011a: ātmā putraḥ sakhā bhāryā kṛcchraṃ tu duhitā kila
GE07mbh_01_u:147.011c: sa kṛcchrān mocayātmānaṃ māṃ ca dharmeṇa yojaya
GE07mbh_01_u:147.012c: bhaviṣyāmi tvayā tāta vihīnā kṛpaṇā bata
GE07mbh_01_u:147.014a: athavā yāsyase tatra tyaktvā māṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:147.014c: pīḍitāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi tad avekṣasva mām api
GE07mbh_01_u:147.015a: tad asmadarthaṃ dharmārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca sattama
GE07mbh_01_u:147.015c: ātmānaṃ parirakṣasva tyaktavyāṃ māṃ ca saṃtyaja
GE07mbh_01_u:147.016c: tvayā dattena toyena bhaviṣyati hitaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_01_u:147.017a: kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad vayaṃ svargate tvayi
GE07mbh_01_u:147.018a: tvayi tv aroge nirmukte kleśād asmāt sabāndhave
GE07mbh_01_u:147.018d-1623_01: itaḥ pradāne devāś ca pitaraś ceti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:147.018d-1624_01: ity etad ubhayaṃ tāta niśāmya tava yad dhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:147.018d-1624_02: tad vyavasya tathāmbāyā hitaṃ svasya sutasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:147.018d-1624_04: na tu putrasya pitarau punar jātu bhaviṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.019c: pitā mātā ca sā caiva kanyā prarurudus trayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.020a: tataḥ praruditān sarvān niśamyātha sutas tayoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:147.021a: mā rodīs tāta mā mātar mā svasas tvam iti bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:147.021c: prahasann iva sarvāṃs tān ekaikaṃ so 'pasarpati
GE07mbh_01_u:147.022a: tataḥ sa tṛṇam ādāya prahṛṣṭaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:147.023a: tathāpi teṣāṃ duḥkhena parītānāṃ niśamya tat
GE07mbh_01_u:147.023c: bālasya vākyam avyaktaṃ harṣaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_01_u:147.024a: ayaṃ kāla iti jñātvā kuntī samupasṛtya tān
GE07mbh_01_u:148.001a: kutomūlam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.002a: upapannaṃ satām etad yad bravīṣi tapodhane
GE07mbh_01_u:148.002c: na tu duḥkham idaṃ śakyaṃ mānuṣeṇa vyapohitum
GE07mbh_01_u:148.002d-1625_01: tathāpi tattvam ākhyāsye etad duḥkhasya saṃbhavam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.002d-1625_02: śakyaṃ vā yadi vāśakyaṃ śṛṇu bhadre yathātatham
GE07mbh_01_u:148.003b-1626_02: tasyāṃ ghoraḥ sa vasati jighāṃsuḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.003b-1626_03: bako nāma sa nāmnā vai duṣṭātmā rākṣasādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.004c: rakṣaty asurarāṇ nityam imaṃ janapadaṃ balī
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005c: tatkṛte paracakrāc ca bhūtebhyaś ca na no bhayam puruṣādakena raudreṇa bhakṣyamāṇā durātmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0002: anāthā nagarī nāthaṃ trātāraṃ nādhigacchati guhāyāṃ vasatas tatra bādhate satataṃ janam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0004: striyo bālāṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca yūnaś cāpi durātmavān atra mantraiś ca homaiś ca bhojanaiś ca sa rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0006: īḍito dvijamukhyaiś ca pūjitaś ca durātmavān
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0007: yadā ca sakalān evaṃ prasūdayati rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0008: athainaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarve samaye samayojayan māsmān kāmād vadhī rakṣo dāsyāmas te sadā vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0012: sarpiṣā ca samāyukta vyañjanaiś ca vibhūṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0013: srajaś citrās tilān piṇḍāṃl lājāpūpasurāsavān śṛtāśṛtān pānakumbhān sthūlamāṃsaṃ śṛtāśṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0015: sarpiḥkumbhāṃś ca vividhān anyāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0016: adya siddhaiḥ samāyuktais tilacūrṇaiḥ samākulān kulāt kulāc ca puruṣaṃ balīvardau ca kālakau
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0018: prāpsyasi tvam asaṃkruddho rakṣobhāgaṃ prakalpitam tiṣṭheha samaye 'smākam ity ayācanta taṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0020: bāḍham ity eva tad rakṣas tadvacaḥ pratyagṛhṇata
GE07mbh_01_u:148.005d-091_0021: paracakrān na bibhyaṃś ca rakṣaṇaṃ sa karoti ca tasmin bhāge vinirdiṣṭe cāsthitaḥ samayaṃ balī
GE07mbh_01_u:148.006c: mahiṣau puruṣaś caiko yas tad ādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_01_u:148.007a: ekaikaś caiva puruṣas tat prayacchati bhojanam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.007c: sa vāro bahubhir varṣair bhavaty asutaro naraiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.008a: tadvimokṣāya ye cāpi yatante puruṣāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:148.008c: saputradārāṃs tān hatvā tad rakṣo bhakṣayaty uta
GE07mbh_01_u:148.009b-1628_01: upāyaṃ taṃ na kurute yatnād api sa mandadhīḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.009c: anāmayaṃ janasyāsya yena syād adya śāśvatam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.010a: etadarhā vayaṃ nūnaṃ vasāmo durbalasya ye
GE07mbh_01_u:148.011a: brāhmaṇāḥ kasya vaktavyāḥ kasya vā chandacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.011c: guṇair ete hi vāsyante kāmagāḥ pakṣiṇo yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:148.012a: rājānaṃ prathamaṃ vindet tato bhāryāṃ tato dhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.012b-1630_01: rājany asati loke 'smin kuto bhāryā kuto dhanam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.012c: trayasya saṃcaye cāsya jñātīn putrāṃś ca dhārayet
GE07mbh_01_u:148.013a: viparītaṃ mayā cedaṃ trayaṃ sarvam upārjitam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.013c: ta imām āpadaṃ prāpya bhṛśaṃ tapsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.014c: bhojanaṃ puruṣaś caikaḥ pradeyaṃ vetanaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:148.015a: na ca me vidyate vittaṃ saṃkretuṃ puruṣaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:148.015c: suhṛjjanaṃ pradātuṃ ca na śakṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:148.015e: gatiṃ cāpi na paśyāmi tasmān mokṣāya rakṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:148.016a: so 'haṃ duḥkhārṇave magno mahaty asutare bhṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:148.016e: tato naḥ sahitan kṣudraḥ sarvān evopabhokṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:149.001a: na viṣādas tvayā kāryo bhayād asmāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:149.001d-1632_01: naiva svayaṃ saputrasya gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
GE07mbh_01_u:149.002a: ekas tava suto bālaḥ kanyā caikā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:149.002c: na te tayos tathā patnyā gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
GE07mbh_01_u:149.003a: mama pañca sutā brahmaṃs teṣām eko gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:149.003c: tvadarthaṃ balim ādāya tasya pāpasya rakṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:149.004a: nāham etat kariṣyāmi jīvitārthī kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:149.005a: na tv etad akulīnāsu nādharmiṣṭhāsu vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:149.005c: yad brāhmaṇārthe visṛjed ātmānam api cātmajam
GE07mbh_01_u:149.006a: ātmanas tu mayā śreyo boddhavyam iti rocaye
GE07mbh_01_u:149.006d-1633_01: brahmahatyā paraṃ pāpaṃ śreyān ātmavadho mama
GE07mbh_01_u:149.007a: brahmavadhyā paraṃ pāpaṃ niṣkṛtir nātra vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:149.007b-1634_01: prayoktā cānumantā ca hantā ceti trayaḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:149.008a: na tv ahaṃ vadham ākāṅkṣe svayam evātmanaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:149.008c: paraiḥ kṛte vadhe pāpaṃ na kiṃ cin mayi vidyate
GE07mbh_01_u:149.009c: niṣkṛtiṃ na prapaśyāmi nṛśaṃsaṃ kṣudram eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:149.010c: yācamānasya ca vadho nṛśaṃsaṃ paramaṃ matam
GE07mbh_01_u:149.011a: kuryān na ninditaṃ karma na nṛśaṃsaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_01_u:149.012a: śreyāṃs tu sahadārasya vināśo 'dya mama svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:149.012c: brāhmaṇasya vadhaṃ nāham anumaṃsye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:149.013a: mamāpy eṣā matir brahman viprā rakṣyā iti sthirā
GE07mbh_01_u:149.013c: na cāpy aniṣṭaḥ putro me yadi putraśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:149.014a: na cāsau rākṣasaḥ śakto mama putravināśane
GE07mbh_01_u:149.014c: vīryavān mantrasiddhaś ca tejasvī ca suto mama
GE07mbh_01_u:149.015a: rākṣasāya ca tat sarvaṃ prāpayiṣyati bhojanam
GE07mbh_01_u:149.015c: mokṣayiṣyati cātmānam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:149.016a: samāgatāś ca vīreṇa dṛṣṭapūrvāś ca rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:149.017a: na tv idaṃ keṣu cid brahman vyāhartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:149.017c: vidyārthino hi me putrān viprakuryuḥ kutūhalāt
GE07mbh_01_u:149.018a: guruṇā cānanujñāto grāhayed yaṃ suto mama
GE07mbh_01_u:149.018c: na sa kuryāt tayā kāryaṃ vidyayeti satāṃ matam
GE07mbh_01_u:149.019a: evam uktas tu pṛthayā sa vipro bhāryayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:149.019c: hṛṣṭaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa tad vākyam amṛtopamam
GE07mbh_01_u:149.020a: tataḥ kuntī ca vipraś ca sahitāv anilātmajam
GE07mbh_01_u:149.020c: tam abrūtāṃ kuruṣveti sa tathety abravīc ca tau
GE07mbh_01_u:150.001a: kariṣya iti bhīmena pratijñāte tu bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:150.001c: ājagmus te tataḥ sarve bhaikṣam ādāya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.001d-1635_02: bubodha dharmarājas tu hṛṣitaṃ bhīmam acyutam
GE07mbh_01_u:150.001d-1635_03: harṣituṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan manasā cintayan guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.001d-1635_04: sa samīkṣya tadā rājañ śrotukāmo yudhāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.003a: kiṃ cikīrṣaty ayaṃ karma bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.003c: bhavaty anumate kaccid ayaṃ kartum ihecchati
GE07mbh_01_u:150.004c: brāhmaṇārthe mahat kṛtyaṃ moṣkāya nagarasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:150.004d-1636_01: bakāya kalpitaṃ putra mahāntaṃ balim uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:150.004d-1636_02: bhīmo bhunakti saṃpuṣṭam apy ekāhaṃ tapaḥsuta
GE07mbh_01_u:150.005a: kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ bhavatyā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:150.005c: parityāgaṃ hi putrasya na praśaṃsanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.007a: yasya bāhū samāśritya sukhaṃ sarve svapāmahe
GE07mbh_01_u:150.008c: na śete vasatīḥ sarvā duḥkhāc chakuninā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:150.009a: yasya vīrasya vīryeṇa muktā jatugṛhād vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:150.009c: anyebhyaś caiva pāpebhyo nihataś ca purocanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.010d-1638_01: karṇaṃ duḥśāsanaṃ caiva śakuniṃ cāpi saubalam
GE07mbh_01_u:150.011a: tasya vyavasitas tyāgo buddhim āsthāya kāṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:150.011c: kaccin na duḥkhair buddhis te viplutā gatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.012a: yudhiṣṭhira na saṃtāpaḥ kāryaḥ prati vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_01_u:150.012c: na cāyaṃ buddhidaurbalyād vyavasāyaḥ kṛto mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:150.012d-1639_01: na ca śokena buddhir me viplutā gatacetanā
GE07mbh_01_u:150.013a: iha viprasya bhavane vayaṃ putra sukhoṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:150.013e: etāvān eva puruṣaḥ kṛtaṃ yasmin na naśyati
GE07mbh_01_u:150.013f-1642_01: yāvac ca kuryād anyo 'sya kuryād bahuguṇaṃ tataḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:155.030f-1692_01: tathety uktvā tu taṃ rājñaḥ putrakāmīyam ārabhat
GE07mbh_01_u:155.031c: ācakhyau karma vaitānaṃ tadā putraphalāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:155.031d-1693_01: yathoktaṃ kalpayām āsa rājā vipreṇa taṃ kratum
GE07mbh_01_u:155.032a: sa ca putro mahāvīryo mahātejā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.032c: iṣyate yadvidho rājan bhavitā te tathāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.033c: ājahre tat tathā sarvaṃ drupadaḥ karmasiddhaye
GE07mbh_01_u:155.034a: yājas tu havanasyānte devīm āhvāpayat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:155.034c: praihi māṃ rājñi pṛṣati mithunaṃ tvām upasthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:155.035a: avaliptaṃ me mukhaṃ brahman puṇyān gandhān bibharmi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:155.035d-1695_01: rājñā caivam abhihito yājo rājñīm uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:155.035d-1695_02: tat sarvaṃ sahamānaś ca brahmatejonidhiḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:155.036c: kathaṃ kāmaṃ na saṃdadhyāt sā tvaṃ vipraihi tiṣṭha vā
GE07mbh_01_u:155.037a: evam ukte tu yājena hute haviṣi saṃskṛte
GE07mbh_01_u:155.038c: bibhrat sakhaḍgaḥ saśaro dhanuṣmān vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.039a: so 'dhyārohad rathavaraṃ tena ca prayayau tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:155.039c: tataḥ praṇeduḥ pāñcālāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:155.039d-1696_01: harṣāviṣṭāṃs tataś caitān neyaṃ sehe vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_01_u:155.040c: rājñaḥ śokāpaho jāta eṣa droṇavadhāya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:155.040e: ity uvāca mahad bhūtam adṛśyaṃ khecaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:155.043c: yā bibharti paraṃ rūpaṃ yasyā nāsty upamā bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:155.044a: tāṃ cāpi jātāṃ suśroṇīṃ vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:155.045c: asyā hetoḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahad utpatsyate bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:155.046b-1700_01: pāñcālarājas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣād aśrūṇy avartayat
GE07mbh_01_u:155.046b-1700_02: pariṣvajya sutāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ snuṣāṃ pāṇḍor iti bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:155.046b-1700_03: aṅkam āropya pāñcālīṃ rājā harṣam avāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.046c: na caitān harṣasaṃpūṇān iyaṃ sehe vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_01_u:155.047a: tau dṛṣṭvā pṛṣatī yājaṃ prapede vai sutārthinī
GE07mbh_01_u:155.047c: na vai mad anyāṃ jananīṃ jānīyātām imāv iti
GE07mbh_01_u:155.048a: tathety uvāca tāṃ yājo rājñaḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_01_u:155.048c: tayoś ca nāmanī cakrur dvijāḥ saṃpūrṇamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.050a: kṛṣṇety evābruvan kṛṣṇāṃ kṛṣṇābhūt sā hi varṇataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.050c: tathā tan mithunaṃ jajñe drupadasya mahāmakhe
GE07mbh_01_u:155.050d-1702_01: kriyāsu caiva sarvāsu kṛtavān drupadena ha
GE07mbh_01_u:155.050d-1703_03: kṛṣṇā ca śibikāṃ prāpya praviveśa niveśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:155.051a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tu pāñcālyam ānīya svaṃ viveśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:155.051b-1704_01: droṇaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa sakhyuḥ putram udāradhīḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.051b-1705_01: droṇaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad gurur ity eva dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.051b-1705_02: paridāya tu taṃ śiṣyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tu somakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.051b-1705_04: mahāprabhāvo brahmarṣir jñātvā tasya ca saṃbhavam
GE07mbh_01_u:155.052a: amokṣaṇīyaṃ daivaṃ hi bhāvi matvā mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:155.052c: tathā tat kṛtavān droṇa ātmakīrty anurakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:155.052d-1706_01: sarvāstrāṇi sa tu kṣipram āptavān dṛṣṭamātrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:156.001a: etac chrutvā tu kaunteyāḥ śalyaviddhā ivābhavan
GE07mbh_01_u:156.002a: tataḥ kuntī sutān dṛṣṭvā vibhrāntān gatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:156.004c: sarvāṇi tāni dṛṣṭāni punaḥ punar ariṃdama
GE07mbh_01_u:156.005a: punar dṛṣṭāni tāny eva prīṇayanti na nas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:156.005c: bhaikṣaṃ ca na tathā vīra labhyate kurunandana
GE07mbh_01_u:156.006a: te vayaṃ sādhu pāñcālān gacchāma yadi manyase
GE07mbh_01_u:156.007c: yajñasenaś ca rājāsau brahmaṇya iti śuśrumaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:156.008a: ekatra ciravāso hi kṣamo na ca mato mama
GE07mbh_01_u:156.008c: te tatra sādhu gacchāmo yadi tvaṃ putra manyase
GE07mbh_01_u:156.009a: bhavatyā yan mataṃ kāryaṃ tad asmākaṃ paraṃ hitam
GE07mbh_01_u:156.009c: anujāṃs tu na jānāmi gaccheyur neti vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:156.010a: tataḥ kuntī bhīmasenam arjunaṃ yamajau tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:156.010c: uvāca gamanaṃ te ca tathety evābruvaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:156.011a: tata āmantrya taṃ vipraṃ kuntī rājan sutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:157.003a: samanujñāpya tān sarvān āsīnān munir abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:157.003c: prasannaḥ pūjitaḥ pārthaiḥ prītipūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.004a: api dharmeṇa vartadhvaṃ śāstreṇa ca paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.004c: api vipreṣu vaḥ pūjā pūjārheṣu na hīyate
GE07mbh_01_u:157.005a: atha dharmārthavad vākyam uktvā sa bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.005c: vicitrāś ca kathās tās tāḥ punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:157.006a: āsīt tapovane kā cid ṛṣeḥ kanyā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.007a: karmabhiḥ svakṛtaiḥ sā tu durbhagā samapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:157.007c: nādhyagacchat patiṃ sā tu kanyā rūpavatī satī
GE07mbh_01_u:157.008a: tapas taptum athārebhe patyartham asukhā tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.008c: toṣayām āsa tapasā sā kilogreṇa śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_01_u:157.009a: tasyāḥ sa bhagavāṃs tuṣṭas tām uvāca tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:157.009c: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varado 'smīti bhāmini
GE07mbh_01_u:157.010a: atheśvaram uvācedam ātmanaḥ sā vaco hitam
GE07mbh_01_u:157.011a: tām atha pratyuvācedam īśāno vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.011c: pañca te patayo bhadre bhaviṣyantīti śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.011d-1708_01: evam uktā tataḥ kanyā devaṃ varadam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:157.012a: pratibruvantīm ekaṃ me patiṃ dehīti śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_01_u:157.012c: punar evābravīd deva idaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:157.013a: pañcakṛtvas tvayā uktaḥ patiṃ dehīty ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.013c: deham anyaṃ gatāyās te yathoktaṃ tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:157.014a: drupadasya kule jātā kanyā sā devarūpiṇī
GE07mbh_01_u:157.014c: nirdiṣṭā bhavatāṃ patnī kṛṣṇā pārṣaty aninditā
GE07mbh_01_u:157.015c: sukhinas tām anuprāpya bhaviṣyatha na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.015d-1709_01: rājyaṃ caivāgataṃ pārthā indraprasthaṃ praviśya ha
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016c: pārthān āmantrya kuntīṃ ca prātiṣṭhata mahātapāḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0001: te prayātā naravyāghrā mātrā saha paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0003: atha te brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ pāṇḍavān dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0004: kva bhavanto gamiṣyanti kuto vāgacchateti ha
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0006: bhavanto no 'bhijānantu sahitān mātṛcāriṇaḥ gacchato nas tu pāñcālān drupadasya purīṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0008: icchāmo bhavato jñātuṃ mahat kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0009: ekasārthaṃ prayātāḥ sma vayam apy atra gāminaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0010: tatrāpy adbhutasaṃkāśa utsavo bhavitā mahān tatas tu yajñasenasya drupadasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0012: yāsāv ayonijā kanyā sthāsyate sā svayaṃvare
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0015: jāto yaḥ pāvakāc chūraḥ saśaraḥ saśarāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0017: tasmin saṃjāyamāne ca vāg uvācāśarīriṇī eṣa mṛtyuś ca śiṣyaś ca bhāradvājasya jāyate
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0019: svasā tasya tu vedyāś ca jātā tasmin mahāmakhe strīratnam asitāpāṅgī śyāmā nīlotpalaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0022: gacchāmas tatra vai draṣṭuṃ taṃ caivāsyāḥ svayaṃvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0023: rājāno rājaputrāś ca yajvāno bhūridakṣiṇāḥ svādhyāyavantaḥ śucayo mahātmāno dhṛtavratāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0025: taruṇā darśanīyāś ca balavanto durāsadāḥ mahārathāḥ kṛtāstrāś ca sameṣyantīha bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0027: te tatra vividhaṃ dānaṃ vijayārthe nareśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0028: pradāsyanti dhanaṃ gāś ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ pratilabhya ca tat sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇāṃ svayaṃvare
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0030: yaṃ ca sā kṣatriyaṃ raṅge kumārī varayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0031: naṭā vaitālikāś caiva nartakāḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ niyodhakāś ca deśebhyaḥ sameṣyanti mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0033: etat kautūhalaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā vai pratigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0034: sahāsmābhir mahātmāno mātrā saha nivartsyatha darśanīyāṃś ca vaḥ sarvān ekarūpān avasthitān
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0036: samīkṣya kṛṣṇā varayet saṃgatyānyatamaṃ patim ayam ekaś ca vo bhrātā darśanīyo mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0038: niyudhyamāno vijayet saṃgatyā draviṇaṃ mahat paramaṃ bho gamiṣyāmo draṣṭuṃ tatra svayaṃvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:157.016d-096_0040: draupadīṃ yajñasenasya kanyāṃ tasyās tathotsavam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:158.002a: te gacchantas tv ahorātraṃ tīrthaṃ somaśravāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.003a: ulmukaṃ tu samudyamya teṣām agre dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.003c: prakāśārthaṃ yayau tatra rakṣārthaṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.004a: tatra gaṅgājale ramye vivikte krīḍayan striyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.005a: śabdaṃ teṣāṃ sa śuśrāva nadīṃ samupasarpatām
GE07mbh_01_u:158.005c: tena śabdena cāviṣṭaś cukrodha balavad balī
GE07mbh_01_u:158.006a: sa dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāṃs tatra saha mātrā paraṃtapān
GE07mbh_01_u:158.006c: visphārayan dhanur ghoram idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:158.007c: aśītibhis truṭair hīnaṃ taṃ muhūrtaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_01_u:158.008c: śeṣam anyan manuṣyāṇāṃ kāmacāram iha smṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.009a: lobhāt pracāraṃ caratas tāsu velāsu vai narān
GE07mbh_01_u:158.010a: tato rātrau prāpnuvato jalaṃ brahmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.010c: garhayanti narān sarvān balasthān nṛpatīn api
GE07mbh_01_u:158.011a: ārāt tiṣṭhata mā mahyaṃ samīpam upasarpata
GE07mbh_01_u:158.012c: ahaṃ hi mānī cerṣyuś ca kuberasya priyaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_01_u:158.013a: aṅgāraparṇam iti ca khyataṃ vanam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:158.013c: anu gaṅgāṃ ca vākāṃ ca citraṃ yatra vasāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:158.014a: na kuṇapāḥ śṛṅgiṇo vā na devā na ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.015a: samudre himavatpārśve nadyām asyāṃ ca durmate
GE07mbh_01_u:158.015c: rātrāv ahani saṃdhau ca kasya kḷptaḥ parigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.015d-1713_01: bhukto vāpy athavābhukto rātrāv ahani khecara
GE07mbh_01_u:158.015d-1713_02: na kālaniyamo hy asti gaṅgāṃ prāpya saridvarām
GE07mbh_01_u:158.016a: vayaṃ ca śaktisaṃpannā akāle tvām adhṛṣṇumaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.016c: aśaktā hi kṣaṇe krūre yuṣmān arcanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.017d-1714_01: gaṅgāṃ ca yamunāṃ caiva plakṣajātāṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_01_u:158.017d-1714_02: rathasthāṃ sarayūṃ caiva gomatīṃ gaṇḍakīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:158.017d-1714_03: aparyuṣitapāpās te nadīḥ sapta pibanti ye
GE07mbh_01_u:158.018a: iyaṃ bhūtvā caikavaprā śucir ākāśagā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.020c: katham icchasi tāṃ roddhuṃ naiṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.021a: anivāryam asaṃbādhaṃ tava vācā kathaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.022a: aṅgāraparṇas tac chrutvā kruddha ānamya kārmukam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.022c: mumoca sāyakān dīptān ahīn āśīviṣān iva
GE07mbh_01_u:158.023a: ulmukaṃ bhrāmayaṃs tūrṇaṃ pāṇḍavaś carma cottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.023c: vyapovāha śarāṃs tasya sarvān eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.025a: mānuṣān ati gandharvān sarvān gandharva lakṣaye
GE07mbh_01_u:158.025c: tasmād astreṇa divyena yotsye 'haṃ na tu māyayā
GE07mbh_01_u:158.026a: purāstram idam āgneyaṃ prādāt kila bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.027c: sa tv idaṃ mahyam adadād droṇo brāhmaṇasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.028a: ity uktvā pāṇḍavaḥ kruddho gandharvāya mumoca
GE07mbh_01_u:158.028c: pradīptam astram āgneyaṃ dadāhāsya rathaṃ tu tat
GE07mbh_01_u:158.029a: virathaṃ viplutaṃ taṃ tu sa gandharvaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.032a: trāhi tvaṃ māṃ mahārāja patiṃ cemaṃ vimuñca me
GE07mbh_01_u:158.032c: gandharvīṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptāṃ nāmnā kumbīnasīṃ prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:158.032d-1716_01: dīnaṃ vākyaṃ tu tac chrutvā yudhiṣṭhira uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:158.032d-1718_01: dṛṣṭvānugrahabhāvāc ca pārthaḥ pārtham uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:158.033c: ko nu hanyād ripuṃ tvādṛṅ muñcemaṃ ripusūdana
GE07mbh_01_u:158.034a: aṅgemaṃ pratipadyasva gaccha gandharva mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.035c: na ca ślāghe balenādya na nāmnā janasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_01_u:158.036a: sādhv imaṃ labdhavāṃl lābhaṃ yo 'haṃ divyāstradhāriṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.036c: gāndharvyā māyayā yoddhum icchāmi vayasā varam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.037a: astrāgninā vicitro 'yaṃ dagdho me ratha uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.038a: saṃbhṛtā caiva vidyeyaṃ tapaseha purā mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:158.039a: saṃstambhitaṃ hi tarasā jitaṃ śaraṇam āgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.039c: yo 'riṃ saṃyojayet prāṇaiḥ kalyāṇaṃ kiṃ na so 'rhati
GE07mbh_01_u:158.040a: cakṣuṣī nāma vidyeyaṃ yāṃ somāya dadau manuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.040c: dadau sa viśvāvasave mahyaṃ viśvāvasur dadau
GE07mbh_01_u:158.041c: āgamo 'syā mayā prokto vīryaṃ pratinibodha me
GE07mbh_01_u:158.042a: yac cakṣuṣā draṣṭum icchet triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:158.042c: tat paśyed yādṛśaṃ cecchet tādṛṣaṃ draṣṭum arhati
GE07mbh_01_u:158.043a: samānapadye ṣaṇmāsān sthito vidyāṃ labhed imām
GE07mbh_01_u:158.043c: anuneṣyāmy ahaṃ vidyāṃ svayaṃ tubhyaṃ vrate kṛte
GE07mbh_01_u:158.044a: vidyayā hy anayā rājan vayaṃ nṛbhyo viśeṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.045c: bhrātṛbhyas tava pañcabhyaḥ pṛthag dātā śataṃ śatam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.046c: kṣīṇāḥ kṣīṇā bhavanty ete na hīyante ca raṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.047c: daśadhā śatadhā caiva tac chīrṇaṃ vṛtramūrdhani
GE07mbh_01_u:158.048c: loke yat sādhanaṃ kiṃ cit sā vai vajratanuḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:158.049a: vajrapāṇir brāhmaṇaḥ syāt kṣatraṃ vajrarathaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:158.049c: vaiśyā vai dānavajrāś ca karmavajrā yavīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.050a: vajraṃ kṣatrasya vājino avadhyā vājinaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.050c: rathāṅgaṃ vaḍavā sūte sūtāś cāśveṣu ye matāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:158.051c: ime gandharvajāḥ kāmaṃ pūrayiṣyanti te hayāḥ

GE07mbh_01_u:168.001a: mā bhaiḥ putri na bhetavyaṃ rakṣasas te kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_01_u:168.003a: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:168.004a: mantrapūtena ca punaḥ sa tam abhyukṣya vāriṇā

GE07mbh_01_u:168.008c: asmin kāle yad iṣṭaṃ te brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_01_u:168.009a: vṛttam etad yathākālaṃ gaccha rājyaṃ praśādhi tat
GE07mbh_01_u:168.009c: brāhmaṇāṃś ca manuṣyendra māvamaṃsthāḥ kadā cana rājovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:168.010a: nāvamaṃsyāmy ahaṃ brahman kadā cid brāhmaṇarṣabhān
GE07mbh_01_u:168.010c: tvan nideśe sthitaḥ śaśvat pujayiṣyāmy ahaṃ dvijān
GE07mbh_01_u:168.011a: ikṣvākūṇāṃ tu yenāham anṛṇaḥ syāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_01_u:168.011c: tat tvattaḥ prāptum icchāmi varaṃ vedavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:168.013a: dadānīty eva taṃ tatra rājānaṃ pratyuvāca ha

GE07mbh_01_u:168.017a: dadṛśus taṃ tato rājann ayodhyāvāsino janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:168.018a: sa hi tāṃ pūrayām āsa lakṣmyā lakṣmīvatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:168.019c: manaḥ prahlādayām āsā tasya tat puram uttamam

GE07mbh_01_u:168.022a: ṛtāv atha maharṣiḥ sa saṃbabhūva tayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:168.022c: devyā divyena vidhinā vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhabhāg ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:168.023a: atha tasyāṃ samutpanne garbhe sa munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:168.024a: dīrghakāladhṛtaṃ garbhaṃ suṣāva na tu taṃ yadā
GE07mbh_01_u:168.024c: sātha devy aśmanā kukṣiṃ nirbibheda tadā svakam
GE07mbh_01_u:168.025a: dvādaśe 'tha tato varṣe sa jajñe manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:168.025c: aśmako nāma rājarṣiḥ potanaṃ yo nyaveśayat
GE07mbh_01_u:169.001c: śakteḥ kulakaraṃ rājan dvitīyam iva śaktinam
GE07mbh_01_u:169.003a: parāsuś ca yatas tena vasiṣṭhaḥ sthāpitas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:169.003c: garbhasthena tato loke parāśara iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.004a: amanyata sa dharmātmā vasiṣṭhaṃ pitaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:169.005a: sa tāta iti viprarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:169.006a: tāteti paripūrṇārthaṃ tasya tan madhuraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.006c: adṛśyanty aśrupūrṇākṣī śṛṇvantī tam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:169.007a: mā tāta tāta tāteti na te tāto mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.007c: rakṣasā bhakṣitas tāta tava tāto vanāntare
GE07mbh_01_u:169.008a: manyase yaṃ tu tāteti naiṣa tātas tavānagha
GE07mbh_01_u:169.008c: āryas tv eṣa pitā tasya pitus tava mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.009a: sa evam ukto duḥkhārtaḥ satyavāg ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.010c: vasiṣṭho vārayām āsa hetunā yena tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_01_u:169.011a: kṛtavīrya iti khyāto babhūva nṛpatiḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_01_u:169.012a: sa tān agrabhujas tāta dhānyena ca dhanena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:169.012c: somānte tarpayām āsa vipulena viśāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.014a: te bhṛgūṇāṃ dhanaṃ jñātvā rājānaḥ sarva eva ha
GE07mbh_01_u:169.015a: bhūmau tu nidadhuḥ ke cid bhṛgavo dhanam akṣayam
GE07mbh_01_u:169.015c: daduḥ ke cid dvijātibhyo jñātvā kṣatriyato bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:169.016a: bhṛgavas tu daduḥ ke cit teṣāṃ vittaṃ yathepsitam
GE07mbh_01_u:169.017e: tad vittaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarve sametāḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.018a: avamanya tataḥ kopād bhṛgūṃs tāñ śaraṇāgatān
GE07mbh_01_u:169.018c: nijaghnus te maheṣvāsāḥ sarvāṃs tān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.018e: ā garbhād anukṛntantaś ceruś caiva vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_01_u:169.019a: tata ucchidyamāneṣu bhṛguṣv evaṃ bhayāt tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:169.020a: tāsām anyatamā garbhaṃ bhayād dādhāra taijasam
GE07mbh_01_u:169.020d-1788_03: tatas te kṣatriyā jagmus taṃ garbhaṃ hantum udyatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.020e: dadṛśur brāhmaṇīṃ tāṃ te dīpyamānāṃ svatejasā
GE07mbh_01_u:169.021a: atha garbhaḥ sa bhittvoruṃ brāhmaṇyā nirjagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:169.021c: muṣṇan dṛṣṭīḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ madhyāhna iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.022c: brahmaṇīṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur dṛṣṭyarthaṃ tām aninditām
GE07mbh_01_u:169.023a: ūcuś caināṃ mahābhāgāṃ kṣatriyās te vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:169.025a: saputrā tvaṃ prasādaṃ naḥ sarveṣāṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:170.001a: nāhaṃ gṛhṇāmi vas tāta dṛṣṭīr nāsti ruṣānvitā
GE07mbh_01_u:170.001c: ayaṃ tu bhārgavo nūnam ūrujaḥ kupito 'dya vaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.002a: tena cakṣūṃṣi vas tāta nūnaṃ kopān mahātmanā

GE07mbh_01_u:170.003a: garbhān api yadā yūyaṃ bhṛgūṇāṃ ghnata putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.003c: tadāyam ūruṇā garbho mayā varṣaśataṃ dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.004a: ṣaḍaṅgaś cākhilo veda imaṃ garbhastham eva hi
GE07mbh_01_u:170.005a: so 'yaṃ pitṛvadhān nūnaṃ krodhād vo hantum icchati
GE07mbh_01_u:170.005c: tejasā yasya divyena cakṣūṃṣi muṣitāni vaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.006a: tam imaṃ tāta yācadhvam aurvaṃ mama sutottamam
GE07mbh_01_u:170.006c: ayaṃ vaḥ praṇipātena tuṣṭo dṛṣṭīr vimokṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:170.007a: evam uktās tataḥ sarve rājānas te tam ūrujam
GE07mbh_01_u:170.007c: ūcuḥ prasīdeti tadā prasādaṃ ca cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.008a: anenaiva ca vikhyāto nāmnā lokeṣu sattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.008c: sa aurva iti viprarṣir ūruṃ bhittvā vyajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:170.010a: sa cakre tāta lokānāṃ vināśāya mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.010c: sarveṣām eva kārtsnyena manaḥ pravaṇam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.013a: tatas taṃ pitaras tāta vijñāya bhṛgusattamam
GE07mbh_01_u:170.013c: pitṛlokād upāgamya sarva ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.014a: aurva dṛṣṭaḥ prabhāvas te tapasograsya putraka
GE07mbh_01_u:170.014c: prasādaṃ kuru lokānāṃ niyaccha krodham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.015a: nānīśair hi tadā tāta bhṛgubhir bhāvitātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.016a: āyuṣā hi prakṛṣṭena yadā naḥ kheda āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:170.016c: tadāsmābhir vadhas tāta kṣatriyair īpsitaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:170.017a: nikhātaṃ tad dhi vai vittaṃ kena cid bhṛguveśmani
GE07mbh_01_u:170.017e: kiṃ hi vittena naḥ kāryaṃ svargepsūnāṃ dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:170.017f-1789_01: yad asmākaṃ dhanādhyakṣaḥ prabhūtaṃ dhanam āharat
GE07mbh_01_u:170.018a: yadā tu mṛtyur ādātuṃ na naḥ śaknoti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.018c: tadāsmābhir ayaṃ dṛṣṭa upāyas tāta saṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:170.019a: ātmahā ca pumāṃs tāta na lokāṃl labhate śubhān
GE07mbh_01_u:170.019d-1790_01: etasya parihārārthaṃ tvaṃ tu dharmaṃ samācara
GE07mbh_01_u:170.020a: na caitan naḥ priyaṃ tāta yad idaṃ kartum icchasi
GE07mbh_01_u:170.021a: na hi naḥ kṣatriyāḥ ke cin na lokāḥ sapta putraka
GE07mbh_01_u:170.021c: dūṣayanti tapas tejaḥ krodham utpatitaṃ jahi
GE07mbh_01_u:171.001a: uktavān asmi yāṃ krodhāt pratijñāṃ pitaras tadā

GE07mbh_01_u:171.006c: āgarbhotsādanaṃ kṣāntaṃ tadā māṃ manyur āviṣat
GE07mbh_01_u:171.007a: āpūrṇakośāḥ kila me mātaraḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:171.008a: tān bhṛgūṇāṃ tadā dārān kaś cin nābhyavapadyata
GE07mbh_01_u:171.008c: yadā tadā dadhāreyam ūruṇaikena māṃ śubhā

GE07mbh_01_u:171.010c: tiṣṭhanti bahavo loke tadā pāpeṣu karmasu

GE07mbh_01_u:171.011c: īśaḥ san so 'pi tenaiva karmaṇā saṃprayujyate

GE07mbh_01_u:171.012c: śaktair na śakitā trātum iṣṭaṃ matveha jīvitam

GE07mbh_01_u:171.015a: yaś cāyaṃ manyujo me 'gnir lokān ādātum icchati
GE07mbh_01_u:171.015c: dahed eṣa ca mām eva nigṛhītaḥ svatejasā
GE07mbh_01_u:171.016c: tasmād vidadhvaṃ yac chreyo lokānāṃ mama ceśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:171.017a: ya eṣa manyujas te 'gnir lokān ādātum icchati
GE07mbh_01_u:171.017c: apsu taṃ muñca bhadraṃ te lokā hy apsu pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:171.017d-1791_01: kuru tāta vaco 'smākaṃ mā lokān hiṃsi cādhunā
GE07mbh_01_u:171.019a: ayaṃ tiṣṭhatu te vipra yadīcchasi mahodadhau

GE07mbh_01_u:171.022c: tam agnim udgiran vaktrāt pibaty āpo mahodadhau
GE07mbh_01_u:171.023a: tasmāt tvam api bhadraṃ te na lokān hantum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:171.023c: parāśara parān dharmāñ jānañ jñānavatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:172.001a: evam uktaḥ sa viprarṣir vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā

GE07mbh_01_u:172.004c: dvitīyām asya mā bhāṅkṣaṃ pratijñām iti niścayāt

GE07mbh_01_u:172.005c: āsīt purastād dīptānāṃ caturtha iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:172.007a: taṃ vasiṣṭhādayaḥ sarve munayas tatra menire
GE07mbh_01_u:172.007c: tejasā divi dīpyantaṃ dvitīyam iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_01_u:172.009a: tathā pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuś caiva mahākratum
GE07mbh_01_u:172.010a: pulastyas tu vadhāt teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:172.011a: kaccit tātāpavighnaṃ te kaccin nandasi putraka
GE07mbh_01_u:172.012b-1792_01: naiṣa tāta dvijātīnāṃ dharmo dṛṣṭas tapasvinām
GE07mbh_01_u:172.012b-1792_02: śama eva paro dharmas tam ācara parāśara

GE07mbh_01_u:172.012d-1793_02: prajānāṃ ca mamocchedaṃ na caivaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:172.012d-1793_03: śāpād dhi śakter vāsiṣṭha tat tāvad upapāditam
GE07mbh_01_u:172.012d-1793_04: ātmajena saroṣeṇa śaktir nīta ito divam
GE07mbh_01_u:172.012d-1793_05: na hi taṃ rākṣasaḥ kaś cic chakto bhakṣayituṃ mune

GE07mbh_01_u:173.009c: tayoś ca dravator vipraṃ jagṛhe nṛpatir balāt
GE07mbh_01_u:173.010a: dṛṣṭvā gṛhītaṃ bhartāram atha brāhmaṇy abhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:173.010c: śṛṇu rājan vaco mahyaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi suvrata

GE07mbh_01_u:173.011d-1798_04: tadāsi rakṣitas tvaṃ vai viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
