GE07mbh_01_u:181.024c: nyavadhīd balināṃ śreṣṭho jahasur brāhmaṇās tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025c: yac chalyaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau nāhanad balinaṃ balī
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0001: tato rājasamūhasya paśyato vṛkṣam ārujat tatas tu bhīmaṃ saṃjñābhir vārayām āsa dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0004: dharmarājaś ca kauravyaṃ duryodhanam amarṣaṇam etasmin nantare 'vidhyad bāṇena nataparvaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0007: tato duryodhanaḥ kruddho daṇḍāhata ivoragaḥ pratyayudhyata rājānaṃ yatnaṃ paramam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0009: chittvā rājā dhanuḥ sajyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0010: abhyavarṣac charoghais taṃ sa hitvā prādravad raṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0011: duḥśāsanas tu saṃkruddhaḥ sahadevena pārthiva yuddhvā ca suciraṃ kālaṃ dhanuṣā sa mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0013: visṛjya ca dhanuḥ saṃkhye varma cādāya bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0016: duḥṣaho nakulāc cāpi apakṛṣṭaś ca kauravaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0017: nivartantāṃ bhavanto vai kuto vipreṣu vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0018: na ceme kevalaṃ viprā na caiṣāṃ mānuṣaṃ balam dvāv atra brāhmaṇau krūrau dvāv indrasadṛśau bale
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0020: ye vā ke vā namas tebhyo gacchāmaḥ svapuraṃ vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0021: evaṃ saṃbhāṣya te vīrā vinivartanta kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0022: prajahur brāhmaṇās tatra sametaṃ rājamaṇḍalam prayātās te tatas tatra kṣatriyā raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_01_u:181.025d-099_0024: brāhmaṇāś ca jayaṃ prāptāḥ kanyām ādāya niryayuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.026a: pātite bhīmasenena śalye karṇe ca śaṅkite
GE07mbh_01_u:181.027a: ūcuś ca sahitās tatra sādhv ime brāhmaṇarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.028a: ko hi rādhāsutaṃ karmaṃ śakto yodhayituṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:181.028c: anyatra rāmād droṇād vā kṛpād vāpi śaradvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.029a: kṛṣṇād vā devakīputrāt phalgunād vā paraṃtapāt
GE07mbh_01_u:181.029c: ko vā duryodhanaṃ śaktaḥ pratiyodhayituṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:181.030c: baladevād ṛte vīrāt pāṇḍavād vā vṛkodarāt
GE07mbh_01_u:181.030d-1881_01: vīrād duryodhanād vānyaḥ śaktaḥ pātayituṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:181.031b-1882_01: brāhmaṇā hi sadā rakṣyāḥ sāparādhāpi nityadā
GE07mbh_01_u:181.031d-1883_01: tāṃs tathā vadataḥ sarvān prasamīkṣya kṣitīśvarān
GE07mbh_01_u:181.031d-1883_02: aty anyān puruṣāṃś cāpi kṛtvā tat karma saṃyuge
GE07mbh_01_u:181.032a: tat karma bhīmasya samīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ; kuntīsutau tau pariśaṅkamānaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.032c: nivārayām āsa mahīpatīṃs tān; dharmeṇa labdhety anunīya sarvān
GE07mbh_01_u:181.033a: ta evaṃ saṃnivṛttās tu yuddhād yuddhaviśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.034a: vṛtto brahmottaro raṅgaḥ pāñcālī brāhmaṇair vṛtā
GE07mbh_01_u:181.034c: iti bruvantaḥ prayayur ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.038a: dhārtarāṣṭrair hatā na syur vijñāya kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.039c: ity evaṃ cintayām āsa sutasnehānvitā pṛthā
GE07mbh_01_u:181.040a: mahaty athāparāhṇe tu ghanaiḥ sūrya ivāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:181.040d-1886_02: āgatas tu gṛhadvāri yatra tiṣṭhati vai pṛthā
GE07mbh_01_u:182.001a: gatvā tu tāṃ bhārgavakarmaśālāṃ; pārthau pṛthāṃ mahānubhāvau
GE07mbh_01_u:182.001c: tāṃ yājñasenīṃ paramapratītau; bhikṣety athāvedayatāṃ narāgryau
GE07mbh_01_u:182.001d-1887_01: prāg eva saṃpraviṣṭeṣu bhavanaṃ bhrātṛṣu triṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:182.002a: kuṭīgatā sā tv anavekṣya putrān; uvāca bhuṅkteti sametya sarve
GE07mbh_01_u:182.002c: paścāt tu kuntī prasamīkṣya kanyāṃ; kaṣṭaṃ mayā bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:182.003a: sādharmabhītā hi vilajjamānā; tāṃ yājñasenīṃ paramapratītām
GE07mbh_01_u:182.003c: pāṇau gṛhītvopajagāma kuntī; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vākyam uvāca cedam
GE07mbh_01_u:182.004a: iyaṃ hi kanyā drupadasya rājñas; tavānujābhyāṃ mayi saṃnisṛṣṭā
GE07mbh_01_u:182.004c: yathocitaṃ putra mayāpi coktaṃ; sametya bhuṅkteti nṛpa pramādāt
GE07mbh_01_u:182.005a: kathaṃ mayā nānṛtam uktam adya; bhavet kurūṇām ṛṣabha bravīhi
GE07mbh_01_u:182.005c: pāñcālarājasya sutām adharmo; na copavarteta nabhūtapūrvaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:182.006a: muhūrtamātraṃ tv anucintya rājā; yudhiṣṭhiro mātaram uttamaujāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:182.006c: kuntīṃ samāśvāsya kurupravīro; dhanaṃjayaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE07mbh_01_u:182.007a: tvayā jitā pāṇḍava yājñasenī; tvayā ca toṣiṣyati rājaputrī
GE07mbh_01_u:182.007c: prajvālyatāṃ hūyatāṃ cāpi vahnir; gṛhāṇa pāṇiṃ vidhivat tvam asyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:182.008a: mā māṃ narendra tvam adharmabhājaṃ; kṛthā na dharmo hy ayam īpsito 'nyaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:182.008c: bhavān niveśyaḥ prathamaṃ tato 'yaṃ; bhīmo mahābāhur acintyakarmā
GE07mbh_01_u:182.009a: ahaṃ tato nakulo 'nantaraṃ me; mādrīsutaḥ sahadevo jaghanyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:182.009c: vṛkodaro 'haṃ ca yamau ca rājann; iyaṃ ca kanyā bhavataḥ sma sarve
GE07mbh_01_u:182.010a: evaṃgate yat karaṇīyam atra; dharmyaṃ yaśasyaṃ kuru tat pracintya
GE07mbh_01_u:182.010c: pāñcālarājasya ca yat priyaṃ syāt; tad brūhi sarve sma vaśe sthitās te vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:182.011a: te dṛṣṭvā tatra tiṣṭhantīṃ sarve kṛṣṇāṃ yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:182.012a: teṣāṃ hi draupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā sarveṣām amitaujasām
GE07mbh_01_u:182.013a: kāmyaṃ rūpaṃ hi pāñcālyā vidhātrā vihitaṃ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:182.015a: abravīt sa hi tān bhrātṝn mithobhedabhayān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:182.015c: sarveṣāṃ draupadī bhāryā bhaviṣyati hi naḥ śubhā
GE07mbh_01_u:182.015d-1890_01: pratyagṛhṇaṃs tato vāṇīṃ bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:182.015d-1891_02: sajjaṃ dhanus tan na kṛtaṃ kimartham
GE07mbh_01_u:182.015d-1891_03: viddhaṃ ca lakṣyaṃ na ca kasya hetor
GE07mbh_01_u:182.015d-1891_15: na tad dhanuḥ sajyam iyeṣa kartuṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:183.001a: bhrātur vacas tat prasamīkṣya sarve; jyeṣṭhasya pāṇḍos tanayās tadānīm
GE07mbh_01_u:183.001c: tam evārthaṃ dhyāyamānā manobhir; āsāṃ cakrur atha tatrāmitaujāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:183.002c: jagāma tāṃ bhārgavakarmaśālāṃ; yatrāsate te puruṣapravīrāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:183.003c: ajātaśatruṃ parivārya tāṃś ca; upopaviṣṭāñ jvalanaprakāśān
GE07mbh_01_u:183.004c: kṛṣṇo 'ham asmīti nipīḍya pādau; yudhiṣṭhirasyājamīḍhasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:183.005a: tathaiva tasyāpy anu rauhiṇeyas; tau cāpi hṛṣṭāḥ kuravo 'bhyanandan
GE07mbh_01_u:183.005c: pitṛṣvasuś cāpi yadupravīrāv; agṛhṇatāṃ bhāratamukhya pādau
GE07mbh_01_u:183.006a: ajātaśatruś ca kurupravīraḥ; papraccha kṛṣṇaṃ kuśalaṃ nivedya
GE07mbh_01_u:183.006c: kathaṃ vayaṃ vāsudeva tvayeha; gūḍhā vasanto viditāḥ sma sarve
GE07mbh_01_u:183.007a: tam abravīd vāsudevaḥ prahasya; gūḍho 'py agnir jñāyata eva rājan
GE07mbh_01_u:183.007c: taṃ vikramaṃ pāṇḍaveyānatītya; ko 'nyaḥ kartā vidyate mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:183.008a: diṣṭyā tasmāt pāvakāt saṃpramuktā; yūyaṃ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ śatrusāhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:183.008c: diṣṭyā pāpo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putraḥ; sahāmātyo na sakāmo 'bhaviṣyat
GE07mbh_01_u:183.009a: bhadraṃ vo 'stu nihitaṃ yad guhāyāṃ; vivardhadhvaṃ jvalana ivedhyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:183.009c: mā vo vidyuḥ pārthivāḥ ke caneha; yāsyāvahe śibirāyaiva tāvat
GE07mbh_01_u:183.009e: so 'nujñātaḥ pāṇḍavenāvyayaśrīḥ; prāyāc chīghraṃ baladevena sārdham
GE07mbh_01_u:184.002d-1894_01: jijñāsamānas tu sa tān saṃdideśa nṛpātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.002d-1894_02: puruṣān draupadīhetor jānīdhvaṃ ke tv ime dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.003a: sāye 'tha bhīmas tu ripupramāthī; jiṣṇur yamau cāpi mahānubhāvau
GE07mbh_01_u:184.003c: bhaikṣaṃ caritvā tu yudhiṣṭhirāya; nivedayāṃ cakrur adīnasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.004a: tatas tu kuntī drupadātmajāṃ tām; uvāca kāle vacanaṃ vadānyā
GE07mbh_01_u:184.004c: ato 'gram ādāya kuruṣva bhadre; baliṃ ca viprāya ca dehi bhikṣām
GE07mbh_01_u:184.005a: ye cānnam icchanti dadasva tebhyaḥ; pariśritā ye parito manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.005c: tataś ca śeṣaṃ pravibhajya śīghram; ardhaṃ caturṇāṃ mama cātmanaś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:184.006a: ardhaṃ ca bhīmāya dadāhi bhadre; ya eṣa mattarṣabhatulyarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.006c: śyāmo yuvā saṃhananopapanna; eṣo hi vīro bahubhuk sadaiva
GE07mbh_01_u:184.007a: sā hṛṣṭarūpaiva tu rājaputrī; tasyā vacaḥ sādhv aviśaṅkamānā
GE07mbh_01_u:184.007c: yathāvad uktaṃ pracakāra sādhvī; te cāpi sarve 'bhyavajahrur annam
GE07mbh_01_u:184.008a: kuśais tu bhūmau śayanaṃ cakāra; mādrīsutaḥ sahadevas tarasvī
GE07mbh_01_u:184.008c: yathātmīyāny ajināni sarve; saṃstīrya vīrāḥ suṣupur dharaṇyām
GE07mbh_01_u:184.009a: agastyaśāstām abhito diśaṃ tu; śirāṃsi teṣāṃ kurusattamānām
GE07mbh_01_u:184.009c: kuntī purastāt tu babhūva teṣāṃ; kṛṣṇā tiraś caiva babhūva pattaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.010a: aśeta bhūmau saha pāṇḍuputraiḥ; pādopadhāneva kṛtā kuśeṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:184.010c: na tatra duḥkhaṃ ca babhūva tasyā; na cāvamene kurupuṃgavāṃs tān
GE07mbh_01_u:184.011a: te tatra śūrāḥ kathayāṃ babhūvuḥ; kathā vicitrāḥ pṛtanādhikārāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.011c: astrāṇi divyāni rathāṃś ca nāgān; khaḍgān gadāś cāpi paraśvadhāṃś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:184.012a: teṣāṃ kathās tāḥ parikīrtyamānāḥ; pāñcālarājasya sutas tadānīm
GE07mbh_01_u:184.012c: śuśrāva kṛṣṇāṃ ca tathā niṣaṇṇāṃ; te cāpi sarve dadṛśur manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.013a: dhṛṣṭadyumno rājaputras tu sarvaṃ; vṛttaṃ teṣāṃ kathitaṃ caiva rātrau
GE07mbh_01_u:184.013c: sarvaṃ rājñe drupadāyākhilena; nivedayiṣyaṃs tvarito jagāma
GE07mbh_01_u:184.014a: pāñcālarājas tu viṣaṇṇarūpas; tān pāṇḍavān aprativindamānaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.014c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ paryapṛcchan mahātmā; kva sā gatā kena nītā ca kṛṣṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:184.015a: kaccin na śūdreṇa na hīnajena; vaiśyena vā karadenopapannā
GE07mbh_01_u:184.015c: kaccit padaṃ mūrdhni na me nidigdhaṃ; kaccin mālā patitā na śmaśāne
GE07mbh_01_u:184.016a: kaccit savarṇapravaro manuṣya; udriktavarṇo 'py uta veha kaccit
GE07mbh_01_u:184.016c: kaccin na vāmo mama mūrdhni pādaḥ; kṛṣṇābhimarśena kṛto 'dya putra
GE07mbh_01_u:184.017a: kaccic ca yakṣye paramapratītaḥ; saṃyujya pārthena nararṣabheṇa
GE07mbh_01_u:184.017c: bravīhi tattvena mahānubhāvaḥ; ko 'sau vijetā duhitur mamādya
GE07mbh_01_u:184.018a: vicitravīryasya tu kaccid adya; kurupravīrasya dharanti putrāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:184.018b-1895_02: bhāgyena tasyāś ca kulaṃ ca vā me
GE07mbh_01_u:184.018c: kaccit tu pārthena yavīyasādya; dhanur gṛhītaṃ nihataṃ ca lakṣyam
GE07mbh_01_u:185.001a: tatas tathoktaḥ parihṛṣṭarūpaḥ; pitre śaśaṃsātha sa rājaputraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.001c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ somakānāṃ prabarho; vṛttaṃ yathā yena hṛtā ca kṛṣṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.002c: yaḥ kārmukāgryaṃ kṛtavān adhijyaṃ; lakṣyaṃ ca tat pātitavān pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_01_u:185.003a: asajjamānaś ca gatas tarasvī; vṛto dvijāgryair abhipūjyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.003c: cakrāma vajrīva diteḥ suteṣu; sarvaiś ca devair ṛṣibhiś ca juṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.004a: kṛṣṇā ca gṛhyājinam anvayāt taṃ; nāgaṃ yathā nāgavadhūḥ prahṛṣṭā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.004c: amṛṣyamāṇeṣu narādhipeṣu; kruddheṣu taṃ tatra samāpatatsu
GE07mbh_01_u:185.005c: prakālayann eva sa pārthivaughān; kruddho 'ntakaḥ prāṇabhṛto yathaiva
GE07mbh_01_u:185.005d-1899_02: yaḥ pātayām āsa raṇe tu śalyam
GE07mbh_01_u:185.006a: tau pārthivānāṃ miṣatāṃ narendra; kṛṣṇām upādāya gatau narāgryau
GE07mbh_01_u:185.006c: vibhrājamānāv iva candrasūryau; bāhyāṃ purād bhārgavakarmaśālām
GE07mbh_01_u:185.007a: tatropaviṣṭārcir ivānalasya; teṣāṃ janitrīti mama pratarkaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.007c: tathāvidhair eva narapravīrair; upopaviṣṭais tribhir agnikalpaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.008a: tasyās tatas tāv abhivādya pādāv; uktvā ca kṛṣṇām abhivādayeti
GE07mbh_01_u:185.008c: sthitau ca tatraiva nivedya kṛṣṇāṃ; bhaikṣapracārāya gatā narāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.009a: teṣāṃ tu bhaikṣaṃ pratigṛhya kṛṣṇā; kṛtvā baliṃ brāhmaṇasāc ca kṛtvā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.009c: tāṃ caiva vṛddhāṃ pariviṣya tāṃś ca; narapravīrān svayam apy abhuṅkta
GE07mbh_01_u:185.010a: suptās tu te pārthiva sarva eva; kṛṣṇā tu teṣāṃ caraṇopadhānam
GE07mbh_01_u:185.010c: āsīt pṛthivyāṃ śayanaṃ ca teṣāṃ; darbhājināgryāstaraṇopapannam
GE07mbh_01_u:185.011a: te nardamānā iva kālameghāḥ; kathā vicitrāḥ kathayāṃ babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.011c: na vaiśyaśūdraupayikīḥ kathās tā; na ca dvijāteḥ kathayanti vīrāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.012a: niḥsaṃśayaṃ kṣatriyapuṃgavās te; yathā hi yuddhaṃ kathayanti rājan
GE07mbh_01_u:185.012c: āśā hi no vyaktam iyaṃ samṛddhā; muktān hi pārthāñ śṛṇumo 'gnidāhāt
GE07mbh_01_u:185.013a: yathā hi lakṣyaṃ nihataṃ dhanuś ca; sajyaṃ kṛtaṃ tena tathā prasahya
GE07mbh_01_u:185.013c: yathā ca bhāṣanti parasparaṃ te; channā dhruvaṃ te pracaranti pārthāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.014a: tataḥ sa rājā drupadaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ; purohitaṃ preṣayāṃ tatra cakre
GE07mbh_01_u:185.014c: vidyāma yuṣmān iti bhāṣamāṇo; mahātmanaḥ pāṇḍusutāḥ stha kaccit
GE07mbh_01_u:185.015a: gṛhītavākyo nṛpateḥ purodhā; gatvā praśaṃsām abhidhāya teṣām
GE07mbh_01_u:185.015c: vākyaṃ yathāvan nṛpateḥ samagram; uvāca tān sa kramavit krameṇa
GE07mbh_01_u:185.016a: vijñātum icchaty avanīśvaro vaḥ; pāñcālarājo drupado varārhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.016c: lakṣyasya veddhāram imaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā; harṣasya nāntaṃ paripaśyate saḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.017a: tad ācaḍḍhvaṃ jñātikulānupūrvīṃ; padaṃ śiraḥsu dviṣatāṃ kurudhvam
GE07mbh_01_u:185.018a: pāṇḍur hi rājā drupadasya rājñaḥ; priyaḥ sakhā cātmasamo babhūva
GE07mbh_01_u:185.018c: tasyaiṣa kāmo duhitā mameyaṃ; snuṣā yadi syād iti kauravasya
GE07mbh_01_u:185.019a: ayaṃ ca kāmo drupadasya rājño; hṛdi sthito nityam aninditāṅgāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.019c: yad arjuno vai pṛthudīrghabāhur; dharmeṇa vindeta sutāṃ mameti
GE07mbh_01_u:185.019d-1900_01: tad vai śrutvā pāṇḍavāḥ sarva eva
GE07mbh_01_u:185.019d-1901_01: kṛtaṃ hi tat syāt sukṛtaṃ mamedaṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.019d-1901_02: yaśaś ca puṇyaṃ ca hitaṃ tad etat
GE07mbh_01_u:185.020a: tathoktavākyaṃ tu purohitaṃ taṃ; sthitaṃ vinītaṃ samudīkṣya rājā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.020c: samīpasthaṃ bhīmam idaṃ śaśāsa; pradīyatāṃ pādyam arghyaṃ tathāsmai
GE07mbh_01_u:185.021a: mānyaḥ purodhā drupadasya rājñas; tasmai prayojyābhyadhikaiva pūjā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.021c: bhīmas tathā tat kṛtavān narendra; tāṃ caiva pūjāṃ pratisaṃgṛhītvā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.022a: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ tu purohitaṃ taṃ; yudhiṣṭhiro brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:185.023a: pradiṣṭaśulkā drupadena rājñā; sānena vīreṇa tathānuvṛttā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.023c: na tatra varṇeṣu kṛtā vivakṣā; na jīvaśilpe na kule na gotre
GE07mbh_01_u:185.024a: kṛtena sajyena hi kārmukeṇa; viddhena lakṣyeṇa ca saṃnisṛṣṭā
GE07mbh_01_u:185.024c: seyaṃ tathānena mahātmaneha; kṛṣṇā jitā pārthivasaṃghamadhye
GE07mbh_01_u:185.025a: naivaṃgate saumakir adya rājā; saṃtāpam arhaty asukhāya kartum
GE07mbh_01_u:185.025c: kāmaś ca yo 'sau drupadasya rājñaḥ; sa cāpi saṃpatsyati pārthivasya
GE07mbh_01_u:185.026a: aprāpyarūpāṃ hi narendrakanyām; imām ahaṃ brāhmaṇa sādhu manye
GE07mbh_01_u:185.026c: na tad dhanur mandabalena śakyaṃ; maurvyā samāyojayituṃ tathā hi
GE07mbh_01_u:185.026e: na cākṛtāstreṇa na hīnajena; lakṣyaṃ tathā pātayituṃ hi śakyam
GE07mbh_01_u:185.027a: tasmān na tāpaṃ duhitur nimittaṃ; pāñcālarājo 'rhati kartum adya
GE07mbh_01_u:185.027c: na cāpi tat pātanam anyatheha; kartuṃ viṣahyaṃ bhuvi mānavena
GE07mbh_01_u:185.028a: evaṃ bruvaty eva yudhiṣṭhire tu; pāñcālarājasya samīpato 'nyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:185.028c: tatrājagāmāśu naro dvitīyo; nivedayiṣyann iha siddham annam
GE07mbh_01_u:186.001a: janyārtham annaṃ drupadena rājñā; vivāhahetor upasaṃskṛtaṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.001c: tad āpnuvadhvaṃ kṛtasarvakāryāḥ; kṛṣṇā ca tatraiva ciraṃ na kāryam
GE07mbh_01_u:186.002c: etān samāruhya paraita sarve; pāñcālarājasya niveśanaṃ tat
GE07mbh_01_u:186.003a: tataḥ prayātāḥ kurupuṃgavās te; purohitaṃ taṃ prayāpya
GE07mbh_01_u:186.003c: āsthāya yānāni mahānti tāni; kuntī ca kṛṣṇā ca sahaiva yāte
GE07mbh_01_u:186.004a: śrutvā tu vākyāni purohitasya; yāny uktavān bhārata dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.005a: phalāni mālyāni susaṃskṛtāni; carmāṇi varmāṇi tathāsanāni
GE07mbh_01_u:186.005c: gāś caiva rājann atha caiva rajjūr; dravyāṇi cānyāni kṛṣīnimittam
GE07mbh_01_u:186.006a: anyeṣu śilpeṣu ca yāny api syuḥ; sarvāṇi kḷptāny akhilena tatra
GE07mbh_01_u:186.006c: krīḍānimittāni ca yāni tāni; sarvāṇi tatropajahāra rājā
GE07mbh_01_u:186.007a: rathāśvavarmāṇi ca bhānumanti; khaḍgā mahānto 'śvarathāś ca citrāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.007c: dhanūṃṣi cāgryāṇi śarāś ca mukhyāḥ; śaktyṛṣṭayaḥ kāñcanabhūṣitāś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:186.008a: prāsā bhuśuṇḍyaś ca paraśvadhāś ca; sāṃgrāmikaṃ caiva tathaiva sarvam
GE07mbh_01_u:186.008c: śayyāsanāny uttamasaṃskṛtāni; tathaiva cāsan vividhāni tatra
GE07mbh_01_u:186.009a: kuntī tu kṛṣṇāṃ parigṛhya sādhvīm; antaḥpuraṃ drupadasyāviveṣa
GE07mbh_01_u:186.009c: striyaś ca tāṃ kauravarājapatnīṃ; pratyarcayāṃ cakrur adīnasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.011a: rājā ca rājñaḥ sacivāś ca sarve; putrāś ca rājñaḥ suhṛdas tathaiva
GE07mbh_01_u:186.011c: preṣyāś ca sarve nikhilena rājan; harṣaṃ samāpetur atīva tatra
GE07mbh_01_u:186.012a: te tatra vīrāḥ paramāsaneṣu; sapādapīṭheṣv aviśaṅkamānāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.012c: yathānupūrvyā viviśur narāgryās; tadā mahārheṣu na vismayantaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.013c: dāsāś ca dāsyaś ca sumṛṣṭaveṣāḥ; bhojāpakāś cāpy upajahrur annam
GE07mbh_01_u:186.014a: te tatra bhuktvā puruṣapravīrā; yathānukāmaṃ subhṛśaṃ pratītāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.014c: utkramya sarvāṇi vasūni tatra; sāṃgrāmikāny āviviśur nṛvīrāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.015a: tal lakṣayitvā drupadasya putro; rājā ca sarvaiḥ saha mantrimukhyaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:186.015c: samarcayām āsur upetya hṛṣṭāḥ; kuntīsutān pārthivaputrapautrān
GE07mbh_01_u:187.002c: kathaṃ jānīma bhavataḥ kṣatriyān brāhmaṇān uta
GE07mbh_01_u:187.003a: vaiśyān vā guṇasaṃpannān uta vā śūdrayonijān
GE07mbh_01_u:187.003c: māyām āsthāya vā siddhāṃś carataḥ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_01_u:187.004c: bravītu no bhavān satyaṃ saṃdeho hy atra no mahān
GE07mbh_01_u:187.005c: api no bhāgadheyāni śubhāni syuḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:187.006a: kāmayā brūhi satyaṃ tvaṃ satyaṃ rājasu śobhate
GE07mbh_01_u:187.006c: iṣṭāpūrtena ca tathā vaktavyam anṛtaṃ na tu
GE07mbh_01_u:187.007a: śrutvā hy amarasaṃkāśa tava vākyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_01_u:187.008a: mā rājan vimanā bhūs tvaṃ pāñcālya prītir astu
GE07mbh_01_u:187.008c: īpsitas te dhruvaḥ kāmaḥ saṃvṛtto 'yam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_01_u:187.009a: vayaṃ hi kṣatriyā rājan pāṇḍoḥ putrā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.009c: jyeṣṭhaṃ māṃ viddhi kaunteyaṃ bhīmasenārjunāv imau
GE07mbh_01_u:187.009e: yābhyāṃ tava sutā rājan nirjitā rājasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_01_u:187.010a: yamau tu tatra rājendra yatra kṛṣṇā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_01_u:187.010c: vyetu te mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ kṣatriyāḥ smo nararṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:187.010e: padminīva suteyaṃ te hradād anyaṃ hradaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_01_u:187.011a: iti tathyaṃ mahārāja sarvam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_01_u:187.011c: bhavān hi gurur asmākaṃ paramaṃ ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:187.012c: prativaktuṃ tadā yuktaṃ nāśakat taṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_01_u:187.013a: yatnena tu sa taṃ harṣaṃ saṃnigṛhya paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.014a: papraccha cainaṃ dharmātmā yathā te pradrutāḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:187.014c: sa tasmai sarvam ācakhyāv ānupūrvyeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.015a: tac chrutvā drupado rājā kuntīputrasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:187.016a: āśvāsayām āsa ca taṃ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_01_u:187.016c: pratijajñe ca rājyāya drupado vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.017a: tataḥ kuntī ca kṛṣṇā ca bhīmasenārjunāv api
GE07mbh_01_u:187.017c: yamau ca rājñā saṃdiṣṭau viviśur bhavanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:187.018a: tatra te nyavasan rājan yajñasenena pūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.018c: pratyāśvastāṃs tato rājā saha putrair uvāca tān
GE07mbh_01_u:187.020a: tatas tam abravīd rājā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.020c: mamāpi dārasaṃbandhaḥ kāryas tāvad viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:187.020d-1904_01: tasmāt pūrvaṃ mayā kāryaṃ yad bhavān anumanyate
GE07mbh_01_u:187.021a: bhavān vā vidhivat pāṇiṃ gṛhṇātu duhitur mama
GE07mbh_01_u:187.021c: yasya vā manyase vīra tasya kṛṣṇām upādiśa
GE07mbh_01_u:187.022a: sarveṣāṃ draupadī rājan mahiṣī no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:187.022c: evaṃ hi vyāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ mama mātrā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:187.023a: ahaṃ cāpy aniviṣṭo vai bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.023c: pārthena vijitā caiṣā ratnabhūtā ca te sutā
GE07mbh_01_u:187.024a: eṣa naḥ samayo rājan ratnasya sahabhojanam
GE07mbh_01_u:187.024c: na ca taṃ hātum icchāmaḥ samayaṃ rājasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:187.024d-1905_01: akrameṇa niveśe ca dharmalopo mahān bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:187.024d-1905_02: nirjitā caiva pārthena ratnabhūtā ca te sutā
GE07mbh_01_u:187.025a: sarveṣāṃ dharmataḥ kṛṣṇā mahiṣī no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:187.026c: naikasyā bahavaḥ puṃso vidhīyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_01_u:187.026d-1906_01: so 'yaṃ na loke vede vā jātu dharmaḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_01_u:187.027c: kartum arhasi kaunteya kasmāt te buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_01_u:187.028a: sūkṣmo dharmo mahārāja nāsya vidmo vayaṃ gatim
GE07mbh_01_u:187.029a: na me vāg anṛtaṃ prāha nādharme dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.029c: evaṃ caiva vadaty ambā mama caiva manogatam
GE07mbh_01_u:187.029d-1908_01: āśrame rudranirdiṣṭād vyāsād etan mayā śrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:187.030a: eṣa dharmo dhruvo rājaṃś carainam avicārayan
GE07mbh_01_u:187.030c: mā ca te 'tra viśaṅkā bhūt kathaṃ cid api pārthiva
GE07mbh_01_u:187.031a: tvaṃ ca kuntī ca kaunteya dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:187.032a: te sametya tataḥ sarve kathayanti sma bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:188.001a: tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve pāñcālyaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.002a: pratinandya sa tān sarvān pṛṣṭvā kuśalam antataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.004a: tato muhūrtān madhurāṃ vāṇīm uccārya pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.004c: papraccha taṃ mahātmānaṃ draupadyarthe viśāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.005a: katham ekā bahūnāṃ syān na ca syād dharmasaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.005c: etan no bhagavān sarvaṃ prabravītu yathātatham
GE07mbh_01_u:188.006c: yasya yasya mataṃ yad yac chrotum icchāmi tasya tat
GE07mbh_01_u:188.007c: na hy ekā vidyate patnī bahūnāṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:188.008a: na cāpy ācaritaḥ pūrvair ayaṃ dharmo mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.008c: na ca dharmo 'py anekasthaś caritavyaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.009a: ato nāhaṃ karomy evaṃ vyavasāyaṃ kriyāṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:188.010a: yavīyasaḥ kathaṃ bhāryāṃ jyeṣṭho bhrātā dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:188.011a: na tu dharmasya sūkṣmatvād gatiṃ vidmaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:188.011c: adharmo dharma iti vā vyavasāyo na śakyate
GE07mbh_01_u:188.012a: kartum asmadvidhair brahmaṃs tato na vyavasāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:188.012c: pañcānāṃ mahiṣī kṛṣṇā bhavatv iti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:188.013a: na me vāg anṛtaṃ prāha nādharme dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.013c: vartate hi mano me 'tra naiṣo 'dharmaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:188.014a: śrūyate hi purāṇe 'pi jaṭilā nāma gautamī
GE07mbh_01_u:188.015a: guroś ca vacanaṃ prāhur dharmaṃ dharmajñasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:188.015c: gurūṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ janitrī paramo guruḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.016a: sā cāpy uktavatī vācaṃ bhaikṣavad bhujyatām iti
GE07mbh_01_u:188.016c: tasmād etad ahaṃ manye dharmaṃ dvijavarottama kunty uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:188.017-1911_01: bhujyatāṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdham ity arjunam acodayam
GE07mbh_01_u:188.017c: anṛtān me bhayaṃ tīvraṃ mucyeyam anṛtāt katham
GE07mbh_01_u:188.018a: anṛtān mokṣyase bhadre dharmaś caiṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.018c: na tu vakṣyāmi sarveṣāṃ pāñcāla śṛṇu me svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:188.019a: yathāyaṃ vihito dharmo yataś cāyaṃ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.019c: yathā ca prāha kaunteyas tathā dharmo na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.020a: tata utthāya bhagavān vyāso dvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.021a: pāṇḍavāś cāpi kuntī ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.021c: vicetasas te tatraiva pratīkṣante sma tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022c: ācakhyau tad yathā dharmo bahūnām ekapatnitā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-1912_01: yathā devā daduś caiva rājaputryāḥ purā varam
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0001: mā bhūd rājaṃs tava tāpo manaḥsthaḥ; pañcānāṃ bhāryā duhitā mameti mātur eṣā pārthiva prārthitā syāt; pañcānāṃ bhāryā duhitā mameti
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0003: yājopayājau dharmaratau tapobhyāṃ; tau cakratuḥ pañcapatitvam asyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0004: sā dharmataḥ pāṇḍuputrair avāptā; bhāryā kṛṣṇā modatāṃ vai kulaṃ te
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0005: loke nānyo nāthavāṃs tvad viśiṣṭaḥ; sarvārīṇām apradhṛṣyo 'si rājan
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0006: bhūyas tu me śṛṇv idaṃ tvaṃ viśoko; yathāgamaṃ pañcapatitvam asyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0007: eṣā nāḷāyanī pūrvaṃ maudgalyaṃ sthaviraṃ patim
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0008: ārādhayām āsa tadā kuṣṭhinaṃ tam aninditā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0009: tvagasthibhūtaṃ kaṭukaṃ lolam īrṣyuṃ sukopanam sugandhetaragandhāḍhyaṃ valīpalitadhāriṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0013: tataḥ kadā cid aṅguṣṭho bhuñjānasya vyaśīryata
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0014: annād uddhṛtya tac cānnam upāyuṅktāviśaṅkitā tena tasyāḥ prasannena kāmavyāhāriṇā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0016: varaṃ vṛṇīṣvety asakṛd uktā vavre varaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0017: nāsmi vṛddho na kaṭuko nerṣyur naivātikopanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0018: na ca durgandhavadano na kṛśo na ca lolupaḥ kathaṃ tvāṃ ramayāmīha kathaṃ tvāṃ vāsayāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0020: vada kalyāṇi bhadraṃ te yathā tvaṃ manasecchasi
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0021: sā tam akliṣṭakarmāṇaṃ varadaṃ sarvakāmadam bhartāram anavadyāṅgī prasannaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0024: pañcadhā māṃ vibhaktātmā bhagavāṃl lokaviśrutaḥ ramaya tvam acintyātman punaś caikatvam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0026: tāṃ tathety abravīd dhīmān brahmarṣir vai mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0027: sa pañcadhānubhūtvā tāṃ ramayām āsa sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0029: āśrameṣv adhikaṃ cāpi pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ vicacāra yathākāmaṃ kāmarūpavapuḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0031: yadā yayau divaṃ cāpi tatra devarṣibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0033: pūjyamānas tathā śacyā śakrasya bhavaneṣv api
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0035: sūryasya ca rathaṃ divyam āruhya bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0036: paryupetya punar meruṃ merau vāsam arocayat
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0037: ākāśagaṅgām āplutya tayā saha taponidhiḥ aṃśujāleṣu candrasya uvāsa ca yathānilaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0039: girirūpaṃ yadā dadhre sa maharṣis tadā punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0040: tatprabhāvena sā tasya madhye jajñe mahānadī
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0041: yadā puṣpākulaḥ sālaḥ saṃjajñe bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0042: latātvam atha saṃpede tam evābhyanuveṣṭatī pupoṣa ca vapur yasya tasyānugaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0044: sā pupoṣa samaṃ bhartuḥ skandhenāpi cacāra ha
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0045: tatas tasya ca tasyāś ca tulyā prītir avardhata tathā hi bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ prasādād ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0047: vijajñuṣī ca sā tatra daivayogena bhāminī
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0048: sa ca tāṃ tapasā devīṃ ramayām āsa yogataḥ ekapatnī purā bhūtvā sadaivāgre yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0051: damayantyāś ca mātuḥ sā viśeṣam adhikaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0052: etat tathyaṃ mahārāja mā te bhūd buddhir anyathā eṣā nāḷāyanī jajñe daivayogena kena cit
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0054: rājaṃs tavātmajā kṛṣṇā vedyāṃ tejasvinī śubhā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0055: tasmiṃs tasyā manaḥ saktaṃ na śaśāka kadā cana tathā praṇihito hy ātmā tasyās tasmin dvijottame
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0057: brūhi tat kāraṇaṃ yena brahmañ jātā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0058: sutā mamādhvare kṛṣṇā sarvavedavidāṃ vara śṛṇu rājan yathā hy asyā datto rudreṇa vai varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0060: yadarthaṃ caiva saṃbhūtā tava yajñe yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0061: ahaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi kṛṣṇāyāḥ paurvadehikam indraseneti vikhyātā purā nāḷāyanī śubhā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0064: maudgalyasya maharṣeś ca ramamāṇasya vai tayā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0065: saṃvatsaragaṇā rājan vyatīyuḥ kṣaṇavat tadā tataḥ kadā cid dharmātmā tṛptaḥ kāmād vyarajyata
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0068: utsasarja sa tāṃ vipraḥ sā tadā cāpatad bhuvi maudgalyo rājaśārdūla tapobhir bhāvitaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0071: prasīda bhagavan mahyaṃ na mām utsraṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0073: māro māṃ bādhate 'tyartham anugṛhṇātu māṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0075: yasmāt tvaṃ mayi niḥśaṅkā hy avaktavyaṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0076: ācarantī tapovighnaṃ tasmāc chṛṇu vaco mama
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0077: bhaviṣyasi nṛloke tvaṃ rājaputrī yaśasvinī pāñcālarājasya sutā drupadasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0079: bhavitāras tu te tatra patayaḥ pañca viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0080: taiḥ sārdhaṃ madhurākāraiś ciraṃ ratim avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0081: saivaṃ śaptā tu vimanā vanaṃ prāptā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0082: bhogair atṛptā deveśaṃ tapasārādhayat tadā nirāśīr mārutāhārā nirāhārā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0085: tīvreṇa tapasā tasyās tuṣṭaḥ paśupatiḥ svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0086: varaṃ prādāt tadā rudraḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0087: bhaviṣyati paraṃ janma mānuṣeṣu varāṅgane bhaviṣyanti ca te bhadre patayaḥ pañca suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0090: tatrasthā ca mahat karma surāṇāṃ tvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0091: ekaḥ khalu mayā bhartā vṛtaḥ pañcāpi me katham bhaviṣyanti mamaikasyāḥ patayas tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0093: pañcakṛtvas tvayā hy uktaḥ patiṃ dehīty ahaṃ punaḥ pañca te patayo bhadre bhaviṣyanti sukhāvahāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0095: dharma ekaḥ patiḥ strīṇāṃ pūrvam eva prakalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0096: bahupatnīkatā puṃsāṃ dharmaś ca pitṛbhiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0097: strīdharmaḥ pūrvam evāyaṃ nirmito munibhiḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0098: sahadharmacarī bhartur ekā ekasya cocyate eko hi bhartā nārīṇāṃ kaumāra iti laukikaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0100: āpatsu ca niyogena saṃtānārthe paraḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0101: gaccheta yā tṛtīyaṃ tu tasyā niṣkṛtir ucyate
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0102: caturthe patitā dharmāt pañcame vardhakī bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0103: evaṃ gate dharmapathe na vṛṇe bahupuṃskatām
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0104: alokācaritāt tasmāt kathaṃ mucyeya saṃkarāt anāvṛtāḥ purā nāryo hy āsañ śudhyanti cārtave
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0106: sakṛd uktaṃ tvayā naitān nādharmas te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0107: yadi me patayaḥ pañca varam icchāmi tair mithaḥ kaumāraṃ ca bhavet sarvaiḥ saṃgame saṃgame ca me
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0109: patiśuśrūṣayā caiva siddhiḥ prāptā purā mayā
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0110: bhogecchā ca mayā prāptā sa ca bhogaś ca me bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0111: ratiś ca bhadre siddhiś ca na bhajete parasparam abhogā lapsyase siddhiṃ yogenāpi mahatvatām
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0114: pañcabhiḥ prāpya kaumāraṃ mahābhāgā bhaviṣyasi gaccha gaṅgājalasthā ca naraṃ paśyasi yaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0116: tam ānaya mamābhyāśaṃ surarājaṃ śucismite ity uktā viśvarūpeṇa rudraṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:188.022d-100_0118: jagāma gaṅgām uddiśya puṇyāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_01_u:189.001a: purā vai naimiṣāraṇye devāḥ satram upāsate
GE07mbh_01_u:189.001c: tatra vaivasvato rājañ śāmitram akarot tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.002a: tato yamo dīkṣitas tatra rājan; nāmārayat kiṃ cid api prajābhyaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.002c: tataḥ prajās tā bahulā babhūvuḥ; kālātipātān maraṇāt prahīṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.002d-1913_01: sa tatra dīkṣitas tāta yamo nāmārayat prajāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.003a: tatas tu śakro varuṇaḥ kuberaḥ; sādhyā rudrā vasavaś cāśvinau ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.003c: praṇetāraṃ bhuvanasya prajāpatiṃ; samājagmus tatra devās tathānye
GE07mbh_01_u:189.004a: tato 'bruvaṃl lokaguruṃ sametā; bhayaṃ nas tīvraṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ vivṛddhyā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.004c: tasmād bhayād udvijantaḥ sukhepsavaḥ; prayāma sarve śaraṇaṃ bhavantam brahmovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.005a: kiṃ vo bhayaṃ mānuṣebhyo yūyaṃ sarve yadāmarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.005c: mā vo martyasakāśād vai bhayaṃ bhavatu karhi cit
GE07mbh_01_u:189.006a: martyā hy amartyāḥ saṃvṛttā na viśeṣo 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_01_u:189.007a: vaivasvato vyāpṛtaḥ satrahetos; tena tv ime na mriyante manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.007c: tasminn ekāgre kṛtasarvakārye; tata eṣāṃ bhavitaivāntakālaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.008a: vaivasvatasyāpi tanur vibhūtā; vīryeṇa yuṣmākam uta prayuktā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.008c: saiṣām anto bhavitā hy antakāle; tanur hi vīryaṃ bhavitā nareṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:189.009a: tatas tu te pūrvajadevavākyaṃ; śrutvā devā yatra devā yajante
GE07mbh_01_u:189.009c: samāsīnās te sametā mahābalā; bhāgīrathyāṃ dadṛśuḥ puṇḍarīkam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.010a: dṛṣṭvā ca tad vismitās te babhūvus; teṣām indras tatra śūro jagāma
GE07mbh_01_u:189.010c: so 'paśyad yoṣām atha pāvakaprabhāṃ; yatra gaṅgā satataṃ saṃprasūtā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.011a: sā tatra yoṣā rudatī jalārthinī; gaṅgāṃ devīṃ vyavagāhyāvatiṣṭhat
GE07mbh_01_u:189.011c: tasyāśrubinduḥ patito jale vai; tat padmam āsīd atha tatra kāñcanam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.012a: tad adbhutaṃ prekṣya vajrī tadānīm; apṛcchat tāṃ yoṣitam antikād vai
GE07mbh_01_u:189.012c: kā tvaṃ kathaṃ rodiṣi kasya hetor; vākyaṃ tathyaṃ kāmayeha bravīhi
GE07mbh_01_u:189.013a: tvaṃ vetsyase mām iha yāsmi śakra; yadarthaṃ cāhaṃ rodimi mandabhāgyā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.013c: āgaccha rājan purato 'haṃ gamiṣye; draṣṭāsi tad rodimi yatkṛte 'ham
GE07mbh_01_u:189.014a: tāṃ gacchantīm anvagacchat tadānīṃ; so 'paśyad ārāt taruṇaṃ darśanīyam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.015a: tam abravīd devarājo mamedaṃ; tvaṃ viddhi viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ vaśe sthitam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.015c: īśo 'ham asmīti samanyur abravīd; dṛṣṭvā tam akṣaiḥ subhṛśaṃ pramattam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.016a: kruddhaṃ tu śakraṃ prasamīkṣya devo; jahāsa śakraṃ ca śanair udaikṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:189.016c: saṃstambhito 'bhūd atha devarājas; tenekṣitaḥ sthāṇur ivāvatasthe
GE07mbh_01_u:189.017a: yadā tu paryāptam ihāsya krīḍayā; tadā devīṃ rudatīṃ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.017c: ānīyatām eṣa yato 'ham ārān; mainaṃ darpaḥ punar apy āviśeta
GE07mbh_01_u:189.018a: tataḥ śakraḥ spṛṣṭamātras tayā tu; srastair aṅgaiḥ patito 'bhūd dharaṇyām
GE07mbh_01_u:189.018c: tam abravīd bhagavān ugratejā; maivaṃ punaḥ śakra kṛthāḥ kathaṃ cit
GE07mbh_01_u:189.019a: vivartayainaṃ ca mahādrirājaṃ; balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca tavāprameyam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.019c: vivṛtya caivāviśa madhyam asya; yatrāsate tvadvidhāḥ sūryabhāsaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.020a: sa tad vivṛtya śikharaṃ mahāgires; tulyadyutīṃś caturo 'nyān dadarśa
GE07mbh_01_u:189.020c: sa tān abhiprekṣya babhūva duḥkhitaḥ; kaccin nāhaṃ bhavitā vai yatheme
GE07mbh_01_u:189.021a: tato devo giriśo vajrapāṇiṃ; vivṛtya netre kupito 'bhyuvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.021c: darīm etāṃ praviśa tvaṃ śatakrato; yan māṃ bālyād avamaṃsthāḥ purastāt
GE07mbh_01_u:189.022a: uktas tv evaṃ vibhunā devarājaḥ; pravepamāno bhṛśam evābhiṣaṅgāt
GE07mbh_01_u:189.022c: srastair aṅgair anileneva nunnam; aśvatthapatraṃ girirājamūrdhni
GE07mbh_01_u:189.023a: sa prāñjalir vinatenānanena; pravepamānaḥ sahasaivam uktaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.023c: uvāca cedaṃ bahurūpam ugraṃ; draṣṭā śeṣasya bhagavaṃs tvaṃ bhavādya
GE07mbh_01_u:189.024a: tam abravīd ugradhanvā prahasya; naivaṃśīlāḥ śeṣam ihāpnuvanti
GE07mbh_01_u:189.024c: ete 'py evaṃ bhavitāraḥ purastāt; tasmād etāṃ darim āviśya śedhvam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.025a: śeṣo 'py evaṃ bhavitā vo na saṃśayo; yoniṃ sarve mānuṣīm āviśadhvam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.025c: tatra yūyaṃ karma kṛtvāviṣahyaṃ; bahūn anyān nidhanaṃ prāpayitvā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.026a: āgantāraḥ punar evendralokaṃ; svakarmaṇā pūrvajitaṃ mahārham
GE07mbh_01_u:189.026c: sarvaṃ mayā bhāṣitam etad evaṃ; kartavyam anyad vividhārthavac ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.027a: gamiṣyāmo mānuṣaṃ devalokād; durādharo vihito yatra
GE07mbh_01_u:189.027c: devās tv asmān ādadhīrañ jananyāṃ; dharmo vāyur maghavān aśvinau ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.028a: etac chrutvā vajrapāṇir vacas tu; devaśreṣṭhaṃ punar āha
GE07mbh_01_u:189.028c: vīryeṇāhaṃ puruṣaṃ kāryahetor; dadyām eṣāṃ pañcamaṃ matprasūtam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.028d-1916_01: viśvabhug ṛtadhāmā ca śibir indraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_01_u:189.028d-1916_02: śāntiś caturthas teṣāṃ vai tejasvī pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.029a: teṣāṃ kāmaṃ bhagavān ugradhanvā; prādād iṣṭaṃ sannisargād yathoktam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.029c: tāṃ cāpy eṣāṃ yoṣitaṃ lokakāntāṃ; śriyaṃ bhāryāṃ vyadadhān mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:189.030a: tair eva sārdhaṃ tu tataḥ sa devo; jagāma nārāyaṇam aprameyam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.030c: sa cāpi tad vyadadhāt sarvam eva; tataḥ sarve saṃbabhūvur dharaṇyām
GE07mbh_01_u:189.031a: sa cāpi keśau harir udbabarha; śuklam ekam aparaṃ cāpi kṛṣṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.031c: tau cāpi keśau viśatāṃ yadūnāṃ; kule striyau rohiṇīṃ devakīṃ ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.031e: tayor eko baladevo babhūva; kṛṣṇo dvitīyaḥ keśavaḥ saṃbabhūva
GE07mbh_01_u:189.032a: ye te pūrvaṃ śakrarūpā niruddhās; tasyāṃ daryāṃ parvatasyottarasya
GE07mbh_01_u:189.032c: ihaiva te pāṇḍavā vīryavantaḥ; śakrasyāṃśaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ savyasācī
GE07mbh_01_u:189.033a: evam ete pāṇḍavāḥ saṃbabhūvur; ye te rājan pūrvam indrā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.033c: lakṣmīś caiṣāṃ pūrvam evopadiṣṭā; bhāryā yaiṣā draupadī divyarūpā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.034a: kathaṃ hi strī karmaṇo 'nte mahītalāt; samuttiṣṭhed anyato daivayogāt
GE07mbh_01_u:189.034c: yasyā rūpaṃ somasūryaprakāśaṃ; gandhaś cāgryaḥ krośamātrāt pravāti
GE07mbh_01_u:189.035a: idaṃ cānyat prītipūrvaṃ narendra; dadāmi te varam atyadbhutaṃ ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.035c: divyaṃ cakṣuḥ paśya kuntīsutāṃs tvaṃ; puṇyair divyaiḥ pūrvadehair upetān
GE07mbh_01_u:189.036a: tato vyāsaḥ paramodārakarmā; śucir vipras tapasā tasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.036c: cakṣur divyaṃ pradadau tān sa sarvān; rājāpaśyat pūrvadehair yathāvat
GE07mbh_01_u:189.037c: baddhāpīḍāṃś cārurūpāṃś ca yūno; vyūḍhoraskāṃs tālamātrān dadarśa
GE07mbh_01_u:189.038a: divyair vastrair arajobhiḥ suvarṇair; mālyaiś cāgryaiḥ śobhamānān atīva
GE07mbh_01_u:189.038c: sākṣāt tryakṣān vasavo vātha divyān; ādityān vā sarvaguṇopapannān
GE07mbh_01_u:189.038e: tān pūrvendrān evam īkṣyābhirūpān; prīto rājā drupado vismitaś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.039a: divyāṃ māyāṃ tām avāpyāprameyāṃ; tāṃ caivāgryāṃ śriyam iva rūpiṇīṃ ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.039c: yogyāṃ teṣāṃ rūpatejoyaśobhiḥ; patnīm ṛddhāṃ dṛṣṭavān pārthivendraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.040a: sa tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryarūpaṃ; jagrāha pādau satyavatyāḥ sutasya
GE07mbh_01_u:189.040c: naitac citraṃ paramarṣe tvayīti; prasannacetāḥ sa uvāca cainam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.041a: āsīt tapovane kā cid ṛṣeḥ kanyā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.041c: nādhyagacchat patiṃ sā tu kanyā rūpavatī satī
GE07mbh_01_u:189.042a: toṣayām āsa tapasā sā kilogreṇa śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_01_u:189.042c: tām uvāceśvaraḥ prīto vṛṇu kāmam iti svayam
GE07mbh_01_u:189.043a: saivam uktābravīt kanyā devaṃ varadam īśvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:189.044a: dadau tasyai sa deveśas taṃ varaṃ prītimāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.044c: pañca te patayaḥ śreṣṭhā bhaviṣyantīti śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.045c: ekaṃ patiṃ guṇopetaṃ tvatto 'rhāmīti vai tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.045e: tāṃ devadevaḥ prītātmā punaḥ prāha śubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046a: pañcakṛtvas tvayā uktaḥ patiṃ dehīty ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046c: tat tathā bhavitā bhadre tava tad bhadram astu te
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046e: deham anyaṃ gatāyās te yathoktaṃ tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0001: saiva nāḷāyanī bhūtvā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi maudgalyaṃ patim āsādya śivād varam avāpya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0003: śṛṇu guhyaṃ mahīpāla vadataḥ sāvadhānataḥ saṃśraddhatsva vaco mahyaṃ tataḥ paśyasi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0005: hatvā vṛtraṃ surapatis tvāṣṭraṃ svargāt sa ha cyutaḥ brahmahatyām avāpyātha dharmādirahitas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0007: aindro dharmo yamam agād balaṃ vāyum athāviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0008: vīryaṃ varaṃ jñānarūpe nāsatyāv abhijagmatuḥ hrīś ca lakṣmīś ca kīrtiś ca saṃnatir matir eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0010: etā vinirgatā indrād vāgdevīṃ tāḥ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0012: dharmādīn pāṇḍavān viddhi hriyād yā draupadīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0013: tad ime pāṇḍavā rājan indra eko na saṃśayaḥ ekaiva draupadī rājan paulomī te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:189.046f-102_0015: śṛṇu guhyatamaṃ cānyad rahasyaṃ devanirmitam yac chrutvā saṃśayas te 'dya śatadhā viphaliṣyati

GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0064: hṛṣīkeśavacaḥ śrutvā te ubhe ūcatur bhṛśam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0065: manoratho mahān eṣa hṛdi naḥ parivartate
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0066: kadā drakṣyāma bībhatsuṃ pāṇḍavaṃ gṛham āgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0067: iti cintayamānānāṃ pārtho duḥkham apānudat prāptam ajñātapūjābhir uttamābhir apūjayat
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0069: sa taṃ priyātithiśreṣṭhaṃ samīkṣya yatim āgatam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0070: sodaryāṃ bhaginīṃ kṛṣṇaḥ subhadrām idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0071: ayaṃ deśātithir bhadre saṃyato vratavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0072: prāpnotu satataṃ pūjāṃ tava kanyāpure vasan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0073: āryeṇa ca parijñātaḥ pūjanīyo yatiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0074: tasmād bharasva vārṣṇeyi bhakṣyair bhojyair yatiṃ sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0075: eṣa yad yad ṛṣir brūyāt kāryam eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0076: sakhībhiḥ sahitā bhadre bhavāsya vaśavartinī purāpi yatayo bhadre ye bhaikṣārtham anuvratāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0079: tebhyo bhojyāni bhakṣyāṇi yathākālam atandritāḥ kanyāpuragatāḥ kanyāḥ prayacchanti yaśasvini
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0081: sā tathety abravīt kṛṣṇaṃ kariṣyāmi yathāttha mām
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0082: toṣayiṣyāmi vṛttena karmaṇā ca dvijarṣabham evam etena rūpeṇa kaṃ cit kālaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0084: uvāsa bhakṣyair bhojyaiś ca bhadrayā paramārcitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0086: paśyataḥ satataṃ bhadrāṃ prādur āsīn manobhavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0087: gūhayann iva cākāram ālokya varavarṇinīm dīrgham uṣṇaṃ niśaśvāsa pārthaḥ kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0089: na kṛṣṇāṃ rūpato mene vāsudevasahodarām prāptāṃ hṛdīndrasenāṃ vā sākṣād vā varuṇātmajām
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0094: prīyate smārjunaḥ paśyan svāhām iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0095: pāṇḍavasya subhadrāyāḥ sakāśe tu yaśasvinaḥ samutpattiḥ prabhāvaś ca gadena kathitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0098: upamām arjunaṃ kṛtvā vistaraḥ kathitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0099: kruddhamattapralāpaś ca vṛṣṇīnām arjunaṃ prati pauruṣāṇy upamāṃ kṛtvā prāvardhanta dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0102: arjuno 'pi na me tulyaḥ kutas tvam iti te 'bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0103: jātāṃś ca putrān gṛhṇanta āśiṣo vṛṣṇayo 'bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0104: arjunasya samo vīrye bhava tāta dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0105: tasmāt subhadrā cakame pauruṣād bharatarṣabham satyasaṃdhasya rūpeṇa cāturyeṇa ca mohitā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0109: kīrtayan dadṛśe yo yaḥ kathaṃ cit kurujāṅgalam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0110: taṃ tam eva sadā bhadrā bībhatsuṃ smābhipṛcchati
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0112: pratyakṣa iva bhadrāyāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ samapadyata bhujau bhujagasaṃkāśau jyāghātena kiṇīkṛtau
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0115: yathārūpaṃ hi śuśrāva subhadrā bharatarṣabham tathārūpam avekṣyainaṃ parāṃ prītim avāpa sā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0117: sā kadā cid upāsīnaṃ papraccha kurunandanam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0118: kathaṃ deśāḥ kathaṃ śailā nānājanapadāḥ katham
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0119: sarāṃsi saritaś caiva vanāni ca kathaṃ yate
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0120: diśaḥ kāś ca kathaṃ prāptāś caratā bhavatā sadā sa tathoktas tadā bhadrāṃ bahunarmānṛtaṃ bruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0122: uvāca paramaprītas tasyā bahu tathā kathāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0123: niśamya vividhaṃ tasya loke caritam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0125: parvasaṃdhau ca kasmiṃś cit subhadrā bharatarṣabham
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0128: kaccid bhagavatā dṛṣṭā pṛthāsmākaṃ pitṛṣvasā bhrātṛbhiḥ prayataiḥ sarvaiḥ kaccid āryo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0130: kaccid dharmaparo bhīmo dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ nivṛttasamayaḥ kaccid aparādhād dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0133: kva nu pārthaś caraty adya bahvīr durvasatīr vasan sukhocito hy aduḥkhārho dīrghabāhur ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0135: kaccic chruto vā dṛṣṭo vā pārtho bhagavatārjunaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0136: niśamya vacanaṃ tasyās tām uvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0137: ārye pṛthā ca kuśalā saputrā ca sahasnuṣā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0138: prīyate paśyatī putrān kurukṣetraṃ ca paśyatī
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0139: anujñātas tu mātrā ca sodaryais tu dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0140: dvārakām āvasaty eko yatiliṅgena pāṇḍavaḥ paśyantī satataṃ kasmān nābhijānāsi mādhavi
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0143: niḥśvāsabahulā tasthau kṣitiṃ vilikhatī tadā tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0145: arjuno 'ham iti prītas tām uvāca dhanaṃjayaḥ yathā tava gato bhāvaḥ śravaṇān mayi bhāmini
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0147: tvadgataḥ satataṃ bhāvas tathā śataguṇo mama
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0148: praśaste 'hani dharmeṇa bhadre svayam ahaṃ vṛtaḥ satyavān iva sāvitryā bhaviṣyāmi patis tava
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0150: evam uktvā tataḥ pārthaḥ praviveśa latāgṛham
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0152: mumoha śayane divye śayānā natathocitā kanyāpure ca saṃvṛttaṃ jñātvā divyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0154: śaśāsa rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo bhojanādikam arjune tadā prabhṛti tāṃ bhadrāṃ cintayan vai dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0156: āste sma sa tadārāme kāryeṇaiva sahābhibhūḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0157: subhadrāpi na ca svasthā pārthaṃ prati babhūva sā kṛśā vivarṇavadanā cintāśokaparāyaṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0160: na śayyāsanabhogeṣu ratiṃ vindati kena cit
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0161: na naktaṃ na divā śete babhūvonmattadarśanā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0162: evaṃ śokaparāṃ bhadrāṃ devakī vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0163: mā śokaṃ kuru vārṣṇeyi dhṛtim ālamba śobhane
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0164: nivedayiṣye tvāṃ rāme kṛṣṇe caiva nararṣabhe
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0165: paścāj jānāmi te vārtāṃ mā śokaṃ kuru mādhavi evam uktvā ca sā mātā bhadrāyāḥ priyakāminī
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0167: nivedayām āsa tadā bhadrām ānakadundubheḥ rahasy ekāsanā tatra bhadrāsvastheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0169: ārāme tu yatiḥ śrīmān arjunaḥ so 'tha naḥ śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0170: akrūrāya ca kṛṣṇāya āhukāya ca sātyake
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0171: nivedyatāṃ mahāprājña śrotavyaṃ yadi bāndhavaiḥ vasudevas tu tac chrutvā akrūrāhukayos tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0173: nivedayitvā kṛṣṇāya mantrayām āsa naikadhā idaṃ kāryam idaṃ kṛtyam idam evaṃ viniścitam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0175: akrūraś cograsenaś ca satyakaś ca gadena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0176: pṛthuśravāś ca kṛṣṇaś ca sahitāḥ śininā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0177: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca devakī rohiṇī tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0180: ajñātaṃ rauhiṇeyasya uddhavasya ca bhārata vivāhaṃ tu subhadrāyāḥ kartukāmo gadāgrajaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0184: nagare ghoṣayām āsa hitārthaṃ savyasācinaḥ itaś caturthe tv ahani antardvīpaṃ tu gamyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0186: sadāraiḥ sānuyātraiś ca saputraiś ca sabāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0187: gantavyaṃ sarvavarṇaiś ca gantavyaṃ sarvayādavaiḥ evam uktās tu te sarve tathā cakruś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0189: tataḥ sarvadaśārhāṇām antardvīpe tu bhārata catustriṃśad ahorātraṃ babhūva paramotsavaḥ kṛṣṇarāmāhukākrūrapradyumnaśinisatyakāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0194: samudraṃ prayayur naubhiḥ sarve puranivāsinaḥ tatas tvaritam āgamya dāśārhagaṇapūjitam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0197: kṛtyavān dvādaśāhāni sthātā sa bhagavān iha
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0198: tiṣṭhatas tasya kaḥ kuryād upasthānavidhiṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0199: tām uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ kas tvad anyo viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0200: tam ṛṣiṃ pratyupasthātum ito nārhati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0202: kuru sarvāṇi kāryāṇi kīrtiṃ dharmam avekṣya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0203: tasya cātithimukhyasya sarveṣāṃ ca tapasvinām saṃvidhānaparā bhadre bhava tvaṃ vaśavartinī
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0205: evam ādiśya bhadrāṃ ca rakṣāṃ ca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0206: yayau śaṅkhapraṇādena bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ tatas tad dvīpam āsādya dānadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0212: vāpīpalvalasaṃghaiś ca kānanaiś ca manoramaiḥ vāsudevasamair dvīpaḥ sa sarvaiḥ kukurāndhakaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0217: vicitramālyābharaṇāś citrarūpānulepanāḥ vihārābhimukhāḥ sarve yādavāḥ pānasaṃyutāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0220: tatra yāte daśārhāṇām ṛṣabhe śārṅgadhanvani subhadrodvāhanaṃ pārthaḥ prāptakālam amanyata
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0222: vṛṣṇyandhakapurāt tasmād apayānaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ viniścitya tataḥ pārthaḥ subhadrām idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0224: śṛṇu bhadre yathāśāstraṃ yathārtham ṛṣibhiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0225: kanyāyās tu pitā bhrātā mātā mātula eva ca pitṛbhrātā guruś cāpi dāne tu prabhutāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0228: antardvīpaṃ gato bhadre putraiḥ pautraiḥ sabāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0229: mama caiva viśālākṣi videśasthās tu bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0230: tasmāt subhadre gāndharvo vivāhaḥ pañcamo bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0231: samāgame tu kanyāyāḥ kriyāḥ proktāś caturvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0232: teṣāṃ pravṛttiṃ sādhūnāṃ śṛṇu mādhavi tad yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0233: varam āhūya vidhinā pitṛdattā yathārthine sā patnī tu budhair uktā sā tu vaśyā pativratā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0235: bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇārthāya ātmanaḥ poṣaṇāya ca dāre sthite gṛhītā sā bhāryā ceti budhair matā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0237: dharmato varayitvā tu ānīya svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0238: nyāyena dattā tāruṇye dārāḥ pitṛkṛtā bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0239: janayed yā tu bhartāraṃ jāyā ity eva nāmataḥ dārāḥ patnī ca bhāryā ca jāyā ceti caturvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0243: ātmanānugṛhītā yā sā tu vaśyā prajāvatī
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0244: gāndharvas tu kriyāhīno rāgād eva pravartate
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0245: sakāmāyāḥ sakāmena nirmantro rahasi smṛtaḥ mayoktam akriyaṃ cāpi kartavyaṃ mādhavi tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0247: ayanaṃ caiva māsaś ca ṛkṣaṃ pakṣas tathā tithiḥ karaṇaṃ ca muhūrtaṃ ca lagnasaṃpad yathādya vai
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0250: vaiśākhaś caiva māsānāṃ pakṣāṇāṃ śubhra eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0251: nakṣatrāṇāṃ tathā hastas tṛtīyā ca tithiṣv api
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0252: lagno hi makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ karaṇānāṃ bavas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0253: maitro muhūrto vaivāhya āvayoḥ śubhakarmaṇi sarvasaṃpad iyaṃ bhadre adya rātrau bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0255: bhagavān astam abhyeti tapanas tapatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0256: nārāyaṇo hi sarvajño nānubudhyeta viśvakṛt dharmasaṃkaṭam āpanne kiṃ nu kṛtvā śubhaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0258: manobhavena kāmena mohitaṃ mā pralāpinam prativākyaṃ tu me dehi kiṃ na vakṣyasi mādhavi
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0263: cintayām āsa pitaraṃ praviśya ca latāgṛham
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0264: cintayānaṃ tu kaunteyaṃ jñātvā śacyā śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0267: cintitaṃ ca subhadrāyāś cintayitvā janārdanaḥ nidrayāpahṛtajñānaṃ rauhiṇeyaṃ vinā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0269: sahākrūreṇa śininā satyakena gadena ca vasudevena devakyā āhukena ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0271: ājagāma purīṃ rātrau dvārakāṃ svajanair vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0272: pūjayitvā tu deveśaṃ nāradādyair maharṣibhiḥ kuśalapraśnam uktvā tu devendreṇābhiyācitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0274: vaivāhikakriyāṃ kṛṣṇas tathety evam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0275: āhuko vasudevaś ca sahākrūraḥ sasātyakiḥ abhipraṇamya śirasā pākaśāsanam abruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0277: devadeva namas te 'stu lokanātha jagatpate vayaṃ dhanyāḥ sma lokeṣu bāndhavaiḥ sahitā vibho
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0279: kṛtaprasādās tu vayaṃ tava vākyena viśvajit
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0280: evam uktvā prasādyainaṃ pūjayitvā prayatnataḥ mahendraśāsanāt sarve sahitāś ca maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0283: arundhatī śacī devī rukmiṇī devakī tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0284: divyastrībhiś ca sahitāḥ kriyāṃ bhadrāṃ prayojayan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0285: maharṣiḥ kāśyapo hotā sadasyā nāradādayaḥ puṇyāśiṣaḥ prayoktāraḥ sarve hy āsaṃs tadārjune
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0287: abhiṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā mahendraḥ pākaśāsanim lokapālais tu sahitaḥ sarvair devair abhiṣṭutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0289: kirīṭāṅgadahārādyair hastābharaṇakuṇḍalaiḥ bhūṣayitvā tu taṃ pārthaṃ dvitīyam iva vāsavam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0291: putraṃ pariṣvajya tadā prītim āpa puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0292: śacī devī tathā bhadrām arundhatyādibhis tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0293: kārayām āsa vaivāhyaṃ maṅgalyaṃ yādavastriyaḥ sahāpsarobhir muditā bhūṣaṇaiś cābhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0295: paulomīm iva manyante subhadrāṃ devayoṣitaḥ tato vivāho vavṛdhe kṛtaḥ sarvaguṇānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0298: yathā tasyaiva hi pitā śacyā iva śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0299: sā jiṣṇum adhikaṃ bheje subhadrā cārudarśanā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0300: pārthasya sadṛśī bhadrā rūpeṇa vayasā tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0301: subhadrāyāś ca pārtho 'pi sadṛśo rūpalakṣaṇaiḥ ity ūcuś ca tadā devāḥ prītāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0303: evaṃ niveśya devās tu gandharvaiḥ sāpsarogaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0304: āmantrya yādavān sarve viprajagmur yathāgatam yādavāḥ pārtham āmantrya antardvīpaṃ gatās tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0306: vāsudevas tadā pārtham uvāca yadunandanaḥ dvāviṃśad divasān pārtha ihoṣya bharatarṣabha

GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0352: brāhmaṇāḥ svagṛhaṃ jagmuḥ prayujya paramāśiṣaḥ subhadrayā tu vijñaptaḥ pūrvam eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0354: raśmipragrahaṇe pārtha na me 'sti sadṛśo bhuvi tasmāt sā pūrvam āruhya raśmīñ jagrāha mādhavī
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0357: varjayitvā tu tal liṅgaṃ samucchritamahādhanuḥ āruroha rathaśreṣṭhaṃ śuklavāsā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0359: mahendradattamukuṭaṃ tathā hy ābharaṇāni ca alaṃkṛtya tu kaunteyaḥ prayātum upacakrame
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0365: sarve kāmāḥ samṛddhās te subhadre bhadrabhāṣiṇi
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0366: vāsudevapriyaṃ labdhvā bhartāraṃ vīram arjunam sarvasīmantinīnāṃ tvaṃ śreṣṭhā kṛṣṇasahodare
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0368: yasmāt sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ śreṣṭho bhartā tavārjunaḥ upapannas tvayā vīraḥ sarvalokamahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0370: svasti yāhi gṛhaṃ bhadre suhṛdbhiḥ saṃgamo 'stu te
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0371: evam uktā prahṛṣṭābhiḥ sakhībhiḥ parinanditā bhadrā bhadrajavopetān punar aśvān acodayat
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0375: dadṛśus taṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ janā jīmūtaniḥsvanam subhadrāsaṃgṛhītasya rathasya mahato ravam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0379: prababhau parayopetaḥ kailāsa iva gaṅgayā pārthaḥ subhadrāsahito virarāja mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0381: pārthasyeva pitā śakro yathā śacyā samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0382: subhadrāṃ prekṣya dharmeṇa hriyamāṇāṃ yaśasvinīm cakruḥ kilakilāśabdam āsādya bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0386: athāpare hi saṃkruddhā gṛhṇīta ghnata māciram
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0387: iti saṃvāryamāṇānāṃ sa nādaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0388: sa tena janaghoṣeṇa vīro gaja ivārditaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0389: vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi na tu kaṃ cana roṣayat
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0390: mumoca niśitān bāṇān dīpyamānān svatejasā prāsādavarasaṃgheṣu harmyeṣu bhavaneṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0393: mumoca niśitān bāṇān na ca kaṃ cana roṣayat kṣobhayitvā puraśreṣṭhaṃ garutmān iva sāgaram
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0396: śāsanāt puruṣendrasya balena mahatā balī girau raivatake nityaṃ babhūva vipṛthuśravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0399: saṃbabhūva tadā goptā purasya puravardhanaḥ prāpya pāṇḍavaniryāṇaṃ niryayau vipṛthuśravāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0401: niśamya puranirghoṣaṃ svam anīkam acodayat so 'bhipatya tadādhvānaṃ dadarśa puruṣarṣabham
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0405: pārtham āsādya yodhānāṃ vismayaḥ samapadyata udīrṇarathanāgāśvam anīkam abhivīkṣya tat
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0409: yudhyamānasya saṃgrāme rathaṃ tava nararṣabha ojastejodyutibalair ācitasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0411: pārthasya vai sārathitve bhavethā ity aśikṣayan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0412: evam uktaḥ priyāṃ prītaḥ pratyuvāca nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0413: codayāśvān asaṃsaktān viśantu vipṛthor balam bahubhir yudhyamānasya tāvakānāṃ jighāṃsataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0415: paśya bāhubalaṃ bhadre śarān vikṣipato mama
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0416: evam uktā tato bhadrā pārthena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0417: cucoda cāśvān visrabdhā tatas te viviśur balam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0418: tadāhatamahāvādyaṃ samudagradhvajāyutam anīkaṃ vipṛthor hṛṣṭaṃ pārtham evānvavartata
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0420: rathair bahuvidhair hṛṣṭāḥ sadaśvaiś ca mahājavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0422: teṣām astrāṇi saṃvārya divyair astrair mahāstravit
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0423: āvṛṇon mahad ākāśaṃ śaraiḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ teṣāṃ bāṇān mahābāhur makuṭāny aṅgadāny api
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0425: ciccheda niśitair bāṇaiḥ śarāṃś caiva dhanūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0426: yugānīṣā varūthāni yantrāṇi vividhāni ca ajighāṃsan parān pārthaś ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0428: nirdhanuṣkān vikavacān virathāṃś ca mahārathān kṛtvā pārthaḥ priyāṃ prītaḥ prekṣyatām ity adarśayat
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0430: sā dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryaṃ subhadrā pārtham abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0431: avāptārthāsmi bhadraṃ te yāhi pārtha yathāsukham
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0432: saṃsaktaṃ pāṇḍuputreṇa samīkṣya vipṛthur balam tvaramāṇo 'bhisaṃkramya sthīyatām ity abhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0434: tat tu senāpater vākyaṃ nātyavartanta yādavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0435: sāgare mārutoddhūtā velām iva mahormayaḥ tato rathavarāt tūrṇam avaruhya nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0438: so 'bravīt pārtham āsādya dīrghakālam idaṃ tava nivāsam abhijānāmi śaṅkhacakragadādharāt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0440: na me 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid yad yad ācaritaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0442: prāptasya yatiliṅgena dvārakāṃ tu dhanaṃjaya visṛṣṭā sarvavṛṣṇīnām ṛṣabheṇa ca sodarā
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0444: tvam imāṃ vīra dāśārhāṃ śacīm iva śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0445: bhaktāṃ guṇavatīṃ bhadrāṃ sadā satkartum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0446: bandhur bhava subhadrāyā gatiś ca tvaṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0447: bandhumān asi rāmeṇa mahendrāvarajena ca mām eva hi sadākārṣīn mantriṇaṃ madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0449: antareṇa subhadrāṃ ca tvāṃ ca tāta dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0451: idam evānuyātraṃ ca nirdiśya gadapūrvajaḥ antardvīpaṃ tadā vīra yāto vṛṣṇisukhāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0456: bhadrām anugamiṣyanti ratnāni ca vasūni ca

GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0459: tato vipṛthum āmantrya pārthaḥ prīto 'bhivādya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0460: kṛṣṇasya matam āsthāya kṛṣṇasya ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.001d-114_0461: pūrvam eva tu pārthāya kṛṣṇena viniyojitam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.002d-2055_01: vṛttaiḥ sahotsavair evaṃ vṛṣṇayo 'py agaman purīm
GE07mbh_01_u:212.006a: subhadrā tv atha śailendram abhyarcya saha raivatam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.006c: daivatāni ca sarvāṇi brāhmaṇān svasti vācya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.007a: pradakṣiṇaṃ giriṃ kṛtvā prayayau dvārakāṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:212.008a: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tām ādāya śucismitām
GE07mbh_01_u:212.009a: hriyamāṇāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā subhadrāṃ sainiko janaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.009c: vikrośan prādravat sarvo dvārakām abhitaḥ purīm

GE07mbh_01_u:212.011a: teṣāṃ śrutvā sabhāpālo bherīṃ sāṃnāhikīṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.017a: yojayadhvaṃ rathān āśu prāsān āharateti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.017c: dhanūṃṣi ca mahārhāṇi kavacāni bṛhanti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.018a: sūtān uccukruśuḥ kec cid rathān yojayateti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:212.018c: svayaṃ ca turagān ke cin ninyur hemavibhūṣitān
GE07mbh_01_u:212.021a: kim idaṃ kuruthāprajñās tūṣṇīṃ bhūte janārdane
GE07mbh_01_u:212.022a: eṣa tāvad abhiprāyam ākhyātu svaṃ mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.022c: yad asya rucitaṃ kartuṃ tat kurudhvam atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.023a: tatas te tad vacaḥ śrutvā grāhyarūpaṃ halāyudhāt
GE07mbh_01_u:212.023c: tūṣṇīṃ bhūtās tataḥ sarve sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.024c: punar eva sabhāmadhye sarve tu samupāviśan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.026a: satkṛtas tvatkṛte pārthaḥ sarvair asmābhir acyuta
GE07mbh_01_u:212.026c: na ca so 'rhati tāṃ pūjāṃ durbuddhiḥ kulapāṃsanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.027a: ko hi tatraiva bhuktvānnaṃ bhājanaṃ bhettum arhati
GE07mbh_01_u:212.027c: manyamānaḥ kule jātam ātmānaṃ puruṣaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_01_u:212.028a: īpsamānaś ca saṃbandhaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ ca mānayan
GE07mbh_01_u:212.028c: ko hi nāma bhavenārthī sāhasena samācaret
GE07mbh_01_u:212.029a: so 'vamanya ca nāmāsmān anādṛtya ca keśavam
GE07mbh_01_u:212.029c: prasahya hṛtavān adya subhadrāṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.030a: kathaṃ hi śiraso madhye padaṃ tena kṛtaṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:212.031c: na hi me marṣaṇīyo 'yam arjunasya vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:212.031d-2063_01: tam ahaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ nihanmi kulapāṃsanam
GE07mbh_01_u:213.001d-2064_01: mayoktaṃ na śrutaṃ pūrvaṃ sahitaiḥ sarvayādavaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.001d-2064_02: atikrāntam atikrāntaṃ na nivartati karhi cit
GE07mbh_01_u:213.001d-2064_03: śṛṇudhvaṃ sahitāḥ sarve mama vākyaṃ sahetukam
GE07mbh_01_u:213.003a: arthalubdhān na vaḥ pārtho manyate sātvatān sadā
GE07mbh_01_u:213.004c: vikrayaṃ cāpy apatyasya kaḥ kuryāt puruṣo bhuvi
GE07mbh_01_u:213.005a: etān doṣāṃś ca kaunteyo dṛṣṭavān iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.005c: ataḥ prasahya hṛtavān kanyāṃ dharmeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.006a: ucitaś caiva saṃbandhaḥ subhadrā ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:213.006c: eṣa cāpīdṛśaḥ pārthaḥ prasahya hṛtavān iti
GE07mbh_01_u:213.008a: na ca paśyāmi yaḥ pārthaṃ vikrameṇa parājayet
GE07mbh_01_u:213.009a: sa ca nāma rathas tādṛṅ madīyās te ca vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.009c: yoddhā pārthaś ca śīghrāstraḥ ko nu tena samo bhavet
GE07mbh_01_u:213.011a: yadi nirjitya vaḥ pārtho balād gacchet svakaṃ puram
GE07mbh_01_u:213.011c: praṇaśyed vo yaśaḥ sadyo na tu sāntve parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.011d-2067_01: pitṛṣvasāyāḥ putro me saṃbandhaṃ nārhati dviṣām
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012a: tac chrutvā vāsudevasya tathā cakrur janādhipa vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0001: udyogaṃ kṛtavantas te bherīṃ saṃnādya yādavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0002: arjunas tu tadā śrutvā bherīsaṃnādanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0003: kaunteyas tvaramāṇas tu subhadrām abhyabhāṣata āyānti vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve sasuhṛjjanabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0006: pramattān aśucīn mūḍhān surāmattān narādhamān vāmino vāśinādīṃs tu kariṣyāmi śarottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0009: evam uktvā priyāṃ pārtho nyavartata mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0010: nivartamānaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva subhadrā trastatāṃ gatā evaṃ mā vada pārtheti pādayoḥ patitā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0012: subhadrā nu kalir jātā vṛṣṇīnāṃ nidhanāya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0013: evaṃ bruvantaḥ paurās te janavādaṃ janāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0014: mama śokaṃ vivardhanti tasmāt pāpaṃ na cintaya
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0015: parivādabhayān muktā tvatprasādād bhavāmy aham evam uktas tataḥ pārthaḥ priyayā bhadrayā tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0017: gamanāya matiṃ cakre pārthaḥ satyaparākramaḥ smitapūrvaṃ tadābhāṣya pariṣvajya priyāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0019: utthāpya ca punaḥ pārtho yāhi yāhīti so 'bravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0020: tataḥ subhadrā tvaritā raśmīn saṃgṛhya pāṇinā
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0021: codayām āsa javanāñ śīghram aśvān kṛtatvarā
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0022: tatas tu kṛtasaṃnāhā vṛṣṇivīrāḥ samāhitāḥ pratyānayārthaṃ pārthasya javanais turagottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0024: rājamārgam anuprāptā dṛṣṭvā pārthasya vikramam prāsādapaṅktistambheṣu vedikāsu dhvajeṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0026: arjunasya śarān dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0027: keśavasya vacas tathyaṃ manyamānās tu yādavāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0028: atītya śailaṃ raivatakaṃ śrutvā tu vipṛthor vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0029: arjunena kṛtaṃ śrutvā gantukāmās tu vṛṣṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0030: śrutvā dūraṃ gataṃ pārthaṃ nyavartanta narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0031: purodyānāny atikramya viśālaṃ ca girivrajam sānuṃ muñjāvataṃ caiva vanāny upavanāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:213.012b-115_0035: prekṣyāvartaṃ tataḥ śailam arbudaṃ ca nagottamam
