GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0022: sa cāśramasthān rājarṣis tān uvāca ruṣānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0023: yady ahaṃ patito viprāḥ śuśrūṣāyāṃ na ca sthitaḥ āśu tyājyo 'smi yuṣmābhir brāhmaṇaiś ca jugupsitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0025: tan nārhatha kratuśraddhāṃ vyāghātayitum uttamām asthāne vā parityāgaṃ kartuṃ me dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0027: prapanna eva vo viprāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhatha
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0029: prasādayitvā vakṣyāmi yan naḥ kāryaṃ dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0032: etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ virarāma sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0033: yadā na śekū rājānaṃ yājanārthaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0034: tatas te yājakāḥ kruddhās tam ūcur nṛpasattamam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0035: tava karmāṇy ajasraṃ vai vartante pārthivottama
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0036: tato vayaṃ pariśrāntāḥ satataṃ karmavāhinaḥ śramād asmāt pariśrāntān sa tvaṃ nas tyaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0039: gaccha rudrasakāśaṃ tvaṃ sa hi tvāṃ yājayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0040: sādhikṣepaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā saṃkruddhaḥ śvetakir nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0041: kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā tapa ugraṃ samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0044: kadā cid dvādaśe kāle kadā cid api ṣoḍaśe āhāram akarod rājā mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0046: ūrdhvabāhus tv animiṣas tiṣṭhan sthāṇur ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0047: ṣaṇmāsān abhavad rājā śvetakiḥ susamāhitaḥ taṃ tathā nṛpaśārdūlaṃ tapyamānaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0049: śaṃkaraḥ parayā prītyā darśayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0050: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān snigdhagambhīrayā girā prīto 'smi rājaśārdūla tapasā te paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0052: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yaṃ tvam icchasi pārthiva etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rudrasyāmitatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0055: yadi me bhagavān prītaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ svayaṃ māṃ devadeveśa yājayasva sureśvara
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0057: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rājñā tena prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0058: uvāca bhagavān prītaḥ smitapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0059: nāsmākam etadviṣaye vartate yājanaṃ prati tvayā ca sumahat taptaṃ tapo rājan varārthinā
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0061: yājayiṣyāmi rājaṃs tvāṃ samayena paraṃtapa samā dvādaśa rājendra brahmacārī samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0064: kāmaṃ prārthayase yaṃ tvaṃ mattaḥ prāpsyasi taṃ nṛpa evam uktas tu rudreṇa śvetakir manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0066: tathā cakāra tat sarvaṃ yathoktaṃ śūlapāṇinā
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0067: pūrṇe tu dvādaśe varṣe punar āyān maheśvaram
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0068: dṛṣṭvaiva ca sa rājānaṃ śaṃkaro lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0071: yājanaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ tu vidhidṛṣṭaṃ paraṃtapa ato 'haṃ tvāṃ svayaṃ nādya yājayāmi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0074: durvāsā iti vikhyātaḥ sa hi tvāṃ yājayiṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0075: manniyogān mahātejāḥ saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu te etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rudreṇa samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0077: svapuraṃ punar āgamya saṃbhārān punar ārjayat
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0078: tataḥ saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro bhūyo rudram upāgamat saṃbhṛtā mama saṃbhārāḥ sarvopakaraṇāni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0080: tvatprasādān mahādeva śvo me dīkṣā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0081: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0082: durvāsasaṃ samāhūya rudro vacanam abravīt eṣa rājā mahābhāgaḥ śvetakir dvijasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0085: bāḍham ity eva vacanaṃ rudram ṛṣir uvāca ha
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0086: tataḥ satraṃ samabhavat tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0088: tasmin parisamāpte tu rājñaḥ satre mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0090: ye tatra dīkṣitāḥ sarve sadasyāś ca mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0091: so 'pi rājā mahābhāgaḥ svapuraṃ prāviśat tadā tato bhagavato vahner vikāraḥ samajāyata
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0093: tejasā viprahīṇaś ca glāniś cainaṃ samāviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0094: sa lakṣayitvā cātmānaṃ tejohīnaṃ hutāśanaḥ jagāma sadanaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmaṇo lokapūjitam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0096: tatra brāhmaṇam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0098: iccheyaṃ tvatprasādena svātmanaḥ prakṛtiṃ sthirām etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhagavān sarvalokakṛt
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0100: havyavāham idaṃ vākyam uvāca prahasann iva
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0101: tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi vasor dhārāhutaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0102: upayuktaṃ mahābhāga tena tvāṃ glānir āviśat
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0104: mā gamas tvaṃ vyathāṃ vahne prakṛtistho bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0105: purā devaniyogena yat tvayā bhasmasāt kṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0106: ālayaṃ devaśatrūṇāṃ sughoraṃ khāṇḍavaṃ vanam tatra sarvāṇi sattvāni nivasanti vibhāvaso
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0108: teṣāṃ tvaṃ medasā tṛptaḥ prakṛtistho bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0109: gaccha śīghraṃ pradagdhuṃ tvaṃ tato mokṣyasi kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0110: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ parameṣṭhimukhāc cyutam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0111: uttamaṃ javam āsthāya pradudrāva hutāśanaḥ āgamya khāṇḍavaṃ dāvam uttamaṃ javam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0113: sahasā prajvalaty agniḥ kruddho vāyusamīritaḥ pradīptaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ dṛṣṭvā ye sma tatra nivāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0115: paramaṃ yatnam ātiṣṭhan pāvakasya praśāntaye karais tu kariṇaḥ śīghraṃ jalam ādāya satvarāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0118: bahuśīrṣās tathā nāgāḥ śirobhir jalavṛṣṭayaḥ mumucuḥ pāvakābhyāśe satvarāḥ krodhamūrcchitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0121: vilayaṃ pāvakaṃ śīghram anayan bharatottama anena tu prakāreṇa bhūyo bhūyaś ca prajvalan
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0124: sa tu nairāśyam āpannaḥ sadā glānisamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0126: tac ca sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ brahmaṇe saṃnyavedayat
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0127: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān muhūrtaṃ sa vicintya tu
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0128: upāyaḥ paridṛṣṭo me yathā tvaṃ dhakṣyase 'nala
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0130: naranārāyaṇau yau tau pūrvadevau vibhāvaso saṃprāptau mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ kāryārthaṃ hi divaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0132: arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca yau tau loko 'bhimanyate
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0133: tāv etau sahitau vahne khāṇḍavasya samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0134: tau tvaṃ yācasva sāhāyye dāhārthaṃ khāṇḍavasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0135: tato dhakṣyasi taṃ dāvaṃ rakṣitaṃ tridaśair api
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0136: tau tu sattvāni sarvāṇi yatnato vārayiṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0137: devarājaṃ ca sahitau tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0138: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ tvarito havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0139: kṛṣṇapārthāv upāgamya yam arthaṃ tv abhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:215.011d-118_0140: taṃ te kathitavān asmi pūrvam eva nṛpottama
GE07mbh_01_u:215.013a: uttamāstrāṇi me santi divyāni ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_01_u:215.013c: yair ahaṃ śaknuyāṃ yoddhum api vajradharān bahūn
GE07mbh_01_u:215.014a: dhanur me nāsti bhagavan bāhuvīryeṇa saṃmitam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.014c: kurvataḥ samare yatnaṃ vegaṃ yad viṣaheta me
GE07mbh_01_u:215.015a: śaraiś ca me 'rtho bahubhir akṣayaiḥ kṣipram asyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.015b-2109_01: upāsaṃgau ca me na staḥ pratiyoddhuṃ puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_01_u:215.015c: na hi voḍhuṃ rathaḥ śaktaḥ śarān mama yathepsitān
GE07mbh_01_u:215.016a: aśvāṃś ca divyān iccheyaṃ pāṇḍurān vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:215.017a: tathā kṛṣṇasya vīryeṇa nāyudhaṃ vidyate samam
GE07mbh_01_u:215.017c: yena nāgān piśācāṃś ca nihanyān mādhavo raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:215.018a: upāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ siddhau bhagavan vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_01_u:215.019a: pauruṣeṇa tu yat kāryaṃ tat kartārau sva pāvaka
GE07mbh_01_u:216.001a: evam uktas tu bhagavān dhūmaketur hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.002a: sa ca tac cintitaṃ jñātvā darśayām āsa pāvakam
GE07mbh_01_u:216.003a: somena rājñā yad dattaṃ dhanuś caiveṣudhī ca te
GE07mbh_01_u:216.003c: tat prayacchobhayaṃ śīghraṃ rathaṃ ca kapilakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:216.004a: kāryaṃ hi sumahat pārtho gāṇḍīvena kariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:216.004c: cakreṇa vāsudevaś ca tan madarthe pradīyatām
GE07mbh_01_u:216.006c: citram uccāvacair varṇaiḥ śobhitaṃ ślakṣṇam avraṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:216.007b-2112_01: tad divyaṃ dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:216.007c: prādād vai dhanuratnaṃ tad akṣayyau ca maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_01_u:216.010c: prajāpatir anirdeśyaṃ yasya rūpaṃ raver iva
GE07mbh_01_u:216.011a: yaṃ sma somaḥ samāruhya dānavān ajayat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.011c: nagameghapratīkāśaṃ jvalantam iva ca śriyā surāriyoṣitsauvarṇaśrutitāṭaṅkanāśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:216.013c: vinardann iva tatrasthaḥ saṃsthito mūrdhny aśobhata
GE07mbh_01_u:216.014a: dhvaje bhūtāni tatrāsan vividhāni mahānti ca
GE07mbh_01_u:216.015a: sa taṃ nānāpatākābhiḥ śobhitaṃ ratham uttamam
GE07mbh_01_u:216.016b-2116_01: viṣṇor ājñāṃ gṛhītvā tu phalgunaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_01_u:216.016c: āruroha rathaṃ pārtho vimānaṃ sukṛtī yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:216.017a: tac ca divyaṃ dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:216.018a: hutāśanaṃ namaskṛtya tatas tad api vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:216.018c: jagrāha balam āsthāya jyayā ca yuyuje dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.019a: maurvyāṃ tu yujyamānāyāṃ balinā pāṇḍavena ha
GE07mbh_01_u:216.019c: ye 'śṛṇvan kūjitaṃ tatra teṣāṃ vai vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.020a: labdhvā rathaṃ dhanuś caiva tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_01_u:216.021a: vajranābhaṃ tataś cakraṃ dadau kṛṣṇāya pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.021c: āgneyam astraṃ dayitaṃ sa ca kalyo 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:216.022c: amānuṣān api raṇe vijeṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.023a: anena tvaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ devānām api cāhave
GE07mbh_01_u:216.023f-2117_01: tavaitac cakram astraṃ yan nāmataś ca sudarśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:216.023f-2117_02: tac cāsminn arpaya vibho daityaghāte yathā purā
GE07mbh_01_u:216.023f-2118_01: cakreṇa bhasmasāt sarvaṃ visṛṣṭena tu vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:216.024a: kṣiptaṃ kṣiptaṃ raṇe caitat tvayā mādhava śatruṣu
GE07mbh_01_u:216.024c: hatvāpratihataṃ saṃkhye pāṇim eṣyati te punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.025a: varuṇaś ca dadau tasmai gadām aśaniniḥsvanām
GE07mbh_01_u:216.025c: daityāntakaraṇīṃ ghorāṃ nāmnā kaumodakīṃ hareḥ tadāgner anumodāya sakhā sakhyuḥ priyaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.025d-119_0003: ajitas tvam ajeyaś ca jetā tvam asi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_01_u:216.025d-119_0004: ajitaḥ phālgunety uktvā raśmīn ādāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:216.025d-119_0005: jitam ity eva bībhatsuṃ pratyuvāca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.025d-119_0006: pradakṣiṇaṃ parikramya kareṇa ratham aspṛśat prīyamāṇo rathe tasminn abhavat kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.025d-119_0009: ratham āsthāya bībhatsuś cakre 'dhijyaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.027a: kalyau svo bhagavan yoddhum api sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.028a: cakram astraṃ ca vārṣṇeyo visṛjan yudhi vīryavān
GE07mbh_01_u:216.028c: triṣu lokeṣu tan nāsti yan na jīyāj janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:216.029c: aham apy utsahe lokān vijetuṃ yudhi pāvaka
GE07mbh_01_u:216.031a: evam uktaḥ sa bhagavān dāśārheṇārjunena ca
GE07mbh_01_u:216.031c: taijasaṃ rūpam āsthāya dāvaṃ dagdhuṃ pracakrame
GE07mbh_01_u:216.032c: dadāha khāṇḍavaṃ kruddho yugāntam iva darśayan
GE07mbh_01_u:216.034a: dahyatas tasya vibabhau rūpaṃ dāvasya bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001c: dikṣu sarvāsu bhūtānāṃ cakrāte kadanaṃ mahat janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0001: kimarthaṃ bhagavān agniḥ khāṇḍavaṃ dagdhum icchati
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0002: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vada brāhmaṇasattama
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0003: śveto nāma mahārāja āsīd ikṣvākuvaṃśajaḥ yajatas tasya rājñas tu satraṃ dvādaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0006: tatra pāṇḍucchavir abhūt pāṇḍurogeṇa dhiṣṭhitaḥ nānyasya havir ādātuṃ śakto 'bhūd dhavyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0008: śrāntaḥ śrāntatanur nityaṃ tato brahmāṇam āgamat
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0009: gatvā pitāmahaṃ devaṃ namaskṛtvā ca pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0010: vijñāpayām āsa tadā svaśarīrasya vedanām brahmovāca tadā jñātvā dagdhvā khāṇḍavasatrakam
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0012: arogaḥ siddhatejāś ca bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0013: uktamātre tadā tena brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā khāṇḍavaṃ dagdhukāmaḥ san gatvā dagdhuṃ pracakrame
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0015: vanapālais tadā devaiḥ śamito vāriṇāgamat saptakṛtvo vighātaṃ ca vahan khāṇḍavadāhakam
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0017: tato brahmāṇam agamat punar jñāpitavān prabhum
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0018: tenāpi ca samādiṣṭas tad dhi pāṇḍaravigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0019: naranārāyaṇau yau tu dvāpare kṛṣṇaphalgunau bhaviṣyantau mahātmānau khāṇḍavasya samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.001d-120_0021: tau prārthaya mahāśūrau sāhāyyaṃ te kariṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.002a: yatra yatra hi dṛśyante prāṇinaḥ khāṇḍavālayāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.002c: palāyantas tatra tatra tau vīrau paryadhāvatām
GE07mbh_01_u:217.003a: chidraṃ hi na prapaśyanti rathayor āśuvikramāt
GE07mbh_01_u:217.003c: āviddhāv iva dṛśyete rathinau tau rathottamau
GE07mbh_01_u:217.004a: khāṇḍave dahyamāne tu bhūtāny atha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.004c: utpetur bhairavān nādān vinadanto diśo daśa
GE07mbh_01_u:217.005c: sphuṭitākṣā viśīrṇāś ca viplutāś ca vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.006a: samāliṅgya sutān anye pitṝn mātṝṃs tathāpare
GE07mbh_01_u:217.006c: tyaktuṃ na śekuḥ snehena tathaiva nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.007c: tatra tatra vighūrṇantaḥ punar agnau prapedire
GE07mbh_01_u:217.008c: tatra tatra sma dṛśyante vinaśyantaḥ śarīriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.011a: tāṃs tathotpatataḥ pārthaḥ śaraiḥ saṃchidya khaṇḍaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.012c: ūrdhvam utpatya vegena nipetuḥ pāvake punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.013a: śarair abhyāhatānāṃ ca dahyatāṃ ca vanaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:217.013c: virāvaḥ śrūyate ha sma samudrasyeva mathyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.014a: vahneś cāpi prahṛṣṭasya kham utpetur mahārciṣaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.015a: tato jagmur mahātmānaḥ sarva eva divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.016a: kiṃ nv ime mānavāḥ sarve dahyante kṛṣṇavartmanā
GE07mbh_01_u:217.016c: kaccin na saṃkṣayaḥ prāpto lokānām amareśvara
GE07mbh_01_u:217.016d-2123_01: ity ākrośam akurvaṃs te lokāḥ sarve bhayānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.017a: tac chrutvā vṛtrahā tebhyaḥ svayam evānvavekṣya
GE07mbh_01_u:217.020a: asaṃprāptās tu tā dhārās tejasā jātavedasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.020c: kha eva samaśuṣyanta na kāś cit pāvakaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:217.021a: tato namucihā kruddho bhṛśam arciṣmatas tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:217.021c: punar evābhyavarṣat tam ambhaḥ pravisṛjan bahu
GE07mbh_01_u:218.002a: śaraiḥ samantataḥ sarvaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ cāpi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.002c: chādayām āsa tad varṣam apakṛṣya tato vanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:218.003a: na ca sma kiṃ cic chaknoti bhūtaṃ niścarituṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.003b-2124_01: tad dṛṣṭvā vāritaṃ toyaṃ nārācaiḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_01_u:218.003b-2124_02: āścaryam agaman devā munayaś ca divi sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.004a: takṣakas tu na tatrāsīt sarparājo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.005a: aśvasenas tu tatrāsīt takṣakasya suto balī
GE07mbh_01_u:218.005c: sa yatnam akarot tīvraṃ mokṣārthaṃ havyavāhanāt
GE07mbh_01_u:218.006c: mokṣayām āsa taṃ mātā nigīrya bhujagātmajā
GE07mbh_01_u:218.007a: tasya pūrvaṃ śiro grastaṃ puccham asya nigīryate
GE07mbh_01_u:218.007c: ūrdhvam ācakrame sā tu pannagī putragṛddhinī
GE07mbh_01_u:218.008c: śiraś ciccheda gacchantyās tām apaśyat sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.009c: mohayām āsa tatkālam aśvasenas tv amucyata
GE07mbh_01_u:218.010a: tāṃ ca māyāṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā ghorāṃ nāgena vañcitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.010c: dvidhā tridhā ca ciccheda khagatān eva bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:218.011a: śaśāpa taṃ ca saṃkruddho bībhatsur jihmagāminam
GE07mbh_01_u:218.011c: pāvako vāsudevaś ca apratiṣṭho bhaved iti
GE07mbh_01_u:218.012a: tato jiṣṇuḥ sahasrākṣaṃ khaṃ vitatyeṣubhiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.012c: yodhayām āsa saṃkruddho vañcanāṃ tām anusmaran
GE07mbh_01_u:218.013a: devarāḍ api taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃrabdham iva phalgunam
GE07mbh_01_u:218.013c: svam astram asṛjad dīptaṃ yat tatānākhilaṃ nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.013d-2125_01: subhadrajavam ādīptaṃ tadā vāyuṃ visarja ha
GE07mbh_01_u:218.016c: jaladhārāś ca tāḥ śoṣaṃ jagmur neśuś ca vidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.019a: kṛṣṇābhyāṃ rakṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca dāvam ahaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.022a: tāṃś cakarta śaraiḥ pārthaḥ saroṣān dṛśya khecarān
GE07mbh_01_u:218.023c: utpetur nādam atulam utsṛjanto raṇārthiṇaḥ ayaḥkaṇapacakrāśmabhuśuṇḍyudyatabāhavaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.028c: pāṇḍuraṃ gajam āsthāya tāv ubhau samabhidravat
GE07mbh_01_u:218.029a: aśaniṃ gṛhya tarasā vajram astram avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_01_u:218.029c: hatāv etāv iti prāha surān asurasūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.030c: jagṛhuḥ sarvaśastrāṇi svāni svāni surās tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:218.031a: kāladaṇḍaṃ yamo rājā śibikāṃ ca dhaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.031c: pāśaṃ ca varuṇas tatra vicakraṃ ca tathā śivaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.031d-2130_01: skandaḥ śaktiṃ samādāya tasthau merur ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.031d-2131_01: śaktiṃ khaḍgaṃ yāturājaḥ samīro 'ṅkuśam eva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:218.032c: jagṛhe ca dhanur dhātā musalaṃ ca jayas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:218.033a: parvataṃ cāpi jagrāha kruddhas tvaṣṭā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.033c: aṃśas tu śaktiṃ jagrāha mṛtyur devaḥ paraśvadham
GE07mbh_01_u:218.034c: mitraś ca kṣuraparyantaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya vyatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_01_u:218.035a: pūṣā bhagaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ savitā ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:218.036a: rudrāś ca vasavaś caiva marutaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.037a: ete cānye ca bahavo devās tau puruṣottamau
GE07mbh_01_u:218.039a: tathā tu dṛṣṭvā saṃrabdhaṃ śakraṃ devaiḥ sahācyutau
GE07mbh_01_u:218.040a: āgatāṃś caiva tān dṛṣṭvā devān ekaikaśas tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.041a: asakṛd bhagnasaṃkalpāḥ surāś ca bahuśaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.042c: āścaryam agamaṃs tatra munayo divi viṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.043a: śakraś cāpi tayor vīryam upalabhyāsakṛd raṇe
GE07mbh_01_u:218.044c: bhūya eva tadā vīryaṃ jijñāsuḥ savyasācinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.045a: viphalaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ tat saṃprekṣya ca śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:218.045c: bhūyaḥ saṃvardhayām āsa tad varṣaṃ devarāḍ atha
GE07mbh_01_u:218.046c: vilayaṃ gamayām āsa harṣayan pitaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:218.047a: samutpāṭya tu pāṇibhyāṃ mandarāc chikharaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:218.048c: bāṇair vidhvaṃsayām āsa gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ sahasradhā
GE07mbh_01_u:218.049a: girer viśīryamāṇasya tasya rūpaṃ tadā babhau
GE07mbh_01_u:218.050c: bhūya eva hatās tatra prāṇinaḥ khāṇḍavālayāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.001e: dvipāḥ prabhinnāḥ śārdūlāḥ siṃhāḥ kesariṇas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:219.002a: mṛgāś ca mahiṣāś caiva śataśaḥ pakṣiṇas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:219.003d-2132_02: kṛṣṇam abhyudyatāstraṃ ca nādaṃ mumucur ulbaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:219.003d-2132_03: tena nādena raudreṇa nādena ca vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.003d-2132_05: tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahābāhuḥ svatejo bhāsvaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:219.004e: nikṛttāḥ śataśaḥ sarvā nipetur analaṃ kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_01_u:219.006a: piśācān pakṣiṇo nāgān paśūṃś cāpi sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.006c: nighnaṃś carati vārṣṇeyaḥ kālavat tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:219.007a: kṣiptaṃ kṣiptaṃ hi tac cakraṃ kṛṣṇasyāmitraghātinaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.007c: hatvānekāni sattvāni pāṇim eti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.008a: tathā tu nighnatas tasya sarvasattvāni bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:219.009a: sametānāṃ ca devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.009c: vijetā nābhavat kaś cit kṛṣṇapāṇḍavayor mṛdhe
GE07mbh_01_u:219.010a: tayor balāt paritrātuṃ taṃ dāvaṃ tu yadā surāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.013a: na te sakhā saṃnihitas takṣakaḥ pannagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.013c: dāhakāle khāṇḍavasya kurukṣetraṃ gato hy asau
GE07mbh_01_u:219.014a: na ca śakyau tvayā jetuṃ yuddhe 'smin samavasthitau
GE07mbh_01_u:219.015a: naranārāyaṇau devau tāv etau viśrutau divi
GE07mbh_01_u:219.016a: naitau śakyau durādharṣau vijetum ajitau yudhi
GE07mbh_01_u:219.017a: pūjanīyatamāv etāv api sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ sayakṣarakṣogandharvanarakiṃnarapannagaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.018a: tasmād itaḥ suraiḥ sārdhaṃ gantum arhasi vāsava
GE07mbh_01_u:219.019a: iti vācam abhiśrutya tathyam ity amareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.021a: devarājaṃ tadā yāntaṃ saha devair udīkṣya tu
GE07mbh_01_u:219.022c: nirviśaṅkaṃ punar dāvaṃ dāhayām āsatus tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:219.024a: na ca sma kiṃ cic chaknoti bhūtaṃ niścarituṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.025a: nāśakaṃs tatra bhūtāni mahānty api raṇe 'rjunam
GE07mbh_01_u:219.026a: śatenaikaṃ ca vivyādha śataṃ caikena patriṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:219.026c: vyasavas te 'patann agnau sākṣāt kālahatā iva
GE07mbh_01_u:219.027a: na cālabhanta te śarma rodhaḥsu viṣameṣu ca
GE07mbh_01_u:219.028f-2133_01: apsu na vyacaraṃś caiva tathānye mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.028f-2134_01: vidyādharagaṇāś caiva ye ca tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.029a: na hy arjunaṃ mahābāhuṃ nāpi kṛṣṇaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_01_u:219.029c: nirīkṣituṃ vai śaknoti kaś cid yoddhuṃ kutaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.030a: ekāyanagatā ye 'pi niṣpatanty atra ke cana
GE07mbh_01_u:219.030c: rākṣasān dānavān nāgāñ jaghne cakreṇa tān hariḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.032a: sa māṃsarudhiraughaiś ca medaughaiś ca samīritaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.034a: tāṃ sa kṛṣṇārjunakṛtāṃ sudhāṃ prāpya hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.034c: babhūva muditas tṛptaḥ parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.036a: tam agniḥ prārthayām āsa didhakṣur vātasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.036c: dehavān vai jaṭī bhūtvā nadaṃś ca jalado yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:219.036d-2135_01: jñātvā taṃ dānavendrāṇāṃ mayaṃ vai śilpināṃ varam
GE07mbh_01_u:219.036e: jighāṃsur vāsudevaś ca cakram udyamya viṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.036f-2136_01: jihvayā lelihāno 'gnir mayaṃ dagdhuṃ tam anvagāt
GE07mbh_01_u:219.037a: sa cakram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā didhakṣuṃ ca hutāśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:219.038a: tasya bhītasvanaṃ śrutvā mā bhair iti dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.038c: pratyuvāca mayaṃ pārtho jīvayann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:219.038d-2137_01: taṃ na bhetavyam ity āha mayaṃ pārtho dayāparaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:219.039a: taṃ pārthenābhaye datte namucer bhrātaraṃ mayam
GE07mbh_01_u:219.039c: na hantum aicchad dāśārhaḥ pāvako na dadāha ca vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:219.039d-2138_01: tad vanaṃ pāvako dhīmān dināni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_01_u:219.040a: tasmin vane dahyamāne ṣaḍ agnir na dadāha ca
GE07mbh_01_u:219.040c: aśvasenaṃ mayaṃ cāpi caturaḥ śārṅgakān iti
GE07mbh_01_u:220.001a: kimarthaṃ śārṅgakān agnir na dadāha tathāgate
GE07mbh_01_u:220.001c: tasmin vane dahyamāne brahmann etad vadāśu me
GE07mbh_01_u:220.002a: adāhe hy aśvasenasya dānavasya mayasya ca
GE07mbh_01_u:220.002c: kāraṇaṃ kīrtitaṃ brahmañ śārṅgakānāṃ na kīrtitam
GE07mbh_01_u:220.003a: tad etad adbhutaṃ brahmañ śārṅgānām avināśanam
GE07mbh_01_u:220.004a: yadarthaṃ śārṅgakān agnir na dadāha tathāgate
GE07mbh_01_u:220.004c: tat te sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ kathayiṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:220.005c: āsīn maharṣiḥ śrutavān mandapāla iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.006a: sa mārgam āsthito rājann ṛṣīṇām ūrdhvaretasām
GE07mbh_01_u:220.007a: sa gatvā tapasaḥ pāraṃ deham utsṛjya bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:220.007c: jagāma pitṛlokāya na lebhe tatra tat phalam
GE07mbh_01_u:220.008a: sa lokān aphalān dṛṣṭvā tapasā nirjitān api
GE07mbh_01_u:220.009c: kiṃ mayā na kṛtaṃ tatra yasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_01_u:220.010a: tatrāhaṃ tat kariṣyāmi yadartham idam āvṛtam
GE07mbh_01_u:220.010b-2140_01: āpnomi saphalāṃl lokāṃs tat karma brūta māciram
GE07mbh_01_u:220.011a: ṛṇino mānavā brahmañ jāyante yena tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_01_u:220.011c: kriyābhir brahmacaryeṇa prajayā ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.012a: tad apākriyate sarvaṃ yajñena tapasā sutaiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.012c: tapasvī yajñakṛc cāsi na tu te vidyate prajā
GE07mbh_01_u:220.013a: ta ime prasavasyārthe tava lokāḥ samāvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.014a: punnāmno narakāt putras trātīti pitaraṃ mune
GE07mbh_01_u:220.015a: tac chrutvā mandapālas tu teṣāṃ vākyaṃ divaukasām
GE07mbh_01_u:220.015c: kva nu śīghram apatyaṃ syād bahulaṃ cety acintayat
GE07mbh_01_u:220.017c: tān apāsya sa tatraiva jagāma lapitāṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:220.017e: bālān sutān aṇḍagatān mātrā saha munir vane
GE07mbh_01_u:220.018a: tasmin gate mahābhāge lapitāṃ prati bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:220.019a: tena tyaktān asaṃtyājyān ṛṣīn aṇḍagatān vane
GE07mbh_01_u:220.019c: nājahat putrakān ārtā jaritā khāṇḍave nṛpa
GE07mbh_01_u:220.020a: tato 'gniṃ khāṇḍavaṃ dagdhum āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.020c: mandapālaś caraṃs tasmin vane lapitayā saha
GE07mbh_01_u:220.021a: taṃ saṃkalpaṃ viditvāsya jñātvā putrāṃś ca bālakān
GE07mbh_01_u:220.022a: tvam agne sarvadevānāṃ mukhaṃ tvam asi havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.022c: tvam antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ gūḍhaś carasi pāvaka
GE07mbh_01_u:220.023a: tvām ekam āhuḥ kavayas tvām āhus trividhaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.024a: tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ vadanti paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.024c: tvad ṛte hi jagat kṛtsnaṃ sadyo na syād dhutāśana
GE07mbh_01_u:220.025a: tubhyaṃ kṛtvā namo viprāḥ svakarmavijitāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_01_u:220.025c: gacchanti saha patnībhiḥ sutair api ca śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_01_u:220.026a: tvām agne jaladān āhuḥ khe viṣaktān savidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.027c: tavaiva karma vihitaṃ bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ carācaram
GE07mbh_01_u:220.028a: tvayāpo vihitāḥ pūrvaṃ tvayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_01_u:220.028c: tvayi havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca yathāvat saṃpratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:220.029a: agne tvam eva jvalanas tvaṃ dhātā tvaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.029c: tvam aśvinau yamau mitraḥ somas tvam asi cānilaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.029d-2142_04: tvam ātmā jagataḥ stutyo devadeva namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_01_u:220.029d-2143_01: mama putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca patnīṃ rakṣa hutāśana
GE07mbh_01_u:220.029d-2143_02: gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ paśūn rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarva sarvadā
GE07mbh_01_u:220.030a: evaṃ stutas tatas tena mandapālena pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:220.030e: uvāca cainaṃ prītātmā kim iṣṭaṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_01_u:220.031c: pradahan khāṇḍavaṃ dāvaṃ mama putrān visarjaya
GE07mbh_01_u:220.031d-2144_01: bhāryāṃ rakṣa gṛhaṃ rakṣa paśuṃ me rakṣa sarvadā
GE07mbh_01_u:220.031d-2144_02: patantu hetayaḥ sarve svanyad asmat tavābhibho
GE07mbh_01_u:221.001a: tataḥ prajvalite śukre śārṅgakās te suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.002a: niśāmya putrakān bālān mātā teṣāṃ tapasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:221.003a: ayam agnir dahan kakṣam ita āyāti bhīṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.004a: ime ca māṃ karṣayanti śiśavo mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.004c: abarhāś caraṇair hīnāḥ pūrveṣāṃ naḥ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:221.005a: aśaktimattvāc ca sutā na śaktāḥ saraṇe mama
GE07mbh_01_u:221.005c: ādāya ca na śaktāsmi putrān saritum anyataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.006a: na ca tyaktum ahaṃ śaktā hṛdayaṃ dūyatīva me
GE07mbh_01_u:221.006b-2145_01: kathaṃ pradīptāj jvalanād vimucyeran sutā mama
GE07mbh_01_u:221.006c: kaṃ nu jahyām ahaṃ putraṃ kam ādāya vrajāmy aham
GE07mbh_01_u:221.007a: kiṃ nu me syāt kṛtaṃ kṛtvā manyadhvaṃ putrakāḥ katham
GE07mbh_01_u:221.007c: cintayānā vimokṣaṃ vo nādhigacchāmi kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:221.007e: chādayitvā ca vo gātraiḥ kariṣye maraṇaṃ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:221.009a: stambamitras tapaḥ kuryād droṇo brahmavid uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.009c: ity evam uktvā prayayau pitā vo nirghṛṇaḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:221.009d-2146_01: sahaiva carituṃ bālair na śaknomi tapovane
GE07mbh_01_u:221.010a: kam upādāya śakyeta gantuṃ kasyāpad uttamā
GE07mbh_01_u:221.010c: kiṃ nu kṛtvā kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bhaved iti ca vihvalā
GE07mbh_01_u:221.011c: evaṃ bruvantīṃ śārṅgās te pratyūcur atha mātaram
GE07mbh_01_u:221.012a: sneham utsṛjya mātas tvaṃ pata yatra na havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.012c: asmāsu hi vinaṣṭeṣu bhavitāraḥ sutās tava
GE07mbh_01_u:221.012e: tvayi mātar vinaṣṭāyāṃ na naḥ syāt kulasaṃtatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.013a: anvavekṣyaitad ubhayaṃ kṣamaṃ syād yat kulasya naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.013c: tad vai kartuṃ paraḥ kālo mātar eṣa bhavet tava
GE07mbh_01_u:221.014a: mā vai kulavināśāya snehaṃ kārṣīḥ suteṣu naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.014c: na hīdaṃ karma moghaṃ syāl lokakāmasya naḥ pituḥ jaritovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:221.015a: idam ākhor bilaṃ bhūmau vṛkṣasyāsya samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.015c: tad āviśadhvaṃ tvaritā vahner atra na vo bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:221.018c: paśyamānā bhayam idaṃ na śakṣyāmo niṣevitum
GE07mbh_01_u:221.019a: katham agnir na no dahyāt katham ākhur na bhakṣayet
GE07mbh_01_u:221.019c: kathaṃ na syāt pitā moghaḥ kathaṃ mātā dhriyeta naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:221.020a: bila ākhor vināśaḥ syād agner ākāśacāriṇām
GE07mbh_01_u:221.020c: anvavekṣyaitad ubhayaṃ śreyān dāho na bhakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:221.021a: garhitaṃ maraṇaṃ naḥ syād ākhunā khādatā bile
GE07mbh_01_u:221.021d-2147_01: agnidāhe tu niyataṃ brahmaloke dhruvā gatiḥ jaritovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:222.001a: asmād bilān niṣpatitaṃ śyena ākhuṃ jahāra tam
GE07mbh_01_u:222.001c: kṣudraṃ gṛhītvā pādābhyāṃ bhayaṃ na bhavitā tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:222.002a: na hṛtaṃ taṃ vayaṃ vidmaḥ śyenenākhuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:222.002c: anye 'pi bhavitāro 'tra tebhyo 'pi bhayam eva naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:222.003a: saṃśayo hy agnir āgacched dṛṣṭaṃ vāyor nivartanam
GE07mbh_01_u:222.003c: mṛtyur no bilavāsibhyo bhaven mātar asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_01_u:222.004c: cara khe tvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ putrān vetsyasi śobhanān jaritovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:222.005a: ahaṃ vai śyenam āyāntam adrākṣaṃ bilam antikāt
GE07mbh_01_u:222.006a: taṃ patantam ahaṃ śyenaṃ tvaritā pṛṣṭhato 'nvagām
GE07mbh_01_u:222.006d-2148_01: namo 'stu te śyenarāja rakṣitā rājavat tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:222.007a: yo no dveṣṭāram ādāya śyenarāja pradhāvasi
GE07mbh_01_u:222.007c: bhava tvaṃ divam āsthāya niramitro hiraṇmayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:222.008a: yadā sa bhakṣitas tena kṣudhitena patatriṇā
GE07mbh_01_u:222.008c: tadāhaṃ tam anujñāpya pratyupāyāṃ gṛhān prati
GE07mbh_01_u:222.009a: praviśadhvaṃ bilaṃ putrā viśrabdhā nāsti vo bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:222.009c: śyenena mama paśyantyā hṛta ākhur na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:222.010a: na vidma vai vayaṃ mātar hṛtam ākhum itaḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:222.010c: avijñāya na śakṣyāmo bilam āviśatuṃ vayam jaritovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:222.011a: ahaṃ hi taṃ prajānāmi hṛtaṃ śyenena mūṣakam
GE07mbh_01_u:222.011c: ata eva bhayaṃ nāsti kriyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:222.012a: na tvaṃ mithyopacāreṇa mokṣayethā bhayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_01_u:222.012c: samākuleṣu jñāneṣu na buddhikṛtam eva tat
GE07mbh_01_u:222.013a: na copakṛtam asmābhir na cāsmān vettha ye vayam
GE07mbh_01_u:222.013c: pīḍyamānā bharasy asmān kā satī ke vayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_01_u:222.015a: vayam apy agnim āviśya lokān prāpsyāmahe śubhān
GE07mbh_01_u:222.015c: athāsmān na dahed agnir āyās tvaṃ punar eva naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:222.015d-2149_01: samāgamaś ca bhavitā tvaṃ vai śokaṃ ca mā kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:222.016a: evam uktā tataḥ śārṅgī putrān utsṛjya khāṇḍave
GE07mbh_01_u:222.016c: jagāma tvaritā deśaṃ kṣemam agner anāśrayam
GE07mbh_01_u:222.017c: yatra śārṅgā babhūvus te mandapālasya putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:222.018a: te śārṅgā jvalanaṃ dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_01_u:222.018b-2150_01: vyathitāḥ karuṇā vācaḥ śrāvayām āsur antikāt
GE07mbh_01_u:222.018c: jaritāris tato vācaṃ śrāvayām āsa pāvakam
GE07mbh_01_u:223.001c: sa kṛcchrakālaṃ saṃprāpya vyathāṃ naivaiti karhi cit
GE07mbh_01_u:223.002a: yas tu kṛcchram asaṃprāptaṃ vicetā nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_01_u:223.002c: sa kṛcchrakāle vyathito na prajānāti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:223.003a: dhīras tvam asi medhāvī prāṇakṛcchram idaṃ ca naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.003c: śūraḥ prājño bahūnāṃ hi bhavaty eko na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.004a: jyeṣṭhas trātā bhavati vai jyeṣṭho muñcati kṛcchrataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.004c: jyeṣṭhaś cen na prajānāti kanīyān kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:223.005a: hiraṇyaretās tvarito jvalann āyāti naḥ kṣayam
GE07mbh_01_u:223.006a: evam ukto bhrātṛbhis tu jaritārir vibhāvasum
GE07mbh_01_u:223.006c: tuṣṭāva prāñjalir bhūtvā yathā tac chṛṇu pārthiva
GE07mbh_01_u:223.007a: ātmāsi vāyoḥ pavanaḥ śarīram uta vīrudhām
GE07mbh_01_u:223.007c: yonir āpaś ca te śukra yonis tvam asi cāmbhasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.008a: ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca gacchanti visarpanti ca pārśvataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.008c: arciṣas te mahāvīrya raśmayaḥ savitur yathā
GE07mbh_01_u:223.009a: mātā prapannā pitaraṃ na vidmaḥ; pakṣāś ca no na prajātābjaketo
GE07mbh_01_u:223.009c: na nas trātā vidyate 'gne tvad anyas; tasmād dhi naḥ parirakṣaikavīra
GE07mbh_01_u:223.010a: yad agne te śivaṃ rūpaṃ ye ca te sapta hetayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.011a: tvam evaikas tapase jātavedo; nānyas taptā vidyate goṣu deva
GE07mbh_01_u:223.011c: ṛṣīn asmān bālakān pālayasva; pareṇāsmān praihi vai havyavāha
GE07mbh_01_u:223.012a: sarvam agne tvam evaikas tvayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_01_u:223.012c: tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ bibharṣi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:223.013a: tvam agnir havyavāhas tvaṃ tvam eva paramaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.013c: manīṣiṇas tvāṃ yajante bahudhā caikadhaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:223.014a: sṛṣṭvā lokāṃs trīn imān havyavāha; prāpte kāle pacasi punaḥ samiddhaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.014c: sarvasyāsya bhuvanasya prasūtis; tvam evāgne bhavasi punaḥ pratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_01_u:223.015a: tvam annaṃ prāṇināṃ bhuktam antarbhūto jagatpate
GE07mbh_01_u:223.015c: nityaṃ pravṛddhaḥ pacasi tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_01_u:223.016a: sūryo bhūtvā raśmibhir jātavedo; bhūmer ambho bhūmijātān rasāṃś ca
GE07mbh_01_u:223.016c: viśvān ādāya punar utsargakāle; sṛṣṭvā vṛṣṭyā bhāvayasīha śukra
GE07mbh_01_u:223.017a: tvatta etāḥ punaḥ śukra vīrudho haritacchadāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.017c: jāyante puṣkariṇyaś ca samudraś ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.018a: idaṃ vai sadma tigmāṃśo varuṇasya parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:223.018c: śivas trātā bhavāsmākaṃ māsmān adya vināśaya
GE07mbh_01_u:223.019c: pareṇa praihi muñcāsmān sāgarasya gṛhān iva
GE07mbh_01_u:223.021a: ṛṣir droṇas tvam asi vai brahmaitad vyāhṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_01_u:223.021c: īpsitaṃ te kariṣyāmi na ca te vidyate bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:223.022a: mandapālena yūyaṃ hi mama pūrvaṃ niveditāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.022c: varjayeḥ putrakān mahyaṃ dahan dāvam iti sma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:223.023a: yac ca tad vacanaṃ tasya tvayā yac ceha bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_01_u:223.023c: ubhayaṃ me garīyas tad brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_01_u:223.023e: bhṛśaṃ prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te brahman stotreṇa te vibho droṇa uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:223.024a: ime mārjārakāḥ śukra nityam udvejayanti naḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:223.025a: tathā tat kṛtavān vahnir abhyanujñāya śārṅgakān
GE07mbh_01_u:224.001c: uktavān apy aśītāṃśuṃ naiva sa sma na tapyate
GE07mbh_01_u:224.002a: sa tapyamānaḥ putrārthe lapitām idam abravīt
GE07mbh_01_u:224.002c: kathaṃ nv aśaktāḥ plavane lapite mama putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.004a: kathaṃ nv aśaktā trāṇāya mātā teṣāṃ tapasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:224.005a: kathaṃ nu saraṇe 'śaktān patane ca mamātmajān
GE07mbh_01_u:224.006a: jaritāriḥ kathaṃ putraḥ sārisṛkvaḥ kathaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_01_u:224.006c: stambamitraḥ kathaṃ droṇaḥ kathaṃ sā ca tapasvinī
GE07mbh_01_u:224.007a: lālapyamānaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ mandapālaṃ tathā vane
GE07mbh_01_u:224.008a: na te suteṣv avekṣāsti tān ṛṣīn uktavān asi
GE07mbh_01_u:224.008c: tejasvino vīryavanto na teṣāṃ jvalanād bhayam
GE07mbh_01_u:224.009a: tathāgnau te parīttāś ca tvayā hi mama saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_01_u:224.010a: lokapālo 'nṛtāṃ vācaṃ na tu vaktā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:224.010c: samarthās te ca vaktāro na te teṣv asti mānasam
GE07mbh_01_u:224.011a: tām eva tu mamāmitrīṃ cintayan paritapyase
GE07mbh_01_u:224.011c: dhruvaṃ mayi na te sneho yathā tasyāṃ purābhavat
GE07mbh_01_u:224.012a: na hi pakṣavatā nyāyyaṃ niḥsnehena suhṛjjane
GE07mbh_01_u:224.013a: gaccha tvaṃ jaritām eva yadarthaṃ paritapyase
GE07mbh_01_u:224.013c: cariṣyāmy aham apy ekā yathā kāpuruṣe tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:224.014a: nāham evaṃ care loke yathā tvam abhimanyase
GE07mbh_01_u:224.014c: apatyahetor vicare tac ca kṛcchragataṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:224.015c: avamanyeta taṃ loko yathecchasi tathā kuru
GE07mbh_01_u:224.016c: dveṣyaṃ hi hṛdi saṃtāpaṃ janayaty aśivaṃ mama
GE07mbh_01_u:224.017a: tasmād deśād atikrānte jvalane jaritā tataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.018a: sā tān kuśalinaḥ sarvān nirmuktāñ jātavedasaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.019a: aśraddheyatamaṃ teṣāṃ darśanaṃ sā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.020c: atha te sarva evainaṃ nābhyanandanta vai sutāḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.020d-2154_04: pariṣvajya ca tān putrān mūrdhny upāghrāya bālakān
GE07mbh_01_u:224.020d-2154_05: putrasparśāt tu yā prītis tām avāpa sa gautamaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.021a: lālapyamānam ekaikaṃ jaritāṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.021c: nocus te vacanaṃ kiṃ cit tam ṛṣiṃ sādhv asādhu vā
GE07mbh_01_u:224.022a: jyeṣṭhaḥ sutas te katamaḥ katamas tadanantaraḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:224.022c: madhyamaḥ katamaḥ putraḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ katamaś ca te
GE07mbh_01_u:224.023a: evaṃ bruvantaṃ duḥkhārtaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE07mbh_01_u:224.023c: kṛtavān asmi havyāśe naiva śāntim ito labhe
GE07mbh_01_u:224.023d-2156_01: evam uktvā tu tāṃ patnīṃ mandapālas tathāspṛśat jaritovāca
GE07mbh_01_u:224.024a: kiṃ te jyeṣṭhe sute kāryaṃ kim anantarajena vā
GE07mbh_01_u:224.024c: kiṃ ca te madhyame kāryaṃ kiṃ kaniṣṭhe tapasvini
GE07mbh_01_u:224.025a: yas tvaṃ māṃ sarvaśo hīnām utsṛjyāsi gataḥ purā
GE07mbh_01_u:224.025c: tām eva lapitāṃ gaccha taruṇīṃ cāruhāsinīm
GE07mbh_01_u:224.026a: na strīṇāṃ vidyate kiṃ cid anyatra puruṣāntarāt
GE07mbh_01_u:224.026c: sāpatnakam ṛte loke bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:224.026d-2158_01: strīṇāṃ sadā hi sāpatnyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:224.028c: saptarṣimadhyagaṃ vīram avamene ca taṃ munim
GE07mbh_01_u:224.030a: apatyahetoḥ saṃprāptaṃ tathā tvam api mām iha
GE07mbh_01_u:224.030c: iṣṭam evaṃgate hitvā sā tathaiva ca vartase
GE07mbh_01_u:224.031a: naiva bhāryeti viśvāsaḥ kāryaḥ puṃsā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_01_u:224.031c: na hi kāryam anudhyāti bhāryā putravatī satī
GE07mbh_01_u:224.032a: tatas te sarva evainaṃ putrāḥ samyag upāsire
GE07mbh_01_u:224.032c: sa ca tān ātmajān rājann āśvāsayitum ārabhat
GE07mbh_01_u:225.001c: agninā ca tathety evaṃ pūrvam eva pratiśrutam
GE07mbh_01_u:225.002a: agner vacanam ājñāya mātur dharmajñatāṃ ca vaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.002c: yuṣmākaṃ ca paraṃ vīryaṃ nāhaṃ pūrvam ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.003a: na saṃtāpo hi vaḥ kāryaḥ putrakā maraṇaṃ prati
GE07mbh_01_u:225.003c: ṛṣīn veda hutāśo 'pi brahma tad viditaṃ ca vaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.004a: evam āśvāsya putrān sa bhāryāṃ cādāya bhārata
GE07mbh_01_u:225.004c: mandapālas tato deśād anyaṃ deśaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_01_u:225.005a: bhagavān api tigmāṃśuḥ samiddhaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_01_u:225.006a: vasāmedovahāḥ kulyās tatra pītvā ca pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.006c: agacchat paramāṃ tṛptiṃ darśayām āsa cārjunam
GE07mbh_01_u:225.008a: kṛtaṃ yuvābhyāṃ karmedam amarair api duṣkaram
GE07mbh_01_u:225.008c: varān vṛṇītaṃ tuṣṭo 'smi durlabhān apy amānuṣān
GE07mbh_01_u:225.009a: pārthas tu varayām āsa śakrād astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:225.009b-2159_01: astraṃ pāśupataṃ deva vṛṇomi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_01_u:225.009b-2159_04: astraṃ pāśupataṃ divyaṃ tryambakas te pradāsyati
GE07mbh_01_u:225.009c: grahītuṃ tac ca śakro 'sya tadā kālaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_01_u:225.011a: aham eva ca taṃ kālaṃ vetsyāmi kurunandana
GE07mbh_01_u:225.011c: tapasā mahatā cāpi dāsyāmi tava tāny aham
GE07mbh_01_u:225.012a: āgneyāni ca sarvāṇi vāyavyāni tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_01_u:225.013c: dadau ca tasmai devendras taṃ varaṃ prītimāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_01_u:225.014a: dattvā tābhyāṃ varaṃ prītaḥ saha devair marutpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.015a: pāvakaś cāpi taṃ dāvaṃ dagdhvā samṛgapakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_01_u:225.015c: ahāni pañca caikaṃ ca virarāma sutarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.016a: jagdhvā māṃsāni pītvā ca medāṃsi rudhirāṇi ca
GE07mbh_01_u:225.016c: yuktaḥ paramayā prītyā tāv uvāca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_01_u:225.017c: anujānāmi vāṃ vīrau carataṃ yatra vāñchitam
GE07mbh_01_u:225.017d-2160_01: gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyam akṣayyau ca maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_01_u:225.017d-2160_02: kapidhvajo rathaś cāyaṃ tava dattau mahāratha
GE07mbh_01_u:225.018c: arjuno vāsudevaś ca dānavaś ca mayas tathā
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-2161_02: prāñjaliḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā pūjayitvā punaḥ punaḥ janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0001: vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca dadāha bhagavān vahniḥ kimarthaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0002: kasya vā vipriyaṃ kurvan kasya vā priyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0003: na hy alpe kāraṇe vahnir nirbandhaṃ kartum arhati dahanaṃ prati viprendra khāṇḍavasyeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0005: śṛṇu me bhāvito rājan sarvam eva yathātatham
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0007: babhūva rājā rājendra śvetaketur iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0009: jagrāha dīkṣāṃ sa nṛpas tadā varṣasahasrakīm
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0010: ṛtvigbhiḥ sahito dhīmān ayajaj janamejaya tasya satre tadā tasmin samāgacchan maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0013: tatas tu ṛtvijas tasya dhūmavyākulalocanāḥ kālena mahatā khinnās tatyajus te narādhipam
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0015: tataḥ prasādayām āsa ṛtvijaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0016: cakṣur vikalatāṃ prāptā na prasīduś ca tasya te tatas teṣām anumate vighnitas tu narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0018: satraṃ samāpayām āsa ṛtvigbhir aparaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0019: satreṇa mahatā cāpi yayau svargam abhiṣṭutaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0020: ṛtvigbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ sasadasyaiḥ samanvitaḥ satre papau havyavāhaḥ sahasraṃ parivatsarān
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0022: sa tena haviṣā vahniḥ parāṃ tṛptim agacchata
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0023: na caicchad agnir ādātuṃ havir anyasya kasya cit aruciś cāviśat tasya tato 'gāt sa pitāmaham
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0026: bhagavan paramā tṛptiḥ kṛtā vai śvetaketunā
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0027: aruciś cāviśat tīvrā tāṃ na śaknomy apohitum
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0028: tam abravīt tadā vahniṃ sarvabhūtapitāmahaḥ aruciṃ nāśayiṣye te samayaṃ pratipadyase
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0031: abravīt taṃ tato brahmā khāṇḍavaṃ tvaṃ daher yadi
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0032: tatra hy aneke ripavaḥ surāṇāṃ nivasanty uta
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0033: matprasādād ruciḥ samyak tava vahne bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0034: kālaṃ ca kaṃ cit kṣamatāṃ tatas tad dhakṣyate bhavān
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0036: tābhyāṃ tvaṃ sahito dāvaṃ dhakṣyase havyavāhana
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0037: evam astv iti taṃ vahnir brahmāṇaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0038: saṃbhūtau tau viditvā tu naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0039: tadasya mahato rājaṃs tac ca vākyaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0040: anusmṛtya jagāmātha dāvaṃ dagdhuṃ ca havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0041: etat te kathitaṃ rājan yathaitad abhavat purā
GE07mbh_01_u:225.019d-121_0042: dahanād yatra mukto 'sau mayo nāgo 'tha śārṅgakāḥ
